quiz.text: What's the weather like in winter? It's cold and windy.
quiz.nativeText: 冬天天气怎么样？又冷又风大。
quiz.hilitText: What's the weather like in winter? It's cold and windy.
quiz.name: ReadaftermeU1_1.mp3

quiz.text: Hey you! Give me the ball, I want to play too. You're a bit rude. we don't want to play with you.
quiz.hilitText: Hey you! Give me the ball, I want to play too. You're a bit rude. we don't want to play with you.
quiz.nativeText: 嘿，你！你把球给我，我也想玩。你有些粗鲁，我们不想和你玩。
quiz.name: ReadaftermeU1_2.mp3

quiz.text: Why don't they want to play with me? Come over here, Mike. Let me tell you a story.
quiz.hilitText: Why don't they want to play with me? Come over here, Mike. Let me tell you a story.
quiz.nativeText: 他们为什么不想和我玩? 麦克到这里来，我来给你讲个故事。
quiz.name: ReadaftermeU1_3.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks, Mum. That's a nice little story. I know what to do now.
quiz.hilitText: Thanks, Mum. That's a nice little story. I know what to do now.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢妈妈。这是一个很好的小故事。我现在知道怎么做了。
quiz.name: ReadaftermeU1_4.mp3

quiz.text: Happy birthday, Jane!
quiz.nativeText: 生日快乐，简。
quiz.name: 4b685c4ed8341a8ae9ba8dac937f2624.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, but today is not my birthday.
quiz.nativeText: 啊，谢谢，但是今天不是我生日。
quiz.name: 704347217c40c8d665053649c153280f.mp3

quiz.text: Really? Was it yesterday?
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？是昨天吗？
quiz.name: d973cf5a54e692296488e7cb8c358ac9.mp3

quiz.text: No, it's the day after tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 不是。是后天。
quiz.name: 70c02d7ca558db3c7c8d92fdedf1e38d.mp3

quiz.text: But Bob told me it's today.
quiz.nativeText: 但是鲍伯告诉我是今天。
quiz.name: ca1b386cc6488771f5ba53ce9c13c25d.mp3

quiz.text: He confuses my birthday with Cam's.
quiz.nativeText: 他把我的生日和卡姆的搞混了。
quiz.name: ffc5891545aff7ab57cb790ee209eb48.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Is there anybody else who has celebrated a birthday recently?
quiz.nativeText: 我明白了。最近还有别人过了生日吗？
quiz.name: 14b39959cca6ba8089349d8a9738c175.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, our boss. His birthday was the day before yesterday.
quiz.nativeText: 有,是我们的老板。他的生日是在前天。
quiz.name: b696717508a24475a06be895adbd4d95.mp3

learnText: 长元音。发音时，上下唇微开，上下齿分开，舌尖稍抵下齿，嘴角尽量向两边移动，像微笑的样子。[i]的发音类似"衣"，但声音要拉长些。

quiz.text: teacher
quiz.nativeText: 教师
quiz.name: d27692d1fb689faa3bee6b726024c2ac.mp3

quiz.text: tree
quiz.nativeText: 大树
quiz.name: c0f8e24cf041639c4fc457ebec9490eb.mp3

quiz.text: please
quiz.nativeText: 请便
quiz.name: 40ba2b843a1b46f184dbeb9b84a0b260.mp3

quiz.text: reason
quiz.nativeText: 理由
quiz.name: 36eddfbda4235dee51fe30bd18ca5ce4.mp3

name: i

quiz.text: John, what day is it today?
quiz.nativeText: 约翰，今天星期几？
quiz.name: c7095350d26d06b925ffd2991c40f045.mp3

quiz.text: It's Wednesday, mom.
quiz.nativeText: 是星期三，妈妈。
quiz.name: 19dfe3b37c1a95be45b52754a27063b3.mp3

quiz.text: I thought today was Thursday. Is your soccer game on Thursday?
quiz.nativeText: 我还以为今天星期四。你的足球比赛是在周四吗？
quiz.name: 2027bb19e5d2ad9ad39cf152bd5ac25d.mp3

quiz.text: No, it isn't. The soccer game is on Friday.
quiz.nativeText: 不，不是。足球赛在周五。
quiz.name: 8a020f697250bea47a6816b8a791fa4a.mp3

quiz.text: Are you ready for it?
quiz.nativeText: 你准备好了吗？
quiz.name: b360418c8906b6377e0642330e2ebe1d.mp3

quiz.text: Not really. I feel nervous.
quiz.nativeText: 并没有。我好紧张。
quiz.name: 45da1f6e11d62f604218be9b98b063ef.mp3

quiz.text: Why? You're one of the best players at your school.
quiz.nativeText: 为什么？你是学校最好的球员之一。
quiz.name: 68d36ba66291ee6a90109107f8b54df8.mp3

quiz.text: We lost last Monday because of me. I'm afraid of repeating my mistakes this time.
quiz.nativeText: 我们上周一因为我而输了，我害怕重蹈覆辙。
quiz.name: 9a146d3014b5359a2790af77ba0aea51.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry. I'm sure you'll play well.
quiz.nativeText: 别担心，我肯定你会踢得很好。
quiz.name: d0dcff0e472fc8e3e4f1b47bd1f28d1d.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, mom. I'll try my best.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢妈妈，我一定尽力。
quiz.name: 675f6fff9e4ed577c1c4f4e32c9c93e2.mp3

quiz.text: teacher
quiz.nativeText: 教师
quiz.name: d27692d1fb689faa3bee6b726024c2ac.mp3

quiz.text: tree
quiz.nativeText: 大树
quiz.name: c0f8e24cf041639c4fc457ebec9490eb.mp3

quiz.text: many people
quiz.nativeText: 人们
quiz.name: f701a8a8446730463608855550cf8017.mp3

quiz.text: succeed in
quiz.nativeText: 在某方面成功
quiz.name: c99dc651044ed18419bbc5fd49c26a01.mp3

quiz.text: Lee,a three-year-old boy put his shoes on by himself.
quiz.nativeText: 一个三岁的小男孩自己穿了鞋。
quiz.hilitText: {#*Lee*$},a {#*three*$}-year-old boy put his shoes on by himself.
quiz.ipa: l{#*i*$} ə θr{#*i*$} jɪr oʊld bɔɪ pʊt hɪz ʃuz ɑn baɪ hɪmsɛlf
quiz.name: 880d1fbb640b92316d045271d36854d0.mp3

quiz.text: Then only feet from the finish line, disaster struck. I tripped and fell.
quiz.nativeText: 在脚快到终点线的那有时刻，厄运发生了，我被绊倒了。
quiz.hilitText: Then {#*only*$} {#*feet*$} from the finish line, disaster struck. I tripped and fell.
quiz.ipa: ð{#*i*$}z ɑr ð{#*i*$} oʊnl{#*i*$} f{#*i*$}t aɪ hæv
quiz.name: 0624427fa4f55ba105a6eb1afda7375a.mp3

quiz.text: Honey, what time is it now?
quiz.nativeText: 亲爱的，现在几点？
quiz.name: be9b2e395346cfa6a24ebd596d098e26.mp3

quiz.text: The clock says seven thirty.
quiz.nativeText: 钟表上显示的是七点半。
quiz.name: b78bf3ecffd2958da39bfc52514ab457.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I still have time for breakfast.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我还有时间吃早餐。
quiz.name: 088b86d3c6dc284708dda9afbc4a5836.mp3

quiz.text: Take your time. There's no need to hurry.
quiz.nativeText: 慢慢来，不用着急。
quiz.name: 1fef6f32c9770bc5ce16b709709ae90a.mp3

quiz.text: By the way, we have to call a plumber.
quiz.nativeText: 顺便说一句，我们得叫个水管工。
quiz.name: 99d131f0e27a1dfd59e7451506ed4498.mp3

quiz.text: What's wrong?
quiz.nativeText: 怎么了？
quiz.name: 3a17cc2dde3436f7fe85f4e82edd3738.mp3

quiz.text: Our water pipes burst this morning.
quiz.nativeText: 今天早晨我们的水管裂了。
quiz.name: b2b1ccadba5ed0c3995cc833fcf1dfec.mp3

quiz.text: I have called just now, and the plumber will come to fix the pipes on Saturday.
quiz.nativeText: 刚刚我已经打了电话， 水管工周六会来修水管。
quiz.name: 8f6dc84fcf5f0397abcd6ba37fb7fdfb.mp3

quiz.text: That's great. What time is it now?
quiz.nativeText: 那太好了。现在几点了？
quiz.name: 356654839073552a9eb7dd2b17f8b3bf.mp3

quiz.text: Your phone shows a quarter past eight right now.
quiz.nativeText: 现在你的手机显示八点十五了。
quiz.name: e40d973928277ceecfc753d169a0e711.mp3

quiz.text: It doesn't feel like forty-five minutes have passed.
quiz.nativeText: 但感觉不像过了四十五分钟啊。
quiz.name: e818b0b27635d5517862144ca0c79c2d.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry. I forgot the clock is broken.
quiz.nativeText: 我很抱歉。我忘了钟表坏了。
quiz.name: 3e0dd534d454b682f6941c362e482a2c.mp3

quiz.text: Oh my god, I have a meeting at eight thirty!
quiz.nativeText: 我的天，八点半我有个会！
quiz.name: a92c8f5707fe7b51ed57f8e0dba81227.mp3

quiz.text: Don't take the subway this time. Just drive.
quiz.nativeText: 这次别乘地铁了，就开车吧。
quiz.name: d85ed868ec22e4785c17a383276cbf9b.mp3

quiz.text: Lee,a three-year-old boy put his shoes on by himself.
quiz.nativeText: 一个三岁的小男孩自己穿了鞋。
quiz.hilitText: {#*Lee*$},a {#*three*$}-year-old boy put his shoes on by himself.
quiz.ipa: l{#*i*$} ə θr{#*i*$} jɪr oʊld bɔɪ pʊt hɪz ʃuz ɑn baɪ hɪmsɛlf
quiz.name: 880d1fbb640b92316d045271d36854d0.mp3

quiz.text: His mother noticed his left shoe was on his right foot.
quiz.nativeText: 他的妈妈发现他把左右脚穿反了。
quiz.hilitText: His mother noticed his left shoe was on his right foot.
quiz.ipa: hɪz mʌðɝ noʊtəst hɪz lɛft ʃu wɑz ɑn hɪz raɪt fʊt
quiz.name: eb89b2df381b0cb93319aea53e8708d4.mp3

quiz.text: She said, "Lee, your shoes are on the wrong feet."
quiz.nativeText: 妈妈说：“儿子，你的鞋穿错脚了。”
quiz.hilitText: {#*She*$} said, "{#*Lee*$}, your shoes are on the wrong {#*feet*$}."
quiz.ipa: ʃ{#*i*$} sɛd l{#*i*$} jʊr ʃuz ɝ ɑn ðə rɔŋ f{#*i*$}t
quiz.name: 3ff61728f832f0e63f8fd5a65bec706d.mp3

quiz.text: He looked up with a puzzled look and said,
quiz.nativeText: 儿子迷惑的抬起头来看着妈妈说，
quiz.hilitText: {#*He*$} looked up with a puzzled look and said,
quiz.ipa: h{#*i*$} lʊkt ʌp wɪð ə pʌzəld lʊk ænd sɛd
quiz.name: 16dffe347904d46940bc46dcbb1fec24.mp3

quiz.text: "Mom, stop joking. These are the only feet I have!"
quiz.nativeText: “妈妈你别开玩笑啦，我只有这一双脚！”
quiz.ipa: mɑm stɑp dʒoʊkɪŋ ð{#*i*$}z ɑr ð{#*i*$} oʊnl{#*i*$} f{#*i*$}t aɪ hæv
quiz.name: f3e29f8824da72d897512c1a7e1b8b62.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, I'm Peter. Nice to meet you.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，我是皮特，很高兴认识你。
quiz.name: 67fd34d1d37e60aed481ecc7079c18a1.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, I'm Taylor. Nice to meet you too.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我是泰勒，也很高兴认识你。
quiz.name: b4826c9262f44e9d2ce8afe2f514313e.mp3

quiz.text: Where are you from, Taylor?
quiz.nativeText: 泰勒，你来自哪里？
quiz.name: 425a3a972fe7522f6789386a0d5e9287.mp3

quiz.text: I am from China.
quiz.nativeText: 我来自中国。
quiz.name: dc7ca044cf3f058bc6c3b625154108e7.mp3

quiz.text: Which part of China?
quiz.nativeText: 中国的哪个部分？
quiz.name: f8e26d678eca446a24b4c0fc8929b7d6.mp3

quiz.text: The north of China. How about you?
quiz.nativeText: 中国北方。你呢？
quiz.name: cd64e64ce196547b7870d84527b181b8.mp3

quiz.text: I am from Indonesia.
quiz.nativeText: 我来自印度尼西亚。
quiz.name: a2c25f90299d47d0ed7fd0ba23054fd5.mp3

quiz.text: It must be very hot there.
quiz.nativeText: 那里肯定非常炎热。
quiz.name: 2040f9797112df72eff0efa3915a6504.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It's summer for the whole year in my country.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。在我的国家全年都是夏天。
quiz.name: 056054a2b90072ff280fe6bcbc4cdb14.mp3

quiz.text: The north of China has four distinct seasons.
quiz.nativeText: 中国北方四季分明。
quiz.name: 898dff68078a0e47e6b9980b0fefd9fc.mp3

quiz.text: I've already felt that. I never knew what autumn was like until I came to Beijing.
quiz.nativeText: 我已经感受到了。来北京之前，我从来不知道秋天是什么样的。
quiz.name: 13cfd212ef54b7c7980cbcf8225e36dd.mp3

quiz.text: It's cool now. The autumn wind is rustling through the trees.
quiz.nativeText: 现在很凉爽。秋风飒飒地吹过树木。
quiz.name: 15c0ffbfef1bb7a9f012ac2d397fa24a.mp3

quiz.text: We only have a rainy season and a dry season. Things get damp easily.
quiz.nativeText: 我们那里只有雨季和旱季。什么都很容易受潮。
quiz.name: b83bc38d358095b93efce4fa06bcd10b.mp3

quiz.text: I would like to go to Indonesia and see a tropical rainforest.
quiz.nativeText: 但是我想去印度尼西亚看看热带雨林。
quiz.name: 4041d5b9a1b1c345df527505af61f124.mp3

quiz.text: I really like it here, and the changing of seasons is very new to me.
quiz.nativeText: 我很喜欢这里，季节的变化对我来说很新鲜。
quiz.name: db4aa71b22b9b18a919633bc062e63ad.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, you can experience all four seasons.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，你可以体验到四个季节。
quiz.name: 10f703f0e0646372e19a6188a17fb6f9.mp3

quiz.text: Good Morning!
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！
quiz.name: fac93e7c697984f224d796dda66fbd7a.mp3

quiz.text: Morning, dad. What's the date today?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，爸爸。今天几号？
quiz.name: 73e1c2b6c92d43146d27d3c66231fb69.mp3

quiz.text: It's the May fifth.
quiz.nativeText: 今天是五月五日。
quiz.name: b39c228a83bf9343ab56794dbb660f63.mp3

quiz.text: Do you and mom have time two days from now?
quiz.nativeText: 你和妈妈两天后有时间吗？
quiz.name: 0f165af1a366e5c5359f8d530ebe4541.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. What's up?
quiz.nativeText: 有啊。怎么了？
quiz.name: 247c2df519a8573a495ef33fc6b651fc.mp3

quiz.text: Our class is going to put on a show on May seventh.
quiz.nativeText: 我们班要在五月七日进行表演。
quiz.name: 5a1c05a3c94666756180e1538d4ee113.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of show?
quiz.nativeText: 什么类型的表演？
quiz.name: ca13ee0d3899c47e6fddd45e5ff3e4c6.mp3

quiz.text: A musical. Would you like to come and watch?
quiz.nativeText: 音乐剧。你们想来看吗？
quiz.name: dfd28197c94d8a911eb797a1d9c744c5.mp3

quiz.text: Of course! Your mom and I love musicals! When will it start?
quiz.nativeText: 当然！你妈妈和我喜欢看音乐剧！什么时候开始？
quiz.name: 1bfae73aa6a22fed5e3b36468b3205f9.mp3

quiz.text: Five fifty p.m.
quiz.nativeText: 晚上五点五十。
quiz.name: e2a57236b0cbe13255dac401fcc137ab.mp3

quiz.text: We're usually back from work at five thirty.
quiz.nativeText: 我们通常五点半下班回来。
quiz.name: e4fa9648642ff7bd142066ff2eb64211.mp3

quiz.text: Please don't be late!
quiz.nativeText: 请别迟到！
quiz.name: ba0705b6c88a9e49f0e2e6ac184b8359.mp3

quiz.text: What month is it?
quiz.nativeText: 这是哪月？
quiz.name: 307ecbdf24fdafdc08e2894ad70d2e66.mp3

quiz.text: It's April.
quiz.nativeText: 是四月。
quiz.name: d328d11a6354fbb96d365e9e7bdf12ba.mp3

quiz.text: Which month is the last month in a year?
quiz.nativeText: 哪个月份是一年中的最后一个月？
quiz.name: e640683e582005a1372409280ee6dae4.mp3

quiz.text: December.
quiz.nativeText: 是十二月。
quiz.name: 7def6361f3dbe9722a1d93810a4bd249.mp3

quiz.text: What's the name of the month before April?
quiz.nativeText: 四月前面的哪个月叫什么名字？
quiz.name: c1e1f5ef055f5a9305a72757987b97b4.mp3

quiz.text: It is March.
quiz.nativeText: 三月。
quiz.name: 5ba12d8ea64b9e3cd358c354e3eb1710.mp3

quiz.text: Please name three months that begin with the letter "J".
quiz.nativeText: 请说出三个月份，它们的第一个字母都是J。
quiz.name: 563167a490ebc3ad38c06fc02e9ecc41.mp3

quiz.text: January, June and July.
quiz.nativeText: 一月，六月，七月。
quiz.name: 3dc7909922ba1a1ba75e371a09959a8e.mp3

quiz.text: Which month has the fewest days?
quiz.nativeText: 哪个月份天数最少？
quiz.name: ef1af38fa4c204a6de52b47ae368c738.mp3

quiz.text: February has the fewest days.
quiz.nativeText: 二月。
quiz.name: db86cade8263df63630c129963c8b357.mp3

quiz.text: The last question: Which month do students start the new school year in?
quiz.nativeText: 最后一个问题：学生们在哪个月份开始新的学年？
quiz.name: 2f96e670a1fd28f686b30a5628f9a073.mp3

quiz.text: It is September.
quiz.nativeText: 九月。
quiz.name: b75699ae85e879d1f3face0ccdd5d805.mp3

quiz.text: When is National Day in China?
quiz.nativeText: 中国的国庆节是什么时候？
quiz.name: 14f0f6e9e63486f81bd64a5d861ece29.mp3

quiz.text: October first.
quiz.nativeText: 十月一日
quiz.name: fa7568fdf1311fd1fa7328c6566d2940.mp3

quiz.text: When was the People's Republic of China founded?
quiz.nativeText: 中华人民共和国什么时候成立的？
quiz.name: 2620a6b1c58e82ae53916aa10ffcaaea.mp3

quiz.text: On October first, nineteen forty nine.
quiz.nativeText: 一九四九年十月一日。
quiz.name: 3da332948907943f12eec9aab1e191a5.mp3

quiz.text: When is Thanksgiving Day in the United States?
quiz.nativeText: 美国的感恩节是什么时候？
quiz.name: 6d6c9b515a5976f284b8cadb5feacb06.mp3

quiz.text: On the fourth Thursday in November every year.
quiz.nativeText: 在每年十一月的第四个星期四。
quiz.name: 5b9067976bbe3bec10a02e866b60b9f0.mp3

quiz.text: When is Father's Day?
quiz.nativeText: 父亲节是什么时候？
quiz.name: 7e90c20b928d6f239cc637dce9befa75.mp3

quiz.text: On the third Sunday in June.
quiz.nativeText: 在六月的第三个周日。
quiz.name: 2a78fccf8329e454e379f8192194b408.mp3

quiz.text: Which year did Socrates die?
quiz.nativeText: 苏格拉底在哪年去世？
quiz.name: 04789b562b259bcaff8509e520a6e10f.mp3

quiz.text: In three hundred and ninety-nine B.C.
quiz.nativeText: 公元前三百九十九年。
quiz.name: fb2a99a71c8a1e98d36a1e66d343570c.mp3

quiz.text: When was the Roman Empire divided into two parts?
quiz.nativeText: 罗马帝国什么时候被一分为二？
quiz.name: 05fe6289902accb91dc0db4d3d6f25ce.mp3

quiz.text: In three hundred and ninety-five A.D.
quiz.nativeText: 在公元后三百九十五年。
quiz.name: 642d8b00bac5e892cadae9871143dd29.mp3

quiz.text: When families gather for Christmas dinner,
quiz.name: ead68def3ef54f89d61257006dac240f.mp3

quiz.text: some will stick to formal traditions dating back to Grandma’s generation.
quiz.name: c82b6ed6ed13481fb80d8789dd3e9ee2.mp3

quiz.text: Their tables will be set with the good dishes and silver,
quiz.name: 3a32175b0dfd24658c83bc7ba8762a5b.mp3

quiz.text: and the dress code will be Sunday best.

quiz.text: this china-and-silver elegance has given way to a stoneware -and-stainless informality,

quiz.text: with dresses assuming an equally casual-Friday look.
quiz.name: c8a163ae1a12eb9ac70b7ca8640544a2.mp3

quiz.text: For hosts and guests, the change means greater simplicity and comfort.

quiz.text: For makers of fine china in Britain,
quiz.name: 5f5e81313abcb89eb86b16f1379d9d06.mp3

quiz.text: it spells economic hard times.
quiz.name: d45264f65aaaefa8ee68164dedde9257.mp3

quiz.text: Last week Royal Doulton announced that it is eliminating 1,000 jobs,
quiz.name: 1bac5ca7ea5f86211edb036a479308d6.mp3

quiz.text: one-fifth of its total workforce.
quiz.name: ca061c4cc8b64b723725880788ae34be.mp3

quiz.text: Wedgwood and other pottery factories made cuts earlier.
quiz.name: 3ce7eed112de8cbec276c1ffc4a8341f.mp3

quiz.text: One spring day some naughty boys were playing near a pond.
quiz.hilitText: One spring day some naughty boys were playing near a pond.
quiz.ipa: wʌn sprɪŋ deɪ sʌm nɔti bɔɪz wɝ pleɪɪŋ nɪr ə pɑnd
quiz.name: 498b59c8291d2d14fcce0dc19c2b4c5e.mp3

quiz.text: They began to throw large stones into the water.
quiz.hilitText: They began to throw large stones into the water.
quiz.ipa: ðeɪ bɪɡæn tu θroʊ lɑrdʒ stoʊnz ɪntu ðə wɔtɝ
quiz.name: b961bfd958d2523f1e917124928f39c3.mp3

quiz.text: The frogs in the pond were very afraid of the children because the stones killed some of them.
quiz.hilitText: The frogs in the pond were very afraid of the children because the stones killed some of them.
quiz.ipa: ðə frɑɡz ɪn ðə pɑnd wɝ vɛri əfreɪd ʌv ðə tʃɪldrən bɪkɔz ðə stoʊnz kɪld sʌm ʌv ðɛm
quiz.name: d80551bed4d225275cbb2eda1dbf79de.mp3

quiz.text: So an old frog lifted his head out of the water and said, "Boys, please don't throw stones at us."
quiz.hilitText: So an old frog lifted his head out of the water and said, "Boys, please don't throw stones at us."
quiz.ipa: soʊ æn oʊld frɑɡ lɪftɪd hɪz hɛd aʊt ʌv ðə wɔtɝ ænd sɛd bɔɪz pliz doʊn θroʊ stoʊnz æt ʌs
quiz.name: a5ae4a8a2230030842df86a48f5c4637.mp3

quiz.text: The boys said, "But it gave us lots of pleasure. We came here for playing and don't want to go home yet."
quiz.hilitText: The boys said, "But it gave us lots of pleasure. We came here for playing and don't want to go home yet."
quiz.ipa: ði bɔɪz sɛd bʌt ɪt ɡeɪv ʌs lɑts ʌv plɛʒɝ wi keɪm hɪr frɝ pleɪɪŋ ænd doʊnt wɔnt tu ɡoʊ hoʊm jɛt
quiz.name: 503117d889ae0ac92d7c276008f8b06f.mp3

quiz.text: "I know that, but don't be selfish, my kids. What is play to you is death to us." said the old frog,
quiz.hilitText: "I know that, but don't be selfish, my kids. What is play to you is death to us." said the old frog,
quiz.ipa: aɪ noʊ ðæt bʌt doʊnt bi sɛlfɪʃ maɪ kɪdz wʌt ɪz pleɪ tu ju ɪz dɛθ tu ʌs sɛd ði oʊld frɑɡ
quiz.name: 1dd0cb0d9f486edf170dd64dc647259d.mp3

quiz.text: "Look at the pond, now it's full of stones.
quiz.hilitText: "Look at the pond, now it's full of stones.
quiz.ipa: lʊk æt ðə pɑnd naʊ ɪts fʊl ʌv stoʊnz
quiz.name: 540f3cc779c6d218ab4b7e93edbc2adc.mp3

quiz.text: Water is treasure to the fish, and it should be your job to protect the nature rather than change it.
quiz.hilitText: Water is treasure to the fish, and it should be your job to protect the nature rather than change it.
quiz.ipa: wɔtɝ ɪz trɛʒɝ tu ðə fɪʃ ənd ɪt ʃʊd bi jʊr dʒɑb tu prətɛkt ðə neɪtʃɝ ræðɝ ðæn tʃeɪndʒ ɪt
quiz.name: b76696c756a92b0ecce400235dbf3035.mp3

quiz.text: I believe your teacher has told you that from the textbook".
quiz.hilitText: I believe your teacher has told you that from the textbook".

quiz.name: 453bdfa4e203a5765fd99291feb2a210.mp3

quiz.name: 116fdd75819abdbeb67c21140012fb32.mp3

quiz.text: Cinderella danced so joyfully that she forgot the time.
quiz.hilitText: Cinderella danced so joyfully that she forgot the time.

quiz.name: 9ce1da9a27cc191bb54ad172d45c4869.mp3

quiz.name: 8f57933c896da99775c6939c4f1bf9db.mp3

quiz.text: The prince only found one of her glass slippers.

quiz.name: 2b80d9942960e3699783266287449666.mp3

learnText: 发/h/音时，嘴半开，上下齿亦张开，不振动声带，向外呵气即成。整个发音过程就好比你在清理眼镜前，向镜片上哈气一样。也有点像在叹气。而发/f/音时，嘴巴张开程度比发/h/音时小一些，牙齿贴近或轻触下唇。那么，比如在读“far”这个单词的第二个音时，你就需要把嘴张得更开一些。

learnText: /f/和/v/这两个音的发音位置相同，均为上齿轻轻咬住下唇内侧。区别在于，但念/f/这个音时，气流更强，且不振动声带。而念/v/时，声带需要振动。

name: /f/,/v/

learnText: 发/v/这个音时，上齿轻轻咬住下唇内侧。再用力气将气从唇齿之间的缝隙中吹出来，但需要振动声带。而发/w/这个音时，双唇向前突出，发出类似汉语拼音“w”或汉字“乌”的音，然后嘴唇放松。发完第一个音后，立刻向后面的音（通常元音）滑动。

name: /eɪ/,/aɪ/

learnText: 发/ɑ/这个音时，嘴巴尽量张大，舌头自然放平，舌尖不要触碰下齿。类似汉字“啊”的发音，但嘴巴的张开幅度更大。/ɑ/这个音是个圆唇短元音，因此念起来须短促有力。而/oʊ/是个双元音，先发短“鹅”音/ə/，随后慢慢滑向短“乌”音。它的发音与汉字“欧”相似，但是个长元音，发音时要发够长度。

quiz.text: Hey, what do you think of this on me?
quiz.nativeText: 嘿，你觉得我身上的这件怎么样?

quiz.text: That blouse looks good on you.
quiz.nativeText: 这件女式衬衫穿在你身上挺好的。
quiz.name: 87795fcb3419ad78e530d2de1e7738e9.mp3

quiz.text: Pink really suits me. But I'm not sure about the material. It's made of cotton.
quiz.nativeText: 粉色真的很适合我。但我不太确定面料。它是棉质的。
quiz.name: 16f03e4e568d535420e6818a992d6824.mp3

quiz.text: Cotton cloth wrinkles easily. Try a cotton blend.

quiz.name: ee07f0c018801b574c338a2d928edc00.mp3

quiz.text: That's a good idea. What are you trying on?
quiz.nativeText: 好主意。你在试什么？
quiz.name: 572d6fbb1cde992f2ee04fa171c1b5b3.mp3

quiz.text: A bright green dress.

quiz.name: 64d12331f88246aa9045033b60bfd847.mp3

quiz.text: It doesn't suit you. You look like a giant cabbage.

quiz.name: a1e83fa7a71b687ddf9977f063fef4e4.mp3

quiz.text: It's too loud. I'd better try on something else.

quiz.name: 1b9b0db57b639058c7d6921542940537.mp3

quiz.text: Have you made up your mind?

quiz.name: c44a3634151189a679f456c2cead7b66.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, how about you?

quiz.name: 95ea16605340d1a02e56697150864ba3.mp3

quiz.text: I've chosen this one, which is made of cotton blend.

quiz.name: 056c5be113266a9d0227d42412b5b062.mp3

quiz.text: Looks great!
quiz.nativeText: 看上去好极了！
quiz.name: d6b4411925d4401343d7148271046951.mp3

learnText: 短元音。发音时，上下唇及上下齿要比发[i]时微开，双唇扁平，舌尖稍抵下齿。[ɪ]的发音介于"衣"与"也"之间。

quiz.text: sit
quiz.nativeText: 坐下
quiz.name: 0925cf378e385fc077ac24c7305651b0.mp3

quiz.text: pick
quiz.nativeText: 捡起
quiz.name: d9f6d86a3c4dd82ccef63fe5b5cd2def.mp3

quiz.text: think
quiz.nativeText: 认为
quiz.name: f8638794ef44c14a01fad314929e5a9f.mp3

quiz.text: big
quiz.nativeText: 大的
quiz.name: a60c6c694491d75b439073b8cb05b139.mp3

name: ɪ

quiz.text: How long do I have to change?
quiz.nativeText: 我有多长时间换衣服？
quiz.name: 3a68bf6b3c7f35a8dd9766d1e1d04380.mp3

quiz.text: About five minutes. We're running out of time.
quiz.nativeText: 大概五分钟。我们快没时间了。
quiz.name: 6a1ad003afdb0781f99466a487e4b46c.mp3

quiz.text: I know, but I can't find that blue A-line dress I bought recently!
quiz.nativeText: 我知道，但是我找不到我最近买的那件A字裙了。
quiz.name: df674d79f9b61f93c7365466abd22de5.mp3

quiz.text: I remember you put it into the closet.
quiz.nativeText: 我记得你把它放进衣柜里了。
quiz.name: 2201f68c50dba9d1fa02d34efb7daf4a.mp3

quiz.text: I'm looking for it right now. Are you ready?
quiz.nativeText: 我现在正在衣柜里找。你准备好了？
quiz.name: 7744a690fea70dbc47df86df0d8e0f49.mp3

quiz.text: I've been ready for twenty minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 我二十分钟前就好了。
quiz.name: 426834945a40c35836b311205f702430.mp3

quiz.text: Really? Why are you still wearing your slippers?
quiz.nativeText: 真的？那你为什么还穿着拖鞋？
quiz.name: 8e39bb2f64df038ee64daad7dfaedd15.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I forgot to put on my dress shoes. Let me put them on.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，我忘了穿正装鞋了，我马上穿。
quiz.name: 5f5a9cef1eb7d756d2c68c5e9681b899.mp3

quiz.text: I'll just wear my old dress. OK. How do I look in this lilac wrap dress?
quiz.nativeText: 我就穿我的旧连衣裙好了。浅紫色的裹身裙看起来怎么样？
quiz.name: d6bee8efd3ee66c1dfcaf78a975dcbd5.mp3

quiz.text: You look beautiful in anything, dear.
quiz.nativeText: 你穿什么都好看，亲爱的。
quiz.name: 9f243922df5142cb4a77d6091321daf7.mp3

quiz.text: I'll fold these piles of clothes after we get back.
quiz.nativeText: 我们回来以后我再叠这几堆衣服吧。
quiz.name: 3bf9eb1d0bc2f59b6fda84f8d7ae0a98.mp3

quiz.text: It seems like you've turned the whole closet inside out.
quiz.nativeText: 看上去你把整个衣柜的衣服都翻出来了。
quiz.name: b1cac63a5924fa755e3da2e8e4681697.mp3

quiz.text: Because you said we're running out of time.
quiz.nativeText: 因为你说我们快没时间了。
quiz.name: 81d55cf344d37b3d73a57afe9ba738b5.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, we are. Now hurry up, or we'll be late.
quiz.nativeText: 我们确实是。快点，要不就要迟到了。
quiz.name: ccf733d526dc4f73e60194975c69cafa.mp3

quiz.text: sit
quiz.nativeText: 坐下
quiz.name: 0925cf378e385fc077ac24c7305651b0.mp3

quiz.text: city
quiz.nativeText: 城市
quiz.name: 859214628431995197c0558f7b5f8ffc.mp3

quiz.text: pick up
quiz.nativeText: 捡起
quiz.name: 069ab15d7933e4322397c8664f125cd9.mp3

quiz.text: fit in
quiz.nativeText: 合适
quiz.name: 0884d8207d621a8a6430cf150a57b4b9.mp3

quiz.text: A policeman in a big city stops a man in a car with a tiger in the front seat.
quiz.nativeText: 在一个大城市里，一位警察拦下一个男人的车，车的前座有一只老虎。
quiz.hilitText: A policeman {#*in*$} a {#*big*$} {#*city*$} stops a man {#*in*$} a car {#*with*$} a tiger {#*in*$} the front seat.
quiz.ipa: ə pəlismən {#*ɪ*$}n ə b{#*ɪ*$}ɡ s{#*ɪ*$}ti stɑps ə mæn {#*ɪ*$}n ə kɑr w{#*ɪ*$}θ ə taɪɡɝ {#*ɪ*$}n ðə frʌnt sit
quiz.name: 336e0bc82c88e36c4579c5eec3df978b.mp3

quiz.text: The man replied, "I did. We had such a good time. We are going to the beach this weekend!"
quiz.nativeText: 这个男人回答说：“是的。我们在动物园玩得很开心。我们现在要去沙滩享受周末了！”
quiz.hilitText: The man {#*replied*$}, "I {#*did*$}. We had such a good time. We are {#*going*$} to the beach {#*this*$} weekend!"
quiz.ipa: ðə mæn r{#*ɪ*$}plaɪd aɪ d{#*ɪ*$}d wi hæd sʌtʃ ə ɡʊd taɪm wi ɑr ɡoʊ{#*ɪ*$}ŋ tu ðə bitʃ ð{#*ɪ*$}s wikɛnd
quiz.name: 36be84d732e9f6507a8fa5cb5c037d20.mp3

quiz.text: Hello. Welcome to class! What is this?
quiz.nativeText: 你好，欢迎来课堂！这是什么？
quiz.name: 4016f60e55705929a015b5a498410024.mp3

quiz.text: A pair of jeans.
quiz.nativeText: 一件牛仔裤。
quiz.name: d4272f386f63b45af7d84db7c63e4b04.mp3

quiz.text: What color are the jeans?
quiz.nativeText: 这条牛仔裤是什么颜色的？
quiz.name: 87d8500e13660e15579da86b6456200a.mp3

quiz.text: They are blue.
quiz.nativeText: 是蓝色的。
quiz.name: 369e38a36e3e2125142c4bd92f0b4b57.mp3

quiz.text: What's this?
quiz.nativeText: 这是什么？
quiz.name: 5acb8aae7a703dc8b3f8563f66de81d9.mp3

quiz.text: A pair of Oxford shoes.
quiz.nativeText: 一双牛津鞋。
quiz.name: 79d86a8462023145faad7456c29e5e76.mp3

quiz.text: And could you tell me what kind of shoes these are?
quiz.nativeText: 你能告诉我这是哪种鞋?
quiz.name: 1fd75f2919d77a077263078e4364e241.mp3

quiz.text: A pair of Chelsea boots.
quiz.nativeText: 一双切尔西靴。
quiz.name: bbb363253259cb8eb6af023214d4b900.mp3

quiz.text: Now could you tell me the name of this?
quiz.nativeText: 现在你能告诉我这个的名字吗？
quiz.name: 173830f0120b0a3805ee48c074f32d42.mp3

quiz.text: A jacket.
quiz.nativeText: 一件夹克。
quiz.name: 8e937712b6b4e4fc27762da73f6ce040.mp3

quiz.text: A policeman in a big city stops a man in a car with a tiger in the front seat.
quiz.nativeText: 在一个大城市里，一位警察拦下一个男人的车，车的前座有一只老虎。
quiz.hilitText: A policeman {#*in*$} a {#*big*$} {#*city*$} stops a man {#*in*$} a car {#*with*$} a tiger {#*in*$} the front seat.
quiz.ipa: ə pəlismən {#*ɪ*$}n ə b{#*ɪ*$}ɡ s{#*ɪ*$}ti stɑps ə mæn {#*ɪ*$}n ə kɑr w{#*ɪ*$}θ ə taɪɡɝ {#*ɪ*$}n ðə frʌnt sit
quiz.name: 336e0bc82c88e36c4579c5eec3df978b.mp3

quiz.text: "What are you doing with that tiger?" he exclaims, "You should take it to the zoo."
quiz.nativeText: “你带着老虎做什么？”这个警察说：“你应该把他带到动物园里去！”
quiz.hilitText: "What are you {#*doing*$} {#*with*$} that tiger?" he {#*exclaims*$}, "You should take {#*it*$} to the zoo."
quiz.ipa: wʌt ɑr ju du{#*ɪ*$}ŋ w{#*ɪ*$}θ ðæt taɪɡɝ hi {#*ɪ*$}kskleɪmz ju ʃʊd teɪk {#*ɪ*$}t tu ðə zu
quiz.name: 73ad7aa7b8e5464d29696c807d4916d2.mp3

quiz.text: The following week, the same policeman sees the same man with the tiger again.
quiz.nativeText: 之后的那个星期，同一个警察又看到了带着老虎开车的那个男人
quiz.hilitText: The {#*following*$} week, the same policeman sees the same man {#*with*$} the tiger again.
quiz.ipa: ðə fɑloʊ{#*ɪ*$}ŋ wik ðə seɪm pəlismən siz ðə seɪm mæn w{#*ɪ*$}θ ðə taɪɡɝ əɡɛn
quiz.name: e52a1f52fe91ce37c03b4ff1bd087f2f.mp3

quiz.text: And both of them are wearing glasses. The policeman pulls him over.
quiz.nativeText: 这次他们都带着墨镜。这位警察把他拦了下来。
quiz.hilitText: And both of them are {#*wearing*$} {#*glasses*$}. The policeman pulls {#*him*$} over.
quiz.ipa: ænd boʊθ ʌv ðɛm ɝ wɛr{#*ɪ*$}ŋ ɡlæs{#*ɪ*$}z ðə pəlismən pʊlz h{#*ɪ*$}m oʊvɝ
quiz.name: 15b7c51cc0f09535ec1c7bee09c03e0b.mp3

quiz.text: "I thought you were going to take that tiger to the zoo!"
quiz.nativeText: “我还以为你把老虎带到动物园去了呢！”
quiz.hilitText: "I thought you were {#*going*$} to take that tiger to the zoo!"
quiz.ipa: aɪ θɔt ju wɝ ɡoʊ{#*ɪ*$}ŋ tu teɪk ðæt taɪɡɝ tu ðə zu
quiz.name: 12c316cc498c9da8d0ead40128a8a34c.mp3

quiz.text: The man replied, "I did. We had such a good time. We are going to the beach this weekend!"
quiz.nativeText: 这个男人回答说：“是的。我们在动物园玩得很开心。我们现在要去沙滩享受周末了！”
quiz.hilitText: The man {#*replied*$}, "I {#*did*$}. We had such a good time. We are {#*going*$} to the beach {#*this*$} weekend!"
quiz.ipa: ðə mæn r{#*ɪ*$}plaɪd aɪ d{#*ɪ*$}d wi hæd sʌtʃ ə ɡʊd taɪm wi ɑr ɡoʊ{#*ɪ*$}ŋ tu ðə bitʃ ð{#*ɪ*$}s wikɛnd
quiz.name: 36be84d732e9f6507a8fa5cb5c037d20.mp3

quiz.text: Honey, what do you want to do this weekend?
quiz.nativeText: 亲爱的，这周末你想做什么？
quiz.name: 2eb4e5c40800f3132f4199fa4910be1f.mp3

quiz.text: Can we go shopping on the weekend?
quiz.nativeText: 周末我们可以去购物吗？
quiz.name: d09e7d5102395e416e1a8752dc620c30.mp3

quiz.text: Anything special to buy?
quiz.nativeText: 有什么想买的吗？
quiz.name: e5b5a0d0ea73e15ee842be5c85891141.mp3

quiz.text: I need a skirt for Peter's birthday party next week.
quiz.nativeText: 我需要一件可以穿去下周彼得生日聚会的裙子。
quiz.name: ece575e1b2212152ce4f94e91882cc3e.mp3

quiz.text: But you just bought a black skirt two days ago.
quiz.nativeText: 但是你两天前刚刚买了一条黑裙子。
quiz.name: 0eb3785327d2de8e0811f9229e38f99b.mp3

quiz.text: That's a tube skirt. It's for work.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一件筒裙。是为了上班买的。
quiz.name: 1c42c0bf74ba318d06de98ed550f0e58.mp3

quiz.text: What about that blue skirt you have?
quiz.nativeText: 你的那件蓝色的裙子怎么样？
quiz.name: b17102275bf02d0cca878553c9ff81eb.mp3

quiz.text: It's already out of style.
quiz.nativeText: 最近它已经过时了。
quiz.name: 5ade3e4b1a24fed6d2e6f6b6bbb2da94.mp3

quiz.text: But I saw you put it on yesterday.
quiz.nativeText: 但是我昨天还看见你穿了。
quiz.name: 4d1b9383053b7bee20ec7f9bda7b2ba8.mp3

quiz.text: No, yesterday I wore a knee-length gathered skirt with white patterns.
quiz.nativeText: 不，昨天我穿了一件及膝的打褶裙，带有白色的图案。
quiz.name: 0ed3dc322d971efc23733e9454e662f9.mp3

quiz.text: What about the tulip skirt that I gave to you last year?
quiz.nativeText: 去年那件我送给你的郁金香裙怎么样？
quiz.name: 63a38932d1abe52953cb061e1e19c482.mp3

quiz.text: I've lost weight, so it's too loose now.
quiz.nativeText: 我已经减下来了，所以现在它太松了。
quiz.name: c84ff726ec466d0fc4536cfa790af3a5.mp3

quiz.text: I can't believe you still want another skirt. You have so many!
quiz.nativeText: 我不敢相信你还是想买一件裙子。你都有这么多了！
quiz.name: 8f1f568b847170a8dbaacb3dc732385b.mp3

quiz.text: I'm a girl. We always want more skirts.
quiz.nativeText: 我是个女生。我们总是需要更多的裙子。
quiz.name: 50b2a22eecf7db9f43c31aada51bd3cd.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 腕花（舞会上的女性或婚礼上新娘戴在手腕上的装饰品）

quiz.text: OK. We've already bought your dress, now you need something to go with it.
quiz.nativeText: 好啦。我们已经买好了你的裙子，现在你需要点东西和它搭配。
quiz.name: 87a1faade0426fcf9363a2ce04370a05.mp3

quiz.text: I think I need a wrist corsage.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得我需要一个腕花。
quiz.name: 8c8d4deeb25699396e2db6c0551f8ab3.mp3

quiz.text: Your date will bring one for you, so don't worry about the corsage.
quiz.nativeText: 你的男伴会给你带过来，所以不要担心腕花的事。
quiz.name: b02d605dfebe15571ffd6e0e76de14ac.mp3

quiz.text: How about these earrings, this bracelet, and an anklet?
quiz.nativeText: 这对耳环，这个手镯，还有一条脚链怎么样？
quiz.name: 96ce23ae609bc1a0527aba4a28481f54.mp3

quiz.text: Well, that might be going a bit overboard. Don't you think the earrings are too shiny?
quiz.nativeText: 啊，这有点太过了。你不觉得那对耳环太闪了吗?
quiz.name: 9ae40116b1d6acbef0a66f8b0ce64094.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'll change to a pair of smaller ones.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，我会换另一对小一些的。
quiz.name: b20d7da3f113f6490a5e71111926c65c.mp3

quiz.text: Keep the bracelet and lose the anklet, it doesn't go with your high heels.
quiz.nativeText: 留着手镯，然后不要脚链，它和你的高跟鞋不搭。
quiz.name: 04f687f502292a1a77b2a9343907024f.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe you're right.
quiz.nativeText: 也许你是对的。
quiz.name: c7f82c581ce3cad5c7252763b77511b2.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, take this shawl. It might be cold outside at night.
quiz.nativeText: 哦，拿上这条披肩。晚上外面可能会冷。
quiz.name: 778d9e4557c2252429bbd0a66444609f.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, mom, but I think it's too plain.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢，妈妈。但我觉得它太素了。
quiz.name: aba94268fb5057c34ebbcdf422679724.mp3

quiz.text: How about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 那这条怎么样？
quiz.name: 2bba67da36e38d6d59e153266fb7a050.mp3

quiz.text: That's the one!
quiz.nativeText: 就是它啦！
quiz.name: aa461fc809d8d67a5ee2e5a5a36e8e47.mp3

quiz.text: What is this called?
quiz.nativeText: 这是什么？
quiz.name: d74973719475aea07d744f621736c162.mp3

quiz.text: It is an A-line dress.
quiz.nativeText: 这是一条A字裙。
quiz.name: a162f900a065b7f68218f9ab56d0c3aa.mp3

quiz.text: What about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 这一件呢？
quiz.name: 96cdc502e42e9f5fefb5ef9705e2d26e.mp3

quiz.text: It is a wrap dress.
quiz.nativeText: 这是一条裹身裙。
quiz.name: f8253bc0526dd2cb3f9457ae871bc980.mp3

quiz.text: I think it may be a bit too tight. What about that one?
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得这件有点太紧了。那一条呢？
quiz.name: 6cf41ff8bbee3cef32e51cd4567ec0a9.mp3

quiz.text: That is a gathered skirt.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一件百褶裙。
quiz.name: 5b06ff64c312cf8713bfb9becde4b05c.mp3

quiz.text: I love all the pleats. What is this one?
quiz.nativeText: 我很喜欢这些褶皱。这一件是什么？
quiz.name: 70d86580f20ee0cfbf9d35335aa43371.mp3

quiz.text: It is called a tube skirt.
quiz.nativeText: 这叫做筒裙。
quiz.name: 3224631a50f58740d370eadacc5d6819.mp3

quiz.text: Is that a blouse?
quiz.nativeText: 那是一件女式衬衫吗？
quiz.name: 642c140bad19c981dac696a6b67fd6be.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, it is.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。
quiz.name: 1cda95f887b53785d6a15fee6240a42c.mp3

quiz.text: What is it made of?
quiz.nativeText: 它是用什么材料做的？
quiz.name: 60a4b04c902a7ce153d8e4cd153d12bf.mp3

quiz.text: It is made of a cotton blend.
quiz.nativeText: 它是棉混纺的。
quiz.name: 5022454d4b045551e9e565be1d40866c.mp3

quiz.text: It doesn't wrinkle as easily as a pure cotton would, right?
quiz.nativeText: 这种衣服不像纯棉的容易皱，对吗？
quiz.name: eb5875e0ce29d5faa3965efecef8c460.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. And the cotton blend fabric is more breathable than pure cotton.
quiz.nativeText: 你说对了。而且棉混纺的布料比纯棉更透气。
quiz.name: 3c492d9a6b4e06c19fc971b4d1dae515.mp3

quiz.text: But I think it's kind of out of style.
quiz.nativeText: 但是我觉得它有点过时了。
quiz.name: ce2ff17459d1cf53843f2382b5c774fb.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. Let's go to another shop.
quiz.nativeText: 我同意。我们去另一家店吧。
quiz.name: 99de79a9d774472ec5f1eab68f744374.mp3

quiz.text: In the 1920s demand for American farm products fell,
quiz.name: 054ec367a06ca9ade9f7bef2c76de72d.mp3

quiz.text: as European countries began to recover from World War I.
quiz.name: 470247b98c3f7444b6f1408f11b9d30a.mp3

quiz.text: The result was a sharp drop in farm prices.
quiz.name: 9bca6da8c348b364b7933792d84533d7.mp3

quiz.text: This period was more disastrous for farmers than earlier times,
quiz.name: 14bf47e7acbacbe89d8ad99248b92bdf.mp3

quiz.text: because farmers were no longer self-sufficient.
quiz.name: 5d109d6f107d7edb839c1dd9e555275c.mp3

quiz.text: They were paying for machinery, seed, and fertilizer,
quiz.name: c775700eca05f7a7ea9db3aa367945e8.mp3

quiz.text: and they were buying consumer goods.
quiz.name: 15c04836343ce909c8b3c9e3b391cd5f.mp3

quiz.text: The prices of the items farmers bought remained constant
quiz.name: 24d8cb31170409471205911fd1c4915b.mp3

quiz.text: while prices they received for their products fell.
quiz.name: 1e0d2bc30adfd66ad306827dd7319345.mp3

quiz.text: These developments were made worse by the Great Depression.
quiz.name: b29a81728485684afaa8bcc9129edefd.mp3

quiz.text: In 1929, under President Herbert Hoover,
quiz.name: 4c5c28c584ee68bc79e972a70bb9a7b8.mp3

quiz.text: the Federal Farm Board was organized.
quiz.name: 6f451fbd6ad07a70f55b32c4af8c3c51.mp3

quiz.text: It established the principle of direct interference,
quiz.name: 3a1e7bdca21391bdf420bec4115e0e14.mp3

quiz.text: and it represented the first national commitment.
quiz.name: 8ee470662c23028eb569a1ee18a2c9ef.mp3

quiz.text: Please call Stella.
quiz.name: 49f4b880dbebfb980ddaffaedb158dfe.mp3

quiz.text: Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:
quiz.hilitText: Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:
quiz.ipa: æsk hɝ tu brɪŋ ðiz θɪŋz wɪθ hɝ frʌm ðə stɔr
quiz.name: 0da595c18611d5b41a2b4227a846f3cd.mp3

quiz.text: Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese,
quiz.hilitText: Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese,
quiz.ipa: sɪks spunz ʌv frɛʃ snoʊ piz faɪv θɪk slæbz ʌv blu tʃiz
quiz.name: bcc5a398eab0590f511b57dee06c5dfc.mp3

quiz.text: and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.
quiz.hilitText: and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.
quiz.ipa: ənd meɪbi ə snæk fɔr hɝ brʌðɝ bɑb
quiz.name: d455e87a1e91361badb832e49f3aec94.mp3

quiz.text: We also need a small yellow plastic snake and an orange toy mouse for the kids, who always treasure their presents.
quiz.hilitText: We also need a small yellow plastic snake and an orange toy mouse for the kids, who always treasure their presents.
quiz.ipa: wi ɔlsoʊ nid ə smɔl jɛloʊ plæstɪk sneɪk ənd æn ɔrəndʒ tɔɪ maʊs frɝ ði kɪdz hu ɔlweɪz trɛʒɝ ðɛr prɛzənts
quiz.name: 603c72ee30bb7168bb55c4202b37a331.mp3

quiz.text: She can scoop these things into three red bags,
quiz.hilitText: She can scoop these things into three red bags,
quiz.ipa: ʃi kæn skup ðiz θɪŋz ɪntu θri rɛd bæɡz
quiz.name: 9048a3f2524c67c41fdaefd897e838c1.mp3

quiz.text: and we will go meet her on Wednesday at the book store, near the train station.
quiz.hilitText: and we will go meet her on Wednesday at the book store, near the train station.

learnText: 发/æ/这个音时，上下唇上下齿张开，下巴尽量向下拉，舌尖平放，抵住下齿。而/aɪ/为双元音。先发元音/a/的音，口形由大变小，慢慢滑向/ɪ/音。发音时应注意将/a/音发足，如发音不到位，则会发成/æ/的音。

learnText: 发/ɑ/这个音时，嘴巴尽量张大，舌头自然放平，舌尖不要触碰下齿。类似汉字“啊”的发音，但嘴巴的张开幅度更大；而发/æ/这个音时，上下唇上下齿张开，下巴尽量向下拉，舌尖平放，抵住下齿。可容纳食指与中指两个手指的宽度。

learnText: 发/ʒ/音时，双唇稍收圆并略突出，气流通过时形成摩擦音。发音有点类似汉语的“日”，但不用卷舌。发/dʒ/音时，舌端抵上齿龈后部，气流通过时发出破擦音。发音有点类似汉语的“基”，但“基”的发音舌位更靠前些。

name: ɛ

quiz.text: I can't wait for the party tonight! What drinks do you think we need?
quiz.nativeText: 我等不及今晚的聚会啦！你觉得我们需要什么喝的？
quiz.name: b588199d2805aac3b4260c15bd73ea4e.mp3

quiz.text: Beer, absolutely. And maybe some juice. Not everyone wants to drink alcohol.
quiz.nativeText: 啤酒，绝对的。或许还有一些果汁。不是所有人都想喝酒。
quiz.name: e6f6bc6f040362dd58506678f84ab0df.mp3

quiz.text: I think some large bottles of cola and juice should cover everyone.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得几大瓶可乐和果汁应该够所有人的了。
quiz.name: 8d9d06fafb9e60f52c095a8eaf52c134.mp3

quiz.text: What about wine?
quiz.nativeText: 那葡萄酒呢？
quiz.name: ca5831e534d0a4c40b9e4c00ca4eb581.mp3

quiz.text: Two bottles of wine should be enough for all of us. We also need ice.
quiz.nativeText: 两瓶葡萄酒应该够我们所有人的了。我们还需要冰。
quiz.name: ea68b8744e0458a31f38919a5e6b20bc.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. We'll have to get back to the house once we get the ice.
quiz.nativeText: 对。我们一拿到冰就得马上回去。
quiz.name: 6bbb8e9f9d0296f43b7cf127a03a3bce.mp3

quiz.text: One more thing. A bottle of whiskey. I'm quite partial to its taste.
quiz.nativeText: 还有一件事。一瓶威士忌。我很喜欢它的味道。
quiz.name: 57cb0c3043543bd43af6c7b14177bc13.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, go and get one. Meet you at the cashier.
quiz.nativeText: 好啊，去拿一瓶。在收款台那里见。
quiz.name: 3954f812fe161021006b643b5cea94ab.mp3

quiz.text: Why are you in such a hurry?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么这么着急？
quiz.name: 764e6f077918d533201cec15ef33e34c.mp3

quiz.text: We have to put wine and ice into the tub before the party.
quiz.nativeText: 我们得在聚会之前把葡萄酒和冰放到桶里。
quiz.name: e4d66e1617999488ae9402170695f584.mp3

quiz.text: How did you like the food?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得食物怎么样？
quiz.name: bac5813a20bdc5dbbe36a5deec5f58c2.mp3

quiz.text: It was great. You're quite a good cook!
quiz.nativeText: 非常棒。你真是个很好的厨师!
quiz.name: 4e54f0865cee5aeb311340642c8c0246.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I always follow my mom's recipes.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我一直都按照我妈妈的食谱做饭。
quiz.name: f86f3d7cb0d7881de574608063d8103a.mp3

quiz.text: I can't help adding extra ingredients when cooking according to a recipe.
quiz.nativeText: 当我按照一份食谱做饭的时候，都忍不住加额外的食材。
quiz.name: 09fbed5fdb5a32d05a4e30658f3c2195.mp3

quiz.text: There's nothing wrong with being inventive. Would you like some more pasta?
quiz.nativeText: 独出心裁并没有错。你还想再来点意面吗?
quiz.name: 9eba50cd23fc8c6d7b2b4c209bc9eadf.mp3

quiz.text: No, thanks. I'm full.
quiz.nativeText: 不了，谢谢。我饱了。
quiz.name: 15e195673fd155289da89f4d8250c6e3.mp3

quiz.text: How about dessert?
quiz.nativeText: 那甜点呢？
quiz.name: df85a4fc5a23af210e8ae3d1984320ab.mp3

quiz.text: I would like some ice cream, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要一些冰激凌。
quiz.name: b1d63feb606e99aea26c7d26aa102282.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, I'll get it for you.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我拿给你。
quiz.name: b4cac5adddc760fd505a957d14b167d8.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: get
quiz.nativeText: 得到
quiz.name: 7528035a93ee69cedb1dbddb2f0bfcc8.mp3

quiz.text: friend
quiz.nativeText: 朋友
quiz.name: 471e11502a3cc3a519644984935691e8.mp3

quiz.text: spend on
quiz.nativeText: 在某方面花费
quiz.name: 57bb3c15ba16e2fb0dac1c5212763131.mp3

quiz.text: in the heaven
quiz.nativeText: 在天堂
quiz.name: c1ad8e6b0912cb1d3c8d20b44ab50dff.mp3

quiz.text: A man is lying on the bed.
quiz.nativeText: 一个男人正躺在床上。
quiz.hilitText: A man is lying on the {#*bed*$}.
quiz.ipa: ə mæn ɪz laɪɪŋ ɑn ðə b{#*ɛ*$}d
quiz.name: f9a0feaf375c4c7088a6a03702ff82ff.mp3

quiz.text: I'll get up and do the dishes myself.
quiz.nativeText: 我马上就起来先去洗碗。
quiz.hilitText: I'll {#*get*$} up and do the dishes {#*myself*$}.
quiz.ipa: aɪl ɡ{#*ɛ*$}t ʌp ænd du ðə dɪʃəz maɪs{#*ɛ*$}lf
quiz.name: fbb9021a67c0d6d4974a99c1caccb4c8.mp3

quiz.text: Tom, breakfast is almost ready! Come down!
quiz.nativeText: Tom！早餐快好啦！快下来！
quiz.name: 64613044fd03c10de0c584a9badf5413.mp3

quiz.text: Wait a minute! I'm still washing my face!
quiz.nativeText: 等一下！我还在洗脸！
quiz.name: c7c4237bef228a4b14a70f040a4cb14f.mp3

quiz.text: Hurry up!
quiz.nativeText: 快点！
quiz.name: ab5a74ae233534f7435182550e3a8eb0.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'm coming! What's for breakfast?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我来啦！早餐吃什么？
quiz.name: 4ca7f8ee393381399c10aa8d402db32f.mp3

quiz.text: Fried eggs and toast as usual.
quiz.nativeText: 和往常一样，煎蛋和吐司。
quiz.name: f3315127bc2c99d56ae51b03ab4d5238.mp3

quiz.text: I want my egg sunny side up.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要单面煎蛋。
quiz.name: 7dc7542c847cfa9787172b982b27e859.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. You can make your oatmeal first.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你可以先冲燕麦片。
quiz.name: 13db0adf22e4f7412b655b7e369f762c.mp3

quiz.text: In a minute. I have to butter my toast.
quiz.nativeText: 马上。我要给吐司抹黄油。
quiz.name: 5977e4f7184dc4fbbac56ae17f3f5d82.mp3

quiz.text: You'd better hurry up, or you'll be late for school.
quiz.nativeText: 你最好快点，要不你该迟到了。
quiz.name: e3680d1e6e2d2198ed7af75b67291173.mp3

quiz.text: I know. We're out of oatmeal. I'll have to skip it today.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道。燕麦片没有了。我今天就不吃了。
quiz.name: da9f92b0410a8cdc6cdf2c49c499b7e1.mp3

quiz.text: Lying on the bed, a man says gently to his wife,
quiz.nativeText: 一个男人躺在床上，温柔地对他的妻子说：
quiz.hilitText: Lying on the {#*bed*$}, a man {#*says*$} {#*gently*$} to his wife,
quiz.ipa: laɪɪŋ ɑn ðə b{#*ɛ*$}d ə mæn s{#*ɛ*$}z dʒ{#*ɛ*$}ntli tu hɪz waɪf
quiz.name: a9a27d0c6663f74c309056e82161e180.mp3

quiz.text: "Honey, can you take care of the dishes over there?"
quiz.nativeText: “亲爱的，你能把那边放着的碗筷收拾一下吗？”
quiz.hilitText: "Honey, can you take {#*care*$} of the dishes over {#*there*$}?"
quiz.ipa: hʌni kæn ju teɪk k{#*ɛ*$}r ʌv ðə dɪʃəz oʊvɝ ð{#*ɛ*$}r
quiz.name: d7dec39d4a5ed40c88cfd8fa68e44bb2.mp3

quiz.text: His wife says, "No problem. But I have to find all the money you have hidden from me."
quiz.nativeText: 他的妻子说：“没问题啊。不过这样我得把你藏的私房钱都找出来。”
quiz.hilitText: His wife {#*says*$}, "No problem. But I have to find all the money you have hidden from me."
quiz.ipa: hɪz waɪf s{#*ɛ*$}z noʊ prɑbləm bʌt aɪ hæv tɪ faɪnd ɔl ðə mʌni ju hæv hɪdən frʌm mi
quiz.name: 77c43801961cfa1c944738f191478065.mp3

quiz.text: He says at once, "Never mind. I'll get up and do the dishes myself."
quiz.nativeText: 他马上说道：“不用不用。我马上就起来先去洗碗。”
quiz.hilitText: He says at once, "{#*Never*$} mind. I'll {#*get*$} up and do the dishes {#*myself*$}."
quiz.ipa: hi sɪz æt wʌns n{#*ɛ*$}vɝ maɪnd aɪl ɡ{#*ɛ*$}t ʌp ænd du ðə dɪʃɪz maɪs{#*ɛ*$}lf
quiz.name: 24cadc5731e152f77507ea9c1ccada2d.mp3

quiz.text: Hey, we need to talk about our food situation.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我们需要谈谈我们的食物问题。
quiz.name: 452321ea1b08fd21794719770680d856.mp3

quiz.text: I'm listening.
quiz.nativeText: 我听着呢。
quiz.name: 392662902939e1b8070f757462b81656.mp3

quiz.text: We can't eat out or order a take-out every day.
quiz.nativeText: 我们不能每天都出去吃或者点外卖。
quiz.name: a49d68f089e6e2265b88c6ef812ca216.mp3

quiz.text: You mean we have to cook things ourselves?
quiz.nativeText: 你的意思是我们得自己做东西？
quiz.name: 7c0289444887a8e133fc26d5187e7564.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. It's healthier, plus I love cooking.
quiz.nativeText: 没错。更健康一些，而且我喜欢做饭。
quiz.name: d6e264fcbd9ab23dcd8ea49d90348777.mp3

quiz.text: I'm not sure about this. I know nothing about cooking.
quiz.nativeText: 我不太确定。我不会做饭。
quiz.name: 51997430cba869affbbc3f67315af3ef.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry. I'll do it all myself.
quiz.nativeText: 别担心，我自己来做。
quiz.name: ee5686e9c8f6583634a8bdf640e70fc6.mp3

quiz.text: But you'll get too tired!
quiz.nativeText: 但你会特别累！
quiz.name: 41095125d707c5c5757317478899336c.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe you could start learning how to cook.
quiz.nativeText: 或许你可以开始学习怎样做饭。
quiz.name: 4e66de5387b2e49121c7e3dd67075100.mp3

quiz.text: How about this? I'll do the dishes and clean the table after the meal.
quiz.nativeText: 这样怎么样？吃完饭后我来洗碗和收拾桌子。
quiz.name: e9d10e8a4be8c33bd3026c5767329675.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds fair enough. Sure.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来很公平。好吧。
quiz.name: 5f4bc352bf8ec98a11f8e40cc7cf9c58.mp3

quiz.text: OK. It's a deal.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。就这么定啦。
quiz.name: 3aab1dd13077602a65ee9cc3f65f8a73.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening.
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好。
quiz.name: ff5a93c43444bdc7d19e1503c02bba83.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening, Tom! Come in!
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好，Tom！快进来！
quiz.name: 195749ed5df26e548604f2718cb75c6f.mp3

quiz.text: I've bought a bottle of champagne for you.
quiz.nativeText: 我带了瓶香槟给你。
quiz.name: 444e67b82665db49ce145eb18b650a9c.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Let's drink it at dinner.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我们晚餐时喝吧。
quiz.name: 23dc2e6bf8c8709919c903dd892676e2.mp3

quiz.text: Could I have something to drink now? I'm quite thirsty.
quiz.nativeText: 我可以现在喝点什么吗？我好渴。
quiz.name: 59a53d6a13b345429041b16adbe792e5.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want water or juice?
quiz.nativeText: 你要水还是果汁？
quiz.name: 1ef72864dfe7889f27c02ee79ce17ecc.mp3

quiz.text: Juice, please. So what do you have planned for dinner?
quiz.nativeText: 果汁，谢谢。所以你对晚餐有什么打算？
quiz.name: b6acd7d95c36214d7bf3fd88bf309ea8.mp3

quiz.text: I've baked a pizza. There's also salad, french fries, fried chicken and ice cream for dessert.
quiz.nativeText: 我已经烤好了披萨，还有沙拉、薯条、炸鸡和冰激凌作为甜点。
quiz.name: 1eeed35d749e8aa342ba603aa1b602a5.mp3

quiz.text: Wow! I love this pizza! It's delicious.
quiz.nativeText: 哇！我喜欢这个批萨！真好吃！
quiz.name: cfdcd854a97276a3aba0a28ef75a111e.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks. Would you pass me the sauce?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。你可以把酱递给我吗？
quiz.name: 79d7a31c5e74d8ec125ae4f456415044.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。给你。
quiz.name: f78202ca3dae6a0c5701fec74ff32a15.mp3

quiz.text: Here's to our friendship and health!
quiz.nativeText: 为我们的友谊和健康干杯！
quiz.name: c756eafa8f1730697968c77157bd8459.mp3

quiz.text: Mom, what is this?
quiz.nativeText: 妈妈，那是什么啊？
quiz.name: 9c8f65215955b91af5c49b3d759faeb8.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, that's a potato.
quiz.nativeText: 哦，那是一个土豆。
quiz.name: 5735dc0fb8870a81dd8bb701b6b7caef.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Does it taste good?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了，那它好吃么？
quiz.name: 95ea5a4f165208eb16569b5002f2ec12.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, your father loves them.
quiz.nativeText: 好吃啊，你爸爸很喜欢吃。
quiz.name: dee14ce041fdebfd1183ee6ee3bdc9c0.mp3

quiz.text: OK. How about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，那这个呢？
quiz.name: d0f3e0cd88eeaf625df6682dfd0b52fa.mp3

quiz.text: That is an onion. It's good for your health.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一个洋葱，它对你身体有好处。
quiz.name: edd4cb81efc5d1c0575e911d8ff5c321.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, I know this one. It's a tomato.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，我认识这个，这是一个番茄。
quiz.name: d674fe7b812eedb80f05782a09ba0c6a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, you are right.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，你说对了。
quiz.name: 606b74a0f9e68cc8ecfd939857eb7c12.mp3

quiz.text: Mom, is that a cucumber?
quiz.nativeText: 妈妈，那是黄瓜么？
quiz.name: fef5af57f5ac4afda1a5c11267a9c472.mp3

quiz.text: Which one do you mean?
quiz.nativeText: 你指的是哪个？
quiz.name: 549e070c8512ecbb9c9cba0b334461a2.mp3

quiz.text: Next to the pumpkins.
quiz.nativeText: 在南瓜旁边。
quiz.name: 3736c114ca38755c2cc7dc182050dad2.mp3

quiz.text: No, it's an eggplant.
quiz.nativeText: 不，那是一个茄子。
quiz.name: 73512d6ea60ece4c2fd9331bf16f4109.mp3

quiz.text: Alright. Do we need to buy some carrots?
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，我们要买胡萝卜么？
quiz.name: 3fff54fba22f8540d8b910df6299f95c.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, let's get some.
quiz.nativeText: 要啊，我们快去买吧。
quiz.name: fef48d1abf218ff8d0530eece0cf6328.mp3

quiz.text: Mom, what's your favorite fruit?
quiz.nativeText: 妈妈，你最爱吃的水果是什么呀？
quiz.name: 6c647b758be8c5314bbca635acd3c0f5.mp3

quiz.text: I like apples.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢苹果。
quiz.name: 0112fdf754ec6fc36221fa00c52f060c.mp3

quiz.text: My favorite fruit is banana.
quiz.nativeText: 我最爱吃的水果是香蕉。
quiz.name: 1de037126699c7454081d4e7a0a1f0f5.mp3

quiz.text: I know, dear.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道，亲爱的。
quiz.name: 4ebc4e267ffc4227234a080e6d350eb9.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like peaches?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢吃桃子么？
quiz.name: c3c5b36bcd9bfd09297bf0fa7a036c87.mp3

quiz.text: No, but I do like pears.
quiz.nativeText: 不，但是我很喜欢吃梨。
quiz.name: 99d80678038bb1a30c04a9e44dfbed47.mp3

quiz.text: I like them too, and I also like pineapples.
quiz.nativeText: 我也喜欢吃梨，而且我也喜欢菠萝。
quiz.name: cc2485e04aded82d6d459088450ff9dd.mp3

quiz.text: Pineapples are too sour for me.
quiz.nativeText: 菠萝对我来说太酸了。
quiz.name: 6b1733cec441248d663b8a26994c2b47.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Do you like cherries?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。那你喜欢吃樱桃么？
quiz.name: a457a915befee70b3f213492774579fb.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, they are delicious.
quiz.nativeText: 喜欢，樱桃很好吃。
quiz.name: 54e00021e86b3587e0302ef00c6053dd.mp3

quiz.text: I agree, and watermelons are perfect for summer.
quiz.nativeText: 我很同意，还有就是夏天的时候吃西瓜是最合适不过的了。
quiz.name: b4486288ce2ce3269c8df7483c5011ee.mp3

quiz.text: That's right. I think everyone likes watermelons.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我觉得应该每个人都喜欢西瓜吧。
quiz.name: bbccaacd80f5f48f486ab68008a085c4.mp3

quiz.text: Since you want to help, put on this apron first.
quiz.nativeText: 既然你想帮忙，先系上这个围裙吧。
quiz.name: 3404f2625b87c5fdbb393bd444d5291f.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Now what can I do?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。现在我该做什么？
quiz.name: 9c22769bdc370a40848f6f67f3f31d86.mp3

quiz.text: Well, take four potatoes from the fridge and wash them.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，从冰箱里拿出四个土豆洗一下。
quiz.name: 13787c55e8b06de3f192359ae7da34cb.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Where should I put them?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。我该把它们放在哪？
quiz.name: 813549a1a9b3a7e58df57a5e10c4d372.mp3

quiz.text: Plates are in the cabinet. You could slice the meat after finishing with the potatoes.
quiz.nativeText: 盘子在橱柜里。洗完土豆后你可以切一下肉。
quiz.name: 624aed1b0af89e84f8fbb648583f5e03.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Can I cook on the gas stove?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我可以在燃气灶上做饭吗？
quiz.name: 4e8e5f55b7f110552e79ed114d5adda0.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe next time. We have guests today.
quiz.nativeText: 或许下次吧。我们今天有客人。
quiz.name: 40cec5e31e22b55e57459ece4678d885.mp3

quiz.text: Fine. Now I'm done with the meat. What's next?
quiz.nativeText: 好吧。现在我弄完肉了。然后呢？
quiz.name: 0063cde58cd8b93a66c6f7487c238ab3.mp3

quiz.text: Just hand me a bowl. Then you can watch the stove.
quiz.nativeText: 递给我一个碗。然后你可以看着灶。
quiz.name: 340b2a800bce47af15906dddcd38bfaa.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. I'll turn it off in time.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我会及时关掉的。
quiz.name: f01f6f3e65bd7582f6564d08e885bcf1.mp3

quiz.text: The heroes lives a life worthy of imitation.
quiz.name: 76e89f368da3111d6fdb7c6a313a5c36.mp3

quiz.text: Those who imitate a genuine hero experience life with new depth, enthusiasm, and meaning.
quiz.name: 02544b8a41ce55d06768495d4d8603b7.mp3

quiz.text: A sure test for would be heroes is what or whom do they serve?
quiz.name: 6520a94f4bd774d280096dea2a45f1a0.mp3

quiz.text: What are they willing to live and die for?
quiz.name: 0f0bc95cc48b6f113b5526d947fd0f62.mp3

quiz.text: If the answer or evidence suggests they serve only their own fame,
quiz.name: d8b0fb2fbeb8dc6e6c08549aa1ee7553.mp3

quiz.text: they may be famous persons but not heroes.
quiz.name: 3c5b309e34be27059451a931d106e0f6.mp3

quiz.text: Heroes are catalysts for change.
quiz.name: 9c45426ac37c4b876e1715dacb5d7caf.mp3

quiz.text: They have a vision from the mountaintop.
quiz.name: be7b6216bf527fbeeebdb8e58697619e.mp3

quiz.text: They have the skill and charm to move the masses.
quiz.name: 67a3fdda1d481dd6cf0edf4191544399.mp3

quiz.text: They create new possibilities.
quiz.name: 296c63ae699d8b2b564af412421f913b.mp3

quiz.text: Without Gandhi, India might still be part of the British Empire.
quiz.name: f7212811c16b6176f4edfee188967a64.mp3

quiz.text: It may be possible for large-scale change to occur
quiz.name: 95152bba84480a9ea6fde2ae2f9d2c68.mp3

quiz.text: without leaders with magnetic personalities,
quiz.name: 321cdcff1809c9b395cc0d12949a1805.mp3

quiz.text: but the pace of change would be slow, the vision uncertain
quiz.name: 0e4ac2e5b51080423841a34bf92fe4c5.mp3

quiz.text: and the committee meeting endless.
quiz.name: c6b53f512e10e3532bae0bd3c5ca86f1.mp3

quiz.text: The rainbow is a division of white light into many colors like yellow and red.
quiz.hilitText: The rainbow is a division of white light into many colors like yellow and red.
quiz.ipa: ðə reɪnboʊ ɪz ə dɪvɪʒən ʌv waɪt laɪt ɪntu mɛni kʌlɝz laɪk jɛloʊ ənd rɛd
quiz.name: e6ff434811285fba21eac9924b050823.mp3

quiz.text: They join together
quiz.name: 56effc762353e1677c51606e6db6eac0.mp3

quiz.text: and usually look like a long round arch.
quiz.hilitText: and usually look like a long round arch.
quiz.ipa: ənd juʒəli lʊk laɪk ə lɔŋ raʊnd ɑrtʃ
quiz.name: f3b153756041eda5366a20e3cfd2ea23.mp3

quiz.text: People have explained the rainbow in different ways.
quiz.hilitText: People have explained the rainbow in different ways.
quiz.ipa: pipəl hæv ɪkspleɪnd ðə reɪnboʊ ɪn dɪfɝənt weɪz
quiz.name: 0e0ebfbd4adbf34002096fb10ce30c2a.mp3

quiz.text: Some have accepted the object as a good sign.
quiz.hilitText: Some have accepted the object as a good sign.
quiz.ipa: sʌm hæv æksɛptɪd ði ɑbdʒɛkt æz ə ɡʊd saɪn
quiz.name: 5b66f47dc31a95f42c86cf37dc179ef0.mp3

quiz.text: Others have tried to explain the natural thing physically.
quiz.hilitText: Others have tried to explain the natural thing physically.
quiz.ipa: ʌðɝz hæv traɪd tu ɪkspleɪn ði nætʃɝəl θɪŋ fɪzɪkli
quiz.name: 060fd85e6a2d78e577c65f88f8876c6e.mp3

quiz.text: Aristotle pointed out that the rainbow could be caused by reflection of sunlight by the rain.
quiz.hilitText: Aristotle pointed out that the rainbow could be caused by reflection of sunlight by the rain.
quiz.ipa: ɛrəstɑtəl pɔɪntəd aʊt ðæt ðə reɪnboʊ kʊd bi kɑzd baɪ rəflɛkʃən ʌv sʌnlaɪt baɪ ðə reɪn
quiz.name: 63dc4cf65fa5d1a8d99527ee358598ea.mp3

quiz.text: Since then scientists have gradually found out that
quiz.hilitText: Since then scientists have gradually found out that
quiz.ipa: sɪns ðɛn saɪəntɪs hæv ɡrædʒuli faʊnd aʊt ðæt
quiz.name: 774e0762fea3b3b501ad95bb40645332.mp3

quiz.text: it is but reflection by the raindrops.
quiz.hilitText: it is but reflection by the raindrops.
quiz.ipa: ɪt ɪz bʌt rəflɛkʃən baɪ ðə reɪndrɑps
quiz.name: 2a14f1c93b179860a996f59bddc43d09.mp3

quiz.text: Plenty of complicated thoughts about the rainbow have been formed.
quiz.hilitText: Plenty of complicated thoughts about the rainbow have been formed.
quiz.ipa: plɛnti ʌv kɑmpləkeɪtəd θɔts əbaʊt ðə reɪnboʊ hæv bɪn fɔrmd
quiz.name: 5acd494350e4d4e35760561a520c1c48.mp3

learnText: /ʃ/和/ʒ/这两个音发音规则大致相同。唯一的区别是发/ʃ/时，不振动声带；而发/ʒ/时，振动声带。双唇稍收圆并略突出，舌头上扬，向外吹气。有点介于汉语中的“西”和“诗”之间的音，和我们让他人安静点时说Shshshshsh!发出的声音是一样的。发/ʒ/音时，双唇稍收圆并略突出，气流通过时形成摩擦音。发音有点类似汉语的“日”，但不用卷舌。

name: /ʃ/,/ʒ/

learnText: /s/这个音与/z/的发音位置相同，气流由舌端和齿龈间的窄缝中送出，形成摩擦音，但不振动声带。发/ʃ/这个音时，也不振动声带。但与/s/不同，发/ʃ/时，双唇稍收圆并略突出，舌头上扬，向外吹气。/ʃ/这个音有点介于汉语中的“西”和“诗”之间的音，和我们让他人安静点时说Shshshshsh!发出的声音是一样的。

quiz.nativeText: 小口喝
quiz.name: 7eb2de9ed94db7230fcafeb1d7c40878.mp3

quiz.name: 43faba084d0165852e5556db67a55378.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 袜子
quiz.name: d304ef841c9d86c3ced968af32a9f9a3.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 震惊
quiz.name: 6ed0b4f78f99e5e6a6d37d3ab94a2cc6.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 种类
quiz.name: a7bdfbfac6ba2252b889996b1430abb4.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 短的
quiz.name: a35c2b02966b1563e5bf7b81b8b0cf77.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 出售
quiz.name: 860926e6fc3f191e18ee7a98259164b8.mp3

name: /s/,/ʃ/

learnText: 在发音时，/i/要长于/ɪ/。我们同时也注意到/ɪ/顶部没有小点，这表示在发音时/ɪ/和/i/的嘴形有所不同。在发/i/音时，嘴部咧开较大，如同微笑的口型，不过较之略宽。这也就是我们在照相时为什么要说“cheese”而不是“chiz”或者“whizz”。

name: /ɪ/,/i/

learnText:
中国人区分这两个音有些困难, 因为中文中只有一个 ai (爱) 的音, 而且：
  • 以英语为母语的人们发/æ/的方式也不尽相同
  • /æ/和/ɛ/实在是太相似了
/æ/和/ɛ/最明显的区别是，/ɛ/的嘴型更扁，更向两边拉伸。当你依次发/æ/, /ɛ/和/i/时，你的嘴型应该是越来越扁平的。

quiz.nativeText: 长途跋涉

name: /æ/,/ɛ/

quiz.text: Good afternoon! How can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好！有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: a3a8d345c43d48f8bb8dcd00aded170a.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, Mr. Smith. I heard that you might have vacant rooms.
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，史密斯先生。我听说你有可租出的房间。
quiz.name: 8b4d63e573c45b67aabf07daa612d55f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. We have a whole apartment ready to rent out.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我们有一整套公寓可以租出。
quiz.name: d563ad2ee2f32a160b02387ddd4f21a5.mp3

quiz.text: Great! Would it be convenient to look at the apartment now?
quiz.nativeText: 太好了！现在可以方便去看一下公寓吗？
quiz.name: bb3016c5dc715049c93648542a7c7928.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, of course. It's on the eleventh floor. Follow me, please.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。在第十一层上，请跟我来。
quiz.name: 015778cc3fb728f004b3c5b402e66875.mp3

quiz.text: Looks nice!
quiz.nativeText: 看起来不错！
quiz.name: 1cf8bd1a6ccbb2f718fa3be6967b0ea4.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. There are two bedrooms, one kitchen, and one bathroom, plus a large living room.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢！这里有两个卧室，一个厨房，一个卫生间，和一个大客厅。
quiz.name: f3659983021a641ee9d2c93e9f5724f4.mp3

quiz.text: Great. It's such a big apartment! How much is the rent?
quiz.nativeText: 很棒。这个公寓真大！租金是多少呢？
quiz.name: 559f3285b869220323cfc091db61ce03.mp3

quiz.text: Twenty-seven hundred yuan a month.
quiz.name: ed3a34f37f41dbf7487ffd02ce9be5d9.mp3

quiz.text: Are utilities included?
quiz.nativeText: 包括水电费吗？
quiz.name: 1384179fcfe012f479fae142116508c8.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, gas and water are included. But you'll have to pay for the electricity and internet.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，用气和用水都包括在内。但是你得自己付电费和网费。
quiz.name: 22c5cd6e6bd8736208a046d66d37631c.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds fine to me. When can we move in?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来还不错。什么时候可以搬进来呢？
quiz.name: d3484f70f202f44b5d8cd32eda7c85df.mp3

quiz.text: Next Friday will be okay.
quiz.nativeText: 下周五就可以。
quiz.name: 741295d55b5a517d2796c5b143ea8164.mp3

quiz.text: Fantastic. Thank you!
quiz.nativeText: 棒极了。谢谢你！
quiz.name: 7d2e31abc489aa550d018ff3b98fb4ce.mp3

learnText: 短元音。发音时，上下唇及上下齿张开，下巴尽量向下拉，舌尖平放，舌尖抵下齿，嘴型要比发[ɛ]时更大。

quiz.nativeText: 爸爸

name: æ

quiz.text: Good morning!
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！
quiz.name: fac93e7c697984f224d796dda66fbd7a.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning! I'm here to look at the apartment we talked about last week.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！我是来看上周看好的公寓的。
quiz.hilitText: Good morning! I'm here to look at the apartment we talked about last week.
quiz.ipa: ɡʊd mɔrnɪŋ aɪm hɪr tu lʊk æt ði əpɑrtmənt wi tɔkt əbaʊt læst wik
quiz.name: 76dfa9e0a21184f7de8f0030084ac171.mp3

quiz.text: Of course, I've been expecting you. This way, please. Here we are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我正好一直等你呢。请往这边走。到了。
quiz.hilitText: Of course, I've been expecting you. This way, please. Here we are.
quiz.ipa: ʌv kɔrs aɪv bɪn ɪkspɛktɪŋ ju ðɪs weɪ pliz hɪr wi ɑr
quiz.name: a0450b9bf6b077eda03da683b6c1dedf.mp3

quiz.text: Well, this is a nice place indeed. Is there any public transportation nearby?
quiz.nativeText: 这公寓确实很不错。附近有公共交通设施吗？
quiz.hilitText: Well, this is a nice place indeed. Is there any public transportation nearby?
quiz.ipa: wɛl ðɪs ɪz ə naɪs pleɪs ɪndid ɪz ðɛr ɛni pʌblɪk trænspɝteɪʃən nɪrbaɪ
quiz.name: 12f842fda68a79ffafe82378ab97e67c.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, of course. There is a subway station a hundred meters away.
quiz.nativeText: 当然了。一百米附近有一个地铁站。
quiz.hilitText: Yes, of course. There is a subway station a hundred meters away.
quiz.ipa: jɛs ʌv kɔrs ðɛr ɪz ə sʌbweɪ steɪʃən ə hʌnɝd mitɝz əweɪ
quiz.name: a61e0ff506d2c9274e232f63dadccdb0.mp3

quiz.text: Then it's quite convenient for me to go to work.
quiz.nativeText: 那我上班应该就很方便。
quiz.hilitText: Then it's quite convenient for me to go to work.
quiz.ipa: ðɛn ɪts kwaɪt kənvinjənt frɝ mi tɪ ɡoʊ tu wɝk
quiz.name: 63d1c30ea88544827e417fdb09966020.mp3

quiz.text: And it's not far from the central business district. Will you live in this apartment by yourself?
quiz.nativeText: 而且离中央商务区也很近。你一个人住这公寓吗？
quiz.hilitText: And it's not far from the central business district. Will you live in this apartment by yourself?
quiz.ipa: ænd ɪts nɑt fɑr frʌm ðə sɛntrəl bɪznɪs dɪstrɪkt wɪl ju lɪv ɪn ðɪs əpɑrtmənt baɪ jɔrsɛlf
quiz.name: 6d30da540916dc9d7cae165ce06f8cc5.mp3

quiz.text: No, I'll share it with my two sisters.
quiz.nativeText: 不是，我和我的两个姐妹一起住。
quiz.hilitText: No, I'll share it with my two sisters.
quiz.ipa: noʊ aɪl ʃɛr ɪt wɪθ maɪ tu sɪstɝz
quiz.name: 7901e18a64f2c3bf210b3ab0098186bd.mp3

quiz.text: In that case, this apartment is large enough for you to live in.
quiz.nativeText: 那样的话，这公寓供你们一起住也足够大了。
quiz.hilitText: In that case, this apartment is large enough for you to live in.
quiz.ipa: ɪn ðæt keɪs ðɪs əpɑrtmənt ɪz lɑrdʒ ɪnʌf frɝ ju tu lɪv ɪn
quiz.name: 64b954e837f31acc7907d287c91f06fa.mp3

quiz.text: It is a comfortable apartment. But I think the price is just too high. Could I get a reduction?
quiz.nativeText: 这公寓住起来很舒服。但是我觉得价格太贵了。可以降价吗？
quiz.hilitText: It is a comfortable apartment. But I think the price is just too high. Could I get a reduction?
quiz.ipa: ɪt ɪz ə kʌmfɝtəbəl əpɑrtmənt bʌt aɪ θɪŋk ðə praɪs ɪz dʒʌst tu haɪ kʊd aɪ ɡɛt ə ridʌkʃən
quiz.name: aae136dd61622bf8f625fcb49d595eb0.mp3

quiz.text: Well, actually we could give you a special price if you have our Very-Important-Person card.
quiz.nativeText: 这样吧，如果你有贵宾卡的话我们可以给一个特价。
quiz.hilitText: Well, actually we could give you a special price if you have our Very-Important-Person card.
quiz.ipa: wɛl ækʃuli wi kʊd ɡɪv ju ə spɛʃəl praɪs ɪf ju hæv ɑr vɛri ɪmpɔrtənt pɝsən kɑrd
quiz.name: d9d4aed3f30fe3a7155848e77359706f.mp3

quiz.text: My sister has one, is that okay?
quiz.nativeText: 我姐姐有一张，可以吗？
quiz.hilitText: My sister has one, is that okay?
quiz.ipa: maɪ sɪstɝ hæz wʌn ɪz ðæt oʊkeɪ
quiz.name: 2ccdf4aea35e651279f42a5bb1a0aff0.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, that will do as well.
quiz.nativeText: 可以的，那样也行。
quiz.hilitText: Yeah, that will do as well.
quiz.ipa: jæ ðæt wɪl du ɛz wɛl
quiz.name: 54b90cc7ac7dc2b3afacfed5983f5445.mp3

quiz.text: Great, I'll call her right now.
quiz.nativeText: 好极了，我现在就给她打电话。
quiz.hilitText: Great, I'll call her right now.
quiz.ipa: ɡreɪt aɪl kɔl hɝ raɪt naʊ
quiz.name: 08777ea919c22b7741fef5ef3027c43e.mp3

quiz.text: cap
quiz.nativeText: 帽子
quiz.name: db5ce5cb1b12edacae4584e881e1451f.mp3

quiz.text: map
quiz.nativeText: 地图
quiz.name: 5af1a3a285c2bdee4192223e31e1f833.mp3

quiz.text: turn on the lamp
quiz.nativeText: 开灯
quiz.name: e64d672750548f03dbe913ae8236625a.mp3

quiz.text: natural landscape
quiz.nativeText: 自然景观
quiz.name: 0cd29af423f6fb789c357f58052f6c41.mp3

quiz.text: Is there proper etiquette for eating a live crab on a train?
quiz.nativeText: 如果要在列车上吃活螃蟹，应该注意什么礼仪？
quiz.hilitText: Is there proper etiquette for eating a live {#*crab*$} on a train?
quiz.ipa: ə pəlis ɔfəsɝ stɑpt h{#*æ*$}nə fɝ spidɪŋ
quiz.name: 59376df02fc804bd61006c0ec8a8d2c2.mp3

quiz.text: He asked if he could see her license.
quiz.nativeText: 警察要求汉娜出示证件。
quiz.hilitText: He {#*asked*$} if he could see her license.
quiz.ipa: hi {#*æ*$}skt ɪf hi kʊd si hɝ laɪsəns
quiz.name: e5c1cbd637ab863c5e6e8d965449f6dd.mp3

quiz.text: So, what do you think of this apartment?
quiz.nativeText: 所以，你觉得这间公寓怎么样？
quiz.name: 2e4542f3a54131f591652b602918d034.mp3

quiz.text: I love the living room; it's bright and spacious.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢起居室，明亮又宽敞。
quiz.name: bee3540fefd9008dd9ff2437b0e50e5b.mp3

quiz.text: I think the bedroom is too small, though.
quiz.nativeText: 但我觉得卧室太小了。
quiz.name: 6030c588f4a132370ebfed1bb4cbc5d1.mp3

quiz.text: It is a bit small, but it should be enough for our needs.
quiz.nativeText: 它是有一点小，但应该能满足我们的需求了。
quiz.name: 8da6b905b06edb465ecf4908832f007d.mp3

quiz.text: Fine. We don't always stay in the bedroom, after all.
quiz.nativeText: 也对。毕竟我们也不是总待在卧室里。
quiz.name: 0adc31595e7ec3181b6acf7f9aed2dd6.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. And look at the kitchen! You can basically cook anything you want.
quiz.nativeText: 正是这样。而且快看厨房！你基本可以烹调任何你想做的东西。
quiz.name: 1d1d9f42ee7d86d48d8e2cbae384cc77.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, it's really well equipped. But we do still need some new furniture.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，真是设备齐全。但我们仍然需要一些新的家具。
quiz.name: 0df9d3cd38442a3c7865c7df9302f4e9.mp3

quiz.text: So you've made up your mind?
quiz.nativeText: 所以你已经决定了？
quiz.name: 52f4d62f20011a3de203ffc4b4061f92.mp3

quiz.text: Almost. Let's see the other apartment on the list and then make a decision.
quiz.nativeText: 快了。我们看下另外一个公寓然后再做决定吧。
quiz.name: 924aaa2d6ff6d91ca86586ebf6c115f2.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Let's go.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。走吧。
quiz.name: 0db2fade06c0f186185649246ab1c539.mp3

quiz.text: A police officer stopped Hannah for speeding.
quiz.nativeText: 一个警察拦下了超速驾驶的汉娜。
quiz.hilitText: A police officer stopped {#*Hannah*$} for speeding.
quiz.ipa: ə pəlis ɔfəsɝ stɑpt h{#*æ*$}nə fɝ spidɪŋ
quiz.name: 59376df02fc804bd61006c0ec8a8d2c2.mp3

quiz.text: He asked if he could see her license.
quiz.nativeText: 警察要求汉娜出示证件。
quiz.hilitText: He {#*asked*$} if he could see her license.
quiz.ipa: hi {#*æ*$}skt ɪf hi kʊd si hɝ laɪsəns
quiz.name: e5c1cbd637ab863c5e6e8d965449f6dd.mp3

quiz.text: Hannah replied unhappily, "I wish you guys could get your act together.
quiz.nativeText: 汉娜不高兴的答道：“我希望你们这帮人行动一致点儿，
quiz.hilitText: {#*Hannah*$} replied {#*unhappily*$}, "I wish you guys could get your {#*act*$} together.
quiz.ipa: h{#*æ*$}nə rɪplaɪd ənh{#*æ*$}pəli aɪ wɪʃ ju ɡaɪz kʊd ɡɛt jɔr {#*æ*$}kt təɡɛðɝ
quiz.name: 959e5f5860bfb35b1d7666d2e2973c37.mp3

quiz.text: Just yesterday you took away my license at Apple Street.
quiz.nativeText: 昨天你们才在苹果大街上收走了我的驾照
quiz.hilitText: Just yesterday you took away my license {#*at*$} {#*Apple*$} Street.
quiz.ipa: dʒʌst jɛstɝdeɪ ju tʊk əweɪ maɪ laɪsəns {#*æ*$}t {#*æ*$}pəl strit
quiz.name: 861cc2671d8e33d4df98eec6c59a2605.mp3

quiz.text: Today you expect me to show it to you.
quiz.nativeText: 今天你又让我拿给你看。”
quiz.hilitText: Today you expect me to show it to you.
quiz.ipa: tədeɪ ju ɪkspɛkt mi tɪ ʃoʊ ɪt tu ju
quiz.name: d5a89236bae22aea6b7b9ca2b7d57fd6.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, what a mess! This house really needs a thorough cleaning.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，一团乱！这房子真的需要一场大扫除了。
quiz.name: f1114c9627d8e4ef844f0fcc4d4b5bbe.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe I can help. What are you planning to do first?
quiz.nativeText: 或许我可以帮忙。你计划先做什么？
quiz.name: 996987bf7c0fd53bcf85e2a11bb741d9.mp3

quiz.text: I'm going to start with the floor.
quiz.nativeText: 我准备从地板开始。
quiz.name: 633e3c3800d382675f7d854cb2a8483d.mp3

quiz.text: But our vacuum is still broken.
quiz.nativeText: 但是我们的吸尘器还是坏的。
quiz.name: 8110608a90e5ceb40ff23e6a614b860d.mp3

quiz.text: I'll have to borrow one from our neighbor.
quiz.nativeText: 我还得从邻居那里借一台。
quiz.name: 2479edaf546982ac50cd8871da98edba.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I'll move the boxes in the corner first.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我先把角落里的盒子移开。
quiz.name: 576c73be3d8ae41062c8081058c54692.mp3

quiz.text: That's a good idea. Put them outside the house for now.
quiz.nativeText: 好主意。暂时把它们放到房子外面吧。
quiz.name: 6cdb235b28e0989bff3883cc68218815.mp3

quiz.text: Why do we have so many boxes? What is inside them, anyway?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么我们有这么多盒子？到底里面有什么？
quiz.name: 7a49868396b861129d2ac51727fd86b9.mp3

quiz.text: I can't remember exactly. It's been such a long time. I'll deal with them later.
quiz.nativeText: 我记不清了。好长时间了。一会儿我再收拾吧。
quiz.name: 03daf8e2217d0c12746aa6886bbc6f51.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Let's get started.
quiz.nativeText: 好。我们开始吧。
quiz.name: b73317acadd7a1e837a62dd3303cc85e.mp3

quiz.text: Hi! It's been a while since I saw you last.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，好久没看见你了。
quiz.name: 9b02430edff68e28b7e14a9185fd04ce.mp3

quiz.text: Hello! I've really missed you.
quiz.nativeText: 你好！我很想你啊。
quiz.name: 66e7619aaa1938dded135edcc29b5ce7.mp3

quiz.text: So this is the apartment you were talking about, right?
quiz.nativeText: 这就是你说的公寓，对吗？
quiz.name: f169806dc6ddc47dc5a9a3d1ce74dfcd.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, this is the living room.
quiz.nativeText: 对，这是客厅。
quiz.name: f4ef62d13ba62402f4b2d08e0dc1612d.mp3

quiz.text: It's really nice.
quiz.nativeText: 真的很不错。
quiz.name: 0312b62ead6838f4a06afd0d35ece7e6.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. I know you like large living rooms.
quiz.nativeText: 当然，我知道你喜欢大客厅。
quiz.name: 159a4dd6a6e88dfcb3827c9b73ab3d10.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Where is Joe?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你。Joe在哪呢？
quiz.name: efff95e8358d8cab805ace57fe815ce1.mp3

quiz.text: Joe is in the bedroom.
quiz.nativeText: Joe在卧室里面。
quiz.name: d21e3e83615e950298bc9f234f58e7a0.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Where is Sandy then?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。Sandy在哪呢？
quiz.name: 5245e89e5edf7cd5745581543c0915bd.mp3

quiz.text: Sandy is in the bathroom.
quiz.nativeText: Sandy在浴室里面。
quiz.name: fd3709d5c72d71267bfd12cba370073b.mp3

quiz.text: Oh. Then let's see more of the apartment first.
quiz.nativeText: 噢。那我们先看看公寓的其他地方吧。
quiz.name: 0083746279f0eae5e5814812b41caf01.mp3

quiz.text: Great. I will show you the kitchen first.
quiz.nativeText: 好。我先带你去看厨房。
quiz.name: fc22a4a068b5394376f9ed111b145493.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。
quiz.name: b90a14c0f61810e0234df3bc2f7261d2.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning!
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。
quiz.name: fac93e7c697984f224d796dda66fbd7a.mp3

quiz.text: How do you like the house?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得这个房子怎么样？
quiz.name: 0f73a8005ef88c92ce2eb9e57e896509.mp3

quiz.text: It is really big.
quiz.nativeText: 好大啊。
quiz.name: fd35d1b28d31cc6105581a9051ef6cac.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, isn't it nice?
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，很棒吧？
quiz.name: 493f300a4900115f7aa0fdc142a7b3f2.mp3

quiz.text: Of course.
quiz.nativeText: 当然啦。
quiz.name: 37223ff28a62f56f0690aad9164f440c.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like your living room?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢你的卧室吗？
quiz.name: 63f0ed01f689b46b7eabc68665b916ee.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I like it very much. It is very cozy.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我非常喜欢。很舒适。
quiz.name: f6c6cf0a06f85928967bbfedc6d66296.mp3

quiz.text: My mom bought this house for me.
quiz.nativeText: 我妈帮我买的这个房子。
quiz.name: fd19cb692d781b1c6fc0ffc7964ed543.mp3

quiz.text: Oh really! You are so lucky.
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗！你太幸运了。

quiz.name: 7b2228843f9f376dd58128155b979f95.mp3

learningItem.desc: suffer from后面加所患的疾病

quiz.text: Good morning. What seems to be the trouble?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，哪里不舒服？
quiz.name: f860b9cc62420644f4fbe58ede4b2e3c.mp3

quiz.text: I have been suffering from insomnia for three months.
quiz.nativeText: 我最近三个月患了失眠症。
quiz.name: c5621307fceb39608e91c1e00117cffe.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have headaches?
quiz.nativeText: 有头痛的情况吗？
quiz.name: e8339ad8f82a26dbc8dea19887ab3387.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, and I have no appetite.
quiz.nativeText: 有的，而且我吃饭没有胃口。
quiz.name: 57884bc4b6ec7421c9e3376098a4db04.mp3

quiz.text: Let me take your blood pressure. Don't worry. You are just a little exhausted from overwork.
quiz.nativeText: 让我给你量量血压。没事的，你就是工作过于劳累了。
quiz.name: 0db05c885e55ed2b03536b8cfba28a13.mp3

quiz.text: What should I do?
quiz.nativeText: 那我该怎么做呢？
quiz.name: aa0e78fa6ef1097226768b0d53cc7307.mp3

quiz.text: Here is a prescription for you. Try to keep your mind off your work.
quiz.nativeText: 这是给你开的处方。尽量不要过度工作。
quiz.name: ace5fb8dbf900472d3fce4612869ae14.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, Doctor. I will.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您，医生。我会照您说的做。
quiz.name: 7750c27a1702c2b91ff523e578e7b74f.mp3

quiz.text: Jake came rushing in to see his Dad.
quiz.nativeText: 杰克急匆匆地跑进来见他的爸爸。
quiz.hilitText: Jake came {#*rushing*$} in to see his Dad.
quiz.ipa: dʒeɪk keɪm r{#*ʌ*$}ʃɪŋ ɪn tu si hɪz dæd
quiz.name: 00960a7b7929813aabdf7e15c1dd3c3e.mp3

quiz.text: "Dad!" he puffed, "is it true that an apple a day keeps the doctor away?"
quiz.nativeText: “爸爸，他们说每天吃一个苹果，医生不会来找你。这句话是真的吗？”杰克气喘吁吁地说。
quiz.hilitText: "Dad!" he {#*puffed*$}, "is it true that an apple a day keeps the doctor away?"
quiz.ipa: dæd hi p{#*ʌ*$}ft ɪz ɪt tru ðæt æn æpəl ə deɪ kips ðə dɑktɝ əweɪ
quiz.name: b33bf172ced7d5822be17df9a038e805.mp3

quiz.text: "That's what they say," said his Dad.
quiz.nativeText: “确实是这么说的。”
quiz.ipa: ðæts w{#*ʌ*$}t ðeɪ seɪ sɛd hɪz dæd
quiz.name: 0ffad90fdba86ffbbb5a75ee389558cb.mp3

quiz.text: "Well, could you give me an apple quickly please?"
quiz.nativeText: “那你能快一点给我一个苹果吗”
quiz.hilitText: "Well, could you give me an apple quickly please?"
quiz.ipa: wɛl kʊd ju ɡɪv mi æn æpəl kwɪkli pliz
quiz.name: 9bd832d64317473119023f6768b31590.mp3

quiz.text: "Why in such a hurry?"
quiz.nativeText: “为什么这么急呢？”
quiz.name: 2d9f79c9a37b1f551921afe0f308e773.mp3

quiz.text: "Because I have just broken the doctor's window!"
quiz.nativeText: “因为我刚刚把医生家的窗户打碎了！”
quiz.hilitText: "Because I have {#*just*$} broken the doctor's window!"
quiz.ipa: bɪkɔz aɪ hæv dʒ{#*ʌ*$}st broʊkən ði dɑktɝz wɪndoʊ
quiz.name: c62142b81e6079e0849dd1e23311c570.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, what can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，有什么能帮您的么？
quiz.name: f7420bef066254c05a7e14b74898163e.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, I wonder if you can fill this prescription for me.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，能帮我开这个处方药吗？
quiz.name: 4bface2fc3a3d05c062871524e127644.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Here you are. Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题，给您。还有其他事吗？
quiz.name: 16fb456e543703fed90fa2c1f2965505.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Could you tell me how to take this medicine?
quiz.nativeText: 有。能告诉我这个药要怎样服用吗？
quiz.name: 4a56e1fe8f982fcb3a4d47f7a7cdd924.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Just use it once each day before going to bed.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。每天晚上睡觉前服用一次就好。
quiz.name: 9c8a38b2eab29cdd3ef8d63cf6255844.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Are there any serious side effects?
quiz.nativeText: 我明白了。有什么副作用吗？
quiz.name: caafc4ab7538cefea09d284ba0812668.mp3

quiz.text: No. The side effects are listed on the box. Is that all?
quiz.nativeText: 。副作用写在包装上了。还需要别的吗？
quiz.name: f8757d787d60371f4afe90e9277fc733.mp3

quiz.text: I also want to buy some vitamins for my son.
quiz.nativeText: 我还想给我的儿子买一些维生素。
quiz.name: 4e570963511323ce0496effb519cdd1d.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, you can find them over the counter. There are various brands for you to choose.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，你可以在柜台找到它们。有好多品牌供您选择。
quiz.name: 795e9f993fe86d60e3d16078b30c3590.mp3

quiz.text: That is great. Thank you for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！谢谢你的帮助。
quiz.name: 4b2f0dbb2b7568b7630a2a1ace1ad370.mp3

quiz.text: How are you doing, Mr.Smith?
quiz.nativeText: 史密斯先生，你感觉怎么样？
quiz.name: 76282f83e423aede8fd7ae3a83679fbe.mp3

quiz.text: I am feeling better now. The medicine is really effective.
quiz.nativeText: 我现在感觉好多了。那个药真的很有效果。
quiz.name: ee6a06ece2c865a0c91cfb8917440698.mp3

quiz.text: I am glad to hear that! Let me look at the x-ray results.
quiz.nativeText: 那太好了！让我来看一看你的射线检查结果。
quiz.name: f20bbaf2a291ad819b5a6ee51bbe21a9.mp3

quiz.text: Ok. Do I need more medicine, Doctor?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我还需要再吃药吗，医生？
quiz.name: ad3d9559e89e4a26cd630aadb7539384.mp3

quiz.text: I am afraid you have not fully recovered yet. I will prescribe some antibiotics for you.
quiz.nativeText: 恐怕是的，你还没有完全康复。我再给你开一些抗生素。
quiz.name: 8f0c054326eac0f5c3e78648ec579643.mp3

quiz.text: How long should I take these?
quiz.nativeText: 我需要吃这些药吃多长时间？
quiz.name: 25438ac0412d4fbfa09fc64de5d48c48.mp3

quiz.text: For one week.
quiz.nativeText: 大概一周。
quiz.name: 2a1535518adb4d96237bd10743960da5.mp3

quiz.text: Are there any side effects?
quiz.nativeText: 有什么副作用吗？
quiz.name: 66e4cc6dbad9a3aa852d2e62810d65cd.mp3

quiz.text: No, but get plenty of sleep and keep away from alcohol.
quiz.nativeText: 没有。但是你要保证充足的睡眠并且滴酒不沾。
quiz.name: 2f1de74a002b5447f440caf3d10069d0.mp3

quiz.text: I will. When do I need to come back?
quiz.nativeText: 我会的。我需要什么时候回来复查呀？
quiz.name: 172fc0a04b0456ffde0952f3968879b1.mp3

quiz.text: Come back and see me in about four days and we'll see if we need to change the dosage.
quiz.nativeText: 大概四天之后吧。我看看用不用改变用药量。
quiz.name: a99739dd98d5e57493f9b768051e0c57.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, Doctor.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您，医生。
quiz.name: c3c281fc92a8e683ec99114ef21191ee.mp3

learningItem.desc: 固定用法，也可以说my nose is running.

quiz.text: Good afternoon. What seems to be the trouble?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好。哪里不舒服啦？
quiz.name: d6f61c15a6b91b57652870a69e833dcc.mp3

quiz.text: I've had a bad headache for two days.
quiz.nativeText: 我的头已经痛两天了。
quiz.name: 2ddaba942489f3ae02604dd8fe5396e0.mp3

quiz.text: Any other symptoms? Do you feel light-headed?
quiz.nativeText: 有其他症状吗？感觉头晕吗？
quiz.name: 6ca3a58f59bb2b89cced3d2aec7083bb.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. And my nose is often running.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。而且我经常流鼻涕。
quiz.name: 8b411694448e6ac574b45f7e09fcc7ec.mp3

quiz.text: I see. What time of the day does your head hurt the most?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。一天中什么时候头最疼？
quiz.name: 3dacb734607bd939f171397b00b4075b.mp3

quiz.text: Mostly in the evening.
quiz.nativeText: 大多数是在晚上的时候。
quiz.name: 8c2985960a37144da9c4ff1bfdc82533.mp3

quiz.text: Now let me take a look at your head. It looks like you've got a chronic migraine along with a cold.
quiz.nativeText: 现在让我来检查一下。看起来你是由于感冒得了偏头痛。
quiz.name: eacdc29f71818b87984b4d6912e56e42.mp3

quiz.text: Is it serious, Doctor?
quiz.nativeText: 严重吗，医生？
quiz.name: 3bd3dfc40b8dbfc604ce47cb7593d539.mp3

quiz.text: No. I'll prescribe some medicine for you and you should feel better in no time.
quiz.nativeText: 不严重。我会为你开一些药，很快就会好的。
quiz.name: bb9e8579cf178acecb6657c5dc88ac07.mp3

quiz.text: Anything else should I pay attention to?
quiz.nativeText: 有什么其他的需要注意的吗？
quiz.name: 6e244484bcf9f9f02146394fa9002762.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. You should keep away from alcohol and be regular in your habits.
quiz.nativeText: 有的。你应该滴酒不沾，并且保持规律的作息。
quiz.name: 094912714ed97ae97c88282e32ec065f.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I'll keep that in mind.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我会记住的。
quiz.name: 46d080c22ec65a81ee9ca15a9cd795a8.mp3

learningItem.desc: 可以做名词也可以做动词

quiz.text: Come in, please. Have a seat. What seems to be the trouble?
quiz.nativeText: 请进。请坐。你哪里不舒服？
quiz.name: c56f82b3b72e934b629339440ce1721b.mp3

quiz.text: It's my stomach. It hurts badly.
quiz.nativeText: 是我的胃的问题。好疼啊。
quiz.name: 20437506bd6d1dd6d6108373169ecfea.mp3

quiz.text: Have you changed your eating habits recently?
quiz.nativeText: 你最近改变饮食习惯了吗？
quiz.name: ff5c6e1adae78c4032bae82b485bea5a.mp3

quiz.text: Kind of. I had too much for dinner last night.
quiz.nativeText: 有一点。我昨晚晚餐吃太多了。
quiz.name: f6c27582851dce520fd24331f64b0a51.mp3

quiz.text: Could you tell me what you had for dinner last night?
quiz.nativeText: 你能告诉我你昨晚吃了什么吗？
quiz.name: fe39bfa8c0f7ec9530ea9fd123415129.mp3

quiz.text: Some seafood, roast duck, pizza and some beer.
quiz.nativeText: 一些海鲜，烤鸭，披萨和一些啤酒。
quiz.name: 8615e1c4dc0063f6261052eaa3b0bd2f.mp3

quiz.text: That's quite a lot. Did you vomit?
quiz.nativeText: 确实挺多的。你呕吐过了吗？
quiz.name: f8255e0f4ba0a30c6b25c7f9d3770979.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. And I made several trips to the bathroom last night.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。而且我昨晚去了好几次厕所。
quiz.name: fb14dbc0ae72458fe04a580f07b6b59e.mp3

quiz.text: I see. You'll have your stools tested and bring the report back to me after the test.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。现在你需要去做便检。做完测试之后请把化验结果拿回来。
quiz.name: 2b390c71aa2474b797ec3066249c0dc3.mp3

quiz.text: All right, Doctor. I'll be back in a minute.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，医生。我去去就回。
quiz.name: 27f351e08008269958fbb1efe7891de3.mp3

quiz.text: Take your time. See you soon.
quiz.nativeText: 慢慢来，一会见。
quiz.name: c8e19099d620839967afbc1a7544c47f.mp3

quiz.text: Here's my report. What caused my stomach-ache?
quiz.nativeText: 这是我的化验结果。什么导致了我的胃痛呢？
quiz.name: 9364536f23de2bcecfc7ae9d949beb12.mp3

quiz.text: You ate too much oily food last night and got indigestion. I'll prescribe some medicine for you.
quiz.nativeText: 你昨晚吃了太多油腻的食物导致消化不良。我给你开一些药。
quiz.name: 3df7b447f772693727db520e69216129.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I'll avoid oily food from now on.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。从现在开始我会避免油腻食物的。
quiz.name: 55d2c1361b0fae1f028184d4f64708cd.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon. How can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: 998b4ee309992522ec3bca02c6c2afe7.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, Doctor. I feel terrible.
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，医生。我感觉很糟糕。
quiz.name: e1e377b3e15298f108e7431a7a276af8.mp3

quiz.text: What's the matter?
quiz.nativeText: 怎么了？
quiz.name: 023ba38a4deba81183a24181a0c8f1fa.mp3

quiz.text: I can't stand up straight due to the pain.
quiz.nativeText: 我疼得站不直了。
quiz.name: 627ab8a4bcab01d63617741a78ab0e2d.mp3
