quiz.text: Well, I suppose it must be a backache.
quiz.nativeText: 这样啊，应该是背疼。
quiz.name: a7327d2d9de9b25ee2ad9c3e278c9749.mp3

quiz.text: No, my back is fine. My stomach feels weird.
quiz.nativeText: 不是，我的背很好。我的胃感觉不好。
quiz.name: 168c74d0bb38844d555f1c5f5e3f3570.mp3

quiz.text: So it must be a stomach ache.
quiz.nativeText: 所以一定是胃疼了。
quiz.name: 530619782c66910447f4f474df20c0c7.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I guess so.
quiz.nativeText: 我猜是这样。
quiz.name: 238838a238b5f0bed8a6509bd4e63602.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, Joe. How are you doing?
quiz.nativeText: Joe，你还好吗？
quiz.name: 7cad2edea77d25754ad8116cff477201.mp3

quiz.text: Not good, Doctor. I have a bad tooth ache.
quiz.nativeText: 不太好，医生。我牙疼得厉害。
quiz.name: 950cf8f08fb3f51ff56733f8214f51f2.mp3

quiz.text: Is it serious?
quiz.nativeText: 严重吗？
quiz.name: d9e970a5406a78ef005a2a59390f8d42.mp3

quiz.text: This bad tooth is killing me!
quiz.nativeText: 这颗烂牙要疼死我了！
quiz.name: 411cabd7fdac963dbd07a1d696320ac2.mp3

quiz.text: Have you been taking good care of your teeth recently?
quiz.nativeText: 你最近有好好养护你的牙齿吗？
quiz.name: 99caa10d356b63fa7128b44ea28b5452.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I have. I brush my teeth twice a day.
quiz.nativeText: 我有啊。我每天刷两次牙。
quiz.name: 00315db4899c401de1f60eafee5df220.mp3

quiz.text: Have you been eating a lot of sugar?
quiz.nativeText: 你是吃了很多糖吗？
quiz.name: 46dbc57d61f04479fea38195786e6390.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I do have a sweet tooth.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，我确实很喜欢甜食。
quiz.name: 5409e33c213bddfd2333d66e07268388.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Don't worry. I'll see what I can do.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。别担心，我来看看怎么解决。
quiz.name: 6619ad6668e56cf0340d6a4f249095ca.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, Doctor.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你，医生。
quiz.name: c3c281fc92a8e683ec99114ef21191ee.mp3

quiz.text: There is a new park near my house.
quiz.name: d9d9f81aea2cc82d67b284e3e8a599be.mp3

quiz.text: It's a fine day today.
quiz.name: 4893434a5123cc07849407aac646f42d.mp3

quiz.text: My family and I are in the park now.
quiz.name: 3e200d7a96324ca2ebeaf6b77d822f09.mp3

quiz.text: On my left, there is a cafe.
quiz.name: 1ddbf6cdd067e4f12df55216717c0ec5.mp3

quiz.text: On my right, there is a big lake.
quiz.name: 8d03324ac35c88053e613345ccabb225.mp3

quiz.text: There are many flowers and trees near the lake.
quiz.name: a6729a4639e9a4a57f5ce0e5f70abc7e.mp3

quiz.text: There is a small hill behind the lake.
quiz.name: 6f8fd76b5847ca8a93856fc5b7ede86a.mp3

quiz.text: Near the lake, there is a sign.
quiz.name: 89e0e483fa43e11d31835e35d443d9ac.mp3

quiz.text: It says,"Don't swim in the lake!"
quiz.name: 0e5a2360de0addbea3091a75ae26e781.mp3

quiz.text: There is a playground in the middle of the park.
quiz.name: 24b9516b71f94f72daf9c76cacbecd04.mp3

quiz.text: The park is so beautiful.
quiz.name: 18c901d5f58a0bc6b17926b24da455c4.mp3

quiz.text: We like it very much.
quiz.name: a8ca6e1c33fa3e64e1bb0010dbc6a19a.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning! How can I help you today?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！我能为您做什么？
quiz.name: bb633bd38d296e16e828de7d566cb5d4.mp3

quiz.text: I want to open an account.
quiz.nativeText: 我想开一个新账户。
quiz.name: a2d077abbd865bd3522e09a83c67d339.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of account would you like to open, a checking account or a savings account?
quiz.nativeText: 您想开一个什么种类的账户？活期的还是定期的？
quiz.name: 05ddb55f61edc7d803cd864367bad6af.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to open a checking account.
quiz.nativeText: 我想开一个活期账户。
quiz.name: 9ea1bdb16e0ec341947591bff2143fe7.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Have you filled out an application form?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你的申请表填好了吗？
quiz.name: acf1f6909ca4dbb8bb74a9b25ad31b45.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Here is my ID card.
quiz.nativeText: 填好了。我还带了身份证。
quiz.name: 67c1f37add6da7f278215331afe2c0d1.mp3

quiz.text: That is great! Would you prefer a bank card or bank book?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，您想办银行卡还是存折？
quiz.name: bf3262b9e181c018f6f57f3f1d1a761c.mp3

quiz.text: Bank card.
quiz.nativeText: 银行卡。
quiz.name: 31a74e302b2f83c9a60fe845836b8acc.mp3

quiz.text: Ok. Would you like to apply for online banking service?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。您想开通网上银行服务吗？
quiz.name: ede15fdfec1805350fdb230d22e5d0f2.mp3

quiz.text: No. I don't think online transactions are safe.
quiz.nativeText: 不想。我觉得网上交易不安全。
quiz.name: 9d6767879c7c8680b3344a44edfbcc32.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Set your PIN number and enter it twice into the machine. Here are your bank card.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧。请输入两次六位密码。这是您的银行卡。
quiz.name: df494e3024731abbc4de62ad7e133b61.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。
quiz.name: 1f33d36ccb6b37e6d20351f841fb1d4f.mp3

learnText: 短元音。发音时，舌尖轻触下齿，舌中部稍抬起，唇形稍扁，开口度较大。

quiz.text: above
quiz.nativeText: 上方
quiz.name: c2d92b81beeac9bfc89fb870c1a20767.mp3

quiz.text: agree
quiz.nativeText: 同意
quiz.name: 8bad2ac090103988193271ed84456e93.mp3

quiz.text: attend
quiz.nativeText: 参加
quiz.name: 8d80d5d2be63c93f7286d9de14266fdc.mp3

quiz.text: seven
quiz.nativeText: 七
quiz.name: ebcf71d9bbc715c43f24a10cce77dab4.mp3

name: ə

learningItem.desc: noun or verb 多重含义

quiz.text: Good afternoon. What can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好！有什么可以帮您的吗？
quiz.name: c9cebddc4bb3e9f36311e899d25fb8cf.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to withdraw some money from my account.
quiz.nativeText: 我想从我的账户里取一些钱。
quiz.name: 166e3e6b52311607bc2ca52a7ae9d4d6.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Would you please fill out the withdrawal slip?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。可以填写这张取款单吗？
quiz.name: c0de791765b73eba33f92eccf4f2c6f3.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. And here is my bank card.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。这是我的银行卡。
quiz.name: 305a9e3785a712939e717908e97aabcb.mp3

quiz.text: How much would you like to withdraw?
quiz.nativeText: 你想取出多少钱？
quiz.name: e8b08f31f21163f20016e7e6c0ebb641.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to withdraw one hundred dollars, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想取一百美元。
quiz.name: 5b4d1412e9aacc24db2e96c1681c16a9.mp3

quiz.text: I am sorry, but your balance is insufficient.
quiz.nativeText: 很抱歉，您的余额不够了。
quiz.name: aca049318f299065186c7595717ef2e5.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Then I'd like to withdraw fifty dollars, please.
quiz.nativeText: 这样啊。那我取五十美元好了。
quiz.name: fa44c9e2afdf5937b0a77cbb4b86e14a.mp3

quiz.text: Ok. Enter your PIN number here.
quiz.nativeText: 可以的，请在这里输入您的密码。
quiz.name: 906ae3e298a462dd500a4cd4c9e12ba8.mp3

quiz.text: Done. Can I have it in small bills?
quiz.nativeText: 好了。能给我一些小面额的钱吗？
quiz.name: 715f8272ec3f4cb0222b97e6ed66b8f1.mp3

quiz.text: No problem! Here you are, fifty dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题！给您五十美元。
quiz.name: 1fe1b568a7a207820207bc508ccd06ae.mp3

quiz.text: Great! Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！谢谢。
quiz.name: 8c1d119bd1253750cd1619cb22e11eb2.mp3

quiz.text: above
quiz.nativeText: 上方
quiz.name: c2d92b81beeac9bfc89fb870c1a20767.mp3

quiz.text: agree
quiz.nativeText: 同意
quiz.name: 8bad2ac090103988193271ed84456e93.mp3

quiz.text: attend a meeting
quiz.nativeText: 参加一个会议
quiz.name: b3796f44c0347ebaa60ae2b7fb9323d0.mp3

quiz.text: rest on a sofa
quiz.nativeText: 在沙发上休息
quiz.name: e77a3e3534f2abeaefb9b9035e49ca75.mp3

quiz.text: Summer vacation was over and Little Johnny returned back to school.
quiz.nativeText: 暑假结束了。小强尼回到了学校。
quiz.hilitText: Summer {#*vacation*$} was over and {#*Little*$} Johnny returned back to school.
quiz.ipa: sʌmɝ veɪkeɪʃ{#*ə*$}n wɑz oʊvɝ ænd lɪt{#*ə*$}l dʒɑni rɪtɝnd bæk tu skul
quiz.name: 67a4ba6ee8e4a103dbda5b7905aef6e4.mp3

quiz.text: The lighthouse flashes signal twice a minute.
quiz.nativeText: 灯塔一分钟发两次闪光信号。
quiz.ipa: weɪt dʒʌst {#*ə*$} mɪn{#*ə*$}t hɪz mʌðɝ sɛd
quiz.name: 67b50b4cac478e0bb4e480a36f963f06.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning! How can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！有什么可以帮助您的？
quiz.name: 1f64c30368813769cc8ca7812729b544.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. I would like to send one thousand dollars to New York.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！我想往纽约市汇一千美元。
quiz.name: 08b6199cd5a537da139128da943ca20c.mp3

quiz.text: Please fill out this wire transfer form. Please put on the name and full address of the receiver.
quiz.nativeText: 请填写这张汇款单。在收款处写上姓名和完整地址。
quiz.name: 6818a677173725383fbc779231fa2d7e.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are. Is that OK?
quiz.nativeText: 给你。这样行吗？
quiz.name: 0cb92f7b1215f99ed9aefff873bf3a91.mp3

quiz.text: Let me check. Yes. Your cash, please.
quiz.nativeText: 让我看看。没问题。请给我汇款。
quiz.name: 8de76b507fd7e973e4f6bc0f73b33c7b.mp3

quiz.text: Here is one thousand dollars. By the way, what is the rate?
quiz.nativeText: 这里是一千美元汇款。顺便问一下，手续费率是多少？
quiz.name: 866008d6a825b7628182bcdf8d4ec08f.mp3

quiz.text: The rate is one percent. That comes to ten dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 手续费率是百分之一。一共就是十美元。
quiz.name: 4fba1951ce0559c6515c6489f1dc90b3.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. When will the money arrive?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。汇款什么时候能到？
quiz.name: 37abaea40087432e81e5c50f33889f81.mp3

quiz.text: Generally it will arrive within a week.
quiz.nativeText: 一般来说一周以内就能到。
quiz.name: ef035b56e71965baf03c215c3614c0d8.mp3

quiz.text: That is great!
quiz.nativeText: 太好了！
quiz.name: e85e51cce1de3909bf865f58fc97779a.mp3

quiz.text: Make sure you take care of your receipt.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。请保管好你的汇款收据。
quiz.name: fc244f9b9a5d8f1b944c0e33c02de7e8.mp3

quiz.text: Will do. Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 我会的。太感谢你了。
quiz.name: 6fcf1023a6424478654cbc2e26460dbf.mp3

quiz.text: Summer vacation was over and Little Johnny returned back to school.
quiz.nativeText: 暑假结束了。小强尼回到了学校。
quiz.hilitText: Summer {#*vacation*$} was over and {#*Little*$} Johnny returned back to school.
quiz.ipa: sʌmɝ veɪkeɪʃ{#*ə*$}n wɑz oʊvɝ ænd lɪt{#*ə*$}l dʒɑni rɪtɝnd bæk tu skul
quiz.name: 67a4ba6ee8e4a103dbda5b7905aef6e4.mp3

quiz.text: Two days later the teacher phoned his mother and said,
quiz.nativeText: 不过仅仅过了两天，老师给他的妈妈打电话说：
quiz.hilitText: Two days later {#*the*$} teacher phoned his mother and said,
quiz.ipa: tu deɪz leɪtɝ ð{#*ə*$} titʃɝ foʊnd hɪz mʌðɝ ænd sɛd
quiz.name: ef7e253f4f283621a2c4523e9dd099fa.mp3

quiz.text: "Your boy is misbehaving and jumping on the sofa!"
quiz.nativeText: “你儿子太淘气了！在沙发上蹦呢！”
quiz.hilitText: "Your boy is misbehaving and jumping on {#*the*$} {#*sofa*$}!"
quiz.ipa: jʊr bɔɪ ɪz mɪsbiheɪvɪŋ ænd dʒʌmpɪŋ ɑn ð{#*ə*$} soʊf{#*ə*$}
quiz.name: 58e1e20b736bae5ad107bbf6567cbcca.mp3

quiz.text: "Wait just a minute," His mother said,
quiz.nativeText: “等一下”，他的妈妈说：
quiz.ipa: weɪt dʒʌst {#*ə*$} mɪn{#*ə*$}t hɪz mʌðɝ sɛd
quiz.name: babd657a7016c5dde5bdf5345b0feb09.mp3

quiz.text: "I had Johnny with me for seven weeks and I never called you once when he misbehaved.
quiz.nativeText: “我和他在暑假呆了整整七个星期。他淘气的时候我从来没给你打过电话。
quiz.hilitText: "I had Johnny with me for {#*seven*$} weeks and I never called you once when he {#*misbehaved*$}.
quiz.ipa: aɪ hæd dʒɑni wɪθ mi fɔr sɛv{#*ə*$}n wiks ænd aɪ nɛvɝ kɔld ju wʌns wɛn hi mɪsb{#*ə*$}heɪvd
quiz.name: 8e13cff65c6c6c43c0dc6cb9022354cb.mp3

quiz.text: Couldn't you show me the same courtesy?"
quiz.nativeText: 你就不能也一样客气地对待我吗？”
quiz.ipa: kʊd{#*ə*$}nt ju ʃoʊ mi ð{#*ə*$} seɪm kɝt{#*ə*$}si
quiz.name: 2650c0d7fd3ef8c3d2003a7f5c63fcd1.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon! What can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好！有什么可以帮您的吗？
quiz.name: 0a516d6e11af44d6f4996408af7e74b0.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to change some foreign currency.
quiz.nativeText: 我想换一些外币。
quiz.name: 70ca8e2c0a3b8395d1b6af3903e0de4b.mp3

quiz.text: OK. What kind of currency do you want to change?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，您想换哪种货币？
quiz.name: 7ad7a35f765de462f7be86ee29fbf402.mp3

quiz.text: I want to change Yuan into US dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 我想把人民币换成美元。
quiz.name: 24dbdce483391d4ee7c1944a5764aae7.mp3

quiz.text: OK. How much would you like to change?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，您想换多少？
quiz.name: 721810b3682362d531b127196101d93d.mp3

quiz.text: What is the current exchange rate?
quiz.nativeText: 现在的汇率是多少？
quiz.name: 2643ac0868be26d2f9e6f0659cbb5ea0.mp3

quiz.text: It is seven Yuan to one US dollar.
quiz.nativeText: 人民币兑美元是七比一。
quiz.name: b0b795712dbf453f21ab02e519894860.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'd like to exchange seven thousand Yuan.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我想换七千人民币。
quiz.name: e4933171cfaa7a5df198c87fd86a819a.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Do you want large bills or small bills?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。您想要大面值的还是小面值的？
quiz.name: d4bce39095a5c5139b64f01eb0e0bba1.mp3

quiz.text: Small bills, please.
quiz.nativeText: 小面值的。
quiz.name: 30f027de4156c79d7ad8988a17781369.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are. One thousand US dollars in total.
quiz.nativeText: 给您。一共是一千美元。
quiz.name: 6bb6f42a20e78f88a2f4f45cceac0ea1.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 您好，我能为您做些什么？
quiz.name: 1daee78dd7195e1c2c200947fd02733b.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to apply for a personal loan.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要申请一下个人贷款。
quiz.name: 91d574e2ecf7fbaea597fb02adc5dad8.mp3

quiz.text: How much would you like to borrow?
quiz.nativeText: 你想贷款多少钱？
quiz.name: 14b36286093950c14c70e00d1045989e.mp3

quiz.text: Three thousand dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 三千美元。
quiz.name: 6ca882fb67e8d72fac53def35bfd5aaa.mp3

quiz.text: OK, let me check. Your credit rating is quite high. I don't think you will have any problem.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，让我查一下。您的信誉度很高。我想贷款应该不会有问题。
quiz.name: 17a622e30f3e993e5a51f38fbe8dcf4c.mp3

quiz.text: What is the current interest rate?
quiz.nativeText: 目前的利率是多少？
quiz.name: ad0a3bb6fbb1a2eb6269ab42b983fe2c.mp3

quiz.text: Our monthly interest is two percent of the outstanding balance. Can I see your ID card, please?
quiz.nativeText: 我们每月的利率是未偿贷款的百分之二。我可以看一下您的身份证吗？
quiz.name: 7de5aa4c6355b8ee931f104a3236a727.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，给你。
quiz.name: 55c0c8ddd77298a96bb8867f1eab1744.mp3

quiz.text: Would you please fill out this application form?
quiz.nativeText: 您可以填写一下这个申请表吗？
quiz.name: 945069a047745a031931387b4ed7d810.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Who should I give it to?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我应该给谁？
quiz.name: 85aabb752d4f75387c84fa904a291495.mp3

quiz.text: You can give it to the loans manager over there. He will talk to you about further details.
quiz.nativeText: 你可以给那边的信贷员。他会和您谈一些更加具体的细节。
quiz.name: c3ced88a68a789f567dbbb2b395c6421.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Thank you for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，谢谢你的帮助。
quiz.name: 614030d4a3fe6a8187daa7322b65d26d.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, sir. How can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，先生。有什么可以帮你的吗？
quiz.name: 24f492a7ff63072b84a32a151ed05b0d.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. I want to open a new account.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。我想新开一个账户。
quiz.name: 8e4efd5b8da45ff1c3586c3f858e81b9.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Please take a number here. Your number is twenty.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。请在这里取一个号。你的号码是二十。
quiz.name: 4f8bcbe55d64faff68de13d225a33cd3.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Do I need to fill out any forms?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你，我需要填表吗？
quiz.name: 0ec77780cdde874831b014ee87125205.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Do you have your ID card with you?
quiz.nativeText: 是的。你带身份证了吗？
quiz.name: 93b917708155febab31f82cf713c3efe.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. Here is my ID card.
quiz.nativeText: 带了，这是我的身份证。
quiz.name: 0c8f55fd014484c25d3ba2b740908b66.mp3

quiz.text: And you need some cash to make an initial deposit.
quiz.nativeText: 然后你需要一些现金来做第一笔存款。
quiz.name: 729c99e5ef2c3be71603a08454e74eb7.mp3

quiz.text: I have some.
quiz.nativeText: 我带了些现金。
quiz.name: 303368f4c5cc7432c9db7330c4cb288b.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Here are the forms you need to fill out.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，这里是你需要填的表格。
quiz.name: 3c265f2beeff1338339d16217137aef8.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning!
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！
quiz.name: fac93e7c697984f224d796dda66fbd7a.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, sir. Welcome to our bank.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！先生。欢迎来到我们的银行。
quiz.name: ee7133cc5de6a9cfc633bf4c9f7e3bc9.mp3

quiz.text: So what kind of bank services do you have?
quiz.nativeText: 所以你们有什么样的银行服务？
quiz.name: b352cfc429ec5cbd09a815a638c8a4f5.mp3

quiz.text: We have two different kinds of account.
quiz.nativeText: 我们提供两种不同的账户。
quiz.name: 3ff715d5dfc5a817fac832765b4e0287.mp3

quiz.text: What are they?
quiz.nativeText: 是什么？
quiz.name: d862e0fd68867d7cb635932bd765826d.mp3

quiz.text: Checking accounts and savings accounts.
quiz.nativeText: 支票账户和储蓄账户。
quiz.name: 656adc28fa0d96b05c752c8448d3bc4f.mp3

quiz.text: I see.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。
quiz.name: 24d7ea5222cfe23b0c528dc389eae85f.mp3

quiz.text: And we offer business loans too.
quiz.nativeText: 我们也提供商业贷款。
quiz.name: ec28e08d0c773ae08e8d410dbb5bf983.mp3

quiz.text: What else?
quiz.nativeText: 还有什么呢？
quiz.name: 767fa89c8da0cb211fb5b541aacced17.mp3

quiz.text: We also provide cash management services.
quiz.nativeText: 还有现金管理服务。
quiz.name: 9e90b270eaadd9ea55b55f7b9a972090.mp3

quiz.text: Welcome to Bear Country!
quiz.name: 445bf3dfafa40897828fc2e37960ea6a.mp3

quiz.text: Down a sunny dirt road lives a family of bears-
quiz.name: 6fb09d8d9f442c7ba96df4987def48b8.mp3

quiz.text: Papa Bear, Mama Bear and Small Bear.
quiz.name: 765f4eb3245f8373a23e3a4c0531a82a.mp3

quiz.text: They live in a big tree.
quiz.name: da3b8995e0b31d3ac313c4d72fffb7f0.mp3

quiz.text: It is a very fine house.
quiz.name: bdef6a2beca0e90a4ef98cb1a73727fc.mp3

quiz.text: There is a big kitchen,
quiz.name: 9f3d76a22a4bfa4a2febe6bf075492bb.mp3

quiz.text: a sitting room and two bedrooms.
quiz.name: 8a05ad6a3dfeaf76ffccc318d77f4073.mp3

quiz.text: Small Bear helps Papa get honey
quiz.name: 8f1fc249551fe8f9ab92d23394d9dd4d.mp3

quiz.text: from the old bee tree.
quiz.name: 1856da5ff3b8e9a923aea3596c719118.mp3

quiz.text: He also helps Mama bring
quiz.name: a8f771fe8f7c609cd322fab416465bdb.mp3

quiz.text: the vegetables from the garden.
quiz.name: ef8135ce05bd5c2d6f1c42bc84a31d4f.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, miss. What can I do for you this afternoon?
quiz.nativeText: 女士您好，我能为您做些什么？
quiz.name: 620192560871f364b2d3de1f5aac6fc2.mp3

quiz.text: I have an appointment to have my hair cut this afternoon.
quiz.nativeText: 我预约了今天下午剪发。
quiz.name: 567ca7b44bc2349d88127ceecbdfa87a.mp3

quiz.text: Right. Would you like a shampoo first? I'll get a gown for you.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。您想先洗头吗？我去给您拿一个理发袍来。
quiz.name: d5a35d43aaa4c163905beb13352526b8.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thanks.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，谢谢。
quiz.name: 9d8f45b9b2e21befe16d40dd06b681bc.mp3

quiz.text: So how would you like your hair cut?
quiz.nativeText: 您想要剪什么样的头型？
quiz.name: 2c30960bfbac1382001058885b1dc48d.mp3

quiz.text: I want it cut shoulder-length.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要剪成及肩长发。
quiz.name: 2812f602190636786e036cb12194bc12.mp3

quiz.text: OK. What do you think of it now?
quiz.nativeText: 好了。现在这样行么？
quiz.name: 5bdb8c22dfcacf7246cd55b9ea8bcb9c.mp3

quiz.text: Please cut the sides a bit shorter.
quiz.nativeText: 两边头发再剪短一些吧。
quiz.name: d1e0d7d2fa8d671885a6054b0387c18f.mp3

quiz.text: All right. What about the top?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。头顶部分怎么办呢？
quiz.name: 36de7a3423b979c1a64208ca84d8fb98.mp3

quiz.text: I think you can just thin the top out a little.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得可以把头顶部分打薄一些。
quiz.name: 6365eb9106495f76a5df7ef1a2bf4ad6.mp3

quiz.text: You got it. Do you still want to part your hair in the middle?
quiz.nativeText: 懂了。你还想留中分头吗？
quiz.name: 2a2ddda22fe573e017980838c0013612.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I do. I think it makes me look mature.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我觉得这样显得成熟一些。
quiz.name: 03450583ebbd1ecc15573f427af46f6d.mp3

quiz.text: It is done. Do you like your new hairstyle?
quiz.nativeText: 弄好了。你喜欢现在的新发型吗？
quiz.name: 7ef399ab7f17e763ff47f8c3433b5d7f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, it is great!
quiz.nativeText: 喜欢，现在的发型很棒！
quiz.name: 325852e0105b80b6a243be23e0f0ea1e.mp3

learnText: 发音时，先发[ʌ]的音，同时将舌头向后卷起，振动声带发声即成。

quiz.text: first
quiz.nativeText: 第一
quiz.name: 2c2624a5059934a947d6e25fe8332ade.mp3

quiz.text: perfect
quiz.nativeText: 完美的
quiz.name: f2fcd5cb74d17554a4d7a30f1b6ecc94.mp3

quiz.text: service
quiz.nativeText: 服务
quiz.name: f9e81a746a286bbac225d69520d1e67a.mp3

quiz.text: journey
quiz.nativeText: 旅程
quiz.name: ba8de81adcb558ee9aefe63df9c6b47c.mp3

name: ɝ

learningItem.desc: 固定搭配，也可以说have a permanent

learningItem.nativeText: 长波波头（最近流行的一款发型）

quiz.text: What can I do for you today, madam?
quiz.nativeText: 我能为您做些什么，女士？
quiz.name: 198721c99f6514ed9ef1c93f821e5620.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like a perm, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想做烫发。
quiz.name: 68d79dcce7c02d28fa67528b480f15d1.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Would you like a cold wave or an ordinary wave?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。您想要冷烫还是正常的热烫？
quiz.name: 93ccc91211782349e60dab2a770b5192.mp3

quiz.text: Just an ordinary one.
quiz.nativeText: 就要正常的烫发就行。
quiz.name: 47e7049c70bd4b41de9819e392043456.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Do you have a particular hairdo in mind?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你有哪种想好的发型吗？
quiz.name: 1cff1b4dc13b661e34b2a90a2ad0095e.mp3

quiz.text: Not really. Could you show me some pictures of hairdos?
quiz.nativeText: 没有。可以给我看一些发型图片吗？
quiz.name: 3cdb0d838c6a8fb0e65f10d6e5adf0e7.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Here you are. I think the long bob suites you well.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。给您。我觉得这个长波波头很适合您。
quiz.name: 532e3459642b7842833121d03e05e56e.mp3

quiz.text: It looks really stylish!
quiz.nativeText: 看起来真的好时髦啊！
quiz.name: 7ec3e5f68c72042b253688e5247ba052.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want a tight, medium or large wave?
quiz.nativeText: 你想要小卷，中卷还是自然的大卷？
quiz.name: 62c8e1f86d496a9a280a301d93d43a49.mp3

quiz.text: Just make the ends naturally curled.
quiz.nativeText: 就把发梢自然地烫一下就行。
quiz.name: dcf0eb3403860c234f5259b99a94a2ec.mp3

quiz.text: You got it! It will take about two hours.
quiz.nativeText: 好的！大概要两个小时。
quiz.name: 1526085744800b5ff35ed654ec2cf625.mp3

quiz.text: Really? I'll take a nap in between.
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？那我在这期间小睡一会好了。
quiz.name: ded3253ea9bf4eb6f47e37129af7f8f7.mp3

quiz.text: first
quiz.nativeText: 第一
quiz.name: 2c2624a5059934a947d6e25fe8332ade.mp3

quiz.text: perfect
quiz.nativeText: 完美的
quiz.name: f2fcd5cb74d17554a4d7a30f1b6ecc94.mp3

quiz.text: out of service
quiz.nativeText: 停止服务
quiz.name: 5f9fc6ec68628127059732ac1ca1eb9d.mp3

quiz.text: go on a journey
quiz.nativeText: 去旅行
quiz.name: 6abe03bd6a47a1ed67d3a41de88fa495.mp3

quiz.text: A man took his eight-year-old son to school on Thursday morning.
quiz.nativeText: 星期四早晨，一个男带着八岁的儿子去上学。
quiz.hilitText: A man took his eight-year-old son to school on {#*Thursday*$} morning.
quiz.ipa: ə mæn tʊk hɪz eɪt jɪr oʊld sʌn tu skul ɑn θ{#*ɝ*$}zdi mɔrnɪŋ
quiz.name: 62a8f923da7096b2fc679537f57534ba.mp3

quiz.text: He made a turn at a red light where it was prohibited.
quiz.nativeText: 他闯红灯拐了个弯。
quiz.hilitText: He made a {#*turn*$} at a red light where it was prohibited.
quiz.ipa: hi meɪd ə t{#*ɝ*$}n æt ə rɛd laɪt wɛr ɪt wɑz proʊhɪbətəd
quiz.name: cee2ecd2eee23204772e129af6addfd0.mp3

learningItem.desc: 可做动词也可做名词，常见用法dye one's hair

quiz.text: Good morning, miss! What can I do for you today?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，小姐！我能为你做些什么？
quiz.name: 64d20af890d2d11e96745bf05780652f.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to dye my hair. Having black hair all the time is a little boring.
quiz.nativeText: 我想染发。一直留黑发有点无聊。
quiz.name: 98efc59853abbb902cd37c113b76781a.mp3

quiz.text: Let's change things up then! Which color would you prefer?
quiz.nativeText: 那让我们来做一些改变吧！你想要哪种颜色？
quiz.name: b80467df0135da7c3455a7a6f0a36a72.mp3

quiz.text: I'm not sure. Could you give me some suggestions?
quiz.nativeText: 我不太确定。你能给我一些建议吗？
quiz.name: 1b2df36d17e5424608f444ee8067af30.mp3

quiz.text: What about deep red? It is very fashionable.
quiz.nativeText: 深红色怎么样？特别时髦。
quiz.name: a7bf1e7d3758df3450e8a4c9679aab53.mp3

quiz.text: I'd prefer a more natural color. Chestnut is good.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢更自然一些的颜色。栗色就很好。
quiz.name: 9b82f51d0d81c95850d228c58f6c7125.mp3

quiz.text: OK. There are various brands of hair dye for you to choose from.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你可以选择不同品牌的染发剂。
quiz.name: fb08a2d70ac141c08804abbe61a85dc2.mp3

quiz.text: I want the best one.
quiz.nativeText: 我要最好的那种。
quiz.name: f43148d369a8bb67e345f67d7673d314.mp3

quiz.text: You got it. I'll give you a hair treatment afterwards.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题！弄完之后我给你做一个头发护理。
quiz.name: 7dcdab55a0cfcff8b948bfc2e151e005.mp3

quiz.text: That's very kind of you. By the way, will it fade fast?
quiz.nativeText: 你太好了。顺便问一下，会很快掉色吗？
quiz.name: 47e82372fe627381f67abedd1694e5bc.mp3

quiz.text: No. Within three months it won't fade. Don't worry.
quiz.nativeText: 不会的。三个月之内不会掉色的。别担心。
quiz.name: ebd8edbadad576b9843c94e3eef9ab65.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 我明白了。谢谢。
quiz.name: 7588a4912129bf7d97bf6dfa2b205477.mp3

quiz.text: A man took his eight-year-old son to school on Thursday morning.
quiz.nativeText: 星期四早晨，一个男带着八岁的儿子去上学。
quiz.hilitText: A man took his eight-year-old son to school on {#*Thursday*$} morning.
quiz.ipa: ə mæn tʊk hɪz eɪt jɪr oʊld sʌn tu skul ɑn θ{#*ɝ*$}zdi mɔrnɪŋ
quiz.name: 62a8f923da7096b2fc679537f57534ba.mp3

quiz.text: He made a turn at a red light where it was prohibited.
quiz.nativeText: 他闯红灯拐了个弯。
quiz.hilitText: He made a {#*turn*$} at a red light where it was prohibited.
quiz.ipa: hi meɪd ə t{#*ɝ*$}n æt ə rɛd laɪt wɛr ɪt wɑz proʊhɪbətəd
quiz.name: cee2ecd2eee23204772e129af6addfd0.mp3

quiz.text: "Uh oh, I just made an illegal turn!" the man said.
quiz.nativeText: “啊糟了，我刚才违章转弯了！”
quiz.hilitText: "Uh oh, I just made an illegal {#*turn*$}!" the man said.
quiz.ipa: ʌ oʊ aɪ dʒʌst meɪd æn ɪliɡəl t{#*ɝ*$}n ðə mæn sɛd
quiz.name: 147551b251d0ab913d47cb5284d5fe0d.mp3

quiz.text: His son said,"Aw, Dad, don't worry!"
quiz.nativeText: “哦，爸爸，别担心。”儿子说道。
quiz.ipa: hɪz sʌn sɛd ɔ dæd doʊnt w{#*ɝ*$}i
quiz.name: c3b970372a76d0b6db6ac6838eb0bea9.mp3

quiz.text: "The police car right behind us made the same turn."
quiz.nativeText: “跟在咱们后面的警车也拐弯了。”
quiz.hilitText: "The police car right behind us made the same {#*turn*$}."
quiz.ipa: ðə pəlis kɑr raɪt bɪhaɪnd ʌs meɪd ðə seɪm t{#*ɝ*$}n
quiz.name: b526350a210894772a90075a5bed14d5.mp3

learningItem.desc: 皮肤类型的一种，其他还有dry,oily,combination等等种类
面部清洁产品有cleansing gel, cleansing foam和cleansing cream之分
相关的还有neck massage和hand massage
功能面膜的一种，其他还有很多，比如修复性面膜restorative mask

quiz.text: Good afternoon. Welcome to our beauty salon!
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，欢迎光临！
quiz.name: e9f0cd92b706b14c96932f11489829ee.mp3

quiz.text: Hi. I would like a facial treatment.
quiz.nativeText: 你好。我想做一个面部护理。
quiz.name: 484458330a2856f5fe6bfc4f0ce740cf.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Have you ever done a skin test before?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你以前做过皮肤测试吗？
quiz.name: 0eacb30b8a8d6c4c97fb4c7be52c8276.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I have dry, sensitive skin.
quiz.nativeText: 做过，我是干性、敏感肤质。
quiz.name: 0e08f88b54638f7cd212821608573c13.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Which kind of facial would you like?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了，你想要哪种护理？
quiz.name: 3b704c108c553e455b07ca78424b52d5.mp3

quiz.text: Which would you recommend?
quiz.nativeText: 你推荐哪种呢？
quiz.name: da9bd20e2e1c9be9c984f58ab296f1da.mp3

quiz.text: Well, based on your skin type and the hot weather now, I'd recommend our summer special.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，根据你的肤质和现在炎热的天气，我推荐夏日特别护理。
quiz.name: aeeb61643011f2ba5040778ea61b6a98.mp3

quiz.text: What does it include?
quiz.nativeText: 里面都包括什么呢？
quiz.name: 5c3b4065e41b0d524f22a3d7234baed2.mp3

quiz.text: The facial will start with a thorough cleansing, which is suitable for sensitive skin.
quiz.nativeText: 这个护理会先进行深度清洁，适用于敏感性肌肤。
quiz.name: e169e618b8d812766bd2e0577cd6563b.mp3

quiz.text: Does it include a massage?
quiz.nativeText: 包括按摩吗？
quiz.name: d6a0a97b0447f157be8ba837bffe66ff.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, a facial massage is included. You can also choose to get a hand or neck massage as well.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，里面包括一个面部护理。你也可以选择手部和颈部护理。
quiz.name: f860db38a4575be9a0c711962ec260c2.mp3

quiz.text: I really love massages. What else?
quiz.nativeText: 我超喜欢按摩。还有呢？
quiz.name: c40e84dd9c65153e8b35f1751803a74a.mp3

quiz.text: I'll give you two facial masks and apply a special day cream to protect your skin from the sun.
quiz.nativeText: 我会给你两个面膜和一个特殊的防晒面霜来保护你的肌肤不受伤害。
quiz.name: 7c224d616c552aecf03fbb853d3aa0e9.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds great. I'll have this facial then.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来真不错！我就做这个护理吧。
quiz.name: 9173b2bdcd827373972f79a817d8f5ef.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 角质，表皮（多指指甲周围的）

quiz.text: Good afternoon, miss! Would you like a manicure?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，小姐！你想做美甲吗？
quiz.name: d7cbabfa70c762836e69625798bdc21f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, please.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。
quiz.name: c9096ac305e1685ab00a9d07b008add2.mp3

quiz.text: Have a seat. Would you like your nails round or square?
quiz.nativeText: 请坐下。您想要圆指甲还是方指甲？
quiz.name: 4615bb608b0b50488e8e89f2079d1e59.mp3

quiz.text: Square, but with round edges.
quiz.nativeText: 方的，但是要圆的边角。
quiz.name: 911f826093b474bd1d894e077cc9bfad.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Do you want your cuticle cut?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。你想要修剪指甲周围角质吗？
quiz.name: 59cc6dc36c86df73a4b40bae983c8432.mp3

quiz.text: No, thank you. But please file the surface of my nails smooth.
quiz.nativeText: 不用，谢谢。但请把我指甲表面打磨光滑。
quiz.name: 8cedce1f9188a88c55de380c3bcfbfe3.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Which kind of pattern would you like? These two are quite popular now.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你喜欢哪种美甲图案？这两个现在挺流行的。
quiz.name: 914a975dd1ce3c1e11b0b000a6b0f311.mp3

quiz.text: I prefer the simple French style with white nail polish.
quiz.nativeText: 我更喜欢用白色指甲油的简约法式风格。
quiz.name: 42768efd5b02b6587bc09969078735eb.mp3

quiz.text: All right. It will take about ten minutes, and then you can go to the drying section.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。这大概要花十分钟，然后你就可以去烘干区了。
quiz.name: 636351dc086d2ad5d8692c93fc7cf9e7.mp3

quiz.text: How long will it take for them to dry?
quiz.nativeText: 让它们变干要花多久？
quiz.name: 83aa3d3e4145213c9b3158bdd9eeacf5.mp3

quiz.text: Five minutes, and you'll be all set.
quiz.nativeText: 五分钟，之后就大功告成啦。
quiz.name: f785ecbf998cb9550f895ef8146e0402.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了，谢谢。
quiz.name: 7588a4912129bf7d97bf6dfa2b205477.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 你好，有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: 1daee78dd7195e1c2c200947fd02733b.mp3

quiz.text: I want to change my hairstyle.
quiz.nativeText: 我想换个发型。
quiz.name: 4913b3248d88fe2a0f3e9859954aefc0.mp3

quiz.text: Great. What kind of hairstyle would you like?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你想换什么样的？
quiz.name: 75fb7215ef717ad75749a14c726db89c.mp3

quiz.text: I don't know. Do you have any suggestions?
quiz.nativeText: 我不知道。你有什么建议吗？
quiz.name: 0809aaee25d6e80f4e2388e58fdb039a.mp3

quiz.text: Well, we can provide a wide variety of different styles.
quiz.nativeText: 我们有很多种风格。
quiz.name: 84ec9d4508a88d3393798be294264be9.mp3

quiz.text: I want to have a stylish haircut.
quiz.nativeText: 我想剪一个时髦的。
quiz.name: 98c30b0541d60edb8c602bd113d79ef3.mp3

quiz.text: Great. We can help you select one.
quiz.nativeText: 好极了。我们可以帮你挑选一个。
quiz.name: 4caf0d4ac94613e511e64e57f3d67ce3.mp3

quiz.text: Okay. I think I want to dye my hair too.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我还想染一下头发。
quiz.name: 2621bbb39584c3a306dcecd99cf5eb11.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Do you have a favorite color?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你有最喜欢的颜色吗?
quiz.name: c69f19ed869538e29f517552daffd654.mp3

quiz.text: I like chestnut.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢栗子色。
quiz.name: 05169b481d5ca6025c97292d2c22e325.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening, miss. How can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好，小姐。有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: edfe1e15caff6606847eadc13c6eb967.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening. I feel exhausted.
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好。我感觉很疲倦。
quiz.name: afcf2d74dba8d1a6bc9e364245e4a299.mp3

quiz.text: Would you like a body treatment?
quiz.nativeText: 你想做一下身体护理吗？
quiz.name: bc9cd42111529620eb1d8cfb3a9d4feb.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. That would be so relaxing.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。那会让我放松。
quiz.name: 4af06e2cf6e3e11d6bcc61ce1fbad7e2.mp3

quiz.text: We provide body massage, detox, and hair removal.
quiz.nativeText: 我们有按摩，排毒，和脱毛。
quiz.name: 816f437578fa3c15fcc39af973693065.mp3

quiz.text: I would love a body massage now.
quiz.nativeText: 我现在想做一个身体按摩。
quiz.name: 2010d056c6133518b50d4e5f4cd08cc2.mp3

quiz.text: Do you prefer oil or sea salt?
quiz.nativeText: 你更喜欢精油还是海盐呢？
quiz.name: 50da1e2ffa4ff2a2fca7e8720b4c91c2.mp3

quiz.text: I like olive oil and other essential oils.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢橄榄油和其他精油。
quiz.name: 2e5a30637876f641bfd3ee37c9616bac.mp3

quiz.text: Okay. We have a variety of essential oils.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我们有多种类的精油。
quiz.name: 9384bfb990c2e1e1917f3da6fcc77d00.mp3

quiz.text: Great. Let's begin then. I'm really tired.
quiz.nativeText: 棒极了。我们现在开始吧。我真的很累。
quiz.name: 824f20de801b29da558d261f44ca507f.mp3

quiz.text: One day, a monkey rides his bike near the river.
quiz.name: d8d6d1507f7b55ea9799291703ac75f4.mp3

quiz.text: This time he sees a lion under a tree.
quiz.name: 1aaf3b4eec67d42d5d47bb648aaa48c7.mp3

quiz.text: The lion runs at him.
quiz.name: 302ac374ec2622682b86f2febd8df9e1.mp3

quiz.text: He is afraid and falls into the river.
quiz.name: d4d5215ca8d5f40bb68e2184634a323b.mp3

quiz.text: He can't swim. He shouts.
quiz.name: e9ef6ed05e13d9d8cf74760234f7ae72.mp3

quiz.text: The rabbit hears him.
quiz.name: 2e6619a9580b54e5a8f0184f6b153cd0.mp3

quiz.text: He jumps into the river.
quiz.name: 6ca0c7d3a9c7285fabd199c39e3a02b7.mp3

quiz.text: The rabbit swims to the monkey,
quiz.name: 79170aac0bfd58e3c441d7d284734b0e.mp3

quiz.text: but he can’t help him.
quiz.name: 27c73bf7e8bf5e33d07a7df42e9f2841.mp3

quiz.text: Luckily, an elephant comes along.
quiz.name: c2acb3954dbba09786397c50608c6257.mp3

quiz.text: He is very strong.
quiz.name: 1d77f215f5b15f2552dcfabd4bbdac5f.mp3

quiz.text: He helps the rabbit and monkey.
quiz.name: 98b0feac85a2a7c06b7e18dcf35bfe8f.mp3

quiz.text: Three friends are very happy.
quiz.name: e32c43ce3f91a8058e80567dc1c1e805.mp3

quiz.text: They go to the elephant’s home.
quiz.name: 4c06e271951cc59ef20ebba7e8cec649.mp3

quiz.text: Then, three of them become good friends.
quiz.name: ccdc97787b913aeda20774f8fc032f02.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, sir. What can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，我能为你做些什么？
quiz.name: 0100a46f1e513a5d5873852bfeb6fef1.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon. I would like to send this package to China.
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，我想把这个包裹寄到中国。
quiz.name: bc5a6486c3be39af7175116f595fdf4b.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. What does it contain?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。里面有什么？
quiz.name: 8763ac5bd75d9611e16201f309bdaf12.mp3

quiz.text: Just some books. How much is the postage?
quiz.nativeText: 就是一些书。邮费多少钱？
quiz.name: 9ace643461b5b5b611e5b7f569279753.mp3

quiz.text: I'll have to weigh it and see. Do you want it insured?
quiz.nativeText: 我需要秤一下才知道。你想要给它加保险吗？
quiz.name: 4242399212fa3b61617b900aa55ad37a.mp3

quiz.text: No. By the way, did I pack it OK?
quiz.nativeText: 不用。顺便问一下，我包装的还可以吗？
quiz.name: c4cc1f29a7bf470719631a207f2920df.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Would you like to send it by airmail or by ordinary mail?
quiz.nativeText: 可以的。你想要航空邮寄还是正常邮寄？
quiz.name: 0f6a35df76e1331bb6b99fa8a1578cbf.mp3

quiz.text: By airmail. How long will it take?
quiz.nativeText: 航空邮寄。需要多久？
quiz.name: d329b2d785e65b38036ad15cd93177d7.mp3

quiz.text: About a week. That will be thirty dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 大概需要一周。一共是三十美元。
quiz.name: 6b0dc5ffd9bda8dbafe7d6ce47e351e5.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are, fifty dollars. I'd also like a delivery confirmation, please.
quiz.nativeText: 给你，五十美元。我还想要一份确认单。
quiz.name: cf7d17fe5f8409b6276dac9a3a02eb65.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Here's your change and receipt, sir.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，这是你的找零和回执单。
quiz.name: 9ab9b32860844be7924d2bc7319c5b38.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 十分感谢。
quiz.name: 1f33d36ccb6b37e6d20351f841fb1d4f.mp3

learningItem.desc: 名词，也有眼镜商，配镜师的含义

quiz.text: Hello, miss. Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 这位小姐，您好！有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: 2ac22d118713ad0e8260a625fb5796c3.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I need to get a new pair of glasses.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我需要一副新的眼镜。
quiz.name: a44ff01055399d03be459f99237764b8.mp3

quiz.text: Please take a seat. Have you seen an optometrist?
quiz.nativeText: 请坐。你去见过验光师验光吗？
quiz.name: ed3fd7650f1e2e5637f031478dafcf48.mp3

quiz.text: I had an eye exam two years ago. But I think my eyesight is getting worse.
quiz.nativeText: 我两年前做过眼部检查，但是我认为我的视力在下降。
quiz.name: 46cccc089956ab6c82908b2e5af72140.mp3

quiz.text: In that case, you might need a new prescription. We can check your eyes again if you like.
quiz.nativeText: 这样的话，你可能需要一份新的检查，如果愿意的话我们可以为您验光。
quiz.name: aa3ec1f8ced013cfcf4aa915fca1522f.mp3

quiz.text: OK. No problem.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，没问题。
quiz.name: d02367f1c63221ce2ec073388409618d.mp3

quiz.text: Come over here, please. Could you close your left eye and read this with your right eye?
quiz.nativeText: 请到这边来，可以将你的左眼遮住用右眼读这一行吗？
quiz.name: 19c8d6f6220c506adec33f9d8a2efbb1.mp3

quiz.text: I can't see it clearly.
quiz.nativeText: 我看不太清。
quiz.name: 983069f767e3e1d23b9d4beee6e7a1eb.mp3

quiz.text: Let me see. You have twenty forty vision in both eyes. What sort of frame would you prefer?
quiz.nativeText: 我看看，你双眼视力为二百度。你喜欢什么样的镜框？
quiz.name: 3dd629829b02702fe0bb7539e4fb169a.mp3

quiz.text: I like this Dior oval frame.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢这个迪奥椭圆形的镜框。
quiz.name: 7255f69342e164a652c1a6d4167c3dd6.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. I'll rewrite you a new prescription and order the new lenses to fit this frame.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题，我会给你重新开一张诊断单然后订购和这个镜框相称的镜片。
quiz.name: 4a246c65bd2e1712c4131a6e374f58d9.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Thank you for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，感谢你的帮助。
quiz.name: 614030d4a3fe6a8187daa7322b65d26d.mp3

quiz.text: May I help you, madam?
quiz.nativeText: 有什么能帮助您的吗，女士？
quiz.name: b6483d59cb1b1ead0490014f0c0bc6d3.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to buy a pair of sunglasses. Could you recommend some?
quiz.nativeText: 我想买一副太阳镜。你能推荐一些吗？
quiz.name: f4ec0377f827654965b20c61d41b6edc.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. These aviator sunglasses are new arrivals. Feel free to try them on.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。这些飞行员太阳镜是新品，戴上试试吧！
quiz.name: 086eda6f78da6cd3f2cf1b2a098fc590.mp3

quiz.text: They look really cool!
quiz.nativeText: 看起来真的很酷！
quiz.name: 9b219762ab6f8fae49105f11ff7582b4.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, these sunglasses suit your face very well. Which lens color would you like?
quiz.nativeText: 是的，这种太阳镜很称你的脸型。你想要什么镜片颜色？
quiz.name: a56be7d9edbe59d88c237d9066430002.mp3

quiz.text: What colors do you have?
quiz.nativeText: 你们都有什么颜色？
quiz.name: 1be737cf78be0251781c0483b6cefccb.mp3

quiz.text: We have rose, yellow, and grey for lens color and each color has three color depths.
quiz.nativeText: 我们有玫瑰色，黄色和灰色三种颜色的镜片，每个颜色还有三种深浅度可供选择。
quiz.name: 7c955eb9a9996cf26f26f432f4ce646d.mp3

quiz.text: Are the prices different?
quiz.nativeText: 价格不一样吗？
quiz.name: 1831630325c6e0d29bb2b08ead4fa6f4.mp3

quiz.text: No, they cost all the same.
quiz.nativeText: 不是，它们的价格一样。
quiz.name: 6844b4ab6f95cbabe52039ce8581606b.mp3

quiz.text: I see. I like medium grey.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了，我想要中灰色的。
quiz.name: 9fe139cd4955071889c5d3fdc7158c22.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Could I recommend ultraviolet coating on your lenses? It protects your eyes from harmful rays.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我可以推荐镜片上的防紫外线光膜吗？它能防止有害紫外线伤害你的眼睛。
quiz.name: 7c68b872d388b00093bd7331151a686d.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I'll take this as well, since I am going to the beach next week.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，这个我也要了，因为我下周要去海滩。
quiz.name: 9006cd9f040e04a25a3f2ad926152048.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 你好，有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: a3a771b3affdc2bc3b90f17c1698f0dd.mp3

quiz.text: I'm looking for toilet paper.
quiz.nativeText: 我在找纸巾。
quiz.name: c2a39d686058966228b334f92992a6aa.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, it's in aisle six.
quiz.nativeText: 在第六过道。
quiz.name: c1a4b1377933acdce725fc294d38b8bd.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你。
quiz.name: 1f33d36ccb6b37e6d20351f841fb1d4f.mp3

quiz.text: Do you need anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 你需要其他什么东西吗？
quiz.name: 083994d151d38ad2b595024975afe401.mp3

quiz.text: I also need some shampoo.
quiz.nativeText: 我还需要洗发露。
quiz.name: 68e238468581081a153ac588f03be2e5.mp3

quiz.text: That's in the personal care area.
quiz.nativeText: 那在个人护理区域。
quiz.name: 3598349e67af34f7be11c8dc1ee45779.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 明白了。谢谢你。
quiz.name: 7588a4912129bf7d97bf6dfa2b205477.mp3

quiz.text: How are you today?
quiz.nativeText: 你今天好吗？
quiz.name: a5c69d35ead5da8544dc9feae0d03e94.mp3

quiz.text: I'm fine, thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 很好，谢谢你。
quiz.name: 3bf2331331b32508c7012dd67dc6804f.mp3

quiz.text: That's fifty dollars. Do you have a membership card?
quiz.nativeText: 总共五十美元。你有会员卡吗？
quiz.name: 9f6564acd25e6288ada2ac3cba4d09aa.mp3

quiz.text: I have one but I left it at home.
quiz.nativeText: 我有，但是忘在家里了。
quiz.name: 91b1ea06dd36eb38d76366979ccebb39.mp3

quiz.text: It's okay. I can scan the QR code on your phone.
quiz.nativeText: 没关系，我可以扫你手机上的二维码。
quiz.name: 3530dafde0e46a7b327e7a0022e7d49a.mp3

quiz.text: Okay. Here is my QR code.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，这是我的二维码。
quiz.name: 7258144ca45f0f1b1b9a457eb66b1f76.mp3

quiz.text: Here is your change and receipt.
quiz.nativeText: 给你找钱和收据。
quiz.name: fcba709819f1b89c53916d41f3fbfa80.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: Excuse me, is dog food on sale today?
quiz.nativeText: 打扰一下，请问狗粮今天打折吗？
quiz.name: 67efe6b62d0d90f187425fcc5f9bc189.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry, I don’t know. You can check the flyer about it.
quiz.nativeText: 不好意思，我不知道。你可以看一下传单。
quiz.name: 0c32789b3079185cbfdf7e5c368530ba.mp3

quiz.text: Where are the flyers?
quiz.nativeText: 传单在哪里？
quiz.name: 79ec0f63c89d6e7ac017aedfb91c3824.mp3

quiz.text: They are at the checkout counters.
quiz.nativeText: 他们在收银台那里。
quiz.name: 5c9a60475aec37440c4a1370f1c27cef.mp3

quiz.text: I didn’t see any on my way in.
quiz.nativeText: 我在进来的路上没有看到。
quiz.name: 812f32bf9349170c36daa9cec023cb7f.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe you can ask the sales person about it then.
quiz.nativeText: 或许你可以问问推销员。
quiz.name: e3cf970a795e679d98efd86c8291c655.mp3

quiz.text: Morning, sir. How can i help you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，先生。我能为你做些什么？
quiz.name: fc717241cbcc2addddf8a6563a206130.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, I’m looking for some flowers for my wife, it’s her birthday.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，我想为我的妻子买一些花，今天是她的生日。
quiz.name: b2af87e2cea00d77f716b44e08072726.mp3

quiz.text: We have some fresh red roses.
quiz.nativeText: 我们有红玫瑰。
quiz.name: f096b42fde2445bdf4ad05902746f7cf.mp3

quiz.text: How much are they?
quiz.nativeText: 他们多少钱？
quiz.name: 79888278f454d584d219c3220a010e36.mp3

quiz.text: 30 dollars per dozen.
quiz.nativeText: 一打三十元。
quiz.name: 296fb360a4ae0f95dbfc2d0bd769497c.mp3

quiz.text: Great. I will take a dozen.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了，我要一打。
quiz.name: 137205fee829104781db3218335e7744.mp3

quiz.text: Do you need anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 你还需要别的什么吗？
quiz.name: 083994d151d38ad2b595024975afe401.mp3

quiz.text: No, the roses are fine.
quiz.nativeText: 不用了，只要玫瑰就好了。
quiz.name: cc4cd43c0d04f3194fb92b6919a97b9b.mp3

quiz.text: I’m sure your wife will love them.
quiz.nativeText: 我敢打包票你妻子会喜欢他们的。
quiz.name: 9fdba802189b8ffdae096903ba6e9c06.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 你好，有什么可以为你做的吗？
quiz.name: 1daee78dd7195e1c2c200947fd02733b.mp3

quiz.text: I’d like to return this shirt.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要退这件上衣。
quiz.name: 93f874d0ac01c11e9b85569dda9874d6.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Do you have the receipt?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，你有收据吗？
quiz.name: 6f8f46cf88b8a920e3c4c245f7bcd73a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, here it is.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，它在这里。
quiz.name: 347bac513da8f9a2059ed811e5b71c8e.mp3

quiz.text: May I ask why would you want to return it?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以问一下你为什么想要退这件衣服吗？
quiz.name: cae0acbb69ab5cbed56e239f7fae1f68.mp3

quiz.text: It doesn’t fit me well.
quiz.nativeText: 因为它不是很适合我。
quiz.name: 2218e312fd47ccbc4b036831bf66d093.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe you would like to try a different color of the shirt?
quiz.nativeText: 也许你想要换一件不同颜色的上衣？
quiz.name: b102325601d1527c117269589ac561f6.mp3

quiz.text: No, thank you. A refund is all I want.
quiz.nativeText: 不用了， 谢谢，我只想要退款。
quiz.name: 837d7b613153cf38f4cf6aa5fcaf99ac.mp3

quiz.text: Could you please roughly describe the robber for me?
quiz.nativeText: 您能为我大致描述一下劫匪的模样吗？
quiz.name: 25bddf3acb4cbbef2875d826b18058c4.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. The man looked very muscular.
quiz.nativeText: 那个人看起来肌肉相当发达。
quiz.name: a38be6e99b67dd8ef6c053b432c0067f.mp3

quiz.text: Was he tall?
quiz.nativeText: 他个子高吗？
quiz.name: ae87297c46f022d42e1c496b51852d6a.mp3

quiz.text: No. He was of medium height.
quiz.nativeText: 不，他中等个头。
quiz.name: 21406d7c3547903163797c4ec980ad93.mp3

quiz.text: Did he have any obvious marks, like tattoos or scars?
quiz.nativeText: 他身上有明显的纹身或伤疤吗？
quiz.name: d870be711e9e6eba9a735412330aa83a.mp3

quiz.text: He had a tattoo on his right arm.
quiz.nativeText: 我看到他的右手臂上有块纹身。
quiz.name: cd4124e453603098ddb04d39caa64e51.mp3

quiz.text: Any other details about his looks?
quiz.nativeText: 关于他的相貌，您还能回忆起其它细节吗？
quiz.name: a67bc5a5e69e909cd5a5aa1bb1a94626.mp3

quiz.text: He had a bushy beard!
quiz.nativeText: 那个人还留着浓密的络腮胡！
quiz.name: daac7057bbc86753144f348152337d99.mp3

quiz.text: Did you notice what he was wearing?
quiz.nativeText: 您注意到他的穿着了吗？
quiz.name: 82db11bc6f75d1171e63ca8a21be9105.mp3

quiz.text: He was dressed in all black.
quiz.nativeText: 他穿了一身黑。
quiz.name: 33d12535bcf2a47453a30d781b6a6325.mp3

quiz.text: Was he wearing any accessories, like sunglasses or a hat?
quiz.nativeText: 他有穿戴诸如太阳镜或帽子之类的配饰吗？
quiz.name: 1f788b85514388ba53ebf1cbf6f7f0a6.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, he also had a black baseball cap on.
quiz.nativeText: 对了，他还戴了一顶黑色的棒球帽。
quiz.name: 64ddde3d678c09ed3c037a1a21a93f3f.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much. You've been really helpful. Should you recall anything else, please let us know.
quiz.nativeText: 太感谢了，您给了我们很大的帮助。如果您想起了什么别的信息，烦请告知。
quiz.name: 1b477e1ac5ac73830d1e55eba9a2cda6.mp3

quiz.text: No problem.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。
quiz.name: 9a03904cb50a587b822f6946dbc8266c.mp3

learnText: 短元音。发音时，口全张，舌头自然放平，舌尖不要接触下齿，也不要翘起。[ɑ]的发音类似"啊"，但嘴巴张开的幅度要更大。

quiz.text: spot
quiz.nativeText: 斑点，污点
quiz.name: 5bac85a0c611ddef64ab0dfb383056f4.mp3

quiz.text: block
quiz.nativeText: 块，块状物
quiz.name: 4d34f53389ed7f28ca91fc31ea360a66.mp3

quiz.text: hot
quiz.nativeText: 热的
quiz.name: c429fde8b1b986d42f84ba63dbfef6ac.mp3

quiz.text: stop
quiz.nativeText: 停止
quiz.name: 615a46af313786fc4e349f34118be111.mp3

name: ɑ

learningItem.nativeText: 性格外向的、喜欢社交的

quiz.text: I heard that a new employee recently joined your department. How do you feel about him?
quiz.nativeText: 我听说你们部门最近来了位新员工。你觉得他怎么样？
quiz.name: f964d6e56b41c1faadde271c99355977.mp3

quiz.text: I think he is very charismatic.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得他很有人格魅力。
quiz.name: 899536e80c9f619c338ede0e0ab7607a.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you say that?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么这么说呢？
quiz.name: df710a638971b137a07e1b7ad17a64c2.mp3

quiz.text: Well, he has a great sense of humor!
quiz.nativeText: 他可有幽默感了！
quiz.name: 780b37ddea96846d81bc292c12098efb.mp3

quiz.text: I guess he must be very talkative, right?
quiz.nativeText: 那么我猜他一定很健谈，对吗？
quiz.name: 6b9c0f7b6ccab4a0516e50dfff32f15a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, he is very extroverted.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，他性格很外向。
quiz.name: 1d587ca91f68ba8d249b45115afea54e.mp3

quiz.text: He sounds like a lot of fun. But is he also a good worker as well?
quiz.nativeText: 他听起来是个很有趣的人。不过，他工作也很棒吗？
quiz.name: d131f57d97b2f0a45784e1b782c8a962.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. He is very diligent in his work.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。他工作相当勤奋。
quiz.name: 4d1cb6ee4da5a3bc1853c357fcca2189.mp3

quiz.text: So he's made a positive contribution to your team, right?
quiz.nativeText: 所以他也为你们团队做了不少积极贡献吧，是吗？
quiz.name: f1e782808c2defb8b51c01c3eb3ab3f0.mp3

quiz.text: Right, he is very helpful in our group discussions.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，他在我们的小组讨论中做了很多贡献。
quiz.name: 270151ee0947067b3fbbd712a7df4cdb.mp3

quiz.text: Fantastic! I'd love to meet him!
quiz.nativeText: 真赞！我真想见见他！
quiz.name: 265f4c88d2f334a17f6b94f3bc81f857.mp3

quiz.text: I can introduce him to you sometime.
quiz.nativeText: 改天我可以把他介绍给你。
quiz.name: 0d669c3308d9131d973584f9129ef06e.mp3

quiz.text: block
quiz.nativeText: 块
quiz.name: 4d34f53389ed7f28ca91fc31ea360a66.mp3

quiz.text: hot
quiz.nativeText: 热的
quiz.name: c429fde8b1b986d42f84ba63dbfef6ac.mp3

quiz.text: on the spot
quiz.nativeText: 当场
quiz.name: ddd9d42132cc679c8b484f28b1575353.mp3

quiz.text: a stop sign
quiz.nativeText: 停车标志
quiz.name: d560c6cf501777eb3946ffabfc62a0e8.mp3

quiz.text: It beats me how she found her lost ring.
quiz.nativeText: 我难以理解她怎么能找到她那遗失的戒指。
quiz.hilitText: It beats me how she found her {#*lost*$} ring.
quiz.ipa: ə tɔl blaɪnd mæn ænd hɪz siɪŋ aɪ dɔɡ wɔkt ɪntu ə stɔr
quiz.name: 597e84e3223a60f5335b0c7dc75e05fc.mp3

quiz.text: When he got inside, he started swinging his dog around.
quiz.nativeText: 进了店门，盲人开始牵着他的狗打转。
quiz.hilitText: When he {#*got*$} inside, he {#*started*$} swinging his dog around.
quiz.ipa: wɪn hi ɡ{#*ɑ*$}t ɪnsaɪd hi st{#*ɑ*$}rtəd swɪŋɪŋ hɪz dɔɡ ɝaʊnd
quiz.name: a3e527c86f65641278ff891b94dbd7c1.mp3

quiz.text: What do you think of the candidate? I'm quite satisfied with his answers.
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得这位应聘者怎么样？我对他的回答还挺满意的。
quiz.name: b878e3ff6f1379fc19267ba2039f52f8.mp3

quiz.text: I don't think we should hire him.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得我们不该聘用他。
quiz.name: f91f5ea70090a63fb7293bff216323b4.mp3

quiz.text: Why? I think he is fine.
quiz.nativeText: 为什么？我认为他还不错。
quiz.name: fac1c07d8a24124fbe8efe1d387a9c8b.mp3

quiz.text: When he walked into the room, he did not even shake hands with us.
quiz.nativeText: 他一进来的时候，甚至都没和我们握手。
quiz.name: 75623d05d702b15da5ccf92a199015b9.mp3

quiz.text: That's a little bit unprofessional.
quiz.nativeText: 那是有些不太专业。
quiz.name: 68aa2be17e3ab470379f4189a6087039.mp3

quiz.text: He was always looking down and didn't make eye contact with us.
quiz.nativeText: 而且他总是眼睛向下看，和我们没有眼神交流。
quiz.name: 6877b89e4d34221380ca2d6e9a60b1ad.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe he was a bit nervous.
quiz.nativeText: 或许他有些紧张。
quiz.name: 2376a3b1c46a0ef1d8bb2d1a7b8d7078.mp3

quiz.text: What's worse, he was nodding too much.
quiz.nativeText: 更糟糕的是，他不管我们说什么都只会点头附和。
quiz.name: 7c6b25eb1173318153edbb199be5514b.mp3

quiz.text: Really? I did notice that he sometimes seemed restless while we were talking.
quiz.nativeText: 是吗？不过我的确注意到一点，在我们交流的时候，他有时显得坐立不安。
quiz.name: faef39134863e697b9e9396e54ee6a6d.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. He kept fidgeting with his tie.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。他一直在玩弄他的领带。
quiz.name: e97a8756655e6db10db56a54b875e7a4.mp3

quiz.text: That's quite impolite. The way a person acts really tells us a lot about the person.
quiz.nativeText: 这确实很不礼貌。原来我们真的可以通过行为举止来了解一个人。
quiz.name: 9e1ae3ac92613a76a15a5079b03732b9.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. That's the magic of body language.
quiz.nativeText: 没错。这就是身体语言的魔力。
quiz.name: e733b72cb8d65c17f847535f365190e5.mp3

quiz.text: A tall blind man and his seeing eye dog walked into a store.
quiz.nativeText: 一个身材高大的盲人和他的导盲犬一起走进商店。
quiz.hilitText: A tall blind man and his seeing eye dog walked into a store.
quiz.ipa: ə tɔl blaɪnd mæn ænd hɪz siɪŋ aɪ dɔɡ wɔkt ɪntu ə stɔr
quiz.name: c28acbf9549ba6f6fa2ea618f46f6463.mp3

quiz.text: When he got inside, he started swinging his dog around.
quiz.nativeText: 进了店门，盲人开始牵着他的狗打转。
quiz.hilitText: When he {#*got*$} inside, he {#*started*$} swinging his dog around.
quiz.ipa: wɪn hi ɡ{#*ɑ*$}t ɪnsaɪd hi st{#*ɑ*$}rtəd swɪŋɪŋ hɪz dɔɡ ɝaʊnd
quiz.name: a3e527c86f65641278ff891b94dbd7c1.mp3

quiz.text: Upset by this, the manager of the store demanded to know what he was doing.
quiz.nativeText: 店主看了不太高兴，问盲人为什么这样做。
quiz.hilitText: Upset by this, the manager of the store demanded to know what he {#*was*$} doing.
quiz.ipa: əpsɛt baɪ ðɪs ðə mænɪdʒɝ ʌv ðə stɔr dɪmændəd tu noʊ wʌt hi w{#*ɑ*$}z duɪŋ
quiz.name: 6ca28b67df83c10800fa450b5bbc53b3.mp3

quiz.text: The blind man calmly replied,
quiz.nativeText: 盲人淡定的回答道：
quiz.name: a19b5f3f42d4921f71470d30e56a0860.mp3

quiz.text: "Sorry, I'm just looking around."
quiz.nativeText: “抱歉，我只是四处随便看看。”
quiz.name: a2e807c1350f9f370c681c8234409a57.mp3

quiz.text: Now, can you give me a few words to describe the body shape of this girl?
quiz.nativeText: 现在，你能用几个词大致描述一下女孩的体型特征吗？
quiz.name: 886ce22ec890ad23f404d9b21f8d15d4.mp3

quiz.text: She is tall and thin.
quiz.nativeText: 她高高瘦瘦的。
quiz.name: 65a4f7be05d62e3c4ccf4dc09898076f.mp3

quiz.text: What about this girl's skin color?
quiz.nativeText: 这个女孩的肤色怎么样？
quiz.name: ef370b08ccda06b5658ba4d621980da7.mp3

quiz.text: She has fair skin.
quiz.nativeText: 她皮肤白皙。
quiz.name: ee90b35ef4e80345a0324296a00a472a.mp3

quiz.text: Good. Can you tell me something about her hair?
quiz.nativeText: 很好。你能告诉我她头发是什么样的吗？
quiz.name: 633ced7648a086686ac464b0bbf789c9.mp3

quiz.text: She has blonde, curly hair.
quiz.nativeText: 她有一头金色的卷发。
quiz.name: 9da90ae68ae7b19ac5501809cb0e370d.mp3

quiz.text: What do you think of this young lady's general appearance?
quiz.nativeText: 你认为这位年轻的女士总体看来如何？
quiz.name: 561f7c60c6e99702f1976a4edd4d03d6.mp3

quiz.text: She is very good-looking and elegant.
quiz.nativeText: 她很好看，也很优雅。
quiz.name: 1dd6a453f777a59b17b66889683579a8.mp3

quiz.text: How do you like Shannon?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得Shannon怎么样？
quiz.name: 9c2165d47e96793efd73cc89362a1a7a.mp3

quiz.text: Shannon is gorgeous.
quiz.nativeText: Shannon非常美丽。
quiz.name: f346e282cd6abdd627d0aaafd6a1c817.mp3

quiz.text: Really? I have never seen her before.
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？我以前从未见过她。
quiz.name: 11430af6a3bba7529d6a2c2ffce22d95.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. She is tall and thin.
quiz.nativeText: 当然了。她又高又苗条。
quiz.name: 11f3b3a6895c8cfed9b0cb138769bc3b.mp3

quiz.text: What about her skin?
quiz.nativeText: 她皮肤怎么样？
quiz.name: 30ced20d40d219bedeee36a8b2e0647e.mp3

quiz.text: She has fair skin.
quiz.nativeText: 她皮肤很白。
quiz.name: ee90b35ef4e80345a0324296a00a472a.mp3

quiz.text: I don't like her hair.
quiz.nativeText: 我不喜欢她的头发。
quiz.name: 2a4586010dcc49c1c22e8485615d7481.mp3

quiz.text: No way! Her naturally curly hair is very attractive.
quiz.nativeText: 怎么会！她的自然卷头发非常迷人。
quiz.name: 42edcf7d4e8a3101c49f7669f77c2f94.mp3

quiz.text: What do you think of our new colleague John?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得我们的新同事John怎么样？
quiz.name: 8d1bfadc6273912dfaae0f454d472de1.mp3

quiz.text: He appears to be an outgoing person.
quiz.nativeText: 他好像是个外向的人。
quiz.name: 215a1c0f162abc6f0ad15db9dc4833fa.mp3

quiz.text: I agree.
quiz.nativeText: 我同意。
quiz.name: 8e767bce185c31c69667b5f333fba2b7.mp3

quiz.text: And he is very humorous.
quiz.nativeText: 而且他很幽默。
quiz.name: 06ebb95feb9768d520fbc9c40ac280d4.mp3

quiz.text: You seem to be quite familiar with him.
quiz.nativeText: 你好像对他很熟悉。
quiz.name: c454b3c940b86db5fef4f70cf3bae70b.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. We used to be classmates.
quiz.nativeText: 当然了。我们之前是同学。
quiz.name: 395ddfb8e676bb882eb44511f60ccc27.mp3

quiz.text: Really? What a coincidence!
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？好巧啊！
quiz.name: 33a948f692a53a4d4673548a5dee48b9.mp3

quiz.text: He is a very hardworking guy.
quiz.nativeText: 他是一个很用功的人。
quiz.name: 6c1bb20b71426134327666424e652c8e.mp3

quiz.text: In the 20th century,mankind has achieved tremendous success.
Of all the success, progress in science and technology is perhaps the greatest.
The rapid development of science and technology and the emergence of high-tech industries
quiz.name: c2f4878926ca9e34bbd9d36a6eb2d22b.mp3

quiz.text: will push the world economy forward in its continuing evolutionary process.
Innovation is the theme of the new age and is of great importance to the world's development.
To fulfill the goal of modernization, China is determined to increase its investment in science and education.
China is determined to enhance technological innovation and accomplish industrialization.
China will implement its long-range plan for national scientific and technological development.
quiz.name: 67f7b211d8fb5abd5a1185d3d151cadf.mp3

quiz.text: Apart from that, it is also vital to integrate science and technology with economy.
A new tide of scientific and technological revolution will be surging up in China, and it would rewrite history.
Lily, would you like to go dancing with us tonight?
quiz.nativeText: 莉莉，今晚来和我们跳舞怎么样？
quiz.name: 98fb6a4ce6cface0a864a532e5c67aac.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry, I'm not in the mood to dance.
quiz.nativeText: 对不起，我现在没兴致跳舞。
quiz.name: 51c3f3d0a4488d35e16a2f36a93e5683.mp3

quiz.text: What happened?
quiz.nativeText: 怎么啦？
quiz.name: 5e6621c5c8e10cc40e134e611cb14775.mp3

quiz.text: I'm really anxious about the drama competition on Thursday."
quiz.nativeText: 我实在是担心这周四的话剧表演。
quiz.name: ea8c6ddafde24cafc0cf380cbe3d78d7.mp3

quiz.text: I thought you were well-prepared for that.
quiz.nativeText: 我以为你已经为此做好充足的准备了。
quiz.name: 176e5758a7226174dc672bc16754b836.mp3

quiz.text: Not really. I have stage fright.
quiz.nativeText: 并没有。我会怯场。
quiz.name: 2a5e5ecc0fc421a9f3da58068968b970.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you say that?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么这么说呢？
quiz.name: df710a638971b137a07e1b7ad17a64c2.mp3

quiz.text: We had a rehearsal yesterday, but my mind went blank and I forgot my lines.
quiz.nativeText: 昨天我们进行了一次彩排。但我一上台脑袋里就一片空白，我忘词了。
quiz.name: fdc534cf575937925980627ab97df076.mp3

quiz.text: I suggest you ignore the audience and focus on your own performance on stage.
quiz.nativeText: 我建议你在舞台上的时候忘记底下的观众，专注于自己的表演。
quiz.name: 774e56950ecf89d6d83620c966ce19ba.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds good. But what if it doesn't work?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来不错。但万一这个方法不管用怎么办？
quiz.name: 86ba93d175bb4a6694c2a285f402432e.mp3

quiz.text: Take it easy! I have confidence in you.
quiz.nativeText: 别紧张啦，我对你有信心！
quiz.name: a1f0c3a5e2a07cc5546f5924f89fad30.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I'll try my best.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你。我会尽我最大的努力的。
quiz.name: cd3d2a1f3a74cdc75a8f79f99c277dc9.mp3

learnText: 长元音。发音时，口张大，舌尖离下齿，舌身低平后缩，舌后部稍抬高，双唇稍收圆。

quiz.text: already
quiz.nativeText: 已经
quiz.name: d10d9acdf6cd47966e6fbad9e143c872.mp3

quiz.text: daughter
quiz.nativeText: 女儿
quiz.name: cad593a449dee8d674361200f2caf20c.mp3

quiz.text: door
quiz.nativeText: 门
quiz.name: 37ce845535b7c13f529505fdfdb04942.mp3

quiz.text: tall
quiz.nativeText: 高的
quiz.name: 1a6536af4d54ddadc8239ec51aa1f81e.mp3

name: ɔ

quiz.text: You seem really exhausted. What's up?
quiz.nativeText: 你看起来这么累，怎么了？
quiz.name: cf84ca47518cf480f2260004bed1ad22.mp3

quiz.text: I am fed up with my roommate!
quiz.nativeText: 我对我的室友已经忍无可忍了！
quiz.name: 0912b9c41e831b7cd7dfae2864a40344.mp3

quiz.text: Calm down. Tell me about it.
quiz.nativeText: 你冷静一些，跟我说说到底是怎么一回事。
quiz.name: 3bdcb790ea4d35716084ae30e827256c.mp3

quiz.text: He always has loud parties in our living room till midnight
quiz.nativeText: 他总是在客厅开派对直至深夜。
quiz.name: c4671157d99cfc3042bbbdc4d00038ec.mp3

quiz.text: That must make it hard for you to sleep. Some people are just not very considerate.
quiz.nativeText: 那你一定很难睡着。有些人就是不会替他人着想。
quiz.name: 3a19c330190b81e9b928a577ec43dc8e.mp3

quiz.text: It's more than that. He is also very messy.
quiz.nativeText: 还不止这些。他也非常邋遢。
quiz.name: 79cffc6202e4e776b1c02ccece6bd0d2.mp3

quiz.text: Does he help clean the house?
quiz.nativeText: 他平时会帮忙打扫房间吗？
quiz.name: 23b2ced0eb76d263680fe53920c123ec.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all. I have to do all the house work.
quiz.nativeText: 压根不会，所有家务都是我一个人做。
quiz.name: df874feb239e498856bdfaaa53bd8e89.mp3

quiz.text: That's pretty annoying. Have you talked to him about it?
quiz.nativeText: 那确实很令人讨厌。你跟他好好说过这事了吗？
quiz.name: 8866c88d7a7431d32f859622f58314dc.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. But he just turned a deaf ear on me.
quiz.nativeText: 当然了，但他把我的话当作耳边风。
quiz.name: cb37520b1e82659b332a79ec61efc613.mp3

quiz.text: I think I understand your situation. Maybe you should report it to the school and apply for a new room.
quiz.nativeText: 现在我明白你的处境了。或许你应该跟校方说明情况，申请一间新宿舍。
quiz.name: 5c0204f25ab5bd8b5f38b51826a8e28c.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. That's what I'm thinking about.
quiz.nativeText: 正有此意。
quiz.name: 3795178f584c7a415d8e363cc2e407df.mp3

quiz.text: already
quiz.nativeText: 已经
quiz.name: d10d9acdf6cd47966e6fbad9e143c872.mp3

quiz.text: daughter
quiz.nativeText: 女儿
quiz.name: cad593a449dee8d674361200f2caf20c.mp3

quiz.text: a tall building
quiz.nativeText: 一幢高楼
quiz.name: 5a2ef2bbc48d365a16ad52acaa46e8ac.mp3

quiz.text: door to door
quiz.nativeText: 挨家挨户
quiz.name: 963b03b84b25a12e9982847e418e5674.mp3

quiz.text: A woman answered the doorbell.
quiz.nativeText: 一个女人在家中应声开门。
quiz.name: 14481d44a6a63d176072415cb41b16fd.mp3

quiz.text: She saw a man standing on her porch.
quiz.nativeText: 她看见一个男人站在门廊上。
quiz.hilitText: She {#*saw*$} a man standing on her {#*porch*$}.
quiz.ipa: ʃi s{#*ɔ*$} ə mæn stændɪŋ ɑn hɝ p{#*ɔ*$}rtʃ
quiz.name: 23f60dccebe27b6a0ef1f4a252a93d88.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 被你说中了，被你发现了。

quiz.text: Did you win the lottery or something? Why the big smile?
quiz.nativeText: 你是中了彩票还是怎么了？为什么笑得这么开心！
quiz.name: 6d5cc362915f5aac3e852f0417170b9d.mp3

quiz.text: Guess what? I received an offer from Yale University yesterday!
quiz.nativeText: 猜猜怎么着？我昨天被耶鲁大学录取啦！
quiz.name: af322bd9b3f93694e58da3fcd292228b.mp3

quiz.text: Congratulations! You must be thrilled.
quiz.nativeText: 恭喜你！你一定激动坏了。
quiz.name: 7c796dc04238d8b6df55d11e9c76dd00.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I'm jumping with joy. It's too good to be true.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，我激动地都要跳起来了。这消息好得令人难以相信。
quiz.name: c5da428ef30d01c1d042941716540850.mp3

quiz.text: It's not unexpected at all. You have always been an excellent student!
quiz.nativeText: 一点儿也不意外。你一直都那么优秀！
quiz.name: 7f0e1cd0182a8ae4c5f87c32fa22f061.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much. I just feel relieved after such a long wait.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你这么说。经历了漫长的等待，我现在如释重负。
quiz.name: 4ce060010e8b700415e4e59d60bc521b.mp3

quiz.text: Did you even sleep last night? Look at the dark circles around your eyes!
quiz.nativeText: 你昨晚睡着了吗？瞧瞧你那黑眼圈！
quiz.name: 44be15f791d182e1796f710b818d8f1b.mp3

quiz.text: You got me. I was too busy envisioning my life at Yale.
quiz.nativeText: 被你说中了。我昨晚一直忙着想象在耶鲁的生活会是怎样呢。
quiz.name: 73b1bbba6b4511913d879567992fbc6b.mp3

quiz.text: It will definitely be full of challenges, don't you think?
quiz.nativeText: 一定充满了挑战，是吗？
quiz.name: 29bf2c98b26bd4533cf96e28601446c9.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, but challenges excite me!
quiz.nativeText: 当然了，但挑战总能让我兴奋！
quiz.name: 0aefe811349c5682c050fbb53197c15d.mp3

quiz.text: A woman answered the doorbell.
quiz.nativeText: 一个女人在家中应声开门。
quiz.name: 14481d44a6a63d176072415cb41b16fd.mp3

quiz.text: She saw a man standing on her porch.
quiz.nativeText: 她看见一个男人站在门廊上。
quiz.hilitText: She {#*saw*$} a man standing on her {#*porch*$}.
quiz.ipa: ʃi s{#*ɔ*$} ə mæn stændɪŋ ɑn hɝ p{#*ɔ*$}rtʃ
quiz.name: 23f60dccebe27b6a0ef1f4a252a93d88.mp3

quiz.text: The man said, "I'm terribly sorry,
quiz.nativeText: 男人说：“非常抱歉，
quiz.ipa: ðə mæn sɛd aɪm tɛrəbli sɑri
quiz.name: b3de4a065635bcda3338ecc801b281b1.mp3

quiz.text: I just ran over your cat and I want to replace it for you."
quiz.nativeText: 我刚刚把你的猫碾死了，我想赔你一只（代替它）。”
quiz.hilitText: I just ran over {#*your*$} cat and I want to replace it {#*for*$} you."
quiz.ipa: aɪ dʒʌst ræn oʊvɝ j{#*ɔ*$}r kæt ænd aɪ wɑnt tu ripleɪs ɪt f{#*ɔ*$}r ju
quiz.name: 965881960ee83dfee958907e8c3b459c.mp3

quiz.text: The woman replied, "Well, that's alright with me.
quiz.nativeText: “女人回答说，：“哦，没关系。
quiz.hilitText: The woman replied, "Well, that's {#*alright*$} with me.
quiz.ipa: ðə wʊmən riplaɪd wɛl ðæts {#*ɔ*$}lraɪt wɪθ mi
quiz.name: 6a75f8589271ca1cb569569661f5f793.mp3

quiz.text: But how are you at catching mice?"
quiz.nativeText: 但是你会捉老鼠吗？
quiz.hilitText: But how are you at catching mice?"
quiz.ipa: bʌt haʊ ɑr ju æt kætʃɪŋ maɪs
quiz.name: 2086d6e8eadaae905d24b7220e96c692.mp3

quiz.text: Hey John, you look pretty depressed. What's wrong?
quiz.nativeText: 约翰，你看起来这么消沉，发生什么事了？
quiz.hilitText: Hey John, you look pretty depressed. What's wrong?
quiz.ipa: heɪ dʒɑn ju lʊk prɪti dɪprɛst wʌts rɔŋ
quiz.name: d8bd143fae26c3dae571e2357694c299.mp3

quiz.text: I just broke up with my girlfriend.
quiz.nativeText: 我刚刚和女朋友分手了。
quiz.hilitText: I just broke up with my girlfriend.
quiz.ipa: aɪ dʒʌst broʊk ʌp wɪθ maɪ ɡɝlfrɛnd
quiz.name: d3520c2dbb30dc22521ecbd0ea7f1780.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，很抱歉听到这个消息。
quiz.hilitText: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
quiz.ipa: oʊ aɪm sɑri tu hɪr ðæt
quiz.name: e2cf80ed5cddf895ff9e2f452cfed6e4.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I am heart-broken. My life is a total mess now.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我的心都碎了。现在我的生活一团糟。
quiz.hilitText: Yeah. I am heart-broken. My life is a total mess now.
quiz.ipa: jæ aɪ æm hɑrt broʊkən maɪ laɪf ɪz ə toʊtəl mɛs naʊ
quiz.name: 14672ed97b3500c81e681b4f226a3738.mp3

quiz.text: Come on John, it's not the end of the world.
quiz.nativeText: 振作起来约翰，天不会塌下来的。
quiz.hilitText: Come on John, it's not the end of the world.
quiz.ipa: kʌm ɑn dʒɑn ɪts nɑt ði ɛnd ʌv ðə wɝld
quiz.name: ec0acb65db0daf0c14504941cf74633a.mp3

quiz.text: It is the end of my world. She was everything to me. I loved her so much.
quiz.nativeText: 我确实感觉天已经塌下来了。她就是我的一切，我太爱她了。
quiz.hilitText: It is the end of my world. She was everything to me. I loved her so much.
quiz.ipa: ɪt ɪz ði ɛnd ʌv maɪ wɝld ʃi wɑz ɛvriθɪŋ tu mi aɪ lʌvd hɝ soʊ mʌtʃ
quiz.name: b2abee608b35a7fcb549be96b6f5124a.mp3

quiz.text: Try to forget her. If you keep thinking about her, you'll just feel even worse.
quiz.nativeText: 试着忘了她吧。如果你一直想她，你的感觉只会比现在更糟糕。
quiz.hilitText: Try to forget her. If you keep thinking about her, you'll just feel even worse.
quiz.ipa: traɪ tu fɝɡɛt hɝ ɪf ju kip θɪŋkɪŋ əbaʊt hɝ jul dʒʌst fil ivɪn wɝs
quiz.name: d3d31cc2fe05e2fba52b5ff63535738f.mp3

quiz.text: It's not that easy.
quiz.nativeText: 想要从这段感情中解脱出来可没那么容易。
quiz.name: 94d1730bbe94b1205152252647197e9c.mp3

quiz.text: You can try to make yourself busy so that you can forget her. Peter and I are planning to go on a trip. Do you want to join us?
quiz.nativeText: 你可以试着让自己变得很忙，这样你就会忘了她的。皮特和我准备出去旅行，你要不要一起？
quiz.hilitText: You can try to make yourself busy so that you can forget her. Peter and I are planning to go on a trip. Do you want to join us?
quiz.ipa: ju kæn traɪ tɪ meɪk jɔrsɛlf bɪzi soʊ ðæt ju kæn fɝɡɛt hɝ pitɝ ænd aɪ ɝ plænɪŋ tɪ ɡoʊ ɔn ə trɪp du ju wɔnt tɪ dʒɔɪn ʌs
quiz.name: 5383cd88c1bfe31040068c0ea5e85045.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I hope it works.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，希望这能有效。
quiz.name: 5c320bedcf07b39e49b8504b2ab93d4e.mp3

quiz.text: Are you okay? You seem really depressed.
quiz.nativeText: 你还好吗？你看起来很沮丧。
quiz.name: 1b108ffe78df3391bb16ccbd30784f33.mp3

quiz.text: I failed a math test again.
quiz.nativeText: 我数学考试又挂了。
quiz.name: 9357eb937850939621018a2e570dc557.mp3

quiz.text: I'm really sorry to hear that.
quiz.nativeText: 很遗憾听到这个。
quiz.name: 71881ba3387839e2ddf37f1753cf1276.mp3

quiz.text: I feel terrible.
quiz.nativeText: 我感觉很糟糕。
quiz.name: 36fc45fb45e2f3d52d362712b7871291.mp3

quiz.text: Is there anything I can do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以为你做点什么吗？
quiz.name: 41da61ca26c4dffbe07930c72b9ace22.mp3

quiz.text: Can you get me some ice cream?
quiz.nativeText: 你能帮我拿些冰淇淋吗？
quiz.name: 3cc6b07f2a72b21b8ffebeefc89cb623.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. What flavor do you like?
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。你喜欢什么口味的？
quiz.name: 62c323dcfd3996e0ad6b11c5fdda0fcd.mp3

quiz.text: Vanilla, please. Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 香草味的。太谢谢你了。
quiz.name: f08a01a222fad6c563fb83e6d31b889c.mp3

quiz.text: That is so hilarious!
quiz.nativeText: 那太搞笑了！
quiz.name: 2cdae675817a0a0efe81d4fe6dfdc586.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, and it is a true story.
quiz.nativeText: 对啊，而且这是一个真实的故事。
quiz.name: e13ce73c6b9dc6b734c845e6711af7d3.mp3

quiz.text: No way!
quiz.nativeText: 不可能！
quiz.name: 80965f62d89046b9a12aba69c9540105.mp3

quiz.text: I told it to the whole class yesterday.
quiz.nativeText: 我昨天跟整个班的人讲了这个故事。
quiz.name: 576eff3e83451f27edf7307ba3d77858.mp3

quiz.text: What was the teacher's reaction?
quiz.nativeText: 老师的反应是什么？
quiz.name: 78f6f10c7fd6b80225b271a0fcea6ff0.mp3

quiz.text: He could barely keep a straight face.
quiz.nativeText: 他都没法忍住不笑。
quiz.name: 779f9a4220e7bc2a2f3e0b6c180bbd9f.mp3

quiz.text: Retirement from work is a dream to some, but a nightmare to others.
Some people are anxious to relax in retirement with all the strains relieved;
others seek alternative outlets for their energies and alternative sources of joy.
Oftentimes, they find themselves reemployed in one way or another.
Many people find it hard to suddenly discontinue their work when they are still healthy.
However, retirement is anything but a withdraw from the world.
Many retirees are using their free time to continue working on their own terms.
They explore new careers or retooling themselves for some part-time job.
It is a transition everybody has to go through, sooner or later in his life.
Needless to say, such a transition is a very painful one.
But when adjustments are well made, retirement life can be full of fun.
Hey, Joey! Long time no see!
quiz.nativeText: 嘿，乔伊！好久不见！
quiz.name: 9052af6e65b8ddbf93bee33fd577d90e.mp3

quiz.text: What a surprise to meet you here!
quiz.nativeText: 真没想到会在这儿见到你！
quiz.name: 1819a89eea215b14ae174b0b0ca6b82f.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. How are your studies coming along?
quiz.nativeText: 是的呢。最近学业进展还顺利吗？
quiz.name: f72a078d2a87355d41753694d9dcffca.mp3

quiz.text: So far so good.
quiz.nativeText: 到目前为止一切都还好。
quiz.name: 381d08ca3acd72979b5f90e19edb8656.mp3

quiz.text: You seem to be in a hurry.
quiz.nativeText: 你似乎在赶时间呀。
quiz.name: 5441ead36d6948f8f338a74be063a5bb.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry. I have class in ten minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 不好意思，我十分钟后还有课。
quiz.name: 22a9f213eac71d133daa814226699d31.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I won't keep you then.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我就不耽搁你了。
quiz.name: 8bc13fd17bccc5cb1603829fa20cd19c.mp3

quiz.text: We should have lunch together sometime.
quiz.nativeText: 我们应该找个时间一起吃顿饭。
quiz.name: d986938630048f9ff0ac3c988788bd87.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, that would be great. How about this Friday?
quiz.nativeText: 那再好不过了。不如就这周五吧，怎么样？
quiz.name: 1f572262ca85d1449e090f38f79d6351.mp3

quiz.text: It's a deal.
quiz.nativeText: 就这么定了。
quiz.name: a90d1b350496f90b0c5abaf60e47954d.mp3

quiz.text: It's been a long time, my dear.
quiz.nativeText: 好久不见啊，亲爱的。
quiz.name: 3853aa60bc2ef33a43948758ed7da2f4.mp3

quiz.text: Indeed. Time has been good to you.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，你看起来还是那么年轻。
quiz.name: 4c6aa67cab8c31a04b4dfcb2990a4843.mp3

quiz.text: You flatter me.
quiz.nativeText: 哪里哪里。
quiz.name: 510fe72f29de330e825a4e575beb91fc.mp3

quiz.text: You look great in this black dress!
quiz.nativeText: 而且这身黑色裙子你穿相当好看！
quiz.name: 74d626bb507be8729128e2abf8a0886b.mp3

quiz.text: I'm glad you like it. My husband gave it to me for my birthday.
quiz.nativeText: 我非常高兴你喜欢它。这是我过生日时我老公送的。
quiz.name: e6fc57a5463e55ba84522e0b6e90e837.mp3

quiz.text: Then he has really good taste in fashion.
quiz.nativeText: 那他的品味真好。
quiz.name: b8e74c3290fa22c3c5644fcd284e29de.mp3

quiz.text: That's very kind of you to say. You look nice too. I like your necklace.
quiz.nativeText: 真感谢你这么说。你也很美啊，我喜欢你的项链。
quiz.name: 03d12e9b60170c6d400975899076afb0.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I really appreciate that you noticed that.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，你注意到了，真好。
quiz.name: c057f8901b3f41185cc4298a7a6ad64c.mp3

quiz.text: How couldn't I? It goes beautifully with your dress.
quiz.nativeText: 我也很喜欢你的项链，特别配你这件裙子。
quiz.name: dd81fd24d4ebf661c2a95328379c7eba.mp3

quiz.text: Hah, you are such a sweet-talker!
quiz.nativeText: 哈哈，你的嘴巴真甜！
quiz.name: a5e0b55030f00566d2d8a6d1bd6d7931.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much for coming to see me off. You really didn't need to.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你能来送我。你真的不用这么麻烦的。
quiz.name: 72383561b9618f35f96b2fd40d24146b.mp3

quiz.text: My pleasure. I'm sorry you're going to leave us. We'll miss you.
quiz.nativeText: 不用客气。很遗憾您就要走了。我们会想念您的。
quiz.name: dad85ece1a76eec3943d7855d6ee11d8.mp3

quiz.text: Me too. I really had a wonderful time here. Thank you for all you have done for me.
quiz.nativeText: 我也是。我在这里度过了很愉快的一段时光。谢谢你们为我做的一切。
quiz.name: 9b5acc367bba139331e4bd3991ce72ec.mp3

quiz.text: Don't mention it.
quiz.nativeText: 没什么值得一提的。
quiz.name: 835c4ef721f9f467df3dbee5f3291514.mp3

quiz.text: I've heard that you would be in the U.S. for a conference later this year. Is that right?
quiz.nativeText: 我听说你之后会来美国出差，参加一场会议。是吗？
quiz.name: e7fd14a0d44fafd4b935869f53079cfe.mp3

quiz.text: That's right. Three months from now in Seattle.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，三个月后，在西雅图。
quiz.name: 3ccc206ec9c087b1fd47d8f6e6ec4250.mp3

quiz.text: Do let me know if you're ever in New York. I'll show you the city.
quiz.nativeText: 要是来纽约的话，一定让我知道。让我来做你的导游。
quiz.name: 992254cc3a090a8dda27ed7ee6036424.mp3

quiz.text: I sure will. Oh, sounds like they're boarding now.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我会的！噢，好像已经开始登机了。
quiz.name: 7e406ff70c38d46e86a13aa845535d77.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Goodbye then. Thanks again for everything.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那就再见了，再一次感谢你为我做的一切。
quiz.name: 8ba0c05ef8d66fe61e46f4a90c7f3f95.mp3

quiz.text: Goodbye. Take care and have a nice trip.
quiz.nativeText: 再见。保重，祝你一路顺风。
quiz.name: 2f52b754cfd6627e593ff5eee46a089c.mp3

quiz.text: Hello. I don't think we've met before.
quiz.nativeText: 你好。我们之前好像没见过面。
quiz.name: 11a51df3f31af1ba3c93e38a8a5fbb22.mp3

quiz.text: No. Are you friend of Josh?
quiz.nativeText: 没有。你是Josh的朋友吗？
quiz.name: 205bd751a509b517dd0c1e218fd9371a.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I'm Kirk. Nice to meet you.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我是Kirk。很高兴见到你。
quiz.name: d1a252bb761e1da73eec8b5a05f09807.mp3

quiz.text: I'm Hannah. Nice to meet you too.
quiz.nativeText: 我是Hannah。也很高兴见到你。
quiz.name: f08d3e5734ff09f6053f7e43b8f4f7fe.mp3

quiz.text: The cakes here are very delicious.
quiz.nativeText: 这里的蛋糕真的很美味。
quiz.name: b86c3f924f2525c1436d4dbfd006d5c5.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. I love cake. These are really good.
quiz.nativeText: 同意。我爱蛋糕。这些真的很好吃。
quiz.name: 0879c842099cdd0313b41516f9d6c185.mp3

quiz.text: I make cakes myself in my spare time.
quiz.nativeText: 我在空闲时间会自己做蛋糕。
quiz.name: cd11dd0d24efb4daba8f12f2ca82df81.mp3

quiz.text: That is amazing! I like cooking too.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！我也喜欢做美食。
quiz.name: dc1fccb956b4523b72303cab43b128a9.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, I'm Alicia. I just moved in next door.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，我是爱丽西娅，我刚刚搬进隔壁。
quiz.name: a7e9ca0a337c665ec7226a4cc3967348.mp3

quiz.text: Hi Alicia. I'm Lucca. Nice to meet you. Come on in.
quiz.nativeText: 你好爱丽西娅，我是卢卡。很高兴认识你。请进吧。
quiz.name: 837abf23f101b695b451ca7798ad8085.mp3

quiz.text: Here's a small gift for you. How long have you lived here?
quiz.nativeText: 这是给您的一个小礼物。您在这儿住了多久啦？
quiz.name: 65a859a5eac258358e1bcd74f4a9b40d.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I've lived here for five years.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我在这儿住了有五年啦。
quiz.name: 8fa5ca9603d3cc26aa9b0a21b3e87e5a.mp3

quiz.text: Then you must be very familiar with the area.
quiz.nativeText: 那您一定对附近很熟悉吧。
quiz.name: 6c384413e6b55c031de67492ef8ff581.mp3

quiz.text: There are stores, clinics and many other facilities here.
quiz.nativeText: 这里商店、诊所和其他便利设施都有。
quiz.name: 52590507e73991c97700faa9c98bebb2.mp3

quiz.text: Great! May I ask what you do?
quiz.nativeText: 真好！能否冒昧地问一句，您是做什么的？
quiz.name: d8ea57a2222e8d8f394fd4039b116a22.mp3

quiz.text: I am an artist. Where do you work?
quiz.nativeText: 我是一名设计师。您是做什么的？
quiz.name: cae4af36009443b1a330a6cbea6445dc.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I am a programmer at Microsoft.
quiz.nativeText: 我是微软的一名程序员。
quiz.name: d104070001d8083d674babc15879c90d.mp3

quiz.text: I have an exhibition this Friday. I'd love it if you came.
quiz.nativeText: 我这周五有一场展览会，如果您能来的话，那就太好了。
quiz.name: cf3506b1d1c896df546803fc64766863.mp3

quiz.text: Fantastic! I'd love to.
quiz.nativeText: 棒极了！我很乐意。
quiz.name: 3ba2eddf986d0aada98c7cf422524a41.mp3

quiz.text: It's a deal.
quiz.nativeText: 那就这么说定了。
quiz.name: a90d1b350496f90b0c5abaf60e47954d.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Rachel. I heard that you are holding a solo exhibition this Sunday, right?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨瑞秋，我听说你这周末要办个人展览，是吗？
quiz.name: 93ed9967426e21189466d1c5b0dbb5c8.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I was just about to invite you. Would you like to come?
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我刚刚正准备邀请你呢。你愿意来吗？
quiz.name: 4278b266d3e7c70f5052197eb2d0cde6.mp3

quiz.text: I'd be delighted to. When is it?
quiz.nativeText: 我很乐意。展览是在什么时候？
quiz.name: fec55a76ef1727afd63c1d4b32840adf.mp3

quiz.text: It starts at seven p.m. Are you busy then?
quiz.nativeText: 周日晚上七点开始。你有空吗？
quiz.name: 89721748035367b0ae6094810ea9b105.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all. I will be available.
quiz.nativeText: 不忙。我有空。
quiz.name: 9dd817cb770f10e77ae4c23e45c9b428.mp3

quiz.text: Good. I will text you the address later.
quiz.nativeText: 那就好。我一会儿把地址用短信发给你。
quiz.name: 08ed412e5cb17635465f64900ee37cb6.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks. I would also like to bring my friend David who is very interested in the arts too.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我也想带我朋友大卫一起过去。他对艺术也很感兴趣。
quiz.name: 61a8fb0b910b29bf8b3708656b9e5944.mp3

quiz.text: Sure! David is welcome!
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以！我很欢迎大卫！
quiz.name: b2b6aa2b4e09bde2cc1d145b589f5d18.mp3

quiz.text: Do you need help setting up or anything? I can help you with that.
quiz.nativeText: 你需要帮忙布置或其它什么的吗？我可以帮你的。
quiz.name: 9ae29914300d6a8fb2087b429a41ea57.mp3

quiz.text: No, but thanks for offering.
quiz.nativeText: 不用了，但谢谢你的好意。
quiz.name: 340697f988a5aa0148986b15a933c650.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thanks for your invitation. I'll be there on time.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，谢谢你的邀请。我会准时到那的。
quiz.name: a23afaf6e71d1716ad75eb70c8f160d1.mp3

quiz.text: See you then.
quiz.nativeText: 到时候见。
quiz.name: 9a4b3d2aef218b2a3f4019eff1506eb6.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Sherry. What are you doing this weekend?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，���莉。你这周有什么活动吗？
quiz.name: 7b161288f7e5276b8a1846bd43a35564.mp3

quiz.text: Nothing special. Why?
quiz.nativeText: 没什么特别的事。为什么这么问？
quiz.name: 659f2365e8586636565cde73a1185244.mp3

quiz.text: Good. I've got two tickets for a play. Care to come?
quiz.nativeText: 太好了。我有两张话剧票，你愿意来吗？
quiz.name: ba80a96f12e793e49e86b1ef3c9b28e8.mp3

quiz.text: You bet! What time will it start?
quiz.nativeText: 当然愿意啦！什么时候开始？
quiz.name: 4e341f6fc8b5bc2ea2975fdd0ece3237.mp3

quiz.text: Around seven thirty on Saturday evening.
quiz.nativeText: 周六晚上大概七点。
quiz.name: 096ed765b26288e50d13ad4e20e2eb7c.mp3

quiz.text: Good. Where shall we meet?
quiz.nativeText: 好。那咱们在哪儿见？
quiz.name: c6fc13534828350d02aa25063588021f.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry. I'll come pick you up at about six thirty.
quiz.nativeText: 不用担心。我六点半左右开车来接你。
quiz.name: d8c758d57719e943b8a534b09c05dc3e.mp3

quiz.text: That's very kind of you.
quiz.nativeText: 你真的是太好了。
quiz.name: c2d2fb3f29f090c42574a254f1b76f23.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all. So that's settled then.
quiz.nativeText: 没什么。那就这么说定啦。
quiz.name: 40df3883bdcf795bf4d6a367930f9371.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Thanks again for the invitation.
quiz.nativeText: 对的。再一次感谢你的邀请。
quiz.name: 50898ef258e62c3d707736731e21f58f.mp3

quiz.text: Ruby, I was wondering if you had any plans for Saturday night.
quiz.nativeText: 鲁比，你周六晚上有安排吗？
quiz.name: 9595891fa0da29b69c2acea09eb59f36.mp3

quiz.text: My family is planning to go out. Why? What's up?
quiz.nativeText: 我们全家准备出门。为什么这么问？怎么啦？
quiz.name: 04d9e094d07c0aa9cc7b0a517a7a6fe0.mp3

quiz.text: There's a really popular exhibition at the national museum. I thought you might be interested.
quiz.nativeText: 国家博物馆现在有个很火的展览。我想你可能会感兴趣。
quiz.name: a828958fde83a8971c8621eabc4ee489.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks for asking, but I'm afraid I can't. I'm going to be out all day.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你问我。但我恐怕没法去了。我周六一整天都会在外面。
quiz.name: c418d96127f6ef62c91b560b69c12de4.mp3

quiz.text: What about Sunday?
quiz.nativeText: 周日呢？
quiz.name: 1694e9f4a936c1e786d1046bb74b266a.mp3

quiz.text: I wish I could, but I have promised to visit my grandma.
quiz.nativeText: 我倒是希望我可以，但我已经答应了我奶奶去看她。
quiz.name: 0d217b13916b742542fd66ee2dcc70e1.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe next weekend?
quiz.nativeText: 或许下周末呢？
quiz.name: 3485a0c4e2fddc896b22410229102864.mp3

quiz.text: I'd really like to, but I have a paper to finish by next Sunday. I'm afraid I'm just too busy.
quiz.nativeText: 我真的很想去，但我下周日之前有篇论文要完成。我恐怕我到时候会很忙。
quiz.name: 0098d9ffc5539cf7cdb3f43a35311429.mp3

quiz.text: Fine. Please give me a call when you are free.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那你什么时候有空了给我打电话。
quiz.name: 8a76d4ec4ce24a78aad4a3bb524430d7.mp3

quiz.text: Sure.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我保证我会的。
quiz.name: 10cb93e9615848f31f4220ae77ffa399.mp3

quiz.text: Mike, how was your bicycle tour last weekend?
quiz.nativeText: 迈克，上周末的单车旅游怎么样哇？
quiz.name: 07189e86fb24d3b46ad479145472b847.mp3

quiz.text: It was good. But I've got some bad news for you.
quiz.nativeText: 很好。但是我有一个坏消息要告诉你。
quiz.name: fc670d3cc71f49549888a973312f019e.mp3

quiz.text: What's wrong?
quiz.nativeText: 怎么啦？
quiz.name: 3a17cc2dde3436f7fe85f4e82edd3738.mp3

quiz.text: I fell off your bike and the bike got scratched. I'm terribly sorry.
quiz.nativeText: 我从你自行车上摔下来了，把你的车刮伤了。真的太对不起了。
quiz.name: 3942ea0e09f7c3eba48a53efa1fcf880.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, don't worry about it. Did you get hurt?
quiz.nativeText: 噢，没关系。你受伤了吗？
quiz.name: 92e09c829344d3ab72595c86563bb4d3.mp3

quiz.text: No, I'm fine. But thank you for asking.
quiz.nativeText: 没有，我没事。谢谢你。
quiz.name: 541f754b873fb422371b5831b939bca2.mp3

quiz.text: Thank God! That's the most important thing.
quiz.nativeText: 谢天谢地！那才是最重要的。
quiz.name: f8681974583e2b53d0811241bf493194.mp3

quiz.text: But how can I make it up to you? Can I get you a new one?
quiz.nativeText: 我该怎么补偿你呢？我能给你再买一辆吗?
quiz.name: 0bc59298c87dc117e6f9e4a6493db04f.mp3
