quiz.text: Oh, you don't have to. It already had a lot of scratches on it.
quiz.nativeText: 真的不必啦。这车本来就有很多刮痕了。
quiz.name: a7e629c12c2c248981f8fc1127dbc7df.mp3

quiz.text: I felt so bad about it. I should have been more careful.
quiz.nativeText: 我感到很内疚。我应当更小心点。
quiz.name: 6cb00fdb13e23422c605c90b75c6d562.mp3

quiz.text: Just forget about it. It's no big deal.
quiz.nativeText: 没什么大不了的。别把这事儿放在心上。
quiz.name: a82b4fc708916c5092d9ee047e68b8cf.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much for understanding.
quiz.nativeText: 你这么说我真的很感激。
quiz.name: 11b33948633568e84bc827d7e22a9458.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 把愤怒发泄在别人身上

quiz.text: Peggy, you got a minute?
quiz.nativeText: 佩吉，你现在有空吗?
quiz.name: 167ec5ae88213d45d3f0e6bf394b3c1a.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. What's up?
quiz.nativeText: 有啊，怎么啦？
quiz.name: a6b188e29fc4723f73b502d6e1f06686.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I want to apologize for shouting at you the other day.
quiz.nativeText: 我想跟你道个歉，前几天我不该对你大吼大叫。
quiz.name: 6a73d4942feaf533ebe7c8a030b22498.mp3

quiz.text: It's okay. I understand. I know you've been through a hard time recently.
quiz.nativeText: 没关系啦，我能理解。我知道你最近不太顺。
quiz.name: 9c296995cb6807cefff8d44e0d1674a1.mp3

quiz.text: But that's no excuse. I shouldn't have taken it out on you.
quiz.nativeText: 但那不是理由。我不应该把怒气发泄在你身上。
quiz.name: bbf0ac1c883dbc352b80e004efef8fbc.mp3

quiz.text: That's quite all right. It could happen to anyone.
quiz.nativeText: 真的没关系啦。谁都可能会遇到这种情况。
quiz.name: ddc228baf1d6f5c0d6fcc18278385644.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks for understanding. I promise it won't happen again.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你能理解。我保证下次不会发生这样的事情了。
quiz.name: d5a22ce55b9e2402668da777348b2e81.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry about it. Are you feeling better now?
quiz.nativeText: 别放在心上。你现在感觉好一些了吗？
quiz.name: 8ba68f20f6f14c4ccc7f7ae8ae2cd9e5.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, a lot better. Things are getting back on track again.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，好多了。事情都重回正轨了。
quiz.name: 0d96e88345f7e124b3142140c197447b.mp3

quiz.text: I'm so glad to hear that.
quiz.nativeText: 那太好了。
quiz.name: c67af712b114c0a4d7a777ad96be3418.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 从（不快或疾病中）恢复过来
帮解决问题，使重回正轨

quiz.text: How have you been these days? Are you feeling any better?
quiz.nativeText: 最近怎么样？感觉好一些了吗？
quiz.name: 1d04a86f1a3ffb1038c93be02190e851.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Much better. Things are getting back on track.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，好多了。一切都开始重回正轨了。
quiz.name: 986046c20ce4dee228e37be56e7f31b6.mp3

quiz.text: Thank goodness. I'm so glad to hear that.
quiz.nativeText: 谢天谢地，听你这么说我真开心。
quiz.name: fc806fdf83358b80e64152f1cf74b609.mp3

quiz.text: I really couldn't have gotten over this breakup without your support.
quiz.nativeText: 要不是你的支持，我是没法走出失恋的痛苦的。
quiz.name: 345574d7981255c17f589fd0b8a4d602.mp3

quiz.text: There are plenty of fish in the sea. You'll have to move on.
quiz.nativeText: 天涯何处无芳草，你应该向前看。
quiz.name: 3900c29806e8d2d925ed74ca733fd9c7.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. What you said really helped straighten me out. I can't thank you enough.
quiz.nativeText: 没错，是你的话让我想通了。真的太感激你了。
quiz.name: 5b43ec0738bebf82a11eea153f6b41bc.mp3

quiz.text: You are quite welcome. Just call me if you want to talk.
quiz.nativeText: 你别这么客气。如果你还想找人聊聊天，随时给我电话。
quiz.name: 937b4d543cc53c2e276ad621d84634ff.mp3

quiz.text: That's so sweet of you.
quiz.nativeText: 你真的是太好了。
quiz.name: 53c4251e5028f304c6726b4439301148.mp3

quiz.text: No, not at all. It's the least I could do.
quiz.nativeText: 别这么说啦。这是我应该做的。
quiz.name: 9f1faacf661fa98c96460d2a1533bc02.mp3

quiz.text: Again, thank you so much for coming.
quiz.nativeText: 还是要说一次，你能来看我，我真的很感激。
quiz.name: 7fb56444ef536e844120efe9b6210194.mp3

quiz.text: Hey, Sara. You're here! I've been looking all over the place for you.
quiz.nativeText: 萨拉，你在这里啊！我到处找你呢！
quiz.name: 3344622f31258f475cae6b52aff6a4d4.mp3

quiz.text: What's up? And how did your exam go?
quiz.nativeText: 怎么啦？对了，你考试怎么样啊？
quiz.name: 2d90c626a1276cca1c27371b8f7ae3af.mp3

quiz.text: I nailed it!
quiz.nativeText: 我考过啦！
quiz.name: 7a364c68b2bc1dfcd56de3db93f3d80a.mp3

quiz.text: Awesome! I knew it.
quiz.nativeText: 真棒！我就知道你会通过的。
quiz.name: 547d0175e98b0f64966d8e3c3616d4bf.mp3

quiz.text: I really can't thank you enough. I couldn't have done it without your notes. Let me buy you dinner.
quiz.nativeText: 真的太感谢你了。要是没有你的笔记，我是无法顺利通过考试的。我请你吃晚饭。
quiz.name: 0269bf129eeecd2acbbac276273e6ce1.mp3

quiz.text: There's really no need. I was happy to be of help.
quiz.nativeText: 真的不需要啦。我很高兴能帮到你。
quiz.name: 586b8a82a22d763d09bf3d9d91b38298.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, and I've also brought you a small gift.
quiz.nativeText: 对了，我给你带了个小礼物。
quiz.name: 7e01c7f7bbf9247edf34b9518dabc396.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, you shouldn't have!
quiz.nativeText: 哎呀，你真不用这样！
quiz.name: d966951d6c85344c8bdbb6e6fd41b1f3.mp3

quiz.text: It's that Michael Jackson album that you've been looking for.
quiz.nativeText: 是你一直在找的迈克尔·杰克逊的专辑。
quiz.name: 1250c11383770a82f243131183ce1d7a.mp3

quiz.text: Really? That's incredible! Now I owe you one.
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？真是难以置信！现在我欠你一个人情啦。
quiz.name: fbad54c48fad08adbb2fc537a43a62f4.mp3

quiz.text: Credit cards enable their holders to obtain goods and services on credit.
They are issued by retail stores, banks to approved clients.
The bank or credit card company settles the client's bills.
They also invoice him monthly and charge interest on any outstanding debts.
Their profit comes from the high rate of interest charged and other ways.
All the credit organizations charge interest on a monthly basis.
It is necessary to consider the amount of credit granted and interest rates.
If used wisely, a credit card would help tide you over a period of financial difficulty.
Also keep in mind that too many credit cards can hurt your financial reputation.
It is important to make sure that you make payments on time.
The best way to avoid credit problems is to be disciplined.
Hey, I heard you went to Thailand last week. Tell me about it.
quiz.nativeText: 听说你上周去泰国啦，跟我说说。
quiz.name: 25f9c7b89f6b7ed3facd4e9958d280de.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, it was really a wonderful trip. But I was only there for five days.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。是一段非常精彩的旅行。但我只在那边待了五天。
quiz.name: c9c0baa55d8305f1f21c8eb0343da6f4.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, that's a bit too short. Where did you go?
quiz.nativeText: 噢，那确实有些短。你都去了哪些地方？
quiz.name: 80a95abacc5b6eca5fd6350858b6f574.mp3

quiz.text: I just went to the capital city, Bangkok.
quiz.nativeText: 我只去了首都，曼谷。
quiz.name: 3836d06f5b25f455c1933efd541fa274.mp3

quiz.text: What is Bangkok like?
quiz.nativeText: 曼谷是什么样的？
quiz.name: c76d59115af9150c76b5b4478994adcb.mp3

quiz.text: Definitely an amazing city. It's so lively!
quiz.nativeText: 棒极了。这座城市充满了生机！
quiz.name: 1da6d0266a3192a503608da5370f2947.mp3

quiz.text: What do you mean by lively?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么这么说？
quiz.name: 171da0f515aa252ddf02acfd226ed34e.mp3

quiz.text: I mean, there are temples, bustling streets and busy night markets. There's just so much to do and see.
quiz.nativeText: 我是说，那里有寺庙、熙熙攘攘的街道、喧闹的夜市。总之有太多值得看和做的事啦。
quiz.name: a1f2daa7d0849da1614176793180d7b0.mp3

quiz.text: Cool. How's the food there?
quiz.nativeText: 真好。那边吃的怎么样？
quiz.name: 46b398e289a4f0e88bd93afe48a78237.mp3

quiz.text: There's a variety of street food. It's cheap and delicious.
quiz.nativeText: 街上有各种各样的小吃。既好吃又便宜。
quiz.name: 959d95d26cc2fc6af0cf3bb2aca13df1.mp3

quiz.text: What about the locals?
quiz.nativeText: 当地的居民呢？
quiz.name: e465dfb76e44a24ef712d7f7a370c4a6.mp3

quiz.text: They are pretty friendly to foreigners, and they seem to enjoy their lives a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 他们对外国游客都挺友好的，而且他们看起来很享受生活。
quiz.name: d3c5b373ef5ab7dc2b67da2c968c13ca.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds like a pretty awesome place.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来真是个不错的地方。
quiz.name: 7524f7c8391bc727c89237cc70f16d66.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, you should go there sometime.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，你应该找个时间去看看。
quiz.name: e33acc7b649fa354cd563699c730514f.mp3

learnText: 短元音。发音时，舌后部抬起，舌身后缩，舌尖离开下齿。双唇收圆，稍向前突出。[ʊ]发音类似"乌"，但相比之下嘴型更扁平。

quiz.text: put
quiz.nativeText: 放置###put.jpg
quiz.name: 3e75383a5992a6d15fb81e872e46e256.mp3

quiz.text: cook
quiz.nativeText: 厨师
quiz.name: 4d0ac0ac81f821d356fa97d73a979614.mp3

quiz.text: should
quiz.nativeText: 应该
quiz.name: bdc97aca8d1f2741c582792b24431122.mp3

quiz.text: look
quiz.nativeText: 看
quiz.name: 7f532486d5e17cc1efdfa2f9f8728478.mp3

name: ʊ

quiz.text: Hi! Are you going home?
quiz.nativeText: 你好！你要回家吗？
quiz.name: 7e08840c9ecd1d23b96560705a95abab.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I'm going to celebrate the Chinese New Year with my family.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我要和家人一起过中国新年。
quiz.name: 855e1b014bef88c6cd9f220f81f27350.mp3

quiz.text: Cool. It is the most important festival in China.
quiz.nativeText: 棒。这是中国最重要的节日了。
quiz.name: 38b8bd61ee587483f5138ceaa9a15166.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. What is your favorite traditional Chinese festival?
quiz.nativeText: 没错。你最喜欢哪一个节日？
quiz.name: d87499bb26fb388ce86b149c167b28a7.mp3

quiz.text: I like the Mid-Autumn Festival the most.
quiz.nativeText: 我最喜欢中秋节。
quiz.name: c30806f6adbfd0aa90434a563115c539.mp3

quiz.text: Great. I love the moon cakes.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了。我爱月饼。
quiz.name: 7fc862ed9bc07fbf464597a7ef81e465.mp3

quiz.text: I totally agree. They are delicious.
quiz.nativeText: 完全同意。太好吃了。
quiz.name: c65af3b5fe09304a925cd04375f0dc66.mp3

quiz.text: And I love Dragon Boat Festival. It's so much fun.
quiz.nativeText: 我也喜欢端午节。很有意思。
quiz.name: e8760fa503619bff92fcce02d6048f70.mp3

quiz.text: Do you believe in astrology?
quiz.nativeText: 你相信星座这回事吗？
quiz.name: 0494844aec31d19b6ceff14f7a7bd5a5.mp3

quiz.text: Actually, I don't really.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上我不怎么信这个。
quiz.name: 99c1182ac6d06bec1b78f77369fbac11.mp3

quiz.text: But you should know that it is sometimes accurate. I guess you must be an Aries.
quiz.nativeText: 但其实星座有时候还挺准的。我猜你就一定是个白羊座。
quiz.name: 48014c020302f22a2d7fa5376e87abc8.mp3

quiz.text: How did you know that?
quiz.nativeText: 你怎么知道的？
quiz.name: 3fc00a6a792cfb55dba0073f17ed8b36.mp3

quiz.text: You are highly energetic and are eager to experience new things.
quiz.nativeText: 因为你总是充满能量，并且乐于体验新事物。
quiz.name: 24ef6d129292b57cc66c07c3eaf8a428.mp3

quiz.text: That does make some sense.
quiz.nativeText: 好像确实能说得通。
quiz.name: 271f05b1cab1b43911cc2e4f22725393.mp3

quiz.text: And you work hard and are committed in your relationship. That's a typical Aries.
quiz.nativeText: 而且你工作努力，也肯为了爱情努力。那是典型的白羊座。
quiz.name: 3db82a0fe0cf39d52b48d1f67297677f.mp3

quiz.text: Interesting. What's your sign?
quiz.nativeText: 有意思。那你是什么星座的？
quiz.name: 2ccc11ca1d5622c66df7003ff88dd329.mp3

quiz.text: I'm a Cancer.
quiz.nativeText: 我是巨蟹座。
quiz.name: c911dde6f50df2d57def4d3d1884faf9.mp3

quiz.text: So what is a Cancer like?
quiz.nativeText: 巨蟹座的人都有什么特点？
quiz.name: 68fabbe168509ca19b20448fa8ab7452.mp3

quiz.text: Well, people born under the Cancer sign really love their homes and want a peaceful family life.
quiz.nativeText: 巨蟹座的人出名地恋家，希望稳稳当当过日子。
quiz.name: 6419502096d1f5843776f6f5771d473e.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, you seem to know a lot about this.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，你很懂星座嘛。
quiz.name: 14d9dd18e673a045446c1cdf6804cdf7.mp3

quiz.text: put
quiz.nativeText: 放置
quiz.name: 3e75383a5992a6d15fb81e872e46e256.mp3

quiz.text: should
quiz.nativeText: 应该
quiz.name: bdc97aca8d1f2741c582792b24431122.mp3

quiz.text: cook dinner
quiz.nativeText: 做晚饭
quiz.name: f5e8f7250652d1df7defd6ff5960d975.mp3

quiz.text: take a look
quiz.nativeText: 看一看
quiz.name: f89e6b45f7803b1cec27b1100ff5b8a2.mp3

quiz.text: I want something to put me in a fighting mood.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要能让我充满斗志的东西。
quiz.hilitText: I want something to {#*put*$} me in a fighting mood.
quiz.ipa: aɪ wɑnt sʌmθɪŋ tu p{#*ʊ*$}t mi ɪn ə faɪtɪŋ mud
quiz.name: f20960f10e619921d7fb6369872e0c6c.mp3

quiz.text: The doctor looked at the patient and replied: "There's no need for that."
quiz.nativeText: 医生看着病人回答到：“没有必要。”
quiz.hilitText: The doctor {#*looked*$} at the patient and replied: "There's no need for that."
quiz.ipa: ðə dɑktɝ l{#*ʊ*$}kt æt ðə peɪʃənt ænd rɪplaɪd ðɛrz noʊ nid frɝ ðæt
quiz.name: d7f9f85a46a4fa5d6f8cf30a69d9caee.mp3

quiz.text: Hey, look at those clouds!
quiz.nativeText: 看看这云！
quiz.name: b50f92a349aec1e97e6c78efdf4bfd28.mp3

quiz.text: I think we're in for some rain later.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得待会要下雨。
quiz.name: 987680e0cab496a6b2931ff6120ed8f1.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. I'm so glad I brought my umbrella! Did you bring yours?
quiz.nativeText: 确实。还好我带伞了！你带伞了吗？
quiz.name: b8fe385d562c6ed6d64c821960bbf474.mp3

quiz.text: Nope. The weather forecast said it would be sunny today.
quiz.nativeText: 没呢。天气预报里明明说今天会是个大晴天。
quiz.name: 70c59c37f4910f128928eabedf86065f.mp3

quiz.text: Hah. The weather forecast is not necessarily reliable.
quiz.nativeText: 哈哈，其实天气预报也不一定准的。
quiz.name: be8eca08c17fed1f921005a6cc6bebd4.mp3

quiz.text: Tell me about it.
quiz.nativeText: 谁说不是呢。
quiz.name: 1f871bb465ba323d48288e82f35fcec3.mp3

quiz.text: Enjoy it while it lasts. I heard it's going to be a rainy week.
quiz.nativeText: 好好享受吧。我听说之后一周都有雨。
quiz.name: e6faa2ba748637d34d961a4732ad8643.mp3

quiz.text: Great. The dog days of summer are finally over.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了，最热的日子总算要过去了。
quiz.name: 1b737224c1b4955c00d21a24eaccec42.mp3

quiz.text: Patient: "Doctor, you should give me something to stir me up.
quiz.nativeText: 病人说：“大夫，您得给我开些能让我振奋的药物。
quiz.hilitText: Patient: "Doctor, you {#*should*$} give me something to stir me up.
quiz.ipa: peɪʃənt dɑktɝ ju ʃ{#*ʊ*$}d ɡɪv mi sʌmθɪŋ tu stɝ mi ʌp
quiz.name: e8c6b2c94c4eb31829d9b8b8dd604333.mp3

quiz.text: I want something to put me in a fighting mood.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要能让我充满斗志的东西。
quiz.hilitText: I want something to {#*put*$} me in a fighting mood.
quiz.ipa: aɪ wɑnt sʌmθɪŋ tu p{#*ʊ*$}t mi ɪn ə faɪtɪŋ mud
quiz.name: f20960f10e619921d7fb6369872e0c6c.mp3

quiz.text: Have you put something like that in this prescription?"
quiz.nativeText: 你在药方上加上这些东西了吗？”
quiz.hilitText: Have you {#*put*$} something like that in this prescription?"
quiz.ipa: hæv ju p{#*ʊ*$}t sʌmθɪŋ laɪk ðæt ɪn ðɪs prəskrɪpʃən
quiz.name: fe61a684486d52e4f760da8b2b4aaf64.mp3

quiz.text: The doctor looked at the patient and replied: "There's no need for that.
quiz.nativeText: 医生看着病人回答到：“没有必要。
quiz.hilitText: The doctor {#*looked*$} at the patient and replied: "There's no need for that.
quiz.ipa: ðə dɑktɝ l{#*ʊ*$}kt æt ðə peɪʃənt ænd rɪplaɪd ðɛrz noʊ nid frɝ ðæt
quiz.name: a069b06e7eea67df277bef1e8883d337.mp3

quiz.text: You will find that in your bill."
quiz.nativeText: 你付账的时候会找到这种感觉的。”
quiz.hilitText: You will find that in your bill."
quiz.ipa: ju wɪl faɪnd ðæt ɪn jɔr bɪl
quiz.name: 51ea798634675ce6b87d461a0d006ffd.mp3

quiz.text: Hey Jane, you look great! Did you lose some weight?
quiz.nativeText: 嘿，简，你看起来状态很不错嘛！你是瘦了吗？
quiz.name: 4f102b8746700749c2fd3c9621806b9c.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I lost five kilos.
quiz.nativeText: 对的。我瘦了有五公斤。
quiz.name: 56d7c19daf0445d33eab07baa6b80efa.mp3

quiz.text: Wow. How did you do it? Did you go on a diet?
quiz.nativeText: 哇，你怎么做到的？是通过节食吗？
quiz.name: 33906d45a743930636786eaac6f12a04.mp3

quiz.text: No, you know I can't bear to eat less.
quiz.nativeText: 不，你知道我可受不了不怎么吃东西。
quiz.name: 00c2e742cba78c1f8ab06469c7d88a50.mp3

quiz.text: Then did you take weight-loss pills?
quiz.nativeText: 那你是吃减肥药了吗？
quiz.name: 1ea21248f885a35989d40cf750385a25.mp3

quiz.text: Oh no, I just started going to the gym every day instead.
quiz.nativeText: 哦不不，我只是最近每天都去健身房锻炼而已。
quiz.name: bedd2a158b27f94ffed9b78f3f4e5a88.mp3

quiz.text: It's really paid off. But I'm just too lazy myself. Maybe I should join you sometime.
quiz.nativeText: 看来你的锻炼相当有成效。但我就是太懒了。或许我哪天该和你一起去健身房。
quiz.name: 111d9437b555705ebe1a00432e7d87ed.mp3

quiz.text: Cool. Let's slim down for summer!
quiz.nativeText: 真棒。让我们一起在夏天来临前成功瘦身吧！
quiz.name: 2810b2356d2bb09c6b4317843a66c37b.mp3

quiz.text: Hey, would you like to watch the new Captain America movie with me this Friday?
quiz.nativeText: 嘿，你愿意周五陪我去电影院看美国队长电影吗？
quiz.name: e4e124d2f60bea79df40eb03b04b398a.mp3

quiz.text: Actually, I have watched it already. I went to the premiere.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上，我已经看过这部电影了。我去看的首映。
quiz.name: bc9e016e4eb0abb69eacb37b83f59c91.mp3

quiz.text: Cool. It must be so much fun to watch the movie before everyone else does.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，抢鲜看电影的感觉一定很有趣。
quiz.name: 6d82ed4f76a59e2b19b57fd55d3dd9c0.mp3

quiz.text: Definitely. It's quite a big-budget movie.
quiz.nativeText: 那当然。这真是部大制作电影。
quiz.name: 2cb99266cfd5eff8264777d3cd93e17a.mp3

quiz.text: What were your favorite parts of the movie?
quiz.nativeText: 你最喜欢电影的哪些部分？
quiz.name: 03b015a086057b4db71a068e1104772b.mp3

quiz.text: I liked its cast and soundtrack.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢它的演员阵容和配乐。
quiz.name: e9550691d655c396da6fbdf4dc4084d3.mp3

quiz.text: The cast is also what I've been looking forward to most. I'm a big fan of Chris Evans!
quiz.nativeText: 这部电影我最期待的也是卡司。我可是克里斯·埃文斯的铁粉呢！
quiz.name: d974cab754488c92fd7ed137b3f80ebf.mp3

quiz.text: Me too. And the fight scenes between Captain America and Iron Man were spectacular.
quiz.nativeText: 我也是呢。而且美队和钢铁侠之间的打斗场面相当壮观。
quiz.name: f4581c2e84add71e203c90ce0cb766b7.mp3

quiz.text: No spoilers, please!
quiz.nativeText: 别剧透！
quiz.name: e7225a5a4110a95f40bfad293708c3eb.mp3

quiz.text: Hah, you should watch it as soon as you have a chance.
quiz.nativeText: 哈哈，有机会赶紧去电影院看吧。
quiz.name: 1aa9bb2e06669c39834aecd34063d0f7.mp3

quiz.text: Did you watch the Super Bowl last night?
quiz.nativeText: 你看了昨晚的超级碗吗？
quiz.name: 90cbe037e08b5a006d8bb64c1be9f5ef.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. I bought a ticket and watched the big game at Levi's Stadium.
quiz.nativeText: 当然啦，我买了门票，在李维斯体育场看的现场。
quiz.name: 2f900404680fa756d098bbe8e57daafe.mp3

quiz.text: Cool. That must have been an unbelievable experience.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，现场看一定很棒。
quiz.name: 57da5d89887b24d3569cee4ffec42e30.mp3

quiz.text: Absolutely. It is the most wonderful game I've ever seen.
quiz.nativeText: 绝对的。这是我所看过的最精彩的比赛。
quiz.name: 18eaa019c2f95581d0a70131c9b6ae72.mp3

quiz.text: The Denver Broncos finally defeated the Carolina Panthers. What was the score again?
quiz.nativeText: 丹佛野马队最终打败了卡罗莱纳黑豹队。比分是多少来着？
quiz.name: ce47f02613bf85a5007251993027a4d7.mp3

quiz.text: Twenty four to ten.
quiz.nativeText: 二十四比十。
quiz.name: ca7fc639ed1420fad9afe46a1689e6c0.mp3

quiz.text: Right. What did you think of this year's commercials?
quiz.nativeText: 对对对。你觉得今年的广告都怎么样？
quiz.name: 70bf0b43cf6fea548cc14867b0b30cfc.mp3

quiz.text: I thought they were pretty creative and funny overall.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得总体来说还是很有趣、很有创意的。
quiz.name: 818b7ecddbcf61ce0369b28fc7e30d9e.mp3

quiz.text: The halftime show was also quite something.
quiz.nativeText: 中场秀也相当精彩。
quiz.name: 87e68a5126ec14eef9ff1f496376dedf.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. But I think Bruno Mars kind of stole the show. His performance was just perfect.
quiz.nativeText: 不过我觉得火星哥抢尽了风头。他的表演简直完美。
quiz.name: cd8858024a6d80f37ed5d6c068039d4a.mp3

quiz.text: Did you watch the Oscars last night?
quiz.nativeText: 昨晚看了奥斯卡颁奖礼吗？
quiz.name: 88f4a4ce95b19e9f3087d0f679709fdb.mp3

quiz.text: Not yet. I was busy with my term paper.
quiz.nativeText: 还没看呢。我昨晚在赶学期论文。
quiz.name: 9a9a810d87ea27dea3d10315ce2b509b.mp3

quiz.text: It was a wonderful night. And there's some unbelievable news!
quiz.nativeText: 昨晚的颁奖礼可精彩了呢。对了，还有一条爆炸性新闻！
quiz.name: fbbf83da04a5787ff6907039ed660b80.mp3

quiz.text: Wait, let me guess. Leonardo finally won Best Actor?
quiz.nativeText: 等等。让我猜猜。小李子获奖啦？
quiz.name: 1fbc70f131b54474c6b4b96872caea5b.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. He finally took home Best Actor for his role in his latest movie.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。他总算凭借其最新电影中的角色捧回了最佳男主角的奖杯。
quiz.name: 2cd1b3c88c771a8d38bfee4391f4b0af.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. He is really good in that movie. I would have been really surprised if he hadn't won an Oscar.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，他在影片中的表演相当出色。要是他没能捧得小金人那才叫人惊讶呢。
quiz.name: 67d4ae5c487e3ed755776ba149f6c4a4.mp3

quiz.text: He also gave quite an impressive acceptance speech.
quiz.nativeText: 他的获奖感言也令人印象深刻。
quiz.name: 20bb0aa8b15f6dea3b829b88a35ecb27.mp3

quiz.text: What did he say?
quiz.nativeText: 他说了什么？
quiz.name: 3792ad24b60ca1e4cf5739c69c19698a.mp3

quiz.text: He mentioned climate change and advocated for environmental protection.
quiz.nativeText: 他提到了气候变化，并倡导人们保护环境。
quiz.name: b3d099e97ca652fc0c827cf04c12292f.mp3

quiz.text: That sort of echoes the theme of the film, man's relationship with the natural world. Don't you think?
quiz.nativeText: 这倒是呼应了那部电影的主题，也就是人与自然的关系。你觉得呢？
quiz.name: c652dd06e77cc57412505fab44dd1a7a.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 疯狂的麦克斯：狂暴之路

quiz.text: Guess who was the biggest winner of the evening?
quiz.nativeText: 猜猜谁是当晚的最大赢家？
quiz.name: 4ccc51cf37ac21a745721e19213621e1.mp3

quiz.text: Um, I have no idea.
quiz.nativeText: 我不知道哎。
quiz.name: 9f3a571a17c36217880f505da2cc4e92.mp3

quiz.text: Fury Road took home six trophies altogether at this year's Oscars.
quiz.nativeText: 疯狂的麦克斯：狂暴之路在今年的奥斯卡颁奖礼中共获得六个奖项。
quiz.name: 014829a70a984d174e71ef6ba7389da4.mp3

quiz.text: That's incredible! I should take some time to watch it.
quiz.nativeText: 真是难以置信！我应该尽快找个时间看看这部电影。
quiz.name: 7b3e07b192fbdc3753fdb8071a2a309d.mp3

quiz.text: There were upsets as well as surprises, however.
quiz.nativeText: 然而，除了惊喜，本届奥斯卡还是有一些爆冷。
quiz.name: b04121aa549308d04f68e325b3e4b477.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you say that?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么这么说？
quiz.name: df710a638971b137a07e1b7ad17a64c2.mp3

quiz.text: The film "Spotlight" pulled off an upset, winning Best Picture against many other strong competitors.
quiz.nativeText: 电影《聚焦》击败众多强劲对手《大空头》，爆冷拿下了最佳影片奖。
quiz.name: 5e83d23c5b6091b566c5099e0cbbd858.mp3

quiz.text: I don't think it's an upset. The film deserves an Oscar.
quiz.nativeText: 我倒不觉得有什么爆冷。这电影值得一座小金人。
quiz.name: d41651eff747ae6862787f9fa3cd5b5d.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any plans for Thanksgiving Day?
quiz.nativeText: 感恩节有什么计划吗？
quiz.name: 8328d0e9baab1ed872d1cb672bc96a29.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to invite you over to have dinner with my family if you're interested.
quiz.nativeText: 如果你有兴趣，我想邀请你来我们家一起享受节日的大餐。
quiz.name: f0b94ab49f1292874b1ed45b488c97c3.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, really? You don't celebrate Thanksgiving in China, right?
quiz.nativeText: 哦是吗？在中国没有过感恩节的传统，是吧？
quiz.name: 6449c0ce3a03c20e4ec15efb88eebbf0.mp3

quiz.text: That's right. Could you tell me some of your family's Thanksgiving traditions?
quiz.nativeText: 是的呢。你能跟我说说你们家感恩节的一些传统吗？
quiz.name: 7eaa50bb2620340c1aa5957e3106d01a.mp3

quiz.text: Well, Thanksgiving dinner is an important tradition. The entire family enjoys a hearty meal.
quiz.nativeText: 家庭大餐是一个重要传统。我们全家享受一顿丰盛的晚餐。
quiz.name: f64ebdc284de94e9e1753e142711b906.mp3

quiz.text: What do you normally eat for the dinner?
quiz.nativeText: 那你们一般都吃什么？
quiz.name: c5af20ddea898856a9c6249f1bce2820.mp3

quiz.text: Roast turkey and pumpkin pie are our favorites.
quiz.nativeText: 烤火鸡和南瓜派是我们的最爱。
quiz.name: 5faee378f799c731b8db80474cda8b49.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds delicious. Are there any other activities?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来很美味。你们还有其他活动吗？
quiz.name: bb1d7e7d8f813a70daea7e4ccb0a3f1a.mp3

quiz.text: Certainly. Volunteering at a local community center is also part of our family's Thanksgiving traditions.
quiz.nativeText: 当然有了。我们家过感恩节还有一个习俗，就是去当地的社区中心做志愿活动。
quiz.name: f5ef2a15edaeb01af15456567b95758b.mp3

quiz.text: Cool. What do you do exactly?
quiz.nativeText: 真酷。你们具体做什么呢？
quiz.name: bbd2328d7ed0c026b13fc5879d371dd6.mp3

quiz.text: We might deliver meals to the homeless and senior citizens.
quiz.nativeText: 我们会给那些无家可归者和老年人送去食物。
quiz.name: 2cf8e44cd59b2cbdca2ab4492aa3882b.mp3

quiz.text: It's definitely a good way to show our gratitude.
quiz.nativeText: 这绝对是我们表达感恩之情的好方式。
quiz.name: 9ef1bda8be9b4d055ffcc18e043620e8.mp3

learnText: 长元音。发音时，舌身后缩，舌后部尽量向软腭抬起，双唇收圆并突出。

quiz.text: A man sat down in the room and said to his Rabbi,
quiz.nativeText: 一个男子去见他的牧师并对他说:
quiz.hilitText: A man sat down in the {#*room*$} and said {#*to*$} his Rabbi,
quiz.ipa: ə mæn sæt daʊn ɪn ðə r{#*u*$}m ænd sɛd t{#*u*$} hɪz ræbaɪ
quiz.name: e17446aa5d419516507a165ccf06c934.mp3

quiz.text: But I want to get better pay, to tell you the truth.
quiz.nativeText: 不过，说实话，我想获得更优厚的报酬。
quiz.hilitText: But I want {#*to*$} get better pay, {#*to*$} tell {#*you*$} the {#*truth*$}.
quiz.ipa: t{#*u*$} tɛl j{#*u*$} ði tr{#*u*$}θ ɪt wɪl dʒʌst fil lɔŋɡɝ
quiz.name: 9421887030c5d23dd12392d0b4dda82f.mp3

quiz.text: A man sat down in the room and said to his Rabbi,
quiz.nativeText: 一个男子去见他的牧师并对他说：
quiz.hilitText: A man sat down in the {#*room*$} and said {#*to*$} his Rabbi,
quiz.ipa: ə mæn sæt daʊn ɪn ðə r{#*u*$}m ænd sɛd t{#*u*$} hɪz ræbaɪ
quiz.name: e17446aa5d419516507a165ccf06c934.mp3

quiz.text: "Rabbi, if I give up drinking and dating beautiful women in the future
quiz.nativeText: “牧师，如果我以后不再酗酒，不再整日约会美女，
quiz.hilitText: "Rabbi, if I give up drinking and dating {#*beautiful*$} women in the {#*future*$}
quiz.ipa: ræbaɪ ɪf aɪ ɡɪv ʌp drɪŋkɪŋ ænd deɪtɪŋ bj{#*u*$}təfəl wɪmən ɪn ðə fj{#*u*$}tʃɝ
quiz.name: c4898a8eec92fcb1f4a00f901321f128.mp3

quiz.text: and start eating healthy food instead, will I live longer?"
quiz.nativeText: 并且开始健康饮食，我能活得久一些吗？”
quiz.hilitText: and start eating healthy {#*food*$} instead, will I live longer?"
quiz.ipa: ənd stɑrt itɪŋ hɛlθi f{#*u*$}d ɪnstɛd wɪl aɪ lɪv lɔŋɡɝ
quiz.name: a862e5936931e6e8a40380f3d1840a5a.mp3

quiz.text: "No", the Rabbi replied,
quiz.nativeText: “不能”，牧师回答说，
quiz.name: d493764dbcf0527fcd4755d11e2172e2.mp3

quiz.text: "To tell you the truth, it will just feel longer."
quiz.nativeText: “实话告诉你，那样你只会感觉到日子更漫长。”
quiz.hilitText: "{#*To*$} tell {#*you*$} the {#*truth*$}, it will just feel longer."
quiz.ipa: t{#*u*$} tɛl j{#*u*$} ði tr{#*u*$}θ ɪt wɪl dʒʌst fil lɔŋɡɝ
quiz.name: fee126ebe90525ccada692c4493f952a.mp3

learnText: 由[e]音滑向[ɪ]音，前音较长较饱满，后音较短较轻。发音过程中下颚和下唇向上移动，舌位也随之抬高。

quiz.nativeText: 支付
quiz.name: c1abfa9d87a9a00497018676957f924f.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 下雨
quiz.name: d7e2f2aa12a4e55b15dac50965e7eac4.mp3

quiz.text: change
quiz.nativeText: 改变
quiz.name: 421cfd143e450c3f5814a0495409e073.mp3

quiz.text: labor
quiz.nativeText: 劳动
quiz.name: 42ffb6a6a0a731f762ccba6b82c1e86a.mp3

name: eɪ

learningItem.nativeText: 橱窗购物 只看不买

quiz.text: Hi, Jim! Why don't we go shopping this weekend?
quiz.nativeText: 吉姆, 周末一起去逛街啊？
quiz.name: e672eec9a78660990ab7e8a16ebc74ea.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, sure! I can't wait to go!
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以，我都迫不及待了。
quiz.name: ff614bc0fb17469eae49b4e152a8d950.mp3

quiz.text: Let's just window shop. That'll save us a lot of money.
quiz.nativeText: 我们只逛不买吧，这样还能省些钱。
quiz.name: 8251de01a0f06c44a682f734336bd9b8.mp3

quiz.text: Come on, there's a big sale at the mall this weekend.
quiz.nativeText: 那怎么成！周末商场还有大促销。
quiz.name: 7520899b668fdcef40fbc824d34cb1a7.mp3

quiz.text: All right, but don't ask for my help when you go flat broke.
quiz.nativeText: 那好吧，不过你没钱的时候可别来找我
quiz.name: 7bd62189c30476196b22589081438b5a.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, sweetheart, I know you're not a fair-weather friend.
quiz.nativeText: 哦，亲爱的，我知道你不是那种不能共患难的朋友
quiz.name: 9dd0af26a70112fd9b38130b86ed34fc.mp3

quiz.text: pay
quiz.nativeText: 支付
quiz.name: c1abfa9d87a9a00497018676957f924f.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 下雨
quiz.name: d7e2f2aa12a4e55b15dac50965e7eac4.mp3

quiz.text: climate change
quiz.nativeText: 气候变化
quiz.name: 2da3a4a0ba4b2dc38e32564dffa66fbc.mp3

quiz.text: Labor Day
quiz.nativeText: 劳动节
quiz.name: 4ea76319c952635fa930c8f2bdc1416f.mp3

quiz.text: One rainy day, in a Catholic school cafeteria,
quiz.nativeText: 雨天里，在一个天主教学校的咖啡厅，
quiz.hilitText: One {#*rainy*$} {#*day*$}, in a Catholic school cafeteria,
quiz.ipa: wʌn r{#*eɪ*$}ni d{#*eɪ*$} ɪn ə kæθlɪk skul kæfətɪriə
quiz.name: e05e73b3ba45acf8b67ebe737e27052e.mp3

quiz.text: An eight-year-old boy made his own note,
quiz.nativeText: 一个八岁的小男孩自己写下了字条，
quiz.ipa: æn {#*eɪ*$}t jɪr oʊld bɔɪ m{#*eɪ*$}d hɪz oʊn noʊt
quiz.name: 808d7ae719f3b05a7eee7d39f91a49ee.mp3

quiz.text: One rainy day, in a Catholic school cafeteria,
quiz.nativeText: 雨天里，在一个天主教学校的咖啡厅，
quiz.hilitText: One {#*rainy*$} {#*day*$}, in a Catholic school cafeteria,
quiz.ipa: wʌn r{#*eɪ*$}ni d{#*eɪ*$} ɪn ə kæθlɪk skul kæfətɪriə
quiz.name: e05e73b3ba45acf8b67ebe737e27052e.mp3

quiz.text: a nun named Aileen placed a note in front of a pile of apples,
quiz.nativeText: 一个名叫艾琳的修女在一堆苹果前放了一张字条，
quiz.hilitText: a nun {#*named*$} Aileen {#*placed*$} a note in front of a pile of apples,
quiz.ipa: ə nʌn n{#*eɪ*$}md aɪlin pl{#*eɪ*$}st ə noʊt ɪn frʌnt ʌv ə paɪl ʌv æpəlz
quiz.name: 2dcbf853bb5a7b06c27981701ab0b3cd.mp3

quiz.text: "Take only one. God is watching."
quiz.nativeText: “只拿一个，上帝在看着。”
quiz.ipa: t{#*eɪ*$}k oʊnli wʌn ɡɑd ɪz wɑtʃɪŋ
quiz.name: 7ef927553ae0fe48a6832af5c3b7901e.mp3

quiz.text: Further down the line, there was a pile of cookies.
quiz.nativeText: 在另一处，那里有一堆饼干。”
quiz.hilitText: Further down the line, there was a pile of cookies.
quiz.ipa: fɝðɝ daʊn ðə laɪn ðɛr wɑz ə paɪl ʌv kʊkiz
quiz.name: 54cbc80434e99572f4c39d37055eb4c4.mp3

quiz.text: An eight-year-old boy made his own note,
quiz.nativeText: 一个八岁的小男孩自己写下了字条，
quiz.ipa: æn {#*eɪ*$}t jɪr oʊld bɔɪ m{#*eɪ*$}d hɪz oʊn noʊt
quiz.name: 808d7ae719f3b05a7eee7d39f91a49ee.mp3

quiz.text: "Take all you want. God is watching the apples."
quiz.nativeText: “随便拿，上帝在看着那些苹果。”
quiz.hilitText: "{#*Take*$} all you want. God is watching the apples."
quiz.ipa: t{#*eɪ*$}k ɔl ju wɔnt ɡɑd ɪz wɑtʃɪŋ ði æpəlz
quiz.name: f6983ebc620078eb1ed8f976eeedba6c.mp3

quiz.text: Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 很高兴为您服务。
quiz.name: fe83ecdae8eb4d17855a3b437ccbf86b.mp3

quiz.text: How much is this blouse?
quiz.nativeText: 这件衬衫多少钱？
quiz.name: f4d0d4192d797c1966d84bb765c7bc10.mp3

quiz.text: The price is on the price tag. The one in your hand is three hundred dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 价格标在价签上,您手中的这件是三百美元。
quiz.name: a469b7f6dbd5be3abe04601959a61b18.mp3

quiz.text: That's too expensive!
quiz.nativeText: 太贵了！
quiz.name: e88d2e59a9521f670b13885fbc60a04a.mp3

quiz.text: How about this one? It costs ten percent less than that one.
quiz.nativeText: 这一件价格比那件低百分之十,您觉得怎么样？
quiz.name: adde5b7cc59596b4b4bc16165150d4ad.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any cheaper ones?
quiz.nativeText: 你这还有再便宜些的么？
quiz.name: 465878004a6300bfa52d03c842305923.mp3

quiz.text: Well, do you mind telling me how much you expect to spend?
quiz.nativeText: 您的目标价位是多少呢？
quiz.name: 0c000bc3fe09ab8b550f7850efc0d6ce.mp3

quiz.text: My price range is within two hundred dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要低于两百美元的。
quiz.name: 507dbdc6e3e76b6e235873a767840c60.mp3

quiz.text: I see. I'm sure there must be one that suits your budget. Let me check.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。一定有合适您的,请让我帮您查一下。
quiz.name: 204f3794481f8172765ef09502c0bfcd.mp3

quiz.text: I really appreciate that!
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢！
quiz.name: df7b7c618d842f8f770877757e96aaf8.mp3

quiz.text: Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 很高兴为您服务。
quiz.name: fe83ecdae8eb4d17855a3b437ccbf86b.mp3

quiz.text: I want to buy a pair of jeans.
quiz.nativeText: 我想买一条牛仔裤。
quiz.name: 5284a2b2f4c40d0d66b0e2c89a3f8341.mp3

quiz.text: OK, this one only costs two hundred dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，这一条只要两百美元哦！
quiz.name: b7a3f01f69ee111a51f3307f86812922.mp3

quiz.text: Is that a discount price?
quiz.nativeText: 这是折扣价么？
quiz.name: ae13239b8cb21d57b3e3badb87ae0c87.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. All the jeans here are ten percent off.
quiz.nativeText: 当然是折扣价，现场所有的牛仔裤都九折出售。
quiz.name: 1451ec687b586907a25da3aa81041fcc.mp3

quiz.text: I was wondering if the price is still negotiable.
quiz.nativeText: 我想知道价格还可谈么？
quiz.name: 2c083726efb2b5fe9c2dfc3e9fa8c952.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry, ma'am, that is the best we can offer.
quiz.nativeText: 实在不好意思，已经是我们的最优惠价格了。
quiz.name: f8ac1095bd290707d6ed41fecfeddfb2.mp3

quiz.text: Can you knock off another ten percent on this one?
quiz.nativeText: 这条裤子能给我再便宜一折么？
quiz.name: 2618548d72ff2b51fb2dd5b9f646f247.mp3

quiz.text: Ma'am, these are rock-bottom prices given the quality and workmanship of the jeans.
quiz.nativeText: 女士，您看这质量和工艺，真的已经是最低价了。
quiz.name: a86b58f9d633f46708f9c19a85985782.mp3

quiz.text: In that case, I'll just have to look around in the next shop.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，既然这样，我再到别家看看吧。
quiz.name: b58a3bb5ce7b94c43c832539f886743c.mp3

quiz.text: Ok, ma'am, I can offer you another ten percent discount if you pay in cash.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，再给您低一折，但一定要现金支付哦。
quiz.name: ca52c56ce27347a5c47fd06ea0d4e220.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'll take them.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我就买了。
quiz.name: e1a0c71c4d0482713e44ec33b074fe05.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, Sir, what can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 您好，先生，有什么需要为您效劳的？
quiz.name: 21091bdf917bb2e95aaf410ccf3bc116.mp3

quiz.text: I want to have these things bagged up.
quiz.nativeText: 请帮我打包一下。
quiz.name: 95090fe43e18c9dcbe096e3940232b7b.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want me to bag them up together?
quiz.nativeText: 需要把这些都放在一起装么？
quiz.name: e664c034dc1e21c67f0e2d7b3fbb0f94.mp3

quiz.text: No. I'd like the bananas bagged separately, and please don't wrap the bag too tight.
quiz.nativeText: 不，香蕉我要单拿，还有，请不要把袋子系得太紧。
quiz.name: 0d31b6c2fa33e813d74a39cc53edf26c.mp3

quiz.text: OK, Sir! Do you need me to deliver the microwave oven to your home for you?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，先生，您还需要我们把微波炉配送到您家么？
quiz.name: 48582eeb2b6db6a4692b21b2887e2a4d.mp3

quiz.text: Please deliver it for me. How much do you charge for the delivery?
quiz.nativeText: 请帮我配送吧，配送费用是多少？
quiz.name: c1c3995f38813c51d815a58d46724651.mp3

quiz.text: We offer free delivery service within twenty kilometers of our shop.
quiz.nativeText: 二十公里范围内我们提供免费服务。
quiz.name: 454986bba846659c0288bd833c0facb4.mp3

quiz.text: Good! How long will the delivery take?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那配送需要多久呢？
quiz.name: c6fc53757568ba75ff90df8eadf8edc6.mp3

quiz.text: Usually it will take less than one day. It'll be even quicker if the delivery starts before noon.
quiz.nativeText: 一般情况下一天就可送达，如果上午开始配送的话会更快。
quiz.name: 561c3121f28d42523ccc58e0369c3083.mp3

quiz.text: Please be careful during the delivery.
quiz.nativeText: 配送过程一定要注意货品安全。
quiz.name: 6b2da8aa88f445e582a1dc7647911b8b.mp3

quiz.text: Will do, Sir. Could you fill out this form with your address and personal information, please?
quiz.nativeText: 我们一定会注意的，先生。请您填一下地址和个人信息。
quiz.name: 13c3e358858a472a25d7c64b1aa55b91.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Give me a minute.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。给我一分钟的时间。
quiz.name: 9572f02c3793d5366ce20846e3dbce26.mp3

quiz.text: May I help you, sir?
quiz.nativeText: 需要我为您效劳么？
quiz.name: ae1aeb1132a05fd53655401e13f5b6ec.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I've got a problem with the shirt I bought here.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我在这买的衬衫有质量问题。
quiz.name: 4b73a8174bd1173b4515033e7df50412.mp3

quiz.text: What's wrong with it?
quiz.nativeText: 出现什么问题了呢？
quiz.name: 5b30759c786488b856c1eccb72ad9e15.mp3

quiz.text: The color faded when I washed it for the first time.
quiz.nativeText: 我第一次洗就出现了掉色。
quiz.name: 10ca6254500ed5db6e48beb0799c208e.mp3

quiz.text: When did you buy it?
quiz.nativeText: 您是什么时候买的这件衬衫呢？
quiz.name: 01f59333568e98c9f3ce75584c92b4f9.mp3

quiz.text: I bought it last week, and I think it's still within the warranty period.
quiz.nativeText: 我是上周买的，我想应该还在质保期。
quiz.name: ae05a5a0dec064dddfca85476ef65067.mp3

quiz.text: OK, we can exchange it for you. Are you satisfied with this solution, sir?
quiz.nativeText: 这样的话我们可以为您调换，您看还满意么？
quiz.name: f970e102421b565772a9af4717dcaf79.mp3

quiz.text: No, I'd like a full refund for this shirt, since you have a money-back guarantee.
quiz.nativeText: 不满意，既然你们有退款保证，我要求全额退款。
quiz.name: c22c9a18723c37e4e6684483a8f06fc7.mp3

quiz.text: All right, sir. I'll get this done quickly for you.
quiz.nativeText: 好的， 我马上给您办理。
quiz.name: 7dc68a37b037301d343489bb3520469e.mp3

quiz.text: It's much appreciated!
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢！
quiz.name: eaa17ab461f14114f5dbc8d87b328378.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, my sister's birthday is coming; I want to buy her some clothes as a gift.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，我妹妹的生日就要到了，我想给她买些衣服作为礼物。
quiz.name: 68708d7c4aa8a3813a0de96a7c566d6b.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I see. How about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我明白了。这件怎么样？
quiz.name: 96619bf47620799411830502b7bd3e57.mp3

quiz.text: Is that a dress?
quiz.nativeText: 那是连衣裙么？
quiz.name: 07e9aee026574c3707b0aefe07b9d96a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, it is a dress.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，这是一件连衣裙。
quiz.name: e89d95ad90ba285fddbeab574d5ad70a.mp3

quiz.text: No, I don't think she'll like it.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我觉得她不会喜欢的。
quiz.name: e588dd84d95fb9f14df695ade29ab0ff.mp3

quiz.text: Then what about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 那这件怎么样？
quiz.name: 4f74253b82f219659d386adeedaeb8d6.mp3

quiz.text: What is that?
quiz.nativeText: 那是什么？
quiz.name: 391c285bfa2525b3ffabcd063871258c.mp3

quiz.text: It is a T-shirt.
quiz.nativeText: 这是一件T恤衫。
quiz.name: 2da51a3df4fbaac71f9bc835871f1e06.mp3

quiz.text: I'll think about it. Do you have any shoes here?
quiz.nativeText: 我再考虑一下吧。你们这儿有鞋子么？
quiz.name: 73efa7e140f4abeecd8070f2fd212ec4.mp3

quiz.text: The shoes are on your right.
quiz.nativeText: 鞋子在您的右手边。
quiz.name: a85f0146f4f035b59a7dd0b23f8c8b4c.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I found them. What is this?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我看到了。这是什么？
quiz.name: 964165f2ad588ac0f8d0027514f8501e.mp3

quiz.text: It's a pair of high heels.
quiz.nativeText: 这是一双高跟鞋。
quiz.name: 824befc75dac55511089601c6223c02e.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, I'll get these for her.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，我就给她买这个吧。
quiz.name: 0d3c4d6dc15c0ac14a8f689d7e6024d3.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sure she will like them.
quiz.nativeText: 我敢肯定她一定会喜欢的。
quiz.name: 0e3fec4aab29e1f3c8ee95ede2589d73.mp3

quiz.text: Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 有什么能帮您的么？
quiz.name: fe83ecdae8eb4d17855a3b437ccbf86b.mp3

quiz.text: How much is this T-shirt?
quiz.nativeText: 这件T恤衫多少钱？
quiz.name: 277a27c772247295efa50da6a26693d3.mp3

quiz.text: It's sixty dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 六十美元。
quiz.name: ba97384ffe0415ec6ec6beea333d6c82.mp3

quiz.text: That's too expensive.
quiz.nativeText: 那太贵了！
quiz.name: 4081ec6c1de2ffba2251223b40faa50e.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like this one? It's much cheaper.
quiz.nativeText: 那您喜欢这件么？这件便宜很多。
quiz.name: 1b9059f37eacc0b8e0a449675e5cc3e4.mp3

quiz.text: How much does it cost?
quiz.nativeText: 这件多少钱？
quiz.name: 7d57599a0310014f5d2fff6651c06d32.mp3

quiz.text: Just forty five dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 只要四十五美元。
quiz.name: 69c6f049b3cc3bd3038314aa6f19b0ff.mp3

quiz.text: Can you make it forty?
quiz.nativeText: 四十美元可以么？
quiz.name: 33214da097f23bfdd117a4528b0d7a4b.mp3

quiz.text: OK, it's a deal.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，成交。
quiz.name: 5ff62a868a01307aa8199cb795879616.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 太感谢啦！
quiz.name: 1f33d36ccb6b37e6d20351f841fb1d4f.mp3

quiz.text: Hey you! Give me the ball.
quiz.name: c4c524bb282437d984e4ceca3adb2361.mp3

quiz.text: I want to play too.
quiz.name: 9ffd644fdc906d9a34c6067b8fc32d3e.mp3

quiz.text: You are a bit rude.
quiz.name: 16d3225f904eecf3745688add9336600.mp3

quiz.text: We don't want to play with you.
quiz.name: cab2ed14c1cd4d8d97ded89eb742d11c.mp3

quiz.text: Mom, why don't they want to play with me?
quiz.name: d0aee3f6bbe859d5185bce5331ce052d.mp3

quiz.text: Come over here, Mike.
quiz.name: 460a3014c206ff8aa8228b950a38d0e1.mp3

quiz.text: Let me tell you a story.
quiz.name: 0f992647c4eeb28a3b96ca96d6f2e716.mp3

quiz.text: One day Mr Wind and Miss Sun are chatting in the sky.
quiz.name: 42105bce42d92cc824f636a5f8612397.mp3

quiz.text: 'I'm strong. I can do anything.' says Mr Wind.
quiz.name: 1cff446be591adac64d6cc94b3f30dce.mp3

quiz.text: 'Can you see the man and the little girl down there?'
quiz.name: a57dfff136d5659a7838752dd4c127d7.mp3

quiz.text: I can blow their clothes off.
quiz.name: c466bcb735d6439ed91bc0feb12e5e5d.mp3

quiz.text: 'Watch me!' Mr Wind blows hard.
quiz.name: 24ceaf40cee7c5e0a4a29940902e1e37.mp3

quiz.text: Hi! What are you doing here in the park at five in the morning?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，才早上五点，你在公园做什么呢？
quiz.name: 8ab3345577c1102a7d25b8eb33a79c14.mp3

quiz.text: I am exercising.
quiz.nativeText: 我在锻炼。
quiz.name: e3e6f1da0cd206cf1e858bfb35fd8542.mp3

quiz.text: Good for you! What exercises have you done?
quiz.nativeText: 棒棒嗒！你都做哪些运动啦？
quiz.name: 9f68fdbd1273f51ddc2176e03f57e880.mp3

quiz.text: At first, I did some warm-up exercises.
quiz.nativeText: 一开始，我做了一些热身运动。
quiz.name: 651ae45391e051a36a02e48be5a6c1e0.mp3

quiz.text: Wise choice! What exercises did you do after the warm-up?
quiz.nativeText: 明智！热身之后又做什么了？
quiz.name: f2fe29f0af096679d59df1d476c6cb44.mp3

quiz.text: Then I jogged for half an hour.
quiz.nativeText: 我又慢跑了半个小时。
quiz.name: d934be2abe11267133af998fac20500f.mp3

quiz.text: Did you do anything to build your muscles?
quiz.nativeText: 你没有锻炼一下肌肉么？
quiz.name: 8aa1515624cc21564483ebdcbac62e2f.mp3

quiz.text: Of course! I did twenty pull ups.
quiz.nativeText: 当然有，我做了二十个引体向上。
quiz.name: 0c1fb97803f7b3090197d583631f418b.mp3

quiz.text: Awesome! I will join you tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 好厉害！明天咱们一起吧！
quiz.name: 0140cbe7d277e188b703ae804c6c39a1.mp3

quiz.text: Great! See you tomorrow!
quiz.nativeText: 好的，明天见！
quiz.name: 508fd9f950aed0bb41137cfe7b14a095.mp3

learnText: 发音时，双唇由扁到略为收圆。由[o]音滑向[ʊ]音，但不到[ʊ]就停止发音。

quiz.text: nose
quiz.nativeText: 鼻子
quiz.name: cb01e43a4cae492bdd0dac857257c2d6.mp3

quiz.text: told
quiz.nativeText: 告诉
quiz.name: a9320ba41467b990fb4269e4d9d7a238.mp3

quiz.text: show
quiz.nativeText: 表演
quiz.name: c34fbad9a5e2a1d0c8f7cf8d226808b9.mp3

quiz.text: home
quiz.nativeText: 家
quiz.name: 710533dd879dd1202e5c73b27705bf02.mp3

name: oʊ

quiz.text: Hello, welcome to MS club! Would you like me to offer you a guided tour of our club?
quiz.nativeText: 您好,欢迎来到MS健身中心！需要我带您参观一下么？
quiz.name: 01c48123ada41066f396bb64b0d05ac8.mp3

quiz.text: Hello! I want to know some information about the club.
quiz.nativeText: 你好,我想了解一下健身中心？
quiz.name: e39223495826a22924d751e21b5be747.mp3

quiz.text: OK, we've got a wide range of facilities in the club, including a great swimming pool.
quiz.nativeText: 好的,我们的健身设施齐全,还包括一个很棒的游泳池
quiz.name: 66743f46147c3092d641ded21af739f6.mp3

quiz.text: Is it an indoor pool or an outdoor pool?
quiz.nativeText: 游泳池是室内还是室外的呢？
quiz.name: 86c588b83dd10c8b20d6f2da6ea90e64.mp3

quiz.text: It's actually an indoor pool.
quiz.nativeText: 我们提供的是室内泳池
quiz.name: 0ea35422f52e43d31d532141de2d9931.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I like outdoor pools better.
quiz.nativeText: 我更喜欢户外游泳池。
quiz.name: b806972e50b8691258e30ff3a3466830.mp3

quiz.text: Our pool has a retractable glass roof, so you won't be disappointed.
quiz.nativeText: 我们的泳池有可收缩玻璃顶棚,所以您不会失望的。
quiz.name: 973516a9936852d7d54c724c9e444990.mp3

quiz.text: That really tickles my fancy!
quiz.nativeText: 这真令我很满意。
quiz.name: bfcfe862c50fd0e42bd889dc83ec5c00.mp3

quiz.text: Well, we also provide swimming classes here, and you're welcome to join us.
quiz.nativeText: 我们这里还有游泳培训班,欢迎您加入。
quiz.name: 49768461e136ad53a537bfc02f581547.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you! I will think it over.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢,我再考虑一下。
quiz.name: 5425d996b3ed7243f95893f51e6d3ac1.mp3

quiz.text: nose
quiz.nativeText: 鼻子
quiz.name: cb01e43a4cae492bdd0dac857257c2d6.mp3

quiz.text: told
quiz.nativeText: 告诉
quiz.name: a9320ba41467b990fb4269e4d9d7a238.mp3

quiz.text: show off
quiz.nativeText: 炫耀
quiz.name: 48c6401ef90397a4a81cd7cb71104286.mp3

quiz.text: at home
quiz.nativeText: 在家
quiz.name: 533e8be92a37a89806d8e66608c5e8b6.mp3

quiz.text: Communication is truth; communication is openness.
quiz.nativeText: 沟通是真理，沟通是开放的态度。
quiz.name: a5a81dacfedd82e37c4b72279ed351eb.mp3

quiz.text: To share is our duty; to go down boldly and bring to light hidden thoughts;
quiz.nativeText: 分享是我们的责任，去挖掘并揭露那些深藏的思想，
quiz.hilitText: To share is our duty; to {#*go*$} down {#*boldly*$} and bring to light hidden thoughts;
quiz.ipa: tu h{#*oʊ*$}ld bæk nʌθɪŋ tɪ pritɛnd nʌθɪŋ
quiz.name: cfaf043483fd2aed06b77fd00b0484a2.mp3

quiz.text: Hi! It looks like you've been putting on weight this last month.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，一个月没见，你胖了不少哦！
quiz.name: d951999703e22f06a8a5966084c70a4e.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I'm getting pretty chubby, I need to lose a few pounds.
quiz.nativeText: 啊,我确实更胖乎了,我得瘦一点。
quiz.name: fb86f2c6c8e0f4ab18b9596bfe38b81a.mp3

quiz.text: Have you been eating too much recently?
quiz.nativeText: 你最近吃的很多么？
quiz.name: ae238a582afb018a7da3aff140bc4859.mp3

quiz.text: I think so. I've been having fast food every day.
quiz.nativeText: 应该是吧,我每天都吃快餐。
quiz.name: 38a36d9259c964a070455afa1d01170b.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Do you exercise often?
quiz.nativeText: 原来是这样,那你经常运动么？
quiz.name: a59bc1ea825dfc28bc4587fc7b6f12ea.mp3

quiz.text: No. I have been leading a sedentary lifestyle.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我的生活方式以不运动为主。
quiz.name: b8b61a44fcdc817a65261987d3c2a099.mp3

quiz.text: I think it's time for you to lose some weight.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得你应该减减肥了。
quiz.name: 5dab58a450ae8a0abc8b960c28a7ab92.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. I have got to get rid of some weight.
quiz.nativeText: 同意,我要从现在做起, 甩掉赘肉。
quiz.name: a4ebbe22f5b17a9a50d8ba225233c58b.mp3

quiz.text: Communication is truth; communication is openness.
quiz.nativeText: 沟通是真理，沟通是开放的态度。
quiz.name: a5a81dacfedd82e37c4b72279ed351eb.mp3

quiz.text: To share is our duty; to go down boldly and bring to light hidden thoughts ;
quiz.nativeText: 分享是我们的责任，去挖掘并揭露那些深藏的思想，
quiz.hilitText: To share is our duty; to {#*go*$} down {#*boldly*$} and bring to light hidden thoughts ;
quiz.ipa: tɪ ʃɛr ɪz ɑr duti tu ɡ{#*oʊ*$} daʊn b{#*oʊ*$}ldli ænd brɪŋ tu laɪt hɪdən θɔts
quiz.name: 3ecf2efb522ea1578b0ddd7f16b2d328.mp3

quiz.text: to hold back nothing; to pretend nothing;
quiz.nativeText: 毫无保留地分享；
quiz.hilitText: to {#*hold*$} back nothing; to pretend nothing;
quiz.ipa: tu h{#*oʊ*$}ld bæk nʌθɪŋ tɪ pritɛnd nʌθɪŋ
quiz.name: 5719334608add867b7982e2878fa0dd5.mp3

quiz.text: if we are ignorant to say so; if we love our friends to let them know it.
quiz.nativeText: 如果我们足够单纯；如果我们足够爱我们朋友，从而愿意向他们敞开心扉。
quiz.hilitText: if we are ignorant to say {#*so*$}; if we love our friends to let them {#*know*$} it.
quiz.ipa: ɪf wi ɑr ɪɡnɝənt tu seɪ s{#*oʊ*$} ɪf wi lʌv aʊɝ frɛnz tɪ lɛt ðɛm n{#*oʊ*$} ɪt
quiz.name: 3b86c34beb79437a54c20417da4b36ef.mp3

quiz.text: Hello, allow me to show you our fitness room.
quiz.nativeText: 您好,让我带您参观一下健身房吧？
quiz.name: c0c47c695ba6e5c9e246b61c9db86c14.mp3

quiz.text: It's really big.
quiz.nativeText: 健身房好大啊！
quiz.name: 2ea906cd2698bf56987a4054f4ea237b.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, and we just upgraded the facilities here.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，而且我们刚刚升级了健身器械。
quiz.name: 02d3108925fdaea0cf95903fdabbccb6.mp3

quiz.text: I like the brand-new treadmills.
quiz.nativeText: 崭新的跑步机我很喜欢。
quiz.name: fb5db3e3e535c48659e6d1627c08f99b.mp3

quiz.text: We've also got weight machines.
quiz.nativeText: 我们还有力量训练器械。
quiz.name: 99e09e313950501b03bd693bc3245d45.mp3

quiz.text: Well, the cable machine and Smith machine are my favorites.
quiz.nativeText: 我最喜欢拉力器和斯密斯器械了。
quiz.name: 8575e73b2109e136bc42c7dabcbeef79.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like free weights?
quiz.nativeText: 您喜欢自由重量训练么？
quiz.name: 90dc20c91195fa7a055dd070bf916c8a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I often work out with dumbbells and barbells at home.
quiz.nativeText: 喜欢。我在家经常举哑铃和杠铃。
quiz.name: da9896a0ae7bc17328e8ad33e707d57d.mp3

quiz.text: Have you been working out recently?
quiz.nativeText: 你现在自己训练么？
quiz.name: f41198f4f2096cc7bd47028696a02dba.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I'm now also working on my abdominal muscles.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我现在也在锻炼腹肌。
quiz.name: 765a74e0cbf6a252cc18bcb2227ade61.mp3

quiz.text: Well, you've come to the right place.
quiz.nativeText: 那您真是来对地方了。
quiz.name: c963079a332a8e3fb8db243c040b5773.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I believe so.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，我想是的。
quiz.name: 84acdbba1ffe75e1c114e2fed7d7fcdb.mp3

quiz.text: What is that big thing?
quiz.nativeText: 那个庞然大物是什么啊？
quiz.name: b1832706add3af73fa1c90a51444ff55.mp3

quiz.text: It is a treadmill.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一台跑步机。
quiz.name: fb19e47444a5dc4ed44caa6bbf2baad4.mp3

quiz.text: What about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 那这个呢？
quiz.name: 96cdc502e42e9f5fefb5ef9705e2d26e.mp3

quiz.text: It is a barbell.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一架杠铃。
quiz.name: 884c2a22909c49e45346951ba74fc716.mp3

quiz.text: What are these?
quiz.nativeText: 那这些又是什么？
quiz.name: 495e1a7f1e9e597cccb4076c1f745c41.mp3

quiz.text: They are dumbbells.
quiz.nativeText: 那些是哑铃。
quiz.name: 296091720f1fcfe162e3214beb7ad3bf.mp3

quiz.text: Where is the cable machine?
quiz.nativeText: 拉力器在哪里？
quiz.name: 991dfede361a11c519ea848d15c6b446.mp3

quiz.text: It's next to the Smith machine.
quiz.nativeText: 就在史密斯器械的旁边。
quiz.name: bdb31ab0d28fe745ca40e93272d44e92.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, there are certainly a lot of different things at this gym.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，这家健身房里有好多不同的器械啊！
quiz.name: 5ce85a0c88baf4655c5bebff651e6db6.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, let's try some out.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我们来试试吧。
quiz.name: 88c43bfea763294c93e014b88a7cce69.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I've gained weight again.
quiz.nativeText: 哦，我又变胖了！
quiz.name: c017cfc74cdfc06a1a98a766a92de35e.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe you've been eating too much.
quiz.nativeText: 或许是你最近吃得太多了。
quiz.name: 9b21d6ef7b4d0ff4de2e515bb9704f73.mp3

quiz.text: I wish I could lose some weight.
quiz.nativeText: 我希望我能瘦一点儿。
quiz.name: d5f503a2aa43ccdee7b4da629ac167e8.mp3

quiz.text: You should go on a diet.
quiz.nativeText: 你应该节食。
quiz.name: 9dafbb7ca6502a59ed75da7228051977.mp3

quiz.text: I've tried that before, but it never worked.
quiz.nativeText: 我以前试过，但是根本不管用。
quiz.name: 44cda2778cb26b08efabddf21d50cdf8.mp3

quiz.text: Perhaps you should exercise more.
quiz.nativeText: 或许你应该多锻炼。
quiz.name: 642fef8a86d2c746001d556654034f37.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, maybe I should.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，或许是的。
quiz.name: 4053facd71e46763fa6613a56ced9d32.mp3

quiz.text: We can exercise together.
quiz.nativeText: 我们可以一起锻炼啊。
quiz.name: bdddf2d1a37bfa05a96ef5929263bb34.mp3

quiz.text: That's very kind of you.
quiz.nativeText: 你人真是太好了！
quiz.name: c2d2fb3f29f090c42574a254f1b76f23.mp3

quiz.text: No problem.
quiz.nativeText: 不用客气。
quiz.name: 9a03904cb50a587b822f6946dbc8266c.mp3

quiz.text: 'Dad, I feel cold,' says the girl.
quiz.name: a8ac39b4282dc3605348157c95c4b18a.mp3

quiz.text: 'Button up your coat, Milly.'
quiz.name: bc9ad3dd5abed3550a4d60a70331ca86.mp3

quiz.text: 'It's windy,' says her father.
quiz.name: 8b93a40a91f3defb5abd548953ed5a7e.mp3

quiz.text: At last Mr Wind gives up.
quiz.name: 401bf6129c824b699248554067eb4784.mp3

quiz.text: 'I can't do it,' he says to Miss Sun. 'You try.'
quiz.name: 44f640d6d4d6c6cde5f9c188c2c536bd.mp3

quiz.text: Miss Sun smiles warmly at the people.
quiz.name: 323231ccda1bb1fda323b788a2e7bdb1.mp3

quiz.text: 'It's warm and sunny now, Dad,' says the girl.
quiz.name: cb9490e4d361107289a36461ec8f700a.mp3

quiz.text: 'Let's take off our coats.'
quiz.name: 9a07ea080d01faf64eed862ef10d1da9.mp3

quiz.text: 'Thank you very much, Mum.' says Mike.
quiz.name: d57dfbd29df70a8ada3b92634e65c734.mp3

quiz.text: That's a nice little story.
quiz.name: a9566c1bd7f582147a2ead8cda7524d2.mp3

quiz.text: I know what to do now.
quiz.name: 1a055b6882496640e341415b222a380c.mp3

quiz.text: Welcome to my shop! What kind of flowers do you want to purchase for your family?
quiz.nativeText: 欢迎来到我的花园，你想给家人挑些什么花呢？
quiz.hilitText: Welcome to my shop! What kind of flowers do you want to purchase for your family?
quiz.ipa: wɛlkəm tu maɪ ʃɑp wʌt kaɪnd ʌv flaʊɝz du ju wɑnt tɪ pɝtʃəs frɝ jɔr fæmli
quiz.name: fbc4f9532d39194b08b3e180be37f24a.mp3

quiz.text: I would like a bouquet of carnations for my mother.
quiz.nativeText: 我想送我妈妈一束康乃馨。
quiz.hilitText: I would like a bouquet of carnations for my mother.
quiz.ipa: aɪ wʊd laɪk ə bukeɪ ʌv kɑrneɪʃənz frɝ maɪ mʌðɝ
quiz.name: 0687ca835b31a992bc97f2f970ab5392.mp3

quiz.text: Got it. So what's next?
quiz.nativeText: 知道了。接下来呢？
quiz.name: eba8ecc99ad1e860404cc8a51061a759.mp3

quiz.text: I would also like a bunch of red roses for my spouse.
quiz.nativeText: 我还想送我爱人一束玫瑰。
quiz.hilitText: I would also like a bunch of red roses for my spouse.
quiz.ipa: aɪ wʊd ɔlsoʊ laɪk ə bʌntʃ ʌv rɛd roʊzɪz frɝ maɪ spaʊs
quiz.name: 95d0c6aa1f88c3095e021b5806f8dd98.mp3

quiz.text: OK. And are there any other flowers here of your interest as well?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你还相中其它种类的花了么？
quiz.hilitText: OK. And are there any other flowers here of your interest as well?
quiz.ipa: oʊkeɪ ænd ɑr ðɛr ɛni ʌðɝ flaʊɝz hɪr ʌv jʊr ɪntrəst ɛz wɛl
quiz.name: e0469fe243689ff5ba03d951bcd26207.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I want some white lilies for my best friend.
quiz.nativeText: 我想送白百合给我最好的朋友。
quiz.hilitText: Yes, I want some white lilies for my best friend.
quiz.ipa: jɛs aɪ wɑnt sʌm waɪt lɪliz frɝ maɪ bɛst frɛnd
quiz.name: a5988373c497d5e8c68c76e032f59144.mp3

quiz.text: Right, lily is the symbol of friendship. And what do you plan to send to your grandparents?
quiz.nativeText: 不错，百合是友谊的象征。那你打算送外祖父祖母什么花呢？
quiz.hilitText: Right, lily is the symbol of friendship. And what do you plan to send to your grandparents?
quiz.ipa: raɪt lɪli ɪz ðə sɪmbəl ʌv frɛnʃɪp ænd hwtt du ju plæn tu sɛnd tu jɔr ɡrændpɛrənts
quiz.name: 5c260e126f2db27856e78c39f5b29336.mp3

quiz.text: Potted pine would definitely be my first choice.
quiz.nativeText: 松树盆栽一定是我的首选。
quiz.hilitText: Potted pine would definitely be my first choice.
quiz.ipa: pɑtɪd paɪn wʊd dɛfənətli bi maɪ fɝst tʃɔɪs
quiz.name: 1031e5c5d5e747fcb4e55f6cd8558e65.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, the symbol of longevity and wisdom. What have you prepared for yourself?
quiz.nativeText: 对哦，那是长寿和智慧的象征。你相好送给自己什么花了么？
quiz.hilitText: Yeah, the symbol of longevity and wisdom. What have you prepared for yourself?
quiz.ipa: jæ ðə sɪmbəl ʌv lɔndʒɛvəti ənd wɪzdəm wʌt hæv ju pripɛrd frɝ jɔrsɛlf
quiz.name: d152443369cfce9c73f43766a8e37195.mp3

quiz.text: Tulips are my favorite.
quiz.nativeText: 我最喜欢郁金香。
quiz.name: d06bbfa1e92e836c961cf9da7feb1693.mp3

quiz.text: May I ask why?
quiz.nativeText: 我能知道为什么吗？
quiz.name: b3746aa43197c399d0436346f5364943.mp3

quiz.text: Because the tulip stands for eternal love.
quiz.nativeText: 因为它代表永恒的爱。
quiz.hilitText: Because the tulip stands for eternal love.
quiz.ipa: bɪkɔz ðə tuləp stændz fɔr ɪtɝnəl lʌv
quiz.name: c1eb1e866b8bfb8b00413cce51394ba9.mp3

learnText: 发音时，口张开略圆，舌尖抵住下齿，舌位很低，舌前隆起。由[a]音滑向[ɪ]音，注意要将前音发饱满。

quiz.text: eye
quiz.nativeText: 眼睛
quiz.name: eaa2d12d8afc4f0e044064ec4770f054.mp3

quiz.text: tie
quiz.nativeText: 领带
quiz.name: 8eb6c56ba51924a4cf185ec29e22be22.mp3

quiz.text: Friday
quiz.nativeText: 星期五
quiz.name: 86fb6d343289267f3e9edb9b7403d936.mp3

quiz.text: title
quiz.nativeText: 标题
quiz.name: 6f9dccd85b2e0786c8d522045365eb48.mp3

name: aɪ

quiz.text: Could you tell me about these flowers?
quiz.nativeText: 你能为我介绍一下这些花么？
quiz.name: af7eaade3fcc47849805998f1d36b8b0.mp3

quiz.text: Of course.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。
quiz.name: 37223ff28a62f56f0690aad9164f440c.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of flower is this?
quiz.nativeText: 这是什么花？
quiz.name: e5517ef05b83713931491642e08900ce.mp3

quiz.text: It's a daisy.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一朵雏菊。
quiz.name: c39cd2f430abfeb40fc8bf5fc8597c96.mp3

quiz.text: What about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 那这朵呢？
quiz.name: 96cdc502e42e9f5fefb5ef9705e2d26e.mp3

quiz.text: That is a rose.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一朵玫瑰。
quiz.name: 408c0465bd40ad8521ac7d55b2bbeb1f.mp3

quiz.text: And the one next to it?
quiz.nativeText: 那玫瑰旁边的那朵呢？
quiz.name: 2e4bed2087235c741f444ffc069546c1.mp3

quiz.text: It's a lily.
quiz.nativeText: 那是一朵百合。
quiz.name: cc6e66dcd3a72826a60117069dc6d25b.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I know this one. It's a tulip.
quiz.nativeText: 哦我认识这个，这是一朵郁金香。
quiz.name: 00e289e00d4ec990a72e9999a4daf8a4.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, it is.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，它是。
quiz.name: 1cda95f887b53785d6a15fee6240a42c.mp3

quiz.text: Where are the carnations?
quiz.nativeText: 康乃馨在哪里？
quiz.name: a1fb8d832be7141d2d709f0f2e7906f5.mp3

quiz.text: Right over here.
quiz.nativeText: 就在这里。
quiz.name: 83c4deb85c4eaf9b3c5843fce95ec214.mp3

quiz.text: They are my favorite.
quiz.nativeText: 它们是我们的最爱。
quiz.name: f6406d64d32b242a810dbc5fa2cf47cd.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, a lot of people like carnations.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，很多人都喜欢康乃馨。
quiz.name: fcd29cfde23cf9e9ed2dfd41dfcf4f45.mp3

quiz.text: What is your hobby?
quiz.nativeText: 你的爱好是什么？
quiz.name: af02b12d594e6dba8ffdefeeaf5f4b4e.mp3

quiz.text: I like playing basketball. How about you?
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢打篮球，你呢？
quiz.name: f4a192b162112a44cc644727a8e615ae.mp3

quiz.text: I like playing football.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢踢足球。
quiz.name: 83a282541c39edc9aeb13fa86dc89d02.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like watching movies?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢看电影么？
quiz.name: 2880c1e7bf15eedde44af797a4dee5f2.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I do. Do you like reading?
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢啊。你喜欢读书么？
quiz.name: 2538b1a2546f1ff9e67bfdc364bf29ac.mp3

quiz.text: No, I think reading is very boring.
quiz.nativeText: 不喜欢，我觉得读书很无聊。
quiz.name: f60846078db1195ce5521c706202fb7c.mp3

quiz.text: If you say so. Sometimes I also play video games.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，如果你非要这么认为的话。有时候我也会玩电子游戏。
quiz.name: 4d6e463a020e38e5e5d784804c5c3965.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, me too.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我也是。
quiz.name: f81db94d2a652b5eb4f1cccef19bf5c4.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe we can play together someday.
quiz.nativeText: 或许我们改天可以一起玩。
quiz.name: b37d24993278d53cbcf28f3bcf98873d.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I love video games.
quiz.nativeText: 好啊，我喜欢电子游戏。
quiz.name: e047d72fbb3b0111c72b8522d298369e.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. How old is your dog?
quiz.nativeText: 吉姆，你的狗多大了？
quiz.name: ac2ed61100f5a5560de312033b04c19b.mp3

quiz.text: She is two years old.
quiz.nativeText: 她两岁了。
quiz.name: cdf9d99cc7d07186593477467de9c09f.mp3

quiz.text: I guess she's full grown by now.
quiz.nativeText: 我想她已经是一只成年狗了。
quiz.name: 373fc852925c3c0a75382036fdc6ac30.mp3

quiz.text: Yes.
quiz.nativeText: 是的
quiz.name: c0dbdeb8b01ee918d0b5c1b143bb8ee4.mp3

quiz.text: It must be tough to deal with. Has she been a mother before?
quiz.nativeText: 这个时候一定有很多麻烦吧。她之前做过妈妈么？
quiz.name: e6f584634a50dc05305ee1307b1473aa.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. She gave birth to a litter of five puppies, half a year ago.
quiz.nativeText: 做过。半年前她一窝生了五只幼崽。
quiz.name: 1447bb144654ce3e5cca8c79a8e94ce8.mp3

quiz.text: That's quite a task for a toy dog like her.
quiz.nativeText: 这对像她这的小型犬来说是个艰巨的任务啊。
quiz.name: fdf59a2a93a612144e5d11b1ef480e45.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. It took her a whole day to finish.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，她生了一天呢！
quiz.name: b42f474cf4f7e76376ca434693069a57.mp3

quiz.text: Have you considered having her neutered? A lot of people do.
quiz.nativeText: 你想过给她做绝育么？很多人都这样做了。
quiz.name: 0891a805388281ffb7465c04a0b9a2c1.mp3

quiz.text: Actually, I am planning to. Five puppies are enough for me.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上，我正打算这样做。五只小狗对我来说已经很多了。
quiz.name: b0375bcaae92b87c762f68d5509ff129.mp3

quiz.text: Welcome to my shop! What kind of flowers do you want to purchase for your family?
quiz.nativeText: 欢迎来到我的花园，你想给家人挑些什么花呢？
quiz.name: fbc4f9532d39194b08b3e180be37f24a.mp3

quiz.text: I would like a bouquet of carnations for my mother.
quiz.nativeText: 我想送我妈妈一束康乃馨。
quiz.name: 0687ca835b31a992bc97f2f970ab5392.mp3

quiz.text: Got it. So what's next?
quiz.nativeText: 知道了。接下来呢？
quiz.name: eba8ecc99ad1e860404cc8a51061a759.mp3

quiz.text: I would also like a bunch of red roses for my spouse.
quiz.nativeText: 我还想送我爱人一束玫瑰。
quiz.name: 95d0c6aa1f88c3095e021b5806f8dd98.mp3

quiz.text: OK. And are there any other flowers here of your interest as well?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你还相中其它种类的花了么？
quiz.name: e0469fe243689ff5ba03d951bcd26207.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I want some white lilies for my best friend.
quiz.nativeText: 我想送白百合给我最好的朋友。
quiz.name: a5988373c497d5e8c68c76e032f59144.mp3

quiz.text: Right, lily is the symbol of friendship. And what do you plan to send to your grandparents?
quiz.nativeText: 不错，百合是友谊的象征。那你打算送外祖父祖母什么花呢？
quiz.name: 5c260e126f2db27856e78c39f5b29336.mp3

quiz.text: Potted pine would definitely be my first choice.
quiz.nativeText: 松树盆栽一定是我的首选。
quiz.name: 1031e5c5d5e747fcb4e55f6cd8558e65.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, the symbol of longevity and wisdom. What have you prepared for yourself?
quiz.nativeText: 对哦，那是长寿和智慧的象征。你相好送给自己什么花了么？
quiz.name: d152443369cfce9c73f43766a8e37195.mp3

quiz.text: Tulips are my favorite.
quiz.nativeText: 我最喜欢郁金香。
quiz.name: d06bbfa1e92e836c961cf9da7feb1693.mp3

quiz.text: Hey, I heard you just got back from the national theater. What's on now?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨, 听说你刚从国家剧院回来,你看的什么剧啊？
quiz.name: 0f991fd4df8534621dec562878b96832.mp3

quiz.text: It's a musical.
quiz.nativeText: 是音乐剧。
quiz.name: 4893d21380ff750d666dbeca7e5a06c0.mp3

quiz.text: Did you enjoy it?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢那部剧么？
quiz.name: cf7745f637ecfd9a03d62052b8a6ae1d.mp3

quiz.text: Not very much! I still think that operas are better.
quiz.nativeText: 一般吧。我认为歌剧更好看一些。
quiz.name: a19ff25a02b6c79e18a96673082ab94e.mp3

quiz.text: I heard there will be a performance of a tragedy by Shakespeare this weekend. Do you want go with me?
quiz.nativeText: 我听说周末有莎士比亚的一部悲剧上映,一起去怎么样？
quiz.name: 062a609ae834585bd7aba42ff48ecf64.mp3

quiz.text: I'd rather go to see a comedy.
quiz.nativeText: 我还是更想看喜剧。
quiz.name: e1bfc98fdf8fcb3d2b374d3a9131893f.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I also booked two tickets to see Ellen's comedy routine.
quiz.nativeText: 刚好定了两张艾伦的喜剧表演。
quiz.name: 43c27a568fef9c83405bc418736b7b7e.mp3

quiz.text: Great. Ellen is my favorite comedian.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了！艾伦是我最喜欢的喜剧演员。
quiz.name: 253e98ef387c54ceae3ea8372dc1eb60.mp3

quiz.text: What do you like about her performance?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢她的节目的哪些方面呢？
quiz.name: 1cc245920be93d7cbe05313de98dda1d.mp3

quiz.text: I like the costumes, the scenery and the sound effects.
quiz.nativeText: 她节目的服装布景和音效我都喜欢！
quiz.name: a3631ddd4e66ea7cd724ba4eac45eaba.mp3

quiz.text: I hear Oprah Winfrey will also be starring in this show.
quiz.nativeText: 我还听说欧普拉还会出演这部剧。
quiz.name: 580260ab712facdfe074e7089e6567e4.mp3

quiz.text: That's really fantastic!
quiz.nativeText: 那太棒啦！
quiz.name: a3361d2fe6fc30c2c4807469c05d4d50.mp3

quiz.text: eye
quiz.nativeText: 眼睛
quiz.name: eaa2d12d8afc4f0e044064ec4770f054.mp3

quiz.text: tie
quiz.nativeText: 领带
quiz.name: 8eb6c56ba51924a4cf185ec29e22be22.mp3

quiz.text: on Friday
quiz.nativeText: 在星期五
quiz.name: 2fad48b82d021c6596dbc8a03bcd68c3.mp3

quiz.text: job title
quiz.nativeText: 职位名称
quiz.name: 763f96ee8ab7fd66d8d4e4a547025aee.mp3

quiz.text: God: Like one second.
quiz.nativeText: 上帝：像一秒钟。
quiz.name: 657a63b0720d1277644cc862fdb5ef2c.mp3

quiz.text: Mortal: Can I have a penny?
quiz.nativeText: 凡人：能给我一分钱吗？
quiz.name: fa681bec92974e26e79e70ddd22acbf9.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Do you enjoy angling?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你喜欢垂钓么？
quiz.name: 0185c426e70b559fcca7b1bb66cc0079.mp3

quiz.text: What's angling?
quiz.nativeText: 什么是垂钓？
quiz.name: 4899b21150276f3efd0d6ee0a2a0c4a9.mp3

quiz.text: I see you don't know much about it. Angling is just a kind of fishing.
quiz.nativeText: 看得出来，你不太了解垂钓。垂钓是一种捕鱼方法。
quiz.name: 5c80b3cc834f338d79e28a32e507d416.mp3

quiz.text: Then why didn't you just say fishing instead?
quiz.nativeText: 那为什么不直接说捕鱼呢？
quiz.name: 7429ff9283119f2599f9cb75e3023797.mp3

quiz.text: Because there are many techniques of catching fish. Angling is just one of them.
quiz.nativeText: 因为捕鱼方法有很多，垂钓只是其中一种。
quiz.name: 6a570be6d066f167f0ca9132fbf5e358.mp3

quiz.text: Can you tell me what angling is then?
quiz.nativeText: 那你现在能告诉我什么是垂钓了么？
quiz.name: 52d2d96872ea3ed591e89b073e8ca484.mp3

quiz.text: Angling is to fish using a hook, which is also called a fish hook.
quiz.nativeText: 垂钓就是用勾子也就是鱼钩捕鱼。
quiz.name: e7de306d6b2357900ea7f7ddf89a451c.mp3

quiz.text: I see. What other fishing methods are there?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了，那还有其它哪些捕鱼方法呢？
quiz.name: e57f20a2fee5df81005e3d3dcb6dcd45.mp3

quiz.text: Other fishing methods include hand fishing, spear fishing, net fishing, and trapping.
quiz.nativeText: 其它方法有徒手捕鱼，叉鱼，网捕，设陷阱捕鱼。
quiz.name: 25efafa929c62cbb5b16d1440c98bd4b.mp3

quiz.text: I think I can guess how they work from their names.
quiz.nativeText: 我想通过名字我就能猜出如何用这些方法捕鱼了。
quiz.name: 595f70b4bea77b6d587a2b9388fcdfca.mp3

quiz.text: So when we talk about fishing, we're usually referring to angling.
quiz.nativeText: 所以当我们谈捕鱼时，我们一般是指垂钓。
quiz.name: c593a8c3b11ce59ba1b2d52070d6b713.mp3

quiz.text: In that case, I am taking up fishing.
quiz.nativeText: 这样，我开始对垂钓感兴趣了。
quiz.name: 20c506b0af351579c7d8c9d9566a708c.mp3

quiz.text: Mortal: What is a million years like to you?
quiz.nativeText: 凡人：一百万年对你来说是什么？
quiz.hilitText: Mortal: What is a million years {#*like*$} to you?
quiz.ipa: mɔrtəl wʌt ɪz ə mɪljən jɪrz l{#*aɪ*$}k tu ju
quiz.name: 26afb34956e8d178808d0ceb33fe701c.mp3

quiz.text: God: Like one second.
quiz.nativeText: 上帝：像一秒钟。
quiz.name: 657a63b0720d1277644cc862fdb5ef2c.mp3

quiz.text: Mortal: What is a million dollars like to you?
quiz.nativeText: 凡人：一百万对你来说是什么？
quiz.hilitText: Mortal: What is a million dollars {#*like*$} to you?
quiz.ipa: mɔrtəl wʌt ɪz ə mɪljən dɑlɝz l{#*aɪ*$}k tu ju
quiz.name: 1fec4dbec02a8e810b8daa1aa6cb7744.mp3

quiz.text: God: Like one penny.
quiz.nativeText: 上帝：就像一分钱。
quiz.name: d5488acf12f9c7ea330114a3ec011efb.mp3

quiz.text: Mortal: Can I have a penny?
quiz.nativeText: 凡人：能给我一分钱吗？
quiz.name: fa681bec92974e26e79e70ddd22acbf9.mp3

quiz.text: God: Just a second.
quiz.nativeText: 上帝：稍等一秒钟。
quiz.name: 5c3ea19d610ed3a6af48e5bf59a2b841.mp3

quiz.text: Hi Jim. I heard you've taken up fishing. Good for you!
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，听说你迷上垂钓了，棒棒嗒！
quiz.name: 658f2d7241fd49a5ce976fa1e33e522b.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you! Can you share some of your experience with me?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢，你能分享一下经验么?
quiz.name: 819a01be30eea7e50387743efa03909c.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Getting a good start is half the battle. First you have to be well prepared before you go fishing.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。良好的开端是成功的一半。钓鱼之前首先要做好准备。
quiz.name: ada24fa84dbb7a9dc5df6a8d1bca333b.mp3

quiz.text: Right. What should I prepare then?
quiz.nativeText: 是的。那我应该准备些什么呢？
quiz.name: 96910aac434558a57cc209250ff51b8c.mp3

quiz.text: A good fishing rod is always necessary.
quiz.nativeText: 好的鱼竿必不可少。
quiz.name: 4bea69768a03cb778db6b48b393ad5d8.mp3

quiz.text: What should the rod be made of?
quiz.nativeText: 鱼竿要什么材料的呢？
quiz.name: 04bfc38e76e511fb010612048a47463f.mp3

quiz.text: Traditional rods are made of bamboo. But now, rods made from carbon fiber are popular.
quiz.nativeText: 传统的鱼竿一般是竹子的，但现在碳纤维的更普遍。
quiz.name: a4973739350bda5124bc5920f1e785f9.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I think I will take the latter.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我选碳纤维的吧。
quiz.name: a870b1a105069828d89814ce002681f6.mp3

quiz.text: You will also need a strong fishing line, usually stored on a reel, which will help you land a fish.
quiz.nativeText: 你还需要一根结实的鱼线，一般会绕在渔轮上。它会帮你把鱼钓上来。
quiz.name: c8935567de8988e55e405bb32684e407.mp3

quiz.text: What else do I need?
quiz.nativeText: 我还需要什么呢？
quiz.name: 87be2575f0766083a217a4a92489585f.mp3

quiz.text: Last but not least, bait, and the hook with which you'll catch the fish are also necessary.
quiz.nativeText: 最后也是最重要一点就是鱼饵和鱼钩，成功捕鱼必不可少。
quiz.name: a399729fa40244a0882a1f9e1e65cf42.mp3

quiz.text: Got it. Thank you for your advice.
quiz.nativeText: 了解，谢谢你的建议。
quiz.name: c984b756941c70eb8d0f9fd1d7f49cf7.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. How is your fishing going?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，今天垂钓战况怎么样？
quiz.name: b24b9775384fa969e4456843c389e028.mp3

quiz.text: I haven't caught a single fish yet.
quiz.nativeText: 我一条鱼都还没有钓到！
quiz.name: 32cfc7add051a4dfc8fc5a3458845451.mp3

quiz.text: I believe it's because you're using the wrong bait.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得这是因为你用错鱼饵了。
quiz.name: f3d9806dac1ccdb4756aa10bf1cf3f10.mp3

quiz.text: That's impossible.
quiz.nativeText: 这不可能。
quiz.name: d25698c926765880efa119e383fe829f.mp3

quiz.text: I see you are using lures. They are artificial bait.
quiz.nativeText: 我发现你在用人鱼饵。
quiz.name: f76209dc4cf2a6e3d36430124a045763.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. And they are quite expensive.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，这些人工鱼饵还很贵呢。
quiz.name: 5624f7e5820a63a6213763eff6b96b3b.mp3

quiz.text: But they are not as useful as natural bait, especially in fishing areas.
quiz.nativeText: 但是人工鱼饵没有天然鱼饵有效，尤其是在垂钓区。
quiz.name: 093fed22510684e61ec564e54737257b.mp3

quiz.text: Really? How do you know that?
quiz.nativeText: 是么？你怎么知道的？
quiz.name: 562d0d83052eeac2cf86febfb5b281ea.mp3

quiz.text: I tested it myself. And I can tell you that worms and minnows are better.
quiz.nativeText: 我亲自试过的，我还想说蠕虫和米诺鱼做鱼饵更好。
quiz.name: 0be05c55ca191b5669a0fb4922e74980.mp3

quiz.text: I'd love to give those a try.
quiz.nativeText: 我要试试它们。
quiz.name: 183fdb080eb7603fd5035fdb5c67bd19.mp3

quiz.text: Go get some from my tackle box and I'll show you.
quiz.nativeText: 去我的渔具箱拿些来，我教你怎么用。
quiz.name: c67ed99de0339843d4b36f1f99529138.mp3

quiz.text: I really appreciate that!
quiz.nativeText: 太感谢啦！
quiz.name: df7b7c618d842f8f770877757e96aaf8.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. I heard that you are planning to get a pet.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，我听说你打算要养一只宠物。
quiz.name: afff56cb4fa7f31618a5b0e1f8f79104.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I have been thinking about it for a while.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我已经考虑一阵了。
quiz.name: 6ac03847ca0e6114eb7a9a46df31f0d7.mp3

quiz.text: I am totally supportive of your choice. Pets can provide both physical and emotional benefits.
quiz.nativeText: 我完全支持你的选择，宠物对我们的身心都是有益的。
quiz.name: c9423174739660fb6b81e52d3f082841.mp3

quiz.text: Benefits? Can you be more specific?
quiz.nativeText: 有益？你能说的具体些么？
quiz.name: 96d25d5be4ab43dd21de6a3598fcc439.mp3

quiz.text: Let's take a dog as an example. When you walk a dog, you get exercise and fresh air at the same time.
quiz.nativeText: 就以养狗为例吧，当你遛狗时，你不仅能锻炼身体还能呼吸新鲜空气。
quiz.name: 549c2d03f8c4ea2a50acd639329b6270.mp3

quiz.text: You are right about that.
quiz.nativeText: 你说的对。
quiz.name: 2f082b61f2c760171a114597f76be585.mp3

quiz.text: Also, your pets can give you companionship when you are alone.
quiz.nativeText: 而且，在你孤独时你的宠物还能陪伴你。
quiz.name: 2fa4d903327c8360f99296b22069643e.mp3

quiz.text: I totally agree with you.
quiz.nativeText: 我完全同意。
quiz.name: e7531b7ea8c64e5ad27c253f42789619.mp3

quiz.text: Just think about their cute appearance and loyal personalities. You'll love having a pet.
quiz.nativeText: 想想它们可爱的长相和忠诚的性格，你就会想要养一只宠物。
quiz.name: 1019f3fc1246cdcb38e7fcf1f08893c6.mp3

quiz.text: Definitely. I can't wait to get one now.
quiz.nativeText: 确实。我现在就等不及要养一只啦！
quiz.name: 47a612d6a44bcb9e665e8f18a2f0798b.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. What is your favorite breed of dog?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你最喜欢什么品种的狗？
quiz.name: 9a48e579369cea56d0f23a1f40afc23b.mp3

quiz.text: The Golden Retriever.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢金毛寻回犬。
quiz.name: 4a14c3fda39b9c35682ec3375f9be39b.mp3

quiz.text: The Golden Retriever is one of the most popular dog breeds.
quiz.nativeText: 金毛是最受欢迎的犬种之一。
quiz.name: c6e1a02e252af5fea9c39876420e6066.mp3

quiz.text: They are of great help to humans.
quiz.nativeText: 它们是人类的好帮手。
quiz.name: c4c4e41c67283929420503c29611806d.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. Golden Retrievers are frequently trained to help the blind.
quiz.nativeText: 是阿，金毛经常会被训练去帮助盲人。
quiz.name: ecb144e671ff6b7b7fbf29545072377b.mp3

quiz.text: They can also act as therapy dogs.
quiz.nativeText: 它们也可以做为治疗犬。
quiz.name: 9136f69846426322b92ccba41d4a197c.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I've heard they can help people who have autism.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我听说它们可以帮助孤独症患者。
quiz.name: 82f7c912d3dc58326b7d57f925bdd3bc.mp3

quiz.text: It's because Golden Retrievers are outgoing and manageable.
quiz.nativeText: 因为金毛犬既活泼又听话。
quiz.name: d939825710314da08fa00f87c6d9e499.mp3

quiz.text: Right. What kind of Golden Retrievers do you like best?
quiz.nativeText: 是的，你喜欢什么样的金毛呢？
quiz.name: ed4b9194ca1f62945c15c700c0f9d1ea.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I like chocolate ones myself.
quiz.nativeText: 我个人喜欢巧克力色的。
quiz.name: c3b3f2270029f9c54d5743ac82847590.mp3

quiz.text: I prefer golden ones. And it would be best if it had white fur on its chest, paws, and tail.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢金色的。要是在胸脯、爪子和尾巴上有白色的毛就更好啦。
quiz.name: 3a12a30d7a73f806e5a1035abd6b1396.mp3

quiz.text: You've got a particular taste.
quiz.nativeText: 你的口味很独特嘛。
quiz.name: b624862a7fbe23ab4e523cf89291c7ed.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. I heard you just got a Golden Retriever puppy. It must be hard to take care of it.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，我听说你刚得到一只小金毛犬，养它一定不容易吧。
quiz.name: 8cca6664ec49f7d2f5e0721b4d8d627e.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I have to take it to the vet for shots.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊。我还得带它去兽医那打针。
quiz.name: bfce37ae77d480b3bdc84f1a111e5bfd.mp3

quiz.text: Vaccinations for dogs are very important.
quiz.nativeText: 给狗狗接种疫苗很重要。
quiz.name: cd3c2961bd0bf6981b1b74c1cef4cc20.mp3

quiz.text: That's true.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。
quiz.name: f9d7a044eb61b3f37e95a99104dd6798.mp3

quiz.text: A lot of people treat their pets as though they were royalty.
quiz.nativeText: 很多人把狗狗像皇室一样养呢。
quiz.name: e9299c059f058948e53cb044d110decc.mp3

quiz.text: That's a little bit ridiculous.
quiz.nativeText: 这有点可笑吧。
quiz.name: b248238fd80a0128f253af9ff7c00ba2.mp3

quiz.text: Do you groom your dog often? I know a lot of people do.
quiz.nativeText: 你经常给狗狗做美容么？很多人都这样呢。
quiz.name: 2e3e7093afbad13e0ec7fa0623714df8.mp3

quiz.text: I will have to pass on that.
quiz.nativeText: 我还是算了吧。
quiz.name: d0b8ff8cf6ee0ced28bb1112e601b6d3.mp3

quiz.text: Do you train your dog yourself?
quiz.nativeText: 你自己训狗么？
quiz.name: b909eba2feb6d4be8283184e397a37b6.mp3

quiz.text: No, I take it to a professional trainer.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我会带它去专业的训狗师那里。
quiz.name: 19a7655248004cf5e030031db751d37a.mp3

quiz.text: That's a good idea. It must be very hard to stop it from barking, digging and rolling in dirt.
quiz.nativeText: 好办法。让狗狗不叫、不挖坑、滚泥巴一定很难。
quiz.name: 816cb3bf119325bcf9536ca73823b653.mp3

quiz.text: It's still a lot of fun to have a dog as a companion, though.
quiz.nativeText: 不过，有狗狗陪伴还是有很多乐趣的。
quiz.name: f237a048e2744352eb9f47f28561699b.mp3

quiz.text: Mary gets some pretty stones from her uncle.
quiz.name: 9cb19888e6297a4e1d34d74ae669a3fc.mp3

quiz.text: She likes them very much.
quiz.name: 173a1984188c80ad0910c557efbe4e1a.mp3

quiz.text: 'Look at these pretty stones, Mummy.'
quiz.name: 85bcd1212adfc860cda4ab172e7878ea.mp3

quiz.text: 'I can show then to Stella on Saturday.'
quiz.name: 738ae5b3016dcf548dedf25aaced8f71.mp3

quiz.text: 'That's a good idea.' says Mary's mum.
quiz.name: e082396349ab66a6a6639d4077febc55.mp3

quiz.text: Stella is Mary's friend.
quiz.name: d84b087af9d4ee57a01a68befa24fb34.mp3

quiz.text: She visits Mary on Saturday.
quiz.name: 8db125db28427e50f0267c5c3d948756.mp3

quiz.text: She sits down on the sofa.
quiz.name: 7030247fc155914c060de1e3ebae2bf2.mp3

quiz.text: The cushion is nice and soft. I like it.
quiz.name: 98a9d192c63aad2bc5c783321c553835.mp3

quiz.text: Mary shows Stella her stones.
quiz.name: 563e45a5d7163bd3b5081fc05bc5728d.mp3

quiz.text: Stella feels the stones with her hands.
quiz.name: b481f7f223128f567df29ea8a3417bfc.mp3

quiz.text: The stones are smooth and hard.
quiz.name: 60f79691baae8c34a71744b0864f5c6a.mp3

quiz.text: Stella smiles, and she likes them.
quiz.name: 4da476c0ac79263f7c88347e982b16bd.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening sir, what can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好先生，请问喝点什么？
quiz.name: 20b89ed5cdc0340e044bc267d6cfbfbb.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like a Dry Martini.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要一杯纯味马提尼。
quiz.name: cd21dc1be6fad4f11e3eafeba54032a3.mp3

quiz.text: How do you like your Martini? Straight up or on the rocks?
quiz.nativeText: 您的马提尼要纯的还是加冰的？
quiz.name: 4d43d6f244f8e7023ee56df3c6f365e7.mp3

quiz.text: With ice, thanks.
quiz.nativeText: 加冰的，谢谢。
quiz.name: bc18dce6d16f70c0ad69fa2466bb1b6a.mp3

quiz.text: Would you like a snack with your drink?
quiz.nativeText: 您需要来点配餐么？
quiz.name: dea50cc30330b8774866643ebd818ec4.mp3

quiz.text: What do you have here?
quiz.nativeText: 你们这里都有些什么？
quiz.name: e4a74f4f0dee6cc8e0b2383854753f7d.mp3

quiz.text: We have sausages, Scotch eggs, nachos and French fries. Popcorn is complimentary.
quiz.nativeText: 我们这儿有香肠、苏格兰煮蛋、烤玉米片和炸薯条。爆米花是免费提供的。
quiz.name: d7d7502478cb16adfe07c5794fc80941.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'll take some popcorn.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我来一点爆米花吧。
quiz.name: 21e4945e02f3fb0bf624c30a74df49ff.mp3

quiz.text: Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 您还需要点别的么？
quiz.name: 389399ee88270b17f0a8a3305d682fc6.mp3

quiz.text: No, thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 不用了，谢谢。
quiz.name: d3fb9d8a0ec69778207a1500013392bc.mp3

learnText: 发音时，口型由大到小，舌位由低到高。由[a]音滑向[ʊ]音，发音时前重后轻。

quiz.text: cloud
quiz.nativeText: 云
quiz.name: a51b1ad8bfa5207b7eb5c2ca7bfc5a3c.mp3

quiz.text: mouth
quiz.nativeText: 嘴
quiz.name: 6371bfbeb0f5c87eab3688a8524795f2.mp3

quiz.text: out
quiz.nativeText: 外面的
quiz.name: ef373774188a51f80463f37b6bd9e83a.mp3

quiz.text: down
quiz.nativeText: 下
quiz.name: c4e0e4e3118472beeb2ae75827450f1f.mp3

name: aʊ

quiz.text: Good evening. What may I offer you, ladies and gentlemen?
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好，女士们先生们。请问喝点什么？
quiz.hilitText: Good evening. What may I offer you, ladies and gentlemen?
quiz.ipa: ɡʊd ivnɪŋ wʌt meɪ aɪ ɔfɝ ju leɪdiz ænd dʒɛntəlmɪn
quiz.name: 57952fab4a5e9c9cf7afee519009ad5a.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any recommendations?
quiz.nativeText: 你有什么推荐么？
quiz.name: d4a1d3f4f87b4767362713b0094f1191.mp3

quiz.text: This is our beverage list. Today's special is Tequila Sunrise.
quiz.nativeText: 这是我们的酒水单。今天的特别推荐是龙舌兰日出。
quiz.hilitText: This is our beverage list. Today's special is Tequila Sunrise.
quiz.ipa: ðɪs ɪz ɑr bɛvrɪdʒ lɪst tədeɪz spɛʃəl ɪz təkilə sʌnraɪz
quiz.name: 30cb5073941187d92567127721117faa.mp3

quiz.text: Is there anything special about it?
quiz.nativeText: 它有什么特别的吗？
quiz.hilitText: Is there anything special about it?
quiz.ipa: ɪz ðɛr ɛniθɪŋ spɛʃəl əbaʊt ɪt
quiz.name: b1ae35f5be4a509f8ed1580d97d04673.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. It contains tequila, orange juice and a special kind of syrup with the appearance of sunrise.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。它里面有龙舌兰、橙子汁和一种特殊的糖浆，呈现出日出的颜色。
quiz.hilitText: Sure. It contains tequila, orange juice and a special kind of syrup with the appearance of sunrise.
quiz.ipa: ʃʊr ɪt kənteɪnz təkilə ɔrəndʒ dʒus ænd ə spɛʃəl kaɪnd ʌv sɪrpp wɪθ ði əpɪrəns ʌv sʌnraɪz
quiz.name: 646d2604d375f1db44c0ffc29fb78840.mp3

quiz.text: So that is why it is called Tequila Sunrise?
quiz.nativeText: 所以它被叫做龙舌兰日出？
quiz.hilitText: So that is why it is called Tequila Sunrise?
quiz.ipa: soʊ ðæt ɪz waɪ ɪt ɪz kɔld təkilə sʌnraɪz
quiz.name: 2546386e7baa2b8ec4c8a2bee9b329ab.mp3

quiz.text: Sure it is.
quiz.nativeText: 确实是这样。
quiz.name: e744e9eb77a25eebdf21d89febd7a7fa.mp3

quiz.text: OK, we'd love a try. Make it three then.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我们愿意试一下。那就来三杯吧。
quiz.hilitText: OK, we'd love a try. Make it three then.
quiz.ipa: oʊkeɪ wid lʌv ə traɪ meɪk ɪt θri ðɛn
quiz.name: d9c586295b1ac6c6c89baf398d8e568a.mp3

quiz.text: By the way, we have an awesome live band here tonight.
quiz.nativeText: 顺便跟您说一声，我们今晚会有一支很棒的现场乐队在这里表演。
quiz.hilitText: By the way, we have an awesome live band here tonight.
quiz.ipa: baɪ ðə weɪ wi hæv æn ɑsəm laɪv bænd hɪr tənaɪt
quiz.name: 77157a56ec2f95497a4ac83778ac65c8.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, perfect! What kind of music are they playing?
quiz.nativeText: 哇，太赞了！他们演奏的是哪种音乐啊？
quiz.hilitText: Wow, perfect! What kind of music are they playing?
quiz.ipa: waʊ pɝfɛkt wʌt kaɪnd ʌv mjuzɪk ɑr ðeɪ pleɪɪŋ
quiz.name: 9ff7314b23047b47b962598297751b91.mp3

quiz.text: Heavy metal. Are you a fan?
quiz.nativeText: 重金属。您是重金属音乐爱好者么？
quiz.hilitText: Heavy metal. Are you a fan?
quiz.ipa: hɛvi mɛtəl ɑr ju ə fæn
quiz.name: 5423af57bfad84daa6f2a91d9e3dbdeb.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, of course. When is the band coming?
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，当然了！这支乐队什么时候来啊？
quiz.hilitText: Yeah, of course. When is the band coming?
quiz.ipa: jæ ʌv kɔrs wɪn ɪz ðə bænd kʌmɪŋ
quiz.name: a7842e08c16b1e37eef59093eb2608f1.mp3

quiz.text: At nine o'clock sharp.
quiz.nativeText: 九点整的时候。
quiz.name: 86d62d4800a6a3f1d488fdbaaed757d2.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you for your information.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你的信息。
quiz.name: c8f3a19065e3c44b5323843d1d041081.mp3

quiz.text: cloud
quiz.nativeText: 云
quiz.name: a51b1ad8bfa5207b7eb5c2ca7bfc5a3c.mp3

quiz.text: mouth
quiz.nativeText: 嘴
quiz.name: 6371bfbeb0f5c87eab3688a8524795f2.mp3

quiz.text: inside out
quiz.nativeText: 里面翻到外面
quiz.name: c1189d510c8e13b8b79c1b2f63218f8c.mp3

quiz.text: upside down
quiz.nativeText: 上下颠倒
quiz.name: e7b99bb0f7e6f5be26bbd0de13d61753.mp3

quiz.text: I had been walking outside, through a singularly dreary ground of country;
quiz.nativeText: 我孤零零在外行走，穿过乡间一片无比萧索的旷野。
quiz.hilitText: I had been walking {#*outside*$}, through a singularly dreary {#*ground*$} of country;
quiz.ipa: aɪ hæd bɪn wɔkɪŋ {#*aʊ*$}tsaɪd θru ə sɪŋɡjəlɝli drɪri ɡr{#*aʊ*$}nd ʌv kʌntri
quiz.name: 9a65dfa4c87f9358f419de02885f082a.mp3

quiz.text: There, in front of me, stood the House of Usher.
quiz.nativeText: 在我眼前，兀然立着厄榭府。
quiz.hilitText: There, in front of me, stood the {#*House*$} of Usher.
quiz.ipa: wɪθɪn vju ʌv ðə mɛlənkɑli h{#*aʊ*$}s ʌv ʌʃɝ
quiz.name: c53d2bc6a3b6b0ad5aad7d7b67107437.mp3

quiz.text: Hi Paul, long time no see. How are you doing recently?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨保罗，好久不见。最近怎么样啊？
quiz.hilitText: Hi Paul, long time no see. How are you doing recently?
quiz.ipa: haɪ pɔl lɔŋ taɪm noʊ si haʊ ɑr ju duɪŋ risənli
quiz.name: b7da4afcae6de1e3ea6010f540e1b633.mp3
