quiz.text: Not so good. I was trying to give up alcohol, but I just lost my job today, so I'm going to drown my sorrows.
quiz.nativeText: 不怎么样。我最近正在试着戒酒，但我今天失业了，所以我想借酒消愁。
quiz.hilitText: Not so good. I was trying to give up alcohol, but I just lost my job today, so I'm going to drown my sorrows.
quiz.ipa: nɑt soʊ ɡʊd aɪ wɑz traɪɪŋ tu ɡɪv ʌp ælkəhɑl bʌt aɪ dʒʌst lɔst maɪ dʒɑb tədeɪ soʊ aɪm ɡoʊɪŋ tɪ draʊn maɪ sɑroʊz
quiz.name: 9591cf9883835a354f0e3c49a5876516.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. So what would you like to have, champagne, whiskey, vodka, brandy, or a cocktail?
quiz.nativeText: 哦抱歉。那你想喝点什么，香槟，威士忌，伏特加，白兰地，还是鸡尾酒？
quiz.hilitText: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. So what would you like to have, champagne, whiskey, vodka, brandy, or a cocktail?
quiz.ipa: oʊ aɪm sɑri tu hɪr ðæt soʊ wʌt wʊd ju laɪk tu hæv ʃæmpeɪn wɪski vɑdkə brændi ɔr ə kɑkteɪl
quiz.name: db5fbb0b97341e1cadee95c9cead9f21.mp3

quiz.text: Maybe a glass of whiskey with soda, and please make it a cold one.
quiz.nativeText: 一杯威士忌加苏打吧，麻烦加点冰谢谢。
quiz.hilitText: Maybe a glass of whiskey with soda, and please make it a cold one.
quiz.ipa: meɪbi ə ɡlæs ʌv wɪski wɪθ soʊdə ænd pliz meɪk ɪt ə koʊld wʌn
quiz.name: aa2fc5c0a3c4b698b1fc005c2f730e32.mp3

quiz.text: You got it. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好嘞，给你。
quiz.hilitText: You got it. Here you are.
quiz.ipa: ju ɡɑt ɪt hɪr ju ɑr
quiz.name: e96e60b2be9b1ab1f9ad0f6729b79730.mp3

quiz.text: Whiskey has always been my favorite.
quiz.nativeText: 威士忌一直是我的最爱。
quiz.hilitText: Whiskey has always been my favorite.
quiz.ipa: wɪski hæz ɔlweɪz bɪn maɪ feɪvrɪt
quiz.name: cfa531beb44815090e9e6dbeff88f2dc.mp3

quiz.text: Would you like another? How about a refill? It's on me.
quiz.nativeText: 你还要再来一杯么？加满怎么样？这杯算我的。
quiz.hilitText: Would you like another? How about a refill? It's on me.
quiz.ipa: wʊd ju laɪk ənʌðɝ haʊ əbaʊt ə rifɪl ɪts ɑn mi
quiz.name: 5a223305daf4817647d2f9c0f14bf6a2.mp3

quiz.text: OK, thank you. I'll have another of the same.
quiz.nativeText: 好，谢谢。我再来一杯一样的。
quiz.hilitText: OK, thank you. I'll have another of the same.
quiz.ipa: oʊkeɪ θæŋk ju aɪl hæv ənʌðɝ ʌv ðə seɪm
quiz.name: 8a9e9c25f155e068880445455e43baf9.mp3

quiz.text: Alright, in a second.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，马上就好。
quiz.name: e5baf9434b3365d625bfa049815d8484.mp3

quiz.text: I'm just worried about what I should do now that I've been fired. Well, what kinds of beer do you have? I'd like a beer as well.
quiz.nativeText: 我正在想被解雇了后应该做什么。嗯，你这儿有什么啤酒？我还想要一杯啤酒。
quiz.hilitText: I'm just worried about what I should do now that I've been fired. Well, what kinds of beer do you have? I'd like a beer as well.
quiz.ipa: aɪm dʒʌst wɝid əbaʊt wʌt aɪ ʃʊd du naʊ ðæt aɪv bɪn faɪɝd wɛl wʌt kaɪndz ʌv bɪr du ju hæv aɪd laɪk ə bɪr æz wɛl
quiz.name: 058c3345153b1316e4ddaa500cf0bb46.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I think you've had enough. You seem a bit drunk now.
quiz.nativeText: 哦我觉得你喝的已经够多了，你现在看起来都有些醉了。
quiz.hilitText: Oh, I think you've had enough. You seem a bit drunk now.
quiz.ipa: oʊ aɪ θɪŋk juv hæd ɪnʌf ju sim ə bɪt drʌŋk naʊ
quiz.name: 47dcf9375692dae684ab2f3b342d492a.mp3

quiz.text: Come on, just one more for the road.
quiz.nativeText: 哎呀，再来一杯我就回家了。
quiz.hilitText: Come on, just one more for the road.
quiz.ipa: kʌm ɑn dʒʌst wʌn mɔr frɝ ðə roʊd
quiz.name: ee9765db0c067be5afe0d1228c385c35.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry, but it's closing time, Paul.
quiz.nativeText: 抱歉，保罗，我们要关门了。
quiz.hilitText: I'm sorry, but it's closing time, Paul.
quiz.ipa: aɪm sɑri bʌt ɪts kloʊzɪŋ taɪm pɔl
quiz.name: d6644bc197cdfc6559f63d80eca746be.mp3

quiz.text: What a bummer! OK then.
quiz.nativeText: 真扫兴！那好吧。
quiz.name: e1802b34800d519f7b7ac62cac0819ae.mp3

quiz.text: During the whole of a dull, dark, and powerless day in the autumn of the year,
quiz.nativeText: 那年秋天，一个阴沉、昏暗、毫无生机的日子，
quiz.hilitText: During the whole of a dull, dark, and {#*powerless*$} day in the autumn of the year,
quiz.ipa: dɝɪŋ ðə hoʊl ʌv ə dʌl dɑrk ænd p{#*aʊ*$}ɝləs deɪ ɪn ði ɔtəm ʌv ði jɪr
quiz.name: ebdce34bc890cb231e53016cd458a44f.mp3

quiz.text: when the clouds hung low in the heavens,
quiz.nativeText: 乌云低垂，厚重地笼罩着大地。
quiz.hilitText: when the {#*clouds*$} hung low in the heavens,
quiz.ipa: wɪn ðə kl{#*aʊ*$}dz hʌŋ loʊ ɪn ðə hɛvənz
quiz.name: 1882e36717712a0ab1b2915c6266baeb.mp3

quiz.text: I had been walking outside, through a singularly dreary ground of country;
quiz.nativeText: 我孤零零在外行走，穿过乡间一片无比萧索的旷野。
quiz.hilitText: I had been walking {#*outside*$}, through a singularly dreary {#*ground*$} of country;
quiz.ipa: aɪ hæd bɪn wɔkɪŋ {#*aʊ*$}tsaɪd θru ə sɪŋɡjəlɝli drɪri ɡr{#*aʊ*$}nd ʌv kʌntri
quiz.name: 9a65dfa4c87f9358f419de02885f082a.mp3

quiz.text: and at length found myself, as the shades of the evening drew down,
quiz.nativeText: 暮色四合之际，
quiz.hilitText: and at length {#*found*$} myself, as the shades of the evening drew {#*down*$},
quiz.ipa: ənd æt lɛŋθ f{#*aʊ*$}nd maɪsɛlf ɛz ðə ʃeɪdz ʌv ði ivnɪŋ dru d{#*aʊ*$}n
quiz.name: 8df93c1c7089be9326f062d280045baf.mp3

quiz.text: within view of the melancholy House of Usher.
quiz.nativeText: 令人忧伤的厄榭府终于遥遥在望。
quiz.hilitText: within view of the melancholy {#*House*$} of Usher.
quiz.ipa: wɪθɪn vju ʌv ðə mɛlənkɑli h{#*aʊ*$}s ʌv ʌʃɝ
quiz.name: e3c7f44edc75416193c6fb02f9cad40b.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, I didn't know you had such a beautiful singing voice.
quiz.nativeText: 哇我都不知道原来你唱歌这么好听！
quiz.hilitText: Wow, I didn't know you had such a beautiful singing voice.
quiz.ipa: waʊ aɪ dɪdən noʊ ju hæd sʌtʃ ə bjutəfəl sɪŋɪŋ vɔɪs
quiz.name: e6949d63676621d95c1a9a7d11497d1d.mp3

quiz.text: That's thanks to the song's melody. I was just following it.
quiz.nativeText: 那要归功于这首歌的旋律，我只是在跟着它走。
quiz.hilitText: That's thanks to the song's melody. I was just following it.
quiz.ipa: ðæts θæŋks tu ðə sɔŋz mɛlədi aɪ wɑz dʒʌst fɑloʊɪŋ ɪt
quiz.name: ab6acdf01833a76fc43a95adb78a8ddf.mp3

quiz.text: Come on. You hit the beats perfectly.
quiz.nativeText: 得了吧，你节拍卡得特别好啊！
quiz.hilitText: Come on. You hit the beats perfectly.
quiz.ipa: kʌm ɑn ju hɪt ðə bits pɝfəktli
quiz.name: e3a20b44e806122e067114d4bdcf29df.mp3

quiz.text: Well, actually I know that song very well, so I didn't need to concentrate on reading the lyrics, which helped a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 额，事实上我对这首歌很熟，所以就不需要集中注意力去看歌词，这帮了我很大忙。
quiz.hilitText: Well, actually I know that song very well, so I didn't need to concentrate on reading the lyrics, which helped a lot.
quiz.ipa: wɛl ækʃuli aɪ noʊ ðæt sɔŋ vɛri wɛl soʊ aɪ dɪdən nid tu kɑnsəntreɪt ɑn ridɪŋ ðə lɪrɪks wɪtʃ hɛlpt eɪ lɑt
quiz.name: f77f7491bd598691b535fa54cf3b0e66.mp3

quiz.text: You're too modest. Let me see. Which song should I choose. I totally have no idea what to sing.
quiz.nativeText: 你太谦虚啦！让我来看看我应该唱哪首歌呢。我都不知道要唱哪首好了。
quiz.hilitText: You're too modest. Let me see. Which song should I choose. I totally have no idea what to sing.
quiz.ipa: jʊr tu mɑdəst lɛt mi si wɪtʃ sɔŋ ʃʊd aɪ tʃuz aɪ toʊtəli hæv noʊ aɪdiə wʌt tu sɪŋ
quiz.name: e4b5146db169b7099ade57fbb7875293.mp3

quiz.text: Let's see. Who is your favorite singer?
quiz.nativeText: 我们一起看看，你最喜欢的歌手是谁啊？
quiz.hilitText: Let's see. Who is your favorite singer?
quiz.ipa: lɛts si hu ɪz jɔr feɪvɝɪt sɪŋɝ
quiz.name: cee26fb405b624f9aad2c5b9ba6960e1.mp3

quiz.text: I have no clue. I can never remember a singer's names.
quiz.nativeText: 我也不知道，我从来都记不住那些歌手的名字
quiz.hilitText: I have no clue. I can never remember a singer's names.
quiz.ipa: aɪ hæv noʊ klu aɪ kæn nɛvɝ rɪmɛmbɝ ə sɪŋɝz neɪmz
quiz.name: d00c344aa4a467280ceb68c3ba643ea6.mp3

quiz.text: Then you can pick this one. The lyrics to the song are really romantic.
quiz.nativeText: 那你可以选这首，这首歌的歌词很浪漫。
quiz.hilitText: Then you can pick this one. The lyrics to the song are really romantic.
quiz.ipa: ðɛn ju kæn pɪk ðɪs wʌn ðə lɪrɪks tu ðə sɔŋ ɑr rili roʊmæntɪk
quiz.name: 9b6c86ba26d9531762cbc1c6d817cb1c.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. Oh, I like this song. It's by two of my favorite singers.
quiz.nativeText: 我也这么觉得。哦我喜欢这首歌，这是由两位我最喜欢的歌手一起唱的。
quiz.hilitText: I agree. Oh, I like this song. It's by two of my favorite singers.
quiz.ipa: aɪ əɡri oʊ aɪ laɪk ðɪs sɔŋ ɪts baɪ tu ʌv maɪ feɪvɝɪt sɪŋɝz
quiz.name: 46dfc8fa14f7af260a2d769ef6c9f18b.mp3

quiz.text: What's it called?
quiz.nativeText: 歌名叫什么啊？
quiz.name: 4dc686f7124bc608b50b81097bad39cb.mp3

quiz.text: "When You Believe". It's a duet. Maybe you can pick up the mic and join me.
quiz.nativeText: 《When you Believe》。这是一首合唱，或许你可以拿起麦克风和我一起唱。
quiz.hilitText: "When You Believe". It's a duet. Maybe you can pick up the mic and join me.
quiz.ipa: wɪn ju bɪliv ɪts ə duɛt meɪbi ju kæn pɪk ʌp ðə mɪk ænd dʒɔɪn mi
quiz.name: 5c0dea678b60f860cac58deb824643ba.mp3

quiz.text: No, I can't sing that high. I will join in with the singing if you turn down the key though.
quiz.nativeText: 不行，我唱不了那么高，除非你把音调调低点我才会加入你。
quiz.hilitText: No, I can't sing that high. I will join in with the singing if you turn down the key though.
quiz.ipa: noʊ aɪ kænt sɪŋ ðæt haɪ aɪ wɪl dʒɔɪn ɪn wɪθ ðə sɪŋɪŋ ɪf ju tɝn daʊn ði ki ðoʊ
quiz.name: 245f1d3ca27d21d3a79800e1bf7cd69f.mp3

quiz.text: Alright, let's do it.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我们开始唱吧。
quiz.name: 85b0a378696bb8ef22a8e984209f1218.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'll try my best.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我一定会努力的。
quiz.name: 9b382fc15c5e83854c432beed5bba3e6.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening. What can I get for you?
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好，请问喝点什么？
quiz.hilitText: Good evening. What can I get for you?
quiz.ipa: ɡʊd ivnɪŋ wʌt kæn aɪ ɡɛt frɝ ju
quiz.name: 1bf0bd32f2b067c846f781aae6127904.mp3

quiz.text: I'm going to stay up late tonight, so I'd like a coffee please.
quiz.nativeText: 我今晚要熬夜，所以要一杯咖啡，谢谢。
quiz.hilitText: I'm going to stay up late tonight, so I'd like a coffee please.
quiz.ipa: aɪm ɡoʊɪŋ tu steɪ ʌp leɪt tənaɪt soʊ aɪd laɪk ə kɑfi pliz
quiz.name: 3168cc94c03c8b0dc550e0428cb9cd01.mp3

quiz.text: Certainly, may I ask what kind of coffee you'd like?
quiz.nativeText: 当然，请问您要哪种咖啡呢？
quiz.hilitText: Certainly, may I ask what kind of coffee you'd like?
quiz.ipa: sɝtənli meɪ aɪ æsk wʌt kaɪnd ʌv kɑfi jud laɪk
quiz.name: 6dbb33552bc5077c1036979a8cc7b27a.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, you got me there. What have you got?
quiz.nativeText: 哦这你可问倒我了，你们都有哪些啊？
quiz.hilitText: Oh, you got me there. What have you got?
quiz.ipa: oʊ ju ɡɑt mi ðɛr wʌt hæv ju ɡɑt
quiz.name: 508706d8d584bf5da2493f4621087545.mp3

quiz.text: We have espresso, cappuccino, latte, mocha, and also Americano.
quiz.nativeText: 我们这儿有浓缩咖啡、卡布奇诺、拿铁、摩卡还有美式咖啡。
quiz.hilitText: We have espresso, cappuccino, latte, mocha, and also Americano.
quiz.ipa: wi hæv ɛsprɛsoʊ kæputʃinoʊ lɑteɪ moʊkə ænd ɔlsoʊ əmɛrɪkɑnoʊ
quiz.name: dcadd4c4c13df5e4a233595b94a47513.mp3

quiz.text: OK, then I'd like a medium cappuccino, extra sugar please.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我要一杯中杯的卡布奇诺，多加点糖谢谢。
quiz.hilitText: OK, then I'd like a medium cappuccino, extra sugar please.
quiz.ipa: oʊkeɪ ðɛn aɪd laɪk ə midiəm kæputʃinoʊ ɛkstrə ʃʊɡɝ pliz
quiz.name: 4528838ed918a8b4af7308623f13669d.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，请问还需要别的么？
quiz.name: f2d417a352b1ab2f355b13cbba5c9443.mp3

quiz.text: Just coffee for the moment. Oh, do you have any teas here?
quiz.nativeText: 暂时就只要咖啡。哦你们这儿有茶么？
quiz.hilitText: Just coffee for the moment. Oh, do you have any teas here?
quiz.ipa: dʒʌst kɑfi fɝ ðə moʊmənt oʊ du ju hæv ɛni tiz hɪr
quiz.name: 89595a6ee7c409e2e2a90283bf9a174f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, of course.
quiz.nativeText: 当然有。
quiz.name: 7ca76e275d95dbdd15f1236d29f00d67.mp3

quiz.text: My colleague asked me to bring a tea for her. So what do you recommend?
quiz.nativeText: 我一个同事让我帮她带杯茶，所以你有什么推荐的么？
quiz.hilitText: My colleague asked me to bring a tea for her. So what do you recommend?
quiz.ipa: maɪ kɑliɡ æskt mi tɪ brɪŋ ə ti frɝ hɝ soʊ wʌt du ju rɛkəmɛnd
quiz.name: 14a2eef8867dc883623d6f5eb930dbbc.mp3

quiz.text: How about an oolong tea? Or perhaps a jasmine tea?
quiz.nativeText: 乌龙茶怎么样？或者花茶？
quiz.hilitText: How about an oolong tea? Or perhaps a jasmine tea?
quiz.ipa: haʊ əbaʊt æn ulɔŋ ti ɔr pɝhæps ə dʒæzmɪn ti
quiz.name: 138be6fd781f14c457171cf61d491ad3.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'd like an oolong tea to go, and make it strong, please.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，那我要一杯乌龙茶外带，麻烦做的浓一点谢谢。
quiz.hilitText: OK, I'd like an oolong tea to go, and make it strong, please.
quiz.ipa: oʊkeɪ aɪd laɪk æn ulɔŋ ti tu ɡoʊ ænd meɪk ɪt strɔŋ pliz
quiz.name: 50d52b4068e9fd55ac4424cefb9d4b2b.mp3

quiz.text: Alright, your order will be ready in five minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，您的订单会在五分钟之内准备好。
quiz.hilitText: Alright, your order will be ready in five minutes.
quiz.ipa: ɔlraɪt jɔr ɔrdɝ wɪl bi rɛdi ɪn faɪv mɪnəts
quiz.name: 00e2cd5c91de991968a73b143501263c.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much for your advice.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢你的建议。
quiz.hilitText: Thank you very much for your advice.
quiz.ipa: θæŋk ju vɛri mʌtʃ frɝ jɔr ædvaɪs
quiz.name: 97b8079a5bc25567ce093b65de6807f9.mp3

quiz.text: Do you know where the park is?
quiz.nativeText: 你知道公园在哪里么？
quiz.name: d62a7da1da691d44ba29043d15be857e.mp3

quiz.text: The park is to the north of our house.
quiz.nativeText: 公园在我们家的北侧。
quiz.name: ac20090cecb7bbe2ea6c210905b46301.mp3

quiz.text: What is this place?
quiz.nativeText: 这是哪里？
quiz.name: 3e3ab462fcaaff873685053b9297142a.mp3

quiz.text: This is the museum.
quiz.nativeText: 这是那座博物馆。
quiz.name: 5c8f8a91ee269b01215ec505143e9036.mp3

quiz.text: Where is the cafe?
quiz.nativeText: 咖啡馆在哪里？
quiz.name: 2d3c4500a698559f948e1a62c4462a35.mp3

quiz.text: It's right here.
quiz.nativeText: 就在这儿。
quiz.name: 9aed0c1dc1c1f0b22ddd000067989580.mp3

quiz.text: How do we get to the bar from home?
quiz.nativeText: 我们怎么才能从家走到那间酒吧呢？
quiz.name: 51c9ae5f716046fe57745af87c7f4687.mp3

quiz.text: Go along this street.
quiz.nativeText: 沿着这条街就可以。
quiz.name: f114fbc692f0f06fdf14afc40b8698c7.mp3

quiz.text: Do you know where the playground is?
quiz.nativeText: 你知道游乐场在哪里么？
quiz.name: 6b128272411183368af68ecfde34f663.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry, I can't find it.
quiz.nativeText: 对不起，我没找到。
quiz.name: 764135dda2e07b705e1b8ae2edfa3e16.mp3

quiz.text: Let me point it out for you.
quiz.nativeText: 我来帮你指出来吧。
quiz.name: b2c223fe0e01e35908420a9b4b81027f.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, it's next to the school.
quiz.nativeText: 哦，它就在学校旁边。
quiz.name: b30fe10e2f073d7273286c7d42eaf6c2.mp3

quiz.text: I'm bored. Do you want to hang out?
quiz.nativeText: 好无聊啊，你想出去玩么？
quiz.name: ba46edf7f0bf1e20d80cc507e7e281d4.mp3

quiz.text: Where do you want to go?
quiz.nativeText: 你想去哪儿？
quiz.name: 4521eef56fe4c5b6da7f3d41a7bb72cd.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want to have a drink?
quiz.nativeText: 你想去喝点酒么？
quiz.name: b3e48286f9ebfd1d3e3c9e73541b41b3.mp3

quiz.text: No, I have to work tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 不了，我明天还要工作呢。
quiz.name: b5ee5324f8f5234503bd9a2cd23e90de.mp3

quiz.text: Fine. Let's go to the movie theater.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，那我们一起去看电影吧。
quiz.name: 4b60771b57b6dbbdc1d086844fa61514.mp3

quiz.text: Actually I don't really want to watch a movie either.
quiz.nativeText: 其实我也不太想看电影。
quiz.name: ace70dad0c7a96f5a88daa2516bbb866.mp3

quiz.text: What do you want to do?
quiz.nativeText: 那你想做什么？
quiz.name: 9b32eacb000c459489cc4afbf1509832.mp3

quiz.text: How about going to the museum together?
quiz.nativeText: 我们一起去博物馆怎么样？
quiz.name: d9f45b2b2016348f055d6c6237505712.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds great.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来不错！
quiz.name: c8f0ae3a588cda664627303642417ec9.mp3

quiz.text: Let's go.
quiz.nativeText: 那我们出发吧！
quiz.name: 270b3043be5cad9b73fa06ddccea8219.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 在小圈子内被支持者喜爱及推崇的电影

quiz.text: Have you watched The Hateful Eight?
quiz.nativeText: 你看了《八恶人》吗？
quiz.name: 3a1a0a7720b5a20beb3eb39baab2c208.mp3

quiz.text: No. But I've heard of him. Isn't he the one who leads cult films into the mainstream?
quiz.nativeText: 没有，不过我听过他。他不就是那个让cult片进入主流的导演吗？
quiz.name: 443c66597ac88eb60afc67fe1e8fb3fc.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. Do you like him?
quiz.nativeText: 是的。你喜欢他吗？
quiz.name: 94a8f6d8c7a3cb49a0a11d3e3d5c414d.mp3

quiz.text: Not really. I'd rather watch Joy with Jennifer Lawrence.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上没有。我宁愿看詹妮弗·劳伦斯出演的《奋斗的乔伊》 。
quiz.name: 89336be4f85b83a7a0660edaa3bb3083.mp3

quiz.text: I knew it. You girls love chick flicks, and romances.
quiz.nativeText: 我就知道。你们女生就喜欢这种小妞电影，还有浪漫片。
quiz.name: 5cd8e92c174d79f41550fe2dc8e53eb8.mp3

quiz.text: Hah! That's not fair. I enjoy action films as well. Remember last time when I watched Spectre with you?
quiz.nativeText: 哈，并不是这样。我也喜欢动作片。还记得上次我和你一起去看《007：幽灵党》吗？
quiz.name: d6b752d0da323259d2e2d280a32bc6ca.mp3

quiz.text: But you didn't recognize the Godfather tribute in the movies we watched before.
quiz.nativeText: 但是你没有看出我们之前看过的电影里面对《教父》的致敬。
quiz.name: 4258eb552f28170167ac7bb3a2e0d95e.mp3

quiz.text: I've always had little interest in gangster movies.
quiz.nativeText: 我一向对黑帮电影兴趣不大。
quiz.name: 7991391f92f0d3eec31a7fb0cca2e304.mp3

quiz.text: I guess you loved Spectre because of Daniel Craig with his "charming" British accent.
quiz.nativeText: 我猜你喜欢《幽灵党》是因为丹尼尔·克雷格和他那“迷人”的英国口音吧。
quiz.name: e9ac4d35e238b16e5896bef9288fa2bf.mp3

quiz.text: Stop being sarcastic.  It is none of your business what I like to watch.
quiz.nativeText: 别这么尖酸。我喜欢看什么和你没关系。
quiz.name: 397094a391dd7415cde89dd5072d42f2.mp3

learnText: 发音时，双唇从收圆到扁平，舌位由低到高，由舌后部抬高滑向舌前部抬高。由[ɔ]音滑向[ɪ]音，注意要将[ɔ]发饱满。

quiz.text: boy
quiz.nativeText: 男孩
quiz.name: 97f04bcb65e4e50aed0875df09d47794.mp3

quiz.text: voice
quiz.nativeText: 声音
quiz.name: 9369ef98bb3f619078bb34cbf76ac6e4.mp3

quiz.text: choice
quiz.nativeText: 选择
quiz.name: d8016e00648935707599e94ff896038f.mp3

quiz.text: join
quiz.nativeText: 参加
quiz.name: a6fa1cdf9c1a71978751b35b88763f8f.mp3

name: ɔɪ

quiz.text: What did you think of Alice Through the Looking Glass?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得爱丽丝镜中奇遇记怎么样？
quiz.name: b5637d8744b5943383505d5c5e506958.mp3

quiz.text: Disappointing. I wish Tim Burton had directed it.
quiz.nativeText: 令人失望。我希望蒂姆·伯顿导演了这部电影。
quiz.name: eeb075c3f0f403ab4cf8490c9ec77ac5.mp3

quiz.text: It feels like something is missing without him.
quiz.nativeText: 感觉没有了伯顿这部电影缺了点什么。
quiz.name: d4ce359918cf93b49574e27594228aa3.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. Even the leading actor and actress couldn't save it.
quiz.nativeText: 我同意。甚至是男女主角也拯救不了它。
quiz.name: 5dc170cbb0f9702f3341d0444d00af1f.mp3

quiz.text: But still, we cannot blame the director for everything.
quiz.nativeText: 但是我们不能把所有过错都推到导演身上。
quiz.name: 15f1b64d55ac931f7bddcdb933c4ea20.mp3

quiz.text: That is true. The screenwriter did a terrible job.
quiz.nativeText: 确实。剧作家也做的很糟糕。
quiz.name: 223a99dd9028caf8ab9f105df2fbd2a5.mp3

quiz.text: And look at what the leading actress is wearing. It is just terrible.
quiz.nativeText: 还有看看女主穿的衣服。简直可怕。
quiz.name: 5dc47b480abfee61cbf499a3f3c36c8f.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I can't believe the costume designer did such poor work!
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我不能相信服装设计师做的如此糟糕。
quiz.name: 28e3dcc4dc32aa4be4420ded37c15a1e.mp3

quiz.text: boy
quiz.nativeText: 男孩
quiz.name: 97f04bcb65e4e50aed0875df09d47794.mp3

quiz.text: voice
quiz.nativeText: 声音
quiz.name: 9369ef98bb3f619078bb34cbf76ac6e4.mp3

quiz.text: make a choice
quiz.nativeText: 做选择
quiz.name: 7f7e127563dba45d0e60c19e8529fdeb.mp3

quiz.text: join in
quiz.nativeText: 参加
quiz.name: f6916c7a385626d120ef9f5bb0000beb.mp3

quiz.text: A lady was picking through the frozen turkeys at a noisy grocery store.
quiz.nativeText: 一位女士正在一家嘈杂的杂货店里挑选冷冻火鸡。
quiz.hilitText: A lady was picking through the frozen turkeys at a {#*noisy*$} grocery store.
quiz.ipa: ə leɪdi wɑz pɪkɪŋ θru ðə froʊzən tɝkiz æt ə n{#*ɔɪ*$}zi ɡroʊsri stɔr
quiz.name: 9eb9b90162c7d7d992e20e133b63b487.mp3

quiz.text: "No madam", the boy replied in a joyful voice, "they're dead."
quiz.nativeText: “不会的，女士。”小伙子愉快地回答道，“它们已经死了。”
quiz.hilitText: "No madam", the {#*boy*$} replied in a {#*joyful*$} {#*voice*$}, "they're dead."
quiz.ipa: noʊ mædəm ðə b{#*ɔɪ*$} rɪplaɪd ɪn ə dʒ{#*ɔɪ*$}fəl v{#*ɔɪ*$}s ðɛr dɛd
quiz.name: 8abd0f808c81015cd0828252aba2aa3e.mp3

quiz.text: Could you tell me about the main film genres?
quiz.nativeText: 你能给我介绍一些主要的电影类型么？
quiz.name: 15f13e8727c26aeb44654d5be7dabb0e.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'd love to.
quiz.nativeText: 好啊，我很乐意。
quiz.name: 56cf72f6b2b404504079b31135ae46a0.mp3

quiz.text: I only know about action films. What else is there?
quiz.nativeText: 我只知道有动作片，还有别的么？
quiz.name: 53a5ee68e7dfeed0e57c6081e0793cfa.mp3

quiz.text: Comedies and tragedies.
quiz.nativeText: 喜剧和悲剧。
quiz.name: 6e65ce590bdf5ce7623e376c691964e4.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Any others?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了，还有别的么？
quiz.name: 600ee524ec1334a4bd1b4bbe165262a2.mp3

quiz.text: There are also thrillers and science fiction movies.
quiz.nativeText: 还有恐怖片和科幻片。
quiz.name: e1962a9b09d00cb8b0a79692ce034fa2.mp3

quiz.text: Is that all?
quiz.nativeText: 只有这些么？
quiz.name: 5f86ae271cb0263fb62bcabd5fdbfb18.mp3

quiz.text: No, we have documentaries and musicals as well.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我们还有纪录片和音乐剧。
quiz.name: 40c73557abbf4e30575d5d4a414a2829.mp3

quiz.text: What genre does Titanic belong to?
quiz.nativeText: 《泰坦尼克号》属于哪一种？
quiz.name: 3d687c51bd564f325054eef3322837bf.mp3

quiz.text: It is a romance.
quiz.nativeText: 它是一部爱情片。
quiz.name: eff1458155e80ccaa050e29e47a06a62.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I love romances.
quiz.nativeText: 哦，我喜欢爱情片。
quiz.name: 156cfbe974685c1cfaabf3be541895ec.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, we all do.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，我们都喜欢。
quiz.name: 9fe78257525d7e179774ceedbcce8fe0.mp3

quiz.text: A lady was picking through the frozen turkeys at a noisy grocery store.
quiz.nativeText: 一位女士正在一家嘈杂的杂货店里挑选冷冻火鸡。
quiz.hilitText: A lady was picking through the frozen turkeys at a {#*noisy*$} grocery store.
quiz.ipa: ə leɪdi wɑz pɪkɪŋ θru ðə froʊzən tɝkiz æt ə n{#*ɔɪ*$}zi ɡroʊsri stɔr
quiz.name: 9eb9b90162c7d7d992e20e133b63b487.mp3

quiz.text: She couldn't find one big enough for her family.
quiz.nativeText: 她没找到一只大小足够全家人吃的火鸡。
quiz.hilitText: She couldn't find one big enough for her family.
quiz.ipa: ʃi kʊdən faɪnd wʌn bɪɡ ɪnʌf frɝ hɝ fæmli
quiz.name: 8420affb777ca3349d1fc1ef3ebda104.mp3

quiz.text: She asked a stock boy,
quiz.nativeText: 于是她问年轻的店员：
quiz.name: 77e9e066d720c173991d554f0d971c05.mp3

quiz.text: "Do these turkeys get any bigger?"
quiz.nativeText: 有再大点儿的火鸡吗？（直译：这些火鸡会长大吗？）
quiz.ipa: du ðiz tɝkiz ɡɛt ɛni bɪɡɝ
quiz.name: be792082231b988191a487d26d10ec58.mp3

quiz.text: "No madam", the boy replied in a joyful voice, "they're dead."
quiz.nativeText: “不会的，女士。”小伙子愉快地回答道，“它们已经死了。”
quiz.hilitText: "No madam", the {#*boy*$} replied in a {#*joyful*$} {#*voice*$}, "they're dead."
quiz.ipa: noʊ mædəm ðə b{#*ɔɪ*$} rɪplaɪd ɪn ə dʒ{#*ɔɪ*$}fəl v{#*ɔɪ*$}s ðɛr dɛd
quiz.name: 8abd0f808c81015cd0828252aba2aa3e.mp3

quiz.text: Did you like the movie?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢这部电影吗？
quiz.name: f96a5c8f3cb6ce7eabebbd5c5d29824b.mp3

quiz.text: Absolutely. It was amazing.
quiz.nativeText: 当然啦。它棒极了。
quiz.name: de4aaacacee98b01cf8d767d35af127b.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you say that?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么这么说？
quiz.name: df710a638971b137a07e1b7ad17a64c2.mp3

quiz.text: The special effects were breathtaking.
quiz.nativeText: 特效很惊人。
quiz.name: a3b7d50a5d07f3638b3e48a05ee4a913.mp3

quiz.text: I agree.
quiz.nativeText: 我同意。
quiz.name: 8e767bce185c31c69667b5f333fba2b7.mp3

quiz.text: And I was on the edge of my seat the whole time.
quiz.nativeText: 我一直坐在椅子前沿专注地看。
quiz.name: 1261059f3008c082357002592456dd00.mp3

quiz.text: It is really exciting to watch a movie on the big screen.
quiz.nativeText: 在大银幕上看电影真的令人兴奋。
quiz.name: 8c4ac452735502c3c8419a9059b7eab5.mp3

quiz.text: But I found the twist at the very end a bit implausible.
quiz.nativeText: 但是我觉得结尾的反转有点不合理。
quiz.name: 56fae991083996d2489001bb924722a5.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. It kind of ruins the movie.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。这个反转几乎毁了这部电影。
quiz.name: 5b81ecb2aba64f7fa4dca150793d3d49.mp3

quiz.text: It is too bad, really.
quiz.nativeText: 这个反转太糟糕了，真的。
quiz.name: 1ddccf78497537fe59ddfde5df715e8a.mp3

quiz.text: Would you like to go to a movie?
quiz.nativeText: 你想去看场电影么？
quiz.name: 5f75f3181aeeb74eff2ab55bae48ebb2.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, I'd love to.
quiz.nativeText: 当然，我很乐意。
quiz.name: a53c02d73fcbfaa45e07a206304d4a34.mp3

quiz.text: What movie do you want to watch?
quiz.nativeText: 你想看什么电影呢？
quiz.name: 0782c1db3e66a6326cb9b6d836eea879.mp3

quiz.text: I want to watch the Wild Hunter.
quiz.nativeText: 我想看《荒野猎人》。
quiz.name: 0973158bb7fbe7e1e49b1734052d1bba.mp3

quiz.text: How long is it?
quiz.nativeText: 那部电影有多长？
quiz.name: 9ba89e6bca889b15e46242d8534697bc.mp3

quiz.text: About two and a half hours.
quiz.nativeText: 大约两个半小时。
quiz.name: 2c335a76106e2ba6f4d72c077a758ff7.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, that's too long.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，那也太长了。
quiz.name: 1017c01c60c7e850f7a6ddece5217ce3.mp3

quiz.text: But it sounds like a very interesting movie.
quiz.nativeText: 但是它听起来是部很有趣的电影。
quiz.name: 3f8995ddb7b7e8373dd2bcf88b0c9667.mp3

quiz.text: OK, let's go and watch it.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧，那我们一起去看吧。
quiz.name: 92e387b5e99bd14886c48a6c6e27632b.mp3

quiz.text: Great, let's go.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了，走吧！
quiz.name: c81d3336c083a6a713cf71334f128092.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of books do you usually like reading?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢读什么书呢？
quiz.hilitText: What kind of books do you usually like reading?
quiz.ipa: wʌt kaɪnd ʌv bʊks du ju juʒəli laɪk ridɪŋ
quiz.name: 7bf2f3ce7b736f923d07773aea784906.mp3

quiz.text: I like reading fiction books.
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢都虚构的文学作品。
quiz.name: 66ee5207741bb1320d21f6ab608a23f3.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of fiction books do you like?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢哪些呢？
quiz.hilitText: What kind of fiction books do you like?
quiz.ipa: wʌt kaɪnd ʌv fɪkʃən bʊks du ju laɪk
quiz.name: 5bc5cbd8cfa63dd39bfe3204a80e9557.mp3

quiz.text: Historical novels are my favorites.
quiz.nativeText: 历史小说是我的最爱。
quiz.name: cbc70f5363c8cb914725140e7d6a7cec.mp3

quiz.text: Why don't you like romance stories?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么不喜欢读言情小说？
quiz.hilitText: Why don't you like romance stories?
quiz.ipa: waɪ doʊnt ju laɪk roʊmæns stɔriz
quiz.name: 4ebb8a1e685e3751dc48230833188127.mp3

quiz.text: Because the plots are too heavy.
quiz.nativeText: 因为剧情太拖沓了。
quiz.hilitText: Because the plots are too heavy.
quiz.ipa: bɪkɔz ði plɑts ɑr tu hɛvi
quiz.name: d2e30d53c0256cb96521af01b8ba383f.mp3

quiz.text: I see. What masterpieces are you reading now?
quiz.nativeText: 原来如此。那你现在在读什么好书呢？
quiz.hilitText: I see. What masterpieces are you reading now?
quiz.ipa: aɪ si wʌt mæstɝpisɪz ɑr ju ridɪŋ naʊ
quiz.name: 4d4129631df78864ecd8757cba023a54.mp3

quiz.text: I'm reading the Old Man and the Sea.
quiz.nativeText: 我在读老人与海。
quiz.hilitText: I'm reading the Old Man and the Sea.
quiz.ipa: aɪm ridɪŋ ði oʊld mæn ænd ðə si
quiz.name: d101fb1d2c0e4083842621ac6509beba.mp3

quiz.text: How is the book?
quiz.nativeText: 这本书怎么样？
quiz.name: 378aad8b02a3f704ec3cf374759dcd3d.mp3

quiz.text: It's very readable.
quiz.nativeText: 这本书可读性很强。
quiz.name: a19c7cd1d90ee8825a935e651d4be626.mp3

quiz.text: Who wrote the book?
quiz.nativeText: 谁写了这本书？
quiz.name: 883e30c59b6ece2769dd2fe38b6bc072.mp3

quiz.text: Its author is Hemingway.
quiz.nativeText: 它的作者是海明威。
quiz.name: d765143a150bac2d5d91b65f9bb9e5ef.mp3

quiz.text: Who's Hemingway?
quiz.nativeText: 海明威是谁？
quiz.name: 345776fba658a7641ba43c8d5b934ec7.mp3

quiz.text: He's a novelist. He was awarded the Nobel Prize.
quiz.nativeText: 他是小说家，诺贝尔奖获得者。
quiz.hilitText: He's a novelist. He was awarded the Nobel Prize.
quiz.ipa: hiz ə nɑvələst hi wɑz əwɔrdəd ðə noʊbɛl praɪz
quiz.name: 4688c517735d4146be2a5291b3ac7158.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, I really want to know more about him. Do you have his autobiography?
quiz.nativeText: 真想好好了解一下他，你有他的自传么？
quiz.hilitText: Wow, I really want to know more about him. Do you have his autobiography?
quiz.ipa: waʊ aɪ rɪli wɑnt tɪ noʊ mɔr əbaʊt hɪm du ju hæv hɪz ɔtəbaɪɑɡrəfi
quiz.name: 81c9a9a492ce6a8ed062c36183c43af7.mp3

quiz.text: No, but you can search online.
quiz.nativeText: 没有。不过你可以上网搜索。
quiz.hilitText: No, but you can search online.
quiz.ipa: noʊ bʌt ju kæn sɝtʃ ɔnlaɪn
quiz.name: 3b3f25ac36e62dfc35f3c665eed5019a.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I will. Thank you!
quiz.nativeText: 好的，谢谢！
quiz.name: d7a5757e360c4aa0aebfb0766d41793a.mp3

quiz.text: You're welcome!
quiz.nativeText: 不客气！
quiz.name: 19849426c82f5278a5aa49743414eefe.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of books do you like best?
quiz.nativeText: 你最喜欢哪种书啊？
quiz.name: b976c931fba8dee7de94128fc8507cdf.mp3

quiz.text: Novels. How about you?
quiz.nativeText: 小说。你呢？
quiz.name: 0c0702dcd6769c0d146ac8535ea3ac69.mp3

quiz.text: I like history books, do you?
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢历史书，你喜欢么？
quiz.name: 98d5d66f62a787ea2adcae98bf07cd23.mp3

quiz.text: No, I think they are boring.
quiz.nativeText: 不喜欢，我觉得历史书很无聊。
quiz.name: 6eb7cbbe4cb668f30c16c4973ccb3a42.mp3

quiz.text: I guess different people have different tastes. What do you think about adventure books?
quiz.nativeText: 可能是不同人口味不同吧。你觉得探险书怎么样？
quiz.name: fd20b2c8cbd5dd58194347fbdd9164c8.mp3

quiz.text: I like adventure books.
quiz.nativeText: 我很喜欢探险书。
quiz.name: 383fbf835dc137e048fcf38b8464b3b6.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like love stories?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢言情故事么？
quiz.name: 2d402fafe723b4d2204d7ba1541e26fb.mp3

quiz.text: No, I like detective stories more.
quiz.nativeText: 不喜欢，相比而言我更喜欢侦探故事。
quiz.name: 1c9f0dc7ae630cbff4804fbcb25ce2ca.mp3

quiz.text: How about horror stories?
quiz.nativeText: 恐怖故事怎么样？
quiz.name: e145b536ddde389a2f0161947b989305.mp3

quiz.text: Not really. They are too scary.
quiz.nativeText: 不太喜欢，它们太吓人了。
quiz.name: 2b6de9a0541efb256d2f09a448e904ce.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. But some people are big fans of horror stories.
quiz.nativeText: 我同意，但是有些人特别喜欢恐怖故事。
quiz.name: c264e3fdba6f6af00be99a60748eabab.mp3

quiz.text: That's interesting.
quiz.nativeText: 那挺有意思的。
quiz.name: 53d8e795645b52caf32bf6d4089c7b2d.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，有什么能帮您的么？
quiz.name: 00346f765e18bca9bd7e0a4da76dbf22.mp3

quiz.text: I want the Economist, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我要一本《经济学人》，谢谢。
quiz.name: eb58a3e17e025fbdb1b2e58252fd9f36.mp3

quiz.text: It is very popular.
quiz.nativeText: 它很受欢迎啊！
quiz.name: 29380209369636e992f8c5040c218207.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I really like this magazine.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我很喜欢这本杂志。
quiz.name: 843021a986b532710bc34005baeeb8d1.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like fashion magazines?
quiz.nativeText: 您喜欢时尚杂志么？
quiz.name: e04bc104ba0721e266ec1b7e88cc3bf2.mp3

quiz.text: No, I'm not interested in fashion.
quiz.nativeText: 不喜欢，我对时尚不是很感兴趣。
quiz.name: 963413a750d3b52eaa95ee77e63b9081.mp3

quiz.text: How about short stories?
quiz.nativeText: 那短篇故事呢？
quiz.name: 06185c67f1013bd6cfb1fed582350a2d.mp3

quiz.text: I prefer poems.
quiz.nativeText: 我更喜欢诗歌。
quiz.name: 1dd853b155795189b0a137f0d4935ba5.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, you've got a particular taste.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，您的品味有点特别哦。
quiz.name: f4f4b9de196b4eb2dbdd8299b92e8c21.mp3

quiz.text: I guess so.
quiz.nativeText: 可能是吧。
quiz.name: 3a96c3cd975fd4afd088eb6df7d2ced2.mp3

quiz.text: Here is your magazine.
quiz.nativeText: 这是您要的杂志。
quiz.name: 38f1e953fe24aa5885ab69f53b8ae2c1.mp3

quiz.text: OK, thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，太感谢啦！
quiz.name: 5a0b1e449586ffd8105a6e46e10260ba.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of fiction do you like?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢哪类小说？
quiz.hilitText: What kind of fiction do you like?
quiz.ipa: wʌt kaɪnd ʌv fɪkʃən du ju laɪk
quiz.name: 60eeee701659c452caa42ea636afc250.mp3

quiz.text: Historical novels are my favorites.
quiz.nativeText: 历史小说是我的最爱。
quiz.name: cbc70f5363c8cb914725140e7d6a7cec.mp3

quiz.text: What are you reading now?
quiz.nativeText: 你现在读什么？
quiz.name: 101e2f0d3051b415faa0ccf8d8a0f0a2.mp3

quiz.text: I'm reading The Old Man and The Sea.
quiz.nativeText: 我在读《老人与海》。
quiz.hilitText: I'm reading The Old Man and The Sea.
quiz.ipa: aɪm ridɪŋ ði oʊld mæn ænd ðə si
quiz.name: d101fb1d2c0e4083842621ac6509beba.mp3

quiz.text: How is the book?
quiz.nativeText: 这本书怎么样？
quiz.name: 378aad8b02a3f704ec3cf374759dcd3d.mp3

quiz.text: It's highly readable.
quiz.nativeText: 它读起来非常有趣。
quiz.name: 806c0812401b44af99279619dfaee376.mp3

quiz.text: Who wrote the book?
quiz.nativeText: 谁写了这本书？
quiz.name: 883e30c59b6ece2769dd2fe38b6bc072.mp3

quiz.text: The author is Hemingway.
quiz.nativeText: 作者是海明威。
quiz.name: 3498bdb0920d05e501fe11c42a669c2d.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, who is he?
quiz.nativeText: 哦，他是谁？
quiz.name: 573e9f56aab1337aa5b91137456732da.mp3

quiz.text: He's a novelist. He was awarded the Nobel Prize before.
quiz.nativeText: 他是个小说家。他以前得过诺贝尔奖。
quiz.hilitText: He's a novelist. He was awarded the Nobel Prize before.
quiz.ipa: hiz ə nɑvələst hi wɑz əwɔrdəd ðə noʊbɛl praɪz bɪfɔr
quiz.name: 1f5c1545239a17f655fe0579222cba56.mp3

quiz.text: Hi Jim. It's been a while.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨吉姆，好久不见啊。
quiz.hilitText: Hi Jim. It's been a while.
quiz.ipa: haɪ dʒɪm ɪts bɪn ə waɪl
quiz.name: 1155c98a4dcd00395d05a5c39e10886d.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I heard you won a photography prize. Congratulations!
quiz.nativeText: 是啊。我听说你拿了一个摄影奖，恭喜啦！
quiz.hilitText: Yeah. I heard you won a photography prize. Congratulations!
quiz.ipa: jæ aɪ hɝd ju wʌn ə fətɑɡrəfi praɪz kənɡrætʃəleɪʃənz
quiz.name: 9c653b2f9ad422a2a021590cd9cecd0e.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I've had a lot of practice as a photographer.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。作为一名摄影师，我一直勤加练习。
quiz.hilitText: Thank you. I've had a lot of practice as a photographer.
quiz.ipa: θæŋk ju aɪv hæd ə lɑt ʌv præktɪs ɛz ə fətɑɡrəfɝ
quiz.name: 0dab593f18140640b150f4e64254f9e9.mp3

quiz.text: I guess that's why they say practice makes perfect.
quiz.nativeText: 我猜这就是为什么人们常说熟能生巧。
quiz.hilitText: I guess that's why they say practice makes perfect.
quiz.ipa: aɪ ɡɛs ðæts hwaɪ ðeɪ seɪ præktəs meɪks pɝfɛkt
quiz.name: 80bc949df349b9469263698e6029dc88.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like photography?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢摄影吗？
quiz.name: ef7de6cf06d81897070536d32b506fe3.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. I take a picture whenever I see something beautiful.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊。无论什么时候，只要我看到美丽的事物就会拍下来。
quiz.hilitText: Yeah. I take a picture whenever I see something beautiful.
quiz.ipa: jæ aɪ teɪk ə pɪktʃɝ wɛnɛvɝ aɪ si sʌmθɪŋ bjutəfəl
quiz.name: f7c655154b4032f9926445c091120f93.mp3

quiz.text: No wonder you post so many pictures of your girlfriend on your social network.
quiz.nativeText: 难怪你在博客上放了这么多你女朋友的照片。
quiz.hilitText: No wonder you post so many pictures of your girlfriend on your social network.
quiz.ipa: noʊ wʌndɝ ju poʊst soʊ mɛni pɪktʃɝz ʌv jɔr ɡɝlfrɛnd ɑn jɔr soʊʃəl nɛtwɝk
quiz.name: 471d2795d294390dd8515a202baabbe3.mp3

quiz.text: What can I say? She takes to the camera well.
quiz.nativeText: 怎么说呢？她真的很上镜。
quiz.hilitText: What can I say? She takes to the camera well.
quiz.ipa: wʌt kæn aɪ seɪ ʃi teɪks tu ðə kæmɝə wɛl
quiz.name: 508caa0c48ac19689a3a042965cf0f72.mp3

quiz.text: If I were you, I would enlarge one and put it on the wall.
quiz.nativeText: 如果我是你的话，我就会放大一张照片然后把它挂在墙上。
quiz.hilitText: If I were you, I would enlarge one and put it on the wall.
quiz.ipa: ɪf aɪ wɝ ju aɪ wʊd ɪnlɑrdʒ wʌn ænd pʊt ɪt ɑn ðə wɔl
quiz.name: 91e09a18e0c31f81aa6cfe06d8d07bcd.mp3

quiz.text: I have already done so and had it put in a beautiful frame.
quiz.nativeText: 我已经这么做了，还把它裱到了一个很漂亮的相框里。
quiz.hilitText: I have already done so and had it put in a beautiful frame.
quiz.ipa: aɪ hæv ɔlrɛdi dʌn soʊ ænd hæd ɪt pʊt ɪn ə bjutəfəl freɪm
quiz.name: bd39e9522184e174bce5165de155635b.mp3

quiz.text: Good for you.
quiz.nativeText: 棒棒哒！
quiz.name: 21cc4f52cdbb78a9af71c2e857314de2.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: Is that a face mask?
quiz.nativeText: 那是面膜么？
quiz.name: e0b17a80b6319bbc104549ea22f257d0.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I have a lot of them.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我有很多呢。
quiz.name: 9c3590ee18cc74a93cf9af77f23453f2.mp3

quiz.text: What is this?
quiz.nativeText: 这是什么？
quiz.name: dc9d5532a6e95ca2761379375dbc47e4.mp3

quiz.text: It's lipstick.
quiz.nativeText: 这是一支口红。
quiz.name: 22ce9e46e9ebe6d1dbe878fcfb41c1b8.mp3

quiz.text: What about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 那这个呢？
quiz.name: 96cdc502e42e9f5fefb5ef9705e2d26e.mp3

quiz.text: It's my nail polish.
quiz.nativeText: 这是我的指甲油。
quiz.name: 2f73d5623837bba09966ad434c119bba.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have sunscreen?
quiz.nativeText: 你有防晒霜么？
quiz.name: 04c4ccbcc03d7c7b8d7ae9b450cf6985.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I have two bottles.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我有两瓶。
quiz.name: c9eeaa24bda95bf645d742b3ba9420e3.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, what are the names of these two bottles?
quiz.nativeText: 哇，这两瓶是什么啊？
quiz.name: bd8675ff0c3ebc4566286a0eaba3765a.mp3

quiz.text: One is day cream and the other is night cream.
quiz.nativeText: 一瓶是日霜，另一瓶是夜霜。
quiz.name: b6fba90a496fdfcaa4c1ce22c7ce3c42.mp3

quiz.text: You do have a lot of cosmetics.
quiz.nativeText: 你真的好多化妆品啊！
quiz.name: 3bea03c628616e4d8e9d73d68678c2f0.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I guess so.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我想是的。
quiz.name: a46061cfb0f81356e3854cd880f0821d.mp3

quiz.text: Hey you! Give me the ball.
quiz.name: b192ce54d5185f09c2949217785188d0.mp3

quiz.text: I want to play too.
quiz.name: 9ffd644fdc906d9a34c6067b8fc32d3e.mp3

quiz.text: You are a bit rude.
quiz.name: f8b2b2f4d4b7356f91f5a2b960bf2903.mp3

quiz.text: We don't want to play with you.
quiz.name: e252bb347e885d0dc20967cbb27f902e.mp3

quiz.text: Why don't they want to play with me?
quiz.nativeText: 他们为什么不和我玩？
quiz.name: e6310e5c7167a4d73129b315993c1b57.mp3

quiz.text: Come over here, Mike. Let me tell you a story.
quiz.name: 4c5e3334eeeb246d83c1ee19bd7fa2ee.mp3

quiz.text: One day Mr wind and Miss sun are chatting in the sky.
quiz.name: 42105bce42d92cc824f636a5f8612397.mp3

quiz.text: 'I'm strong. I can do anything!' says Mr Wind.
quiz.name: dc2cf8f0a52bbaa00b550fd4299dfecf.mp3

quiz.text: 'Can you see the man and the little girl down there?'
quiz.name: a57dfff136d5659a7838752dd4c127d7.mp3

quiz.text: 'I can blow their clothes off.'
quiz.name: e6bf8113f59837ccd8e8cd39f6909e5d.mp3

quiz.text: 'Watch me!' Mr Wind blows hard.
quiz.name: 24ceaf40cee7c5e0a4a29940902e1e37.mp3

quiz.text: 'Dad I feel cold,' says the girl.
quiz.name: f7891eb4409b97c2741647c5f8a11af3.mp3

quiz.text: Let me see your passport, please.
quiz.nativeText: 请让我看下你的护照。
quiz.name: cc522d07545036359e74341c545b5f73.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Here it is.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。在这里。
quiz.name: 62665b779550430181e4703d2f3a8d29.mp3

quiz.text: You come from China, right?
quiz.nativeText: 你来自中国，对吗？
quiz.name: 6c79cdbb04c0120262a45374820d4add.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I'm here on vacation.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我来这度假。
quiz.name: 9e725eee61e1b38afbbbddea8a44b2c9.mp3

quiz.text: How long will you be staying in America?
quiz.nativeText: 你会在美国呆多久？
quiz.name: c28d0ec685c1324394fd8a36edb243fa.mp3

quiz.text: Fifteen days.
quiz.nativeText: 十五天。
quiz.name: d97799e2fd4a7620190fedd3dcdca949.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Could you hand me your Declaration Form?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你可以交给我申报表吗？
quiz.name: 670ec33ee639cbb81ccf0ce760f2ec5f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, here is the form.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。表格在这里。
quiz.name: b25024847d9befc0142fdf66157e0714.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any fresh food, live plants, or animals?
quiz.nativeText: 你有携带任何新鲜食物，活的植物或是动物吗？
quiz.name: 565d28508782be6fdec41f68db27188b.mp3

quiz.text: No. None of those.
quiz.nativeText: 不，都没有。
quiz.name: 51f401ea9cd58925a6b0fbc5aac35fff.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Here is your passport.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。这是你的护照。
quiz.name: cd83bc47293db2845e7c960d4b1b2e6b.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 多谢。
quiz.name: ba83ea1f3e5a32073e8575985c231d15.mp3

quiz.text: May I see your passport?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以看一下你的护照吗？
quiz.name: e75e65f26ae93ed9229486d489f3486c.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。给你
quiz.name: f78202ca3dae6a0c5701fec74ff32a15.mp3

quiz.text: What is the purpose of your visit?
quiz.nativeText: 你此行的目的是什么？
quiz.name: 6ee0c33bacfce5b23decd3993211495f.mp3

quiz.text: To visit my daughter.
quiz.nativeText: 是来看我女儿。
quiz.name: 558b1c2487a06ac8b3f15f4676768773.mp3

quiz.text: And how long are you going to be staying here?
quiz.nativeText: 你要在这里待多长时间？
quiz.name: 47a4fe6b6b40bfba53db61341e6f1577.mp3

quiz.text: About two weeks.
quiz.nativeText: 大约两个星期。
quiz.name: ff61a9bde900160888c5d775b2353d15.mp3

quiz.text: Where are you going to stay?
quiz.nativeText: 你会住在哪里？
quiz.name: 5f2e456fe028c7f4627e7e95c77eabf2.mp3

quiz.text: At my daughter's house.
quiz.nativeText: 我女儿家里。
quiz.name: 893574b4ad286559c540db9c7eab2f4a.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Could you put your handbag on the counter please? Do you have any food, plants, or animals?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你可以把你的手提包放到柜台上来吗？你有带任何的食物、植物或者动物吗？
quiz.name: afdd0b417132ff6ac2326ce345ffefe8.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I've brought some fresh pears.
quiz.nativeText: 有，我带了一些新鲜的梨。
quiz.name: 7dd57731df544d12c7a59b4e1da95198.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry, sir, you can't bring fruit into Germany. I'll have to confiscate these.
quiz.nativeText: 对不起，先生。你不可以把水果带入德国。我不得不把这些没收。
quiz.name: 91a95635a6579f8ef429761c6439b102.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, that's too bad.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，太糟糕了。
quiz.name: 97386c6f6be00a0de58db25acde22876.mp3

quiz.text: Can I see your passport, your immigration form and your Customs Declaration Form, please?
quiz.nativeText: 我能看下你的护照，移民表和你的海关申请表吗？
quiz.name: 358e6e148484f98984c9fc50071e2e9a.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。在这里。
quiz.name: 140f43a91a62c2624c9c67ce206c44b7.mp3

quiz.text: Are you traveling for business or pleasure?
quiz.nativeText: 你是出差还是休闲旅行？
quiz.name: a7e783a3ad3a69dbea5c226ac3641272.mp3

quiz.text: I'm here on a business trip.
quiz.nativeText: 我来这里出差。
quiz.name: 4061c8e632aa94f4a542aaf6698cd779.mp3

quiz.text: How long do you plan to be here?
quiz.nativeText: 你打算在这里呆多久？
quiz.name: dce074dc83a11b85c0d63f1819d29f8e.mp3

quiz.text: About one week.
quiz.nativeText: 大约一个星期。
quiz.name: e44725a252609d6e9099117f3837b06b.mp3

quiz.text: When was your last visit?
quiz.nativeText: 您上次来是什么时候？
quiz.name: 0ff211529edacfd4013d7a1f18e4917c.mp3

quiz.text: In March of this year.
quiz.nativeText: 今年的三月。
quiz.name: 6fc26d3bcc495a35a3a40d1fb0fff3c4.mp3

quiz.text: Anything to declare?
quiz.nativeText: 您有什么东西要申报的吗？
quiz.name: 57aafd2d2e1ea89ce3cb6760b0efa4d7.mp3

quiz.text: No, nothing that I know of.
quiz.nativeText: 没有，据我所知没有。
quiz.name: 73463b99353f237a156f6fdcb3cc14fd.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Please open your luggage.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。请打开你的行李。
quiz.name: 037162c50410722996cb1088e725c0a5.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here you go.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。给你。
quiz.name: db302fe379bc1c9b5936d7e775467122.mp3

quiz.text: What do you have in your luggage?
quiz.nativeText: 你的行李里有什么？
quiz.name: c203528608232aaefa2f24d0896911e2.mp3

quiz.text: Just some personal items.
quiz.nativeText: 只是一些个人物品。
quiz.name: 88dde7256e7e00a88e502e8eb61dfa23.mp3

quiz.text: Open your suitcase, please.
quiz.nativeText: 请打开你的行李箱。
quiz.name: e242218aa34d99932a4866b6d2584ce9.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Here it is.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。在这里。
quiz.name: 62665b779550430181e4703d2f3a8d29.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have anything to declare?
quiz.nativeText: 你有什么要申报的吗？
quiz.name: d43a25b6c0a5186d26f920fabaeeca59.mp3

quiz.text: I'm not sure what should be declared.
quiz.nativeText: 我不确定该审报什么。
quiz.name: c80e4eb8f8e84f7cb86e18370f341bdd.mp3

quiz.text: Let's see. You should declare the camera and the laptop.
quiz.nativeText: 我看看。你应该申报这个相机和笔记本电脑。
quiz.name: 1f74a27e34760a4e9bff950312d22e34.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I will.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我会的。
quiz.name: b369d703f9881f65db9e55cb2f5c54b3.mp3

quiz.text: Are you bringing in any valuable gifts?
quiz.nativeText: 你是否带有任何有价值的礼品？
quiz.name: 5568700025c057fad38bb7e178d71119.mp3

quiz.text: No, but I have some small souvenirs.
quiz.nativeText: 没有，但我有些小的纪念品。
quiz.name: 5feeb283bdf50b2f2b2cf915108de9ad.mp3

quiz.text: OK. This is the Customs Declaration Form. Please fill in it and keep it with you.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。这是海关申报表。请填写并且保管好。
quiz.name: b90c2a7633bdb0146d9884018729cabe.mp3

quiz.text: All right.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。
quiz.name: b6a5a9fa043c349d795ad0b886d50f46.mp3

quiz.text: That'll be all. You may close your suitcase now.
quiz.nativeText: 就这些了。你现在可以合上你的行李箱了。
quiz.name: d9628700b62decb3403c86463f38c45e.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: How many pieces of luggage do you have?
quiz.nativeText: 你带了多少件行李？
quiz.name: 70d7280427dfc12687285b6173e1d162.mp3

quiz.text: Three suitcases and a handbag.
quiz.nativeText: 三个行李箱和一个手提包。
quiz.name: 6e7aecc92333dcb0121c434c9b3a60cf.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any fruits or meat with you?
quiz.nativeText: 你有带任何水果或肉类吗？
quiz.name: 0826e30a3425f67652bcbeca7d010261.mp3

quiz.text: No, I don't.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我没有。
quiz.name: 2afa1508c77a592b5b49ecd95137faa2.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have anything to declare?
quiz.nativeText: 你有任何要申报的吗？
quiz.name: d43a25b6c0a5186d26f920fabaeeca59.mp3

quiz.text: No. I have nothing to declare.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我没有东西要申报。
quiz.name: e8f3ea2010103e2cb8a4e53216be5001.mp3

quiz.text: Would you please open your suitcases?
quiz.nativeText: 你可以打开你的行李箱吗？
quiz.name: 8a0e9eef81e5ea8bf39cda45306ea414.mp3

quiz.text: All right.
quiz.nativeText: 好的
quiz.name: b6a5a9fa043c349d795ad0b886d50f46.mp3

quiz.text: Is that a bottle of whisky?
quiz.nativeText: 那是一瓶威士忌吗？
quiz.name: d12f5db3fbf88e03c22d2c8a1c825f20.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I bought it in the duty-free shop at the airport.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我在机场的免税店买的。
quiz.name: 0bdf847246fbfeb95b33135ef1ce328e.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thank you. You may lock up your suitcases.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。谢谢。你可以锁上行李箱了。
quiz.name: 1f64bb64eb92d690255945d76af3328d.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks. Have a nice day.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。祝你今天愉快。
quiz.name: 40cc4a54b6d058db37d150237e21cf4d.mp3

quiz.text: Welcome aboard. Let me take this bag for you.
quiz.nativeText: 欢迎登机。让我来帮您拿包吧。
quiz.name: 75e02027be50eb81fe0f314f35ae1437.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: May I see your boarding pass, please?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以看下您的登机牌吗？
quiz.name: d728565b5d0b71da3779497484593c29.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 给你。
quiz.name: 59780e91d8429f15db0aedd53c2e42c2.mp3

quiz.text: Your seat is twenty-six K. This way, please. This window seat is yours.
quiz.nativeText: 是26K座位。请这边走。这个靠窗的座位是您的。
quiz.name: 4357fa1cceaa8a7eaa189d6f6abeed25.mp3

quiz.text: Great! Could you put my bag on the overhead bin for me?
quiz.nativeText: 太好啦！你可以帮我把包放到舱顶置物柜上吗?
quiz.name: 1ef412affb0cd49cee11a1e6a6f63ec9.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Anything else I can do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。还要我为您做些什么吗？
quiz.name: 758e151184546b334de7de29b962cdbf.mp3

quiz.text: No, not at the moment.
quiz.nativeText: 不了，现在不用。
quiz.name: c3b7202064df2da114502d6f71817905.mp3

quiz.text: If you need me, please push the red call button here above your head.
quiz.nativeText: 如果你需要我的帮助，请按头顶上的红色呼叫按钮。
quiz.name: e68721916918b425382db71e56e8c358.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。谢谢。
quiz.name: e17438892053cfa1766d7ee83964e06d.mp3

quiz.text: Hello. May I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 你好。有什么需要帮助的吗？
quiz.name: 2e33bba99eed283b8bf561834cfcdaea.mp3

quiz.text: Excuse me, but where is seat sixteen C?
quiz.nativeText: 不好意思，16C座位在哪里？
quiz.name: ae1520e3a5692fda61fb6e138e6d1e1a.mp3

quiz.text: May I see your boarding pass first, please?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以先看下你的登机牌吗？
quiz.name: f8fba88592c44e7652213aa31abcb00e.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here it is.
quiz.nativeText: 可以。在这儿。
quiz.name: 1faa93332cb26f70f933ac696a3a8d78.mp3

quiz.text: Sixteen C is right back here.
quiz.nativeText: 16C就在这后面。
quiz.name: 2a545c94338f4d24ddd19d16d29c768b.mp3

quiz.text: Will you show me to my seat, please?
quiz.nativeText: 可以请你带我去我的座位吗？
quiz.name: dc04acf621c58c4ce21f6af564132db0.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here, this window seat is yours.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。在这儿，这个靠窗座位是您的。
quiz.name: f745cec4d19b33bf96ab29df56302af9.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I'm sorry, but may I change my seat? I would prefer an aisle seat.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。不好意思，我可以换个座位吗？我想要一个靠走廊的座位。
quiz.name: 5a2251d833e3ca79a152c6295a0bf2c4.mp3

quiz.text: I see. There is a seat available for you. Come this way, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。有一个座位可以给您。请这边走。
quiz.name: fc1e373e5ad2f1c412c15ef8b505c102.mp3

quiz.text: That's good. Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了。太谢谢你了。
quiz.name: a60d4fcf3ee405d800910e5ded138c99.mp3

quiz.text: May I have your ticket and passport please?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以看一下你的机票和护照吗？
quiz.name: ef9232e2708a2a737dd5c78c60b0cbb9.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 给你。
quiz.name: 59780e91d8429f15db0aedd53c2e42c2.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any baggage to check?
quiz.nativeText: 你有行李要托运吗？
quiz.name: b8efdf1631b29ffb3a19cdda9493e665.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, this suitcase.
quiz.nativeText: 有，这个行李箱。
quiz.name: c970d36d63852965dc5660b24208c49f.mp3

quiz.text: Please put your luggage on this scale.
quiz.nativeText: 请将你的行李放在秤上。
quiz.name: e130f36a900b3106ec9b4c04685fa847.mp3

quiz.text: OK. What's the weight limit?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。重量限制是多少？
quiz.name: 3ddaeb7f1ba473f39face974dfa70f7f.mp3

quiz.text: Thirty two kilos.
quiz.nativeText: 三十二千克。
quiz.name: bdb223ef98714c62e7df950c2a7e1b44.mp3

quiz.text: Well, it seems that my luggage is a little over-weighted.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我的行李似乎有一点超重。
quiz.name: 47a0371e2c3006d7b66eacc3567e126f.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening. Your ticket and passport, please?
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好。请出示你的机票和护照。
quiz.name: e7b1bcbfd37cd1609a24edce5da7d7c2.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 给你。
quiz.name: 59780e91d8429f15db0aedd53c2e42c2.mp3

quiz.text: How many bags do you have?
quiz.nativeText: 你有几个包？
quiz.name: 9390d9ddbed11dcc8ba4eb9e9c999e3c.mp3

quiz.text: I have two.
quiz.nativeText: 我有两个。
quiz.name: b4a764eba6e9f1731223a1223c4a8044.mp3

quiz.text: Would you please put them on the scale?
quiz.nativeText: 你可以把包放到秤上吗?
quiz.name: fd411ef27e6e5b7fde212ef0462e772f.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Is the flight on time?
quiz.nativeText: 当然。航班按时到吗？
quiz.name: a3f7e6bb86ee1eff51a6ca3cf5067d7e.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry, there'll be a twenty-minute delay. Your flight will be boarding in about an hour and a half.
quiz.nativeText: 我很抱歉，航班将延误二十分钟。您的航班会于大约一至一个半小时后开始登机。
quiz.name: 41301e0a2ba4c739515292452a862f44.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。谢谢。
quiz.name: e17438892053cfa1766d7ee83964e06d.mp3

quiz.text: Next, please.
quiz.nativeText: 请下一位。
quiz.name: 30fb188830486661974fe42b62d9a236.mp3

quiz.text: Here are our passports and tickets.
quiz.nativeText: 这是我们的护照和机票。
quiz.name: 0e82027ac81afb60a77ef734e1885486.mp3

quiz.text: Let's see. OK, here are your passports back. Are these four items all your luggage?
quiz.nativeText: 我看一下。好的，给你护照。这四件都是你的行李？
quiz.name: b428c4e8ba284a4e55c61ded53fdc202.mp3

quiz.text: Yes! And these two are carry-ons.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，还有两件随身物品。
quiz.name: 9908e61681f94574530774c76d6512b3.mp3

quiz.text: You'd better attach these stickers to your carry-ons.
quiz.nativeText: 你最好把这些贴纸贴在随身行李上。
quiz.name: 223d65a031b910006efb304ecd8fbab6.mp3

quiz.text: Right. Thanks.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。谢谢。
quiz.name: fb38c6023845c12949a3d86e375e3be2.mp3

quiz.text: Here are your tickets, boarding pass and baggage check receipt. We'll be boarding in about an hour.
quiz.nativeText: 这是你的机票，登机牌和行李收据。我们会在大概一小时之后安排登机。
quiz.name: 1785fc10ec1738a9ef5f87917cb5714d.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你的帮助。
quiz.name: dbf82f8a88d11bae1983b3470914dc84.mp3

quiz.text: Can I help you, sir?
quiz.nativeText: 先生，需要帮助吗？
quiz.name: 828f453bebc06a18ae55c7b126d8232e.mp3

quiz.text: Is this the right counter to check in for U A zero eight seven?
quiz.nativeText: 这是办理航班UA087登记手续的柜台吗？
quiz.name: 47ab8306d979066a93c8c8c6ed952978.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, it is. May I see your ticket and passport, please? And please put your baggage on the scale.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我可以看下你的机票和护照吗？还有请你将���的行李放在秤上。
quiz.name: 147708cbc251f2f29fed38c91a562c12.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。给你。
quiz.name: f78202ca3dae6a0c5701fec74ff32a15.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry, but I'm afraid your baggage exceeds the weight limit.
quiz.nativeText: 不好意思，恐怕你的行李超过了总重量限制。
quiz.name: 6117a3e86b0858f61f91fe905b460a07.mp3

quiz.text: I'll take some things out and put them in my carry-on baggage.
quiz.nativeText: 那我把一些东西拿出来放在我的随身行李里面。
quiz.name: 31ede9a18b0ffc2a5440dbba2aae71a1.mp3

quiz.text: That's fine.
quiz.nativeText: 这样也行。
quiz.name: cba48e06e1bbfb4b37fe2f745dd43e25.mp3

quiz.text: May I carry on this laptop bag?
quiz.nativeText: 我可以带上我的笔记本电脑包吗？
quiz.name: 73aff630d6d18b86a3bd06df911ba4e1.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Please attach this baggage tag. Here is your boarding pass.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。请贴上这个行李票。这是你的登机牌。
quiz.name: 1f8e06d8750e88a4a048a7f02f262307.mp3

quiz.text: Which gate?
quiz.nativeText: 在哪个口?
quiz.name: 3c0f10aa1c9c39bbf2ac47cb03ed240c.mp3

quiz.text: Gate Three. The flight will depart on time in an hour.
quiz.nativeText: 三号口。飞机会在一小时后准时起飞。
quiz.name: c7b2ac86b53a5c2c6e2cb3c2474621bb.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 我能帮你做点什么吗？
quiz.name: fe83ecdae8eb4d17855a3b437ccbf86b.mp3

quiz.text: Could you please turn down the air conditioner?
quiz.nativeText: 可以请你将冷气调弱一些吗？
quiz.name: 532f874603d719283eacc921ab580fb3.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry, but we can't regulate the air conditioner. I suggest you turn off the airflow overhead.
quiz.nativeText: 我很抱歉，我们不能调节空调。我建议您可以关掉头顶的空调口。
quiz.name: 1a6532163ced75eaefd166fd5371942c.mp3

quiz.text: I've already turned it off, but I still feel cold.
quiz.nativeText: 我已经关了，但我还是觉得冷。
quiz.name: 2c8399a1dd5f426ccebee4777bb8ff50.mp3

quiz.text: Try using the blanket here.
quiz.nativeText: 可以尝试用这里的毯子。
quiz.name: 870f2c15cecc9c44fca33332b77224c2.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have a thicker blanket? I'm trying to sleep.
quiz.nativeText: 你有厚一些的毯子吗？���想睡觉。
quiz.name: e628cb9cc3f4afa597f9014a19a949a0.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. I'll be back with it soon.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。我会马上带过来。
quiz.name: 9e3ff9e65cbc5f1d7d4554fc5334cf03.mp3

quiz.text: When is dinner?
quiz.nativeText: 晚餐是什么时候？
quiz.name: 3eba979c4df3fabaabc7db6353f82ac9.mp3

quiz.text: In about two hours.
quiz.nativeText: 大约在两个小时后。
quiz.name: 05c094a6fe07eb7c701b5475759e7e07.mp3

quiz.text: Please wake me up then. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 请到时候叫醒我。谢谢。
quiz.name: 3ae11489f2a61decddf931b155a69e76.mp3

quiz.text: Excuse me, could you tell me where the railway station is?
quiz.nativeText: 打扰一下。您知道火车站在哪里吗？
quiz.name: 58b5bb1ee5a10c79b26653908b395754.mp3

quiz.text: It's quite far from here. You'd better take the bus.
quiz.nativeText: 火车站离这里挺远的。你最好坐公交。
quiz.name: 288b5241d0b1c1969f4f07399aceefaf.mp3

quiz.text: Which bus should I take?
quiz.nativeText: 我该坐哪辆公交车？
quiz.name: 31a6cd184134d220c18fe01818ff4fb4.mp3

quiz.text: Number Eleven.
quiz.nativeText: 十一路公交。
quiz.name: c7a3e298ed59b3458ff5598ccb78ff07.mp3

quiz.text: Where's the bus stop?
quiz.nativeText: 公交车站在哪里?
quiz.name: 3440ef49826f62937c6563e382d70ff2.mp3

quiz.text: Walk two blocks down the road. The bus stop will be on your right-hand side.
quiz.nativeText: 沿着路走两个街区，公交车站会在右手边。
quiz.name: 93db35ed6d2f2f29c50489c5af5e9620.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds easy to find. And which bus stop should I get off at?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来很好找。那我应该在哪站下车呢？
quiz.name: bf9762b95f7c01a5b2951e353d9c8e8e.mp3

quiz.text: Just tell the driver where you're going, and he'll tell you when the bus arrives.
quiz.nativeText: 直接跟司机说你要去哪里，车到站了他会告诉你的。
quiz.name: ba8740f2c88da0b09109cf96d1a438f6.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。非常感谢。
quiz.name: 93ef428467a7f133c17b0ce281a41b65.mp3

quiz.text: You're welcome.
quiz.nativeText: 不用谢。
quiz.name: a7f7731f93f4078dbb98a3eb8088610d.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, miss.
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，女士。
quiz.name: 044072139ab1b803bdcdf11218cd7bbd.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon.
quiz.nativeText: 下午好。
quiz.name: 3faf16779af82f5c427141c2195d117d.mp3

quiz.text: You look confused. Is there anything I can help you with?
quiz.nativeText: 你看起来很困惑。有什么我能帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: a980c1fb2bc1d638919d073b9d6eac68.mp3

quiz.text: I'm not sure if I've taken the right bus.
quiz.nativeText: 我不确定我上了正确的公交车。
quiz.name: 961d62130766b86e98d4983d4253a68a.mp3

quiz.text: Where are you going?
quiz.nativeText: 你要去哪里？
quiz.name: a56ee86ea6861d3991d985b173dd7a1b.mp3

quiz.text: The Museum of Natural history.
quiz.nativeText: 自然历史博物馆。
quiz.name: 0c018994fbf27bdaae26644cb10d6629.mp3

quiz.text: You're on the right bus.
quiz.nativeText: 那你坐对车了。
quiz.name: 4c4fd281b83501d62955ba894a38ce5e.mp3

quiz.text: I'm happy to hear that.
quiz.nativeText: 我很高兴您这么说。
quiz.name: 5d948557ff1f01d296518aca1cd22e51.mp3

quiz.text: Do you need me to remind you when we get there?
quiz.nativeText: 我们到站的时候需要我提醒你吗？
quiz.name: 202d9c2ddcc66fdfdb8794b6b1cb1a3b.mp3

quiz.text: That would be great. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 那就太好了。谢谢。
quiz.name: acc76d45993a94384e94710321f877e8.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。
quiz.name: b90a14c0f61810e0234df3bc2f7261d2.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. I've booked a car online.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。我在网上预约了一辆车。
quiz.name: 53c345b1c7347db57e94c4380f1e4cc9.mp3

quiz.text: Could I have your reservation number, please?
quiz.nativeText: 你的预约号可以让我看下吗？
quiz.name: 902dbcabb9af3ebfc82368c369f2bac1.mp3

quiz.text: Here it is.
quiz.nativeText: 给你。
quiz.name: 95fff81346c08bbeb392beb8fb9d02b3.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Wait a moment while we validate your credit card.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。请稍等，我们需要确认您的信用卡。
quiz.name: 19f96d15cd1efe48bc43c9ff284fdae0.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Take your time.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。不着急。
quiz.name: 5ed2e7a38c00a07653514be4ef266914.mp3

quiz.text: You haven't chosen full insurance. Do you want it?
quiz.nativeText: 您还没有选择全额保险。您是否需要？
quiz.name: d3c441f94e16f9a6d9b43e21fb4c24a5.mp3

quiz.text: No, thanks.
quiz.nativeText: 不了，谢谢。
quiz.name: 398e67ef72b499d050f2d90042388980.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want roadside service?
quiz.nativeText: 您想要道路救援吗？
quiz.name: 79a880670c76343f251d6e71de0c4ffd.mp3

quiz.text: No, I don't.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我不想。
quiz.name: 2afa1508c77a592b5b49ecd95137faa2.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want a tank of gas?
quiz.nativeText: 您想要一箱汽油吗？
quiz.name: 32e68dd061733365df2c04d0c7a865ee.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, please fill it up.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，请加满油。
quiz.name: 0038e49872bb00d5c70508efb5ce3119.mp3

quiz.text: Excuse me, sir. May I see your ticket, please?
quiz.nativeText: 打扰一下，先生。我可以看下你的车票吗？
quiz.name: 7436fcae2f0d75d50dd12bf0f21520ff.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。给你。
quiz.name: f78202ca3dae6a0c5701fec74ff32a15.mp3

quiz.text: OK. You're going to New Orleans, right?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你要去新奥尔良，对吧？
quiz.name: 7b61b126cc12eef86239aac40c0a285f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. When does the train arrive?
quiz.nativeText: 是的。火车什么时候到？
quiz.name: c26473aa9827cef7a53f32cf4bd44825.mp3

quiz.text: In about three hours.
quiz.nativeText: 大约三个小时后。
quiz.name: bc58366cd3c430ec7639ac3d862b5f1d.mp3

quiz.text: May I have some medicine just in case? I get sick on trains.
quiz.nativeText: 以防万一可以给我一些药吗？我在火车上会不舒服。
quiz.name: a90b77ee99276521ef673d2194e1e8ae.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Here are some pills and a sanitary bag.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。这是一些药片和一个卫生袋。
quiz.name: 25ab1c417907b5e13301350f3301fae9.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 太感谢了。
quiz.name: af0fd01c5df43cdb5ff841d2387a1540.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, Sir.
quiz.nativeText: 下午好，先生。
quiz.name: 8010f94506626e8dde3cdac19f25498f.mp3

quiz.text: Hello. I have to catch a plane at two o'clock.
quiz.nativeText: 你好。我得赶上两点钟的飞机。
quiz.name: 04c7bcd09eada6f77338dfcc8cf9047f.mp3

quiz.text: I'm not sure if you'll make it. It's rush hour right now.
quiz.nativeText: 我不确定你能不能赶上。现在是高峰时段。
quiz.name: d5b31a75bcf05c9601fe8a08a38cce66.mp3

quiz.text: Do you think we can get there in about thirty minutes?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得我们可以在三十分钟内到吗？
quiz.name: c038d7072dc81cfb138bc2d169e646d5.mp3

quiz.text: Well, it's hard to say. I'll try another route.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，很难说。我试试另一条路线吧。
quiz.name: 39d0c36c5aad1dcdfff4e4a846876218.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I'd appreciate it if you could drive a bit faster.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。如果你能开快点的话我会非常感激的。
quiz.name: 90f612b960b726c9ff5eb0cbe78f4442.mp3

quiz.text: I'll try my best. You'll have to calm down.
quiz.nativeText: 我尽量。你得冷静下来。
quiz.name: 8f4a772e181177eeaf1f9b0492fb6e8e.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry, I was in a bit of a panic.
quiz.nativeText: 不好意思，我有点慌了。
quiz.name: 8c3279ac0de63260d39a5bfb09801da7.mp3

quiz.text: OK, here we are! The number on the meter is forty dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了，我们到啦！计量器的度数是四十美元。
quiz.name: e60a50a590376abd65e0a07b803fd13a.mp3

quiz.text: Here's fifty dollars. Keep the change.
quiz.nativeText: 这是五十美元。不用找钱了。
quiz.name: 51b3f70161985420bc431b67e43da8d2.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, what can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，有什么我可以做的吗？
quiz.name: f7420bef066254c05a7e14b74898163e.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. I'd like to get a Metro Card.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。我想要一张地铁卡。
quiz.name: 74dfaa82759333488c1f3ba87ee05b2b.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Which type do you would like? Pay-per-ride or unlimited?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你想要什么类型的？按次付费还是无限制？
quiz.name: 5d8cf0faaf3160e628529e9d4c414abb.mp3

quiz.text: I need a seven-day Metro Card please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要一张七天无限制的地铁卡。
quiz.name: 78a47882e3e18092225e141b50b69770.mp3

quiz.text: That's thirty dollars in total, including a new card fee of one dollar.
quiz.nativeText: 总共三十美元，包括了办新卡的一美元。
quiz.name: d605412ea93db738332fe82364809e45.mp3

quiz.text: Here's the money.
quiz.nativeText: 给你钱。
quiz.name: e5758891e8a6464c43ab84d94a5aeaf9.mp3

quiz.text: OK, here's your card.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，这是你的卡。
quiz.name: 7b5ac5d6c53ab5083d7c176389dabaa4.mp3

quiz.text: Can this card be refilled after it expires in seven days?
quiz.nativeText: 七天以后这张卡无效了可以再充值吗？
quiz.name: e703bb749550075afa9ae10b0dfd38cd.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, unlimited Metro Cards can be refilled. Just take your card to any station booth.
quiz.nativeText: 可以的，无限制地铁卡现在可以再次充值。你只需要带着卡到车站的任何窗口。
quiz.name: 2179745d77b38e61f26bb04b23be6b0f.mp3

quiz.text: That's convenient. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 那真方便。谢谢。
quiz.name: 9dcc87e7e7f6d61e8e0dbb760f9a6dd5.mp3

quiz.text: How do you get to work every day?
quiz.nativeText: 你每天都是怎么去上班的啊？
quiz.name: bc40d031be93cfedb5e494092bdf783a.mp3

quiz.text: I usually take the bus.
quiz.nativeText: 我一般坐公交车。
quiz.name: 35b8794484e5dadafa694a895cc93084.mp3

quiz.text: Do you ever take the subway?
quiz.nativeText: 你会坐地铁么？
quiz.name: 61a42a47e9bedaa0337f60ec4ecde0cd.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, sometimes I also take the subway.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我有时也会乘地铁。
quiz.name: f85cebdf04085082c53490d100f1e23e.mp3

quiz.text: Have you tried taking a taxi?
quiz.nativeText: 你试过坐出租车么？
quiz.name: a1eb3496a7a843428b3c862447086cab.mp3

quiz.text: Taking a taxi is too expensive.
quiz.nativeText: 坐车租车太贵了。
quiz.name: 5380948a40143171f7c940b9ef2ef0f5.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. Then if you wanted to go to another city, how would you go?
quiz.nativeText: 我同意。那你如果要去另一座城市怎么办呢？
quiz.name: 32a95995fe39c0f75f3027b70b4ef234.mp3

quiz.text: By train.
quiz.nativeText: 坐火车啊。
quiz.name: 17b203b2f4520bcb9b8c3dc419708de9.mp3

quiz.text: And what if you wanted to go abroad?
quiz.nativeText: 那如果你想要出国怎么办呢？
quiz.name: a21d8a08943f9968f7b7922399465ddf.mp3

quiz.text: I would travel by plane.
quiz.nativeText: 我会坐飞机。
quiz.name: 5c6b841f8fc0b191ee8ada5c31b82a02.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, there are so many different types of public transportation.
quiz.nativeText: 哇，原来有这么多种不同的公共交通工具啊。
quiz.name: ed6d4cdc0af6869c30eb505fe56831db.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, there are.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，有很多。
quiz.name: ad75a1f2c77b9529eca3be8bfabee856.mp3

quiz.text: Gramercy Park Hotel. Reservation desk. May I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 格拉梅西公园酒店，预定处。有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: 8e4576f8897ebe25f3e0199edf0d499b.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I'd like to book a room at your hotel.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我想在你们酒店预定一个房间。
quiz.name: dc62be6edee0dc52176b3c4e1d367811.mp3

quiz.text: What kind of room would you like sir? We have single rooms, double rooms and suites in various styles.
quiz.nativeText: 您想要什么样的房间呢？我们有单人间，双人间和不同种类的套房。
quiz.name: 3027d47fc199e34e36556bcb686c03f9.mp3

quiz.text: I am travelling with my wife, so a double room will be fine.
quiz.nativeText: 我和我妻子一起来，所以我觉得双人间就可以。
quiz.name: 7662c60e8e68a7c1b77510a69739ad27.mp3

quiz.text: May I have your surname, please?
quiz.nativeText: 能告诉我您的姓氏吗？
quiz.name: d683ad12211817cddbd759df00c8f1ff.mp3

quiz.text: My surname is Lee.
quiz.nativeText: 我姓李。
quiz.name: a0bee2d528c971ec21b2a905850340be.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, Mr. Lee. How long will you stay for?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您，李先生。您想预定几天呢？
quiz.name: b6d146e1d3bb17fe45503170dbe4046f.mp3

quiz.text: Five days. From January thirteenth to the eighteenth.
quiz.nativeText: 五天。从一月十三号到十八号。
quiz.name: d7053e3aa938c0531310b73f7da855fe.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. What time will you be arriving, Mr. Lee?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。您那天大概什么时候能到？
quiz.name: aba42b1084f9865ef3a5d7b76c0f4751.mp3

quiz.text: Around five in the evening.
quiz.nativeText: 大概晚上五点钟。
quiz.name: 15f23a3a9fd349c96316eebbc5a17d2d.mp3

quiz.text: All right. A double room will be ready for you then.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。那时候一个双人房会为您准备好的。
quiz.name: 567d19f609f000c8d68d5fe1d6405d94.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you for your help. Bye.
quiz.nativeText: 感谢你的帮助。再见。
quiz.name: 1ab8d57555aa946d68fdecc6aa0fcf3c.mp3

quiz.text: Good evening. Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 晚上好，先生。有什么可以帮您的吗？
quiz.name: 8aa7832e9e062d540ab647c43a562365.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to check in, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想办理入住。
quiz.name: bb95cd82c86ea4d151dbbc2a47eb3110.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Do you have a reservation?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。您有预定吗？
quiz.name: f7fa9b35e3dc5e54a0472848a400a909.mp3

quiz.text: I booked a double room two weeks ago. My name is Mr. Lee.
quiz.nativeText: 我两周前预定了一个双人间。我是李先生。
quiz.name: e4a7c5526b306148acd2009611cd275f.mp3

quiz.text: Let me check. Yes. Could you show me your passports please?
quiz.nativeText: 让我看一下。对的。我能看一下您的护照吗？
quiz.name: 5d0c784a8b8816dbfbb957862fd863a1.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题，给你。
quiz.name: 6ced6bf786874495f0305cd62a23e422.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Would you fill out this registration card, sir?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您。可以填写一下这张登记卡吗？
quiz.name: 1b5c612404f9d836cebbba98af2ccd01.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Is that OK?
quiz.nativeText: 当然。这样行吗？
quiz.name: 5c52899d4c7e0fecc629c3525305852a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Your room is on the third floor and here is your room card.
quiz.nativeText: 可以的。您的房间在三楼。这是您的房卡。
quiz.name: 1c916701708b9fc153fbbc8ac5e329c3.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks. Could I get a bellman to help me with the luggage?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。可以叫一个服务生来帮我拿行李吗？
quiz.name: f2d1c9a902c36eaa3641054d0c086a4f.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. I'll ring for one immediately. Enjoy your stay here!
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。我马上就为你叫一位。希望您享受在这停留的时光！
quiz.name: 3a1cc258e2e4fdf075a6b2ed3359e282.mp3

quiz.text: I will. Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 我会的。非常感谢。
quiz.name: 4ebdb2047d8a54ab7836f7ed6b1ca6f7.mp3

learningItem.desc: 动词短语，具有多重含义

quiz.text: Room service. What can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 客房服务部。有什么需要帮助的吗？
quiz.name: bdb22eddd7f4a886ee7c8f5ecb4c03dc.mp3

quiz.text: Hello. I'd like a wake-up call tomorrow morning.
quiz.nativeText: 您好，我想明天有个叫醒电话。
quiz.name: be829c7c2a99acb1aad37f8728b60d1c.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. What time do you want to get up?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。您想几点起床？
quiz.name: 62f6c7e9aca2b72fb89abf0a62d72616.mp3

quiz.text: Seven o'clock. My room number is three two one.
quiz.nativeText: 早上七点。我的房间号是三二一。
quiz.name: 1fb1ce43b7478126e2139eee9729a88d.mp3

quiz.text: Fine. Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。还有别的事情吗？
quiz.name: 073e651be6476f0f812088d1bc4c553b.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I have some clothes to wash. Do you have laundry service?
quiz.nativeText: 有的。我有一些衣服想洗一洗。你们有洗衣服的服务吗？
quiz.name: 7ee74afdcef0e180d2d24d1c4e194a83.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. I will send someone to pick up your clothes right now.
quiz.nativeText: 当然有。我马上让人去取您要洗的衣服。
quiz.name: 2f10ed2e14c705fb6b400f2157a23fb9.mp3

quiz.text: That is very kind of you. By the way, what time is breakfast tomorrow?
quiz.nativeText: 您太好了。顺便问一下，明天的早饭几点？
quiz.name: bda8bfec4167f6c20f2f4037f2bd588a.mp3

quiz.text: From six to nine in the morning. The restaurant is on the second floor.
quiz.nativeText: 早上六点到酒店。餐厅在二楼。
quiz.name: 03492d95d691320ef38ff0cb2ae3a772.mp3

quiz.text: Great! Thank you for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！谢谢你的帮助。
quiz.name: e47a72a226c520cd2d5d6ebab6d5db16.mp3

quiz.text: Housekeeping. May I come in?
quiz.nativeText: 整理房间，我可以进来吗？
quiz.name: 7626bc542ec6d8a746fc33b378e1a6a6.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Come in please.
quiz.nativeText: 可以，请进。
quiz.name: 36795e848e4b9ff402d319f8f00aeed5.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, sir. May I clean your room now?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，先生。我现在可以打扫房间吗？
quiz.name: e8e28984827e55766138dd769778ca4c.mp3

quiz.text: How long will it take?
quiz.nativeText: 大概要多久？
quiz.name: e7a0baf1fa9f222c446da7eea4021ad4.mp3

quiz.text: Your room will be ready in about twenty minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 你的房间在二十分钟之内就能打扫完。
quiz.name: c16483ab336c02f8e8489112e2a211a8.mp3

quiz.text: Fine. Could you tidy up the bathroom first? It is quite a mess.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你可以先打扫浴室吗？那里乱糟糟的。
quiz.name: 11fe2166483dd6a0a853dd77599e6619.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. I'll place some soap and fresh towels in there.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。我会在浴室放一些新的肥皂和浴巾。
quiz.name: da702e42b4e557a49d5d68027c052e1a.mp3

quiz.text: Great! I would also like a new pair of bath slippers and a hair dryer.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了！我还想要一双新的浴室拖鞋和一个吹风机。
quiz.name: 7a9f1d72e7ba88cab1ce0d652c3c446d.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I'll bring them to you in a minute.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我马上给您拿来。
quiz.name: db161e929943184e7dfef6cf7f8183ee.mp3

quiz.text: By the way, the toilet doesn't flush. What should I do?
quiz.nativeText: 还有，马桶冲水不好使了。我该怎么办呢？
quiz.name: 3e9849cbc103687e7bc042f6f8f5af39.mp3

quiz.text: I will contact a repairman for you. He will help you with that problem.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我会为你联系一位修理工。他会帮您解决这个问题。
quiz.name: 7cb093680110c59e913a11dc69564095.mp3

quiz.text: That is very kind of you.
quiz.nativeText: 太感谢你了。
quiz.name: d70955fd3f0e75797d8a462d1752ab38.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, sir. Welcome to our hotel's fitness zone. What can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，先生。欢迎来到本酒店健身区，我能为你做些什么？
quiz.name: 840db82caf24c15ad01aeb2c6dcf6058.mp3

quiz.text: I am not familiar with the fitness facilities here. Could you tell me about them?
quiz.nativeText: 我不是很熟悉这里的健身设施。能为我介绍一下吗？
quiz.name: 801bc2b4e09986f9208f24028502f23f.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. We have gym, aerobics room, bowling center and indoor swimming pool.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。我们有健身房、健身操室、保龄球中心和室内游泳池。
quiz.name: 5f1eacbfdb03d81cd9727d4999dbf1a2.mp3

quiz.text: I love swimming! Do I need to pay extra money for that?
quiz.nativeText: 我喜欢游泳！我需要额外付钱吗？
quiz.name: 154475bf83e023e8a4c69176d1b24246.mp3

quiz.text: No. It's free for registered guests.
quiz.nativeText: 不用。对在酒店住的客人是免费的。
quiz.name: 01c73892b35aa21de2eadd8f07e6c885.mp3

quiz.text: That is great! Is the water cold?
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！水凉吗？
quiz.name: 35794a08a80bedae21a28075ceccf97b.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry. We also have a warm Jacuzzi.
quiz.nativeText: 不用担心。我们还有温暖的按摩池。
quiz.name: e59063a243a46fe454b19cee6de1530f.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Where can I change clothes?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。在哪里可以换衣服呢？
quiz.name: c70788b5e32050e654542c98dc27e9bb.mp3

quiz.text: We have separate locker rooms over there. You can also ask for fresh towels.
quiz.nativeText: 那边有独立的更衣室。您还可以得到干净的浴巾。
quiz.name: 8fd5cf2828e1e1bd340e206411c8c9e0.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds good. By the way, when does the pool close?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来真不错！对了，游泳池几点关？
quiz.name: e4fcdccf5be3c427aef0c92e9458c1e3.mp3

quiz.text: Eleven o'clock in the evening.
quiz.nativeText: 晚上十一点。
quiz.name: b9a3215c2649409d1b453f95f1edd29f.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much. I can't wait to have a swim.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。我都迫不及待想去游泳了！
quiz.name: 36c9c4285a969a4f0c596d0532daa2f2.mp3

quiz.text: Front Desk, may I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 这里是前台，有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: 5701e6269287e793e5c854f79189c534.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I need to make a complaint.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我想投诉。
quiz.name: b818a5af82dc480ea5c11ab6ac5338ab.mp3

quiz.text: I am sorry to hear that. What seems to be the problem?
quiz.nativeText: 很抱歉。有什么问题吗？
quiz.name: 355f8760a016621ea55016d4faca4ba5.mp3

quiz.text: The room next door is too noisy. Could you do something about it?
quiz.nativeText: 我隔壁的房间太吵了。你能帮我处理一下吗？
quiz.name: 5dd59eb54f6056ee06876dd848e39a17.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. What room are you in, sir?
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。您在哪个房间？
quiz.name: a1ff5164c8617f0b4a687d5070c58081.mp3

quiz.text: I am in Room three two one. I think the noise is coming from the left.
quiz.nativeText: 我在三二一房间。我觉得噪音从我左侧房间传来的。
quiz.name: b37242bef24f063e76c23dbe40f109e2.mp3

quiz.text: I see. We will take care of it right away.
quiz.nativeText: 明白了。我们会马上处理这个事情的。
quiz.name: 4f0aaa5bc7966db1371e79fb05da9ced.mp3

quiz.text: And where is my laundry? It was supposed to be delivered today.
quiz.nativeText: 还有我要洗的衣服呢？本来应该今天送回来的。
quiz.name: d99bb2cb9108feadf5be5de6aefebdcd.mp3

quiz.text: Let me check. I am so sorry. They mistook your express service for normal service.
quiz.nativeText: 让我查一下。非常抱歉。他们错把您的加急服务弄成普通服务了。
quiz.name: 362e238271b94de84458aeddab020b0f.mp3

quiz.text: Can you ask them to speed up?
quiz.nativeText: 那你能让他们快一点吗？
quiz.name: 6b18d4ba3bcbb0007c3b0f1386454a69.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. We will refund the charge and send your laundry to your room in two hours. Is that all right?
quiz.nativeText: 当然。我们会给您退款并且将您的衣物在两个小时之内送回。这样可以吗？
quiz.name: 6365c443bc846666992a0fdbbb603960.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds reasonable. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来挺合理的。谢谢你了。
quiz.name: 9504adf5fb6a6880327a44c15fc9008d.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, what can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 先生早上好。我能为你做些什么？
quiz.name: f7420bef066254c05a7e14b74898163e.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to check out and settle my bill, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要结账退房。
quiz.name: d01a691d68ff871612be8d7b0350ef58.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. May I have your name and room number, please?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。可以告诉我您的名字和房间号码吗？
quiz.name: 95aafc523c8cd4c9d097e2b1ad0380cb.mp3

quiz.text: My name is David Lee. Room three two one.
quiz.nativeText: 我叫大卫李。在三二一房间。
quiz.name: f85b46b433b6d3ab277852c127c181e3.mp3

quiz.text: OK, Mr. Lee. Here is your bill. The total amount is one thousand dollars.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，李先生。这是您的账单。一共是一千美元。
quiz.name: a047d7bd3cca8c3f3ddad67c2d7ad0e7.mp3

quiz.text: Let me see. Yes, the bill seems right.
quiz.nativeText: 我看一下。好的，账单应该是对的。
quiz.name: fb19e8c4b550a0b69196a3c94cc7a180.mp3

quiz.text: How do you wish to settle your bill sir?
quiz.nativeText: 您想用什么方式付款？
quiz.name: db7800aca44cd0e87d55c02bca164ca4.mp3

quiz.text: By credit card, please. Which credit cards do you accept?
quiz.nativeText: 用信用卡。你们这里接受哪种信用卡呢？
quiz.name: 2fc6862763612d851c631bc0f57afba2.mp3

quiz.text: We accept Master Card, American Express and Visa.
quiz.nativeText: 我们接受万事达卡，美国运通卡和维萨卡。
quiz.name: 20172028f351cdde82978ca0a894537d.mp3

quiz.text: I'll use my Master Card, then. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 那我就用万事达卡吧，给你。
quiz.name: a448fc70ba2627b21e2b0c7024baadbd.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Here is your receipt. Would you sign here please?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题，这是您的收据。可以在这里签一下字吗？
quiz.name: 1cfe178db38c6a0a75782f2ca3412958.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Please call a taxi for me.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。请帮我叫一辆出租车。
quiz.name: 93d8e05926e28b699451f3d1c8d2fcab.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，有什么需要帮助的吗？
quiz.name: a3a771b3affdc2bc3b90f17c1698f0dd.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, I am here to check in.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我是来登记入住的。
quiz.name: f4119f46094394fd938f2099bd1e6c0a.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have a reservation?
quiz.nativeText: 您有预定吗？
quiz.name: aee14069875d643630b10701049b3f70.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I booked a double room last week.
quiz.nativeText: 有的。我上周订了一间双人间。
quiz.name: 8df89088090d7c0fde4c3228a79fbe68.mp3

quiz.text: Can I have your surname please?
quiz.nativeText: 您能告诉我您的姓吗？
quiz.name: 0a0c1f89e5314a1f5be7846acc72fdad.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It's Johnson.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，是约翰逊。
quiz.name: ab2fb2ac766565ed097d925402e26cfa.mp3

quiz.text: Can I see your ID please?
quiz.nativeText: 我能看一下您的身份证明吗？
quiz.name: d8310795d1f2c297ee38121810b3cd76.mp3

quiz.text: Here it is.
quiz.nativeText: 给。
quiz.name: 95fff81346c08bbeb392beb8fb9d02b3.mp3

quiz.text: I have got your booking information.
quiz.nativeText: 我找到了您的预定信息。
quiz.name: 8e0b8ac9cac235e31bd243bccb238f35.mp3

quiz.text: That's great!
quiz.nativeText: 太棒啦！
quiz.name: c3b4008b8a212646ba3ae85f94543b99.mp3

quiz.text: Here is the room card. You can contact the front desk anytime if you need something.
quiz.nativeText: 这是您的房卡。您如果有任何需要可以随时联系前台。
quiz.name: def98d8bdbcfe29dc82aafdf629b1524.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks for your help. See you!
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你的帮助。再见！
quiz.name: ba8002821e3359c58c28306722642a3d.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 可获得的，有空的，可找到的

quiz.text: Good morning, Midtown Restaurant. May I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，城中餐厅。有什么需要帮助的吗？
quiz.name: a814157230e5bb6ddc5fb1a364f1820c.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I'd like to book a table for two under the name William Smith.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我想以威廉史密斯的名义预定一个两人的座位。
quiz.name: 6d70f87d4d0c9c333c799124f79caefc.mp3

quiz.text: OK, Mr. Smith. When will you arrive?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，史密斯先生。您什么时候到？
quiz.name: 3ffcfebff6448f7dd8bb8da38103653f.mp3

quiz.text: Around six o'clock Saturday evening.
quiz.nativeText: 周六晚上六点左右。
quiz.name: 70f0708c3d90454e780037d0749d91ac.mp3

quiz.text: I am sorry. We are fully booked at that time.
quiz.nativeText: 不好意思。那个时间段我们已经订满了。
quiz.name: 97645f9516f8b4b71f97125e3daf0729.mp3

quiz.text: Well, what about the same time on Sunday?
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，那周日同一时间怎么样？
quiz.name: d0318126388bf291e23d54006afdbada.mp3

quiz.text: Let me check. We have tables available on Sunday.
quiz.nativeText: 让我看看。我们周日有空余座位的。
quiz.name: 2254e1c4ee6d32a99d2064c52ad604a4.mp3

quiz.text: That's great. I'd like a table next to the window.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了。我想要一个靠窗户的座位。
quiz.name: 3a05acf709ec411ac4595e2b84875bba.mp3

quiz.text: All right. A table for two next to the window at six o'clock on Sunday, is that correct?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。周日晚上六点，靠窗两人座位。是这样吗？
quiz.name: f06b9c64c17bbda3e49879e5d076d422.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. By the way, do you have a dress code?
quiz.nativeText: 对的。顺便问一下，你们有着装要求吗？
quiz.name: d48a56cfc6d51918f65922ba312d6cb1.mp3

quiz.text: No, nothing in particular. We look forward to seeing you.
quiz.nativeText: 没什么特别的。我们盼望您的到来。
quiz.name: e21ecff736cfa7a12351581808a69a3a.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Bye.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。再见。
quiz.name: 870ab3299f25ca2992cc1bf35cca6a45.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: ...个人的桌（在餐厅常用的表达）

quiz.text: Good afternoon. Welcome to Porter House!
quiz.nativeText: 下午好！欢迎来到波特小屋餐厅！
quiz.name: cac788e28c38a565ce290ef9a703bff6.mp3

quiz.text: A table for four, please.
quiz.nativeText: 四个人用餐，谢谢。
quiz.name: 1cf2f5382c302ce1c1ac3a8a5f7b5ef1.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have a reservation?
quiz.nativeText: 您有预定吗？
quiz.name: aee14069875d643630b10701049b3f70.mp3

quiz.text: I'm afraid not. Are there any vacant tables now?
quiz.nativeText: 恐怕没有。现在有空余餐桌吗？
quiz.name: b2e025f5ffb27e99a2072040db6a6ded.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. This way, please. Would you like to take the table in the corner?
quiz.nativeText: 有的，这边请。您想要角落那边的餐桌吗？
quiz.name: b8db42be90696173037ace3e1ed54f31.mp3

quiz.text: How about the one by the window over there?
quiz.nativeText: 那边靠窗户的那个怎么样？
quiz.name: 1f2a49c217cf27e6264318caa7cb98cf.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry. That table is reserved. How about this one?
quiz.nativeText: 很抱歉。那个餐桌已经被预定了。这个怎么样？
quiz.name: 668d84f3cb7d0c7f7b5e8edcb4a48708.mp3

quiz.text: All right. We'll sit here then.
quiz.nativeText: 好吧。我们就坐在这里吧。
quiz.name: e3aebb682699a8d9ef1ba3d788e4a2af.mp3

quiz.text: Here is the menu. Would you like to order now or wait for a while?
quiz.nativeText: 这是菜单。你想现在点菜还是再等一等？
quiz.name: e2c88ca09426583be26cf067868b9ce7.mp3

quiz.text: We'd like to look at the menu for a while, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我们想看一会菜单，谢谢。
quiz.name: 390223733764d403e4716db18832974b.mp3

quiz.text: Take your time. Just call me if you need anything.
quiz.nativeText: 慢慢看。有什么需要叫我就行。
quiz.name: 2b45f2ec486e9858c28934ad979a06ef.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: Hello. For here or to go?
quiz.nativeText: 你好，在这吃还是带走？
quiz.name: 3960689fb9ed417c5fc2471376f5fc62.mp3

quiz.text: To go. I'd like a double cheese burger.
quiz.nativeText: 带走。我想要一个双层芝士汉堡。
quiz.name: 3aa61f417a7cbb7219fbb5b063f35b88.mp3

quiz.text: Would you like ketchup or barbecue sauce?
quiz.nativeText: 你想要番茄酱还是烧烤酱？
quiz.name: 328df85fc5d0b83006414f628e529ac3.mp3
