quiz.text: Ketchup, please.
quiz.nativeText: 番茄酱，谢谢。
quiz.name: 934e0c33365bec14f2d803417bf1f165.mp3

quiz.text: Would you like some fries to go with that?
quiz.nativeText: 你想点一些薯条做搭配吗？
quiz.name: d9c0eda437d5a16f402aeda5933567bc.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, a large order.
quiz.nativeText: 要，大份的。
quiz.name: a4b96a5eee143afef95798c033d2eae9.mp3

quiz.text: Do you need any drinks?
quiz.nativeText: 你需要饮料吗？
quiz.name: 05c683356b5d33485eac2e3efe988833.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, one small Coke.
quiz.nativeText: 要一份小杯可乐。
quiz.name: 8f97930fe766ea46c5081757c548ee85.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，还要别的吗？
quiz.name: f0bc5371a5405471496e5230737d3773.mp3

quiz.text: That's all, thanks.
quiz.nativeText: 就这些，谢谢。
quiz.name: 315403c00666ea114ea908c350a506d9.mp3

quiz.text: All right. That'll be six dollars and fifty cents in total.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。总共是六美元五十美分。
quiz.name: 1ef2e4fa747933ae97470df057e2a6ec.mp3

quiz.text: Here you are. Bye!
quiz.nativeText: 给你。拜拜！
quiz.name: 6c49fc7cbe212bcbc0b0ca5ab9f19555.mp3

quiz.text: May I take your order now, sir?
quiz.nativeText: 可以点餐了吗，先生？
quiz.name: 31d05d22903e145653ab2511df74cf22.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Could you tell me what the soup of the day is?
quiz.nativeText: 是的。你能告诉我今日例汤是什么？
quiz.name: 7cf6abbe1d36d213e4110c1c2c5a9f30.mp3

quiz.text: Chicken noodle soup. Would you like to try it?
quiz.nativeText: 是面条鸡汤。您想尝尝吗？
quiz.name: 2782fae5e7e1ae81cbb1278bab4c95e5.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, please. I also want a green salad for an appetizer.
quiz.nativeText: 来一份。我还想要一份蔬菜沙拉作为前菜。
quiz.name: 2fe17c782df9104eeffb66303c5d6527.mp3

quiz.text: OK. What dressing would you like?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。您想要什么样的酱汁？
quiz.name: 82275f2e6f3c0d3183a6225c4b8183fe.mp3

quiz.text: Make it Thousand Island. What do you recommend for the main course?
quiz.nativeText: 要千岛酱吧。主菜你有什么推荐吗？
quiz.name: fd609b968b19e03b3f0ca59261d75c87.mp3

quiz.text: I recommend New York steak. It's our restaurant's specialty.
quiz.nativeText: 我推荐纽约客牛排。这是我们店的特色菜。
quiz.name: 7c60b7d976b627cfa58e4db3e33863ab.mp3

quiz.text: I'll have the steak with mashed potatoes, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我就要牛排搭配土豆泥好了。
quiz.name: 8126b11b35c8fa077ee4a91d71d969e3.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Would you like your steak rare, medium or well-done?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。您喜欢几分熟的牛排？
quiz.name: d2167db7e60d7b455f836e6dd64684e3.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like it medium, please.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要五分熟的，谢谢。
quiz.name: 9dde535853122fc14278baf9670cdbec.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Would you like some wine to go with your steak?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你想要搭配牛排的红酒吗？
quiz.name: 6f7d8079a5d875eea0c3b43ff3b41aba.mp3

quiz.text: A glass of Burgundy. That's all.
quiz.nativeText: 一杯勃艮第葡萄酒。就这些吧。
quiz.name: e8b645c1725d048757160edb0efb4829.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 达到...的满意程度，使...满意
人手不够的，人员不足的

quiz.text: Excuse me, sir. Is everything to your satisfaction?
quiz.nativeText: 抱歉打扰，先生。您吃的还满意吗？
quiz.name: 63588a58d50d49fe8355d2a051af5b70.mp3

quiz.text: Well, not really. I'm a little disappointed.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，并没有。我有点失望。
quiz.name: 0a152633d5967e4223d228ea9ba56b05.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry to hear that. What is the matter?
quiz.nativeText: 很抱歉，哪里有问题呢？
quiz.name: ee95b17426727336b41c4b07234631a2.mp3

quiz.text: The steak you recommended is not very fresh.
quiz.nativeText: 你推荐给我的牛排不太新鲜。
quiz.name: b7554cee3bade15079c99c5ded79ba56.mp3

quiz.text: That is quite unusual. I'll look into this for you.
quiz.nativeText: 这还挺少见。我会为您调查一下的。
quiz.name: 88ae333f74180213a6bc491254affcc3.mp3

quiz.text: The salad is fine. But I asked for Thousand Island dressing, not honey mustard.
quiz.nativeText: 沙拉还可以。但我要的是千岛酱而不是蜂蜜芥末。
quiz.name: bc203078332beee1b9c4d73f43a5b91b.mp3

quiz.text: Our mistake. I am terribly sorry to have ruined your evening.
quiz.nativeText: 是我们的错。影响您的晚餐实在是太抱歉了。
quiz.name: 1001bf4369d4c90b3360660e0d227b34.mp3

quiz.text: And most of the waiters seem too busy to pay attention to me.
quiz.nativeText: 而且大多数的服务员似乎忙得都不注意我。
quiz.name: dd6e30cab93765d234d1893e0c64e91e.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry, we are understaffed today. I can offer you a dessert. Please accept our apologies.
quiz.nativeText: 实在抱歉，我们今天人手不够。我可以为您免费提供一份甜品。请接受我们的歉意。
quiz.name: cda22613edd3939fab148283bb882af5.mp3

quiz.text: That's all right. Please be careful next time.
quiz.nativeText: 没事。下次请注意。
quiz.name: 9a00ff65ae6e12f1fd261c6bd6a876f4.mp3

learningItem.desc: bill也表示账单，但在美国更常用check
介词短语，注意搭配的介词

quiz.text: Have you enjoyed your meal, miss?
quiz.nativeText: 这顿饭您吃的开心吗，小姐？
quiz.name: 0d94a8be3225d9eb2936d6c614cd853f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, very much. Can I have the check, please?
quiz.nativeText: 是的，非常开心。我能买单吗？
quiz.name: 3fb19e85f8552e7e35f6f6c4255c8951.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, here you are. It is eighty dollars in total.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题，给您。一共是八十美元。
quiz.name: 797b60286ce012bbc37c637cf461ef54.mp3

quiz.text: Really? Is there a service charge included?
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？服务费包括在内吗？
quiz.name: d56ad07d011c9d3ce3c68bf3fe1a9053.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Ten percent.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，百分之十的服务费。
quiz.name: 76b8e9afb1c88bef4a52e22f627ad7d5.mp3

quiz.text: Let me see. I don't think this is my bill. I did not order steak.
quiz.nativeText: 让我看一看。我不认为这是我的账单。我没点牛排。
quiz.name: bdcdea08d80106912faa436260f28ec9.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry, miss. I will have the bill fixed right away. Could you check again?
quiz.nativeText: 对不起，小姐。我马上去修改一下账单。您能再检查一下吗？
quiz.name: bf36155fc60f704c4e5dc48699eee662.mp3

quiz.text: The amount seems right this time.
quiz.nativeText: 这次的金额看着是对的。
quiz.name: cde63650a1a020a7f8161bee4e90c7e6.mp3

quiz.text: It is fifty two dollars in total. Would you like to pay in cash or by credit card?
quiz.nativeText: 总共是五十二美元。您想现金支付还是信用卡支付？
quiz.name: b8eb6b94fe32e595d580b25b7ab4c7dd.mp3

quiz.text: I'll pay it by credit card.
quiz.nativeText: 我用信用卡支付。
quiz.name: 9dfd431f3c7b141b89e7079845e49d8b.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Would you sign here, please?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。您能在这里签一下字吗？
quiz.name: 8252160433f50404b7cd1480f7af539e.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，给你。
quiz.name: 140f43a91a62c2624c9c67ce206c44b7.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我能为您做点什么？
quiz.name: a3a771b3affdc2bc3b90f17c1698f0dd.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, I booked a table under the name William Smith.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我用威廉·史密斯的名字订了一张桌子。
quiz.name: 53a6966be5da6e4759f1633792659e5c.mp3

quiz.text: All right. This way please. Here is the menu.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。这边请。这是菜单。
quiz.name: e61ec3f3849603b48ead0fc311bc8319.mp3

quiz.text: What is your soup of the day?
quiz.nativeText: 你们今天的特色汤是什么？
quiz.name: 7b723a57facad6a795fe1c0552ee4410.mp3

quiz.text: Chicken noodle soup.
quiz.nativeText: 鸡肉面汤。
quiz.name: 18fd5c508a8c9b96ba66e0f630154b14.mp3

quiz.text: I will try it.
quiz.nativeText: 我要试一下这道菜。
quiz.name: 20937badf44caffc8ec8fb0b36454671.mp3

quiz.text: What would you like for the main course?
quiz.nativeText: 主菜您想点什么？
quiz.name: fbcee56ff642b4b6309658d5be77d54d.mp3

quiz.text: New York strip steak.
quiz.nativeText: 纽约牛排
quiz.name: 067f32b86a16316bc1746b5915de2787.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want it rare, medium, or well-done?
quiz.nativeText: 您想要几分熟？
quiz.name: 301b7f89cce621dbd7e548622f80d271.mp3

quiz.text: Medium, please.
quiz.nativeText: 五分熟。
quiz.name: ac9c59b28f0f781ab062d94faf272e4d.mp3

quiz.text: Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 还要点别的什么吗？
quiz.name: 389399ee88270b17f0a8a3305d682fc6.mp3

quiz.text: That's all for now. We will order dessert after dinner.
quiz.nativeText: 暂时就这些。我们会在餐后点甜点的。
quiz.name: 245c494f5f76b1a1aebbb5f249835c65.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. I will come back later.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。我会之后再来的。
quiz.name: 3f8a932171a3c3f2a151b4b60b27cf92.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。非常感谢。
quiz.name: 93ef428467a7f133c17b0ce281a41b65.mp3

learningItem.text: place of historical and cultural importance

quiz.text: Hey, I heard you are planning to travel abroad.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我听说你正计划出国旅游。
quiz.name: f58a801984aaa027abfd6e71d50f642e.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I'm going to the United States with several friends.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我要和几个朋友去美国。
quiz.name: ea8701922ded9e8106fe3fbdf239cf53.mp3

quiz.text: Where do you plan to visit?
quiz.nativeText: 你打算去哪里？
quiz.name: 34afb86ce48ddf62623b693fcf72ae7b.mp3

quiz.text: We haven't decided yet. Do you have any suggestions?
quiz.nativeText: 我们还没决定呢。你有什么建议吗？
quiz.name: 7fc192a7ac32be8bf6621349acb4b284.mp3

quiz.text: Well, Washington, New York, and Los Angeles are all good choices.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，华盛顿，纽约和洛杉矶都是不错的选择。
quiz.name: 323f11be401e2c21ba09e6cc560294bd.mp3

quiz.text: What if we only drive along the East Coast this time?
quiz.nativeText: 如果我们这次只沿着东海岸驾车呢？
quiz.name: 32ecb10f9b8197b7a945915dfe869f07.mp3

quiz.text: That's a good idea! There are so many places of historical and cultural significance on the East Coast.
quiz.nativeText: 是个好主意！东海岸有许多历史文化景点。
quiz.name: 26d44c815a49b78c4f3c315048a8e833.mp3

quiz.text: That's great! I've always wanted to see the Statue of Liberty with my own eyes.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒啦！我一直想亲眼看看自由女神像。
quiz.name: 3b42ab4c4ba1e9d4f37af8c550afcbda.mp3

quiz.text: Enjoy your trip!
quiz.nativeText: 祝你旅途愉快！
quiz.name: b4ad84f84b56731627e31f6016a9df68.mp3

quiz.text: I will! Thanks!
quiz.nativeText: 我会的！谢谢！
quiz.name: b803c6c9e99a95e7c4a9feaa428398a3.mp3

quiz.text: American Airlines, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 这里是美国航空公司，有什么可以帮你的吗？
quiz.name: 93e51760823248144247e587daeb6b05.mp3

quiz.text: I'd like to confirm my ticket.
quiz.nativeText: 我想确认我定的机票。
quiz.name: 3464d3e2c94d74afabdc147c8ced1247.mp3

quiz.text: May I have your name, please?
quiz.nativeText: 您的名字是？
quiz.name: 0d051a2a35aecf874963b0e03cd6d9d6.mp3

quiz.text: Jessie Smith. I reserved the flight which leaves at six p.m. tomorrow from Shanghai to New York.
quiz.nativeText: Jessie Smith. 我预定了明天下午六点从上海到纽约的航班。
quiz.name: c8fc2ca11b9884d12781a82e0c25ace5.mp3

quiz.text: Let me check. Ok, your information is confirmed.
quiz.nativeText: 让我看一下。是的，你的信息已被确认。
quiz.name: 6e93179527b169487cbd594134ff0d45.mp3

quiz.text: Is it possible to change my booking to next week?
quiz.nativeText: 可以把我的机票改到下周吗？
quiz.name: 1a6ba3bd14b2823278a902bbd667b141.mp3

quiz.text: Certainly. Now you're confirmed on the same Flight at six p.m. on May twentieth.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。现在您的机票已更改为于五月二十日下午六点起飞的同一航班。
quiz.name: b9d099b1fb42edf042a12d91912cde37.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。
quiz.name: af0fd01c5df43cdb5ff841d2387a1540.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, what can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好。有什么需要我做的吗？
quiz.name: 7b1371cd93354c682721fa878e854e2f.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, I'd like to take a trip to Yellowstone National Park. Can you help me arrange that?
quiz.nativeText: 下午好。我打算去黄石公园旅游。你可以安排吗？
quiz.name: 3b4d0b327a44b6b51298f40b84ff3174.mp3

quiz.text: Which do you prefer, an individual tour or a package tour?
quiz.nativeText: 您想自由行还是跟团游？
quiz.name: ff0e4bb2b6ccca5186fca0884b5c911a.mp3

quiz.text: A package tour, please.
quiz.nativeText: 跟团游，谢谢。
quiz.name: 2b27f5cba064ba9e860cdc353c4eb66a.mp3

quiz.text: How long would you like to stay?
quiz.nativeText: 您想待多长时间？
quiz.name: f0a56e051a410eaa0f4aa95c033be8d8.mp3

quiz.text: Three days.
quiz.nativeText: 三天
quiz.name: 7ab82c0c205f514f351143a4376990c9.mp3

quiz.text: OK. We have a three-day package tour that includes most of well-known spots.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我们有一个三天的跟团游，涵盖了大部分著名景点。
quiz.name: 8c51497e635d3ef182a7907d36a73058.mp3

quiz.text: Where is the accommodation located?
quiz.nativeText: 在哪里住宿？
quiz.name: 2d44bffc826704c01e71492af31931c2.mp3

quiz.text: At a hotel in the park.
quiz.nativeText: 在公园的旅馆里。
quiz.name: fab251b04829f5885f768dd038507012.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds good. Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来不错。谢谢。
quiz.name: 4fac4a6917c25794be1f4f702097d5df.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. What's your name?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好！你叫什么名字？
quiz.name: 1d5020128dbbb961686a952230102d88.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning, sir. My name is Wang Ming.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好，先生。我叫王明。
quiz.name: 6eb52c78001049243e796e8cd9249d15.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you want to go to the United States?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么想去美国？
quiz.name: d3f2fff54e9cbd746033135e75304218.mp3

quiz.text: I want to travel with my wife. Here are my marriage certificate and household registration.
quiz.nativeText: 我想要和我妻子一起去旅行。这里是我的结婚证和户口。
quiz.name: 421bf4771178726b4bd51bba7ed2a7e1.mp3

quiz.text: Where have you travelled to before?
quiz.nativeText: 你们以前去过哪里？
quiz.name: 81675da43917c547ecab5dafe390e14c.mp3

quiz.text: We have been to Japan and Australia. Here are some photos we took.
quiz.nativeText: 我们去过日本和澳大利亚。这是我们照的一些照片。
quiz.name: 2b825b374edbe6d534911721bf75c3ba.mp3

quiz.text: I see. How are you going to cover your travel expenses?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。你们想要怎样支付旅行费用呢？
quiz.name: e7ea04c3b4899c358bda324d9abf01c7.mp3

quiz.text: My wife and I are both high school teachers. Here are our bank statement.
quiz.nativeText: 我和我妻子都是高中老师。这是我们的存款证明。
quiz.name: fc9267efee457ca58d3cbca6ea71ce83.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have a travel itinerary?
quiz.nativeText: 你有旅行计划吗？
quiz.name: 1961485a94bc529c91d02c1bd874377e.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Here are our flight itinerary and hotel reservation.
quiz.nativeText: 有的。这是我们的航班行程和酒店订单。
quiz.name: 33976a8c072f0c3db2058cb350ef86d1.mp3

quiz.text: I hope you will enjoy your time in the US.
quiz.nativeText: 希望你在美国可以玩的开心。
quiz.name: e689d94dceaa0056898b0b1f8566f72d.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。
quiz.name: 1f33d36ccb6b37e6d20351f841fb1d4f.mp3

quiz.text: Hi. Can you tell me your name and age?
quiz.nativeText: 你好。能告诉我你的姓名和年龄吗？
quiz.name: 05222034edcb99b43b134f92e2077ee9.mp3

quiz.text: I am Zhang Ning and I am twenty two years old.
quiz.nativeText: 我叫张宁，二十二岁。
quiz.name: 6faddcea78dc7de9fffd248cc3c4348e.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you want to go to the United States for further education?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么想要去美国继续接受教育？
quiz.name: 5d2438bdad82b92d814d04151358d157.mp3

quiz.text: Because the United States has the most developed computer science technology and education programs.
quiz.nativeText: 因为美国有最发达的计算机科学技术和教育项目。
quiz.name: 98b2db0edc99c947189ad359e69f5a50.mp3

quiz.text: Which university do you plan to attend?
quiz.nativeText: 你计划去哪所学校？
quiz.name: d0730957bf160a6c2ce11a8b26e144cd.mp3

quiz.text: University of California, Los Angeles. Here is the admission letter.
quiz.nativeText: 加州大学洛杉矶分校。这是录取通知书。
quiz.name: 2b9993782ec4d4fac2b3367c7c92fa95.mp3

quiz.text: How long do you plan to stay in the US?
quiz.nativeText: 你打算在美国多久？
quiz.name: ae8e1c330fd96aeb0c785c7ac058da16.mp3

quiz.text: About two years. I plan to get a master's degree there.
quiz.nativeText: 大概两年。我计划在那里拿到硕士学位。
quiz.name: a88ea7ac6223b5e86ce841977f25e0e3.mp3

quiz.text: I see. How do to intend to pay for this?
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。你打算怎样承担这个费用呢？
quiz.name: 06b37a125463efd4614e0e9d47b21c1f.mp3

quiz.text: My parents will sponsor me. Here are their bank statements.
quiz.nativeText: 我父母会资助我。这是他们的存款证明
quiz.name: bf710c1d2424b9d90dc3bce139eb7c8d.mp3

quiz.text: What is your plan after graduation?
quiz.nativeText: 你毕业后有什么计划吗？
quiz.name: 87e99c2e47b0101309a655d525d65515.mp3

quiz.text: I will come back to China, because China's economy is growing quickly and there are lots of opportunities here.
quiz.nativeText: 我会回到中国，因为中国经济发展迅速。
quiz.name: f6677e25ab19d7342a4787ad5ce36393.mp3

quiz.text: OK. You are good to go.
quiz.nativeText: 好了。你通过了。
quiz.name: 7bc4dff68e81178a70581429bdb98df1.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 十分感谢。
quiz.name: ba83ea1f3e5a32073e8575985c231d15.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 西雅图（美国西北部城市）

quiz.text: Hi, David. What are you doing?
quiz.nativeText: 大卫你好，你在干什么呢？
quiz.name: e0b33f5a715d0e60905273ada5127891.mp3

quiz.text: I am packing my bag. I am going to Seattle tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 我在收拾行李。我明天要去西雅图。
quiz.name: f2af052e46b49e2780153851e7f72bd3.mp3

quiz.text: That is great! How long will you stay in Seattle?
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！你要在西雅图呆多久？
quiz.name: b2ce658c42c41cc5efcbf37dc64766e0.mp3

quiz.text: About a week, so I don't want my luggage to be too heavy.
quiz.nativeText: 大概一周，所以我不想让我的行李太重。
quiz.name: 5a0bd1ae119ac77ecc99c7b4bdd8ecf6.mp3

quiz.text: I agree. But I think you'll still need a sweater, because Seattle is quite cold in winter.
quiz.nativeText: 我同意。但是我觉得你还是需要一件毛衣，因为西雅图冬天挺冷的。
quiz.name: 79967ed9c7108ba234824999ae1a2054.mp3

quiz.text: You are right. Should I take an umbrella?
quiz.nativeText: 你说得对。我需要带一把雨伞吗？
quiz.name: 01a784143ac95820c02136b5db4018e5.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. It often rains this time of year.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。每年这时候经常下雨。
quiz.name: 827b371808cafd553d297a3cf5fc029b.mp3

quiz.text: All right. I'm also bringing some motion sickness medicine. What else?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我还要带一些晕车药。还有什么呢？
quiz.name: 2bfbd3e1a4c43acceec6ebcfca027791.mp3

quiz.text: Take some Band-Aids. You'll need them if you get injured.
quiz.nativeText: 带一些创可贴吧。如果受伤了的话会用到的。
quiz.name: 3d29ba72fcf355bac1d601b300cd0bec.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Could you hand me that charger and power adapter over there?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你能把那边的充电器和电源转换器递给我吗？
quiz.name: 971f61766a29ae3541b57b3555652bbe.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, here you are. Don't forget to take your passport and bank card with you.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以，给你。别忘了拿好你的护照和银行卡哦。
quiz.name: 4c8288411616a314230710041d7e106b.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks for reminding me.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你的提醒。
quiz.name: ba4272f69707993aa2ed31d28ed354a2.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, how can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，我能为您做点什么？
quiz.name: a3a771b3affdc2bc3b90f17c1698f0dd.mp3

quiz.text: I am planning a trip to the eastern part of Canada. What travel packages do you offer?
quiz.nativeText: 我正在计划去加拿大东部地区旅行。你们有什么旅行套餐？
quiz.name: e8077ab56f69b8edcaa86d0eeabc22d5.mp3

quiz.text: We have several kinds of packages in that area.
quiz.nativeText: 我们在那个地方有几种套餐。
quiz.name: d03191fe4d3e8d7665965113f64376b1.mp3

quiz.text: Let me have a look.
quiz.nativeText: 让我看看
quiz.name: 1493bbe60c4137e6ef64d474624adcd0.mp3

quiz.text: We also take care of the flights and hotels.
quiz.nativeText: 我们也负责机票和酒店。
quiz.name: 8aba57102ab0833c32d1ecb12c3c6837.mp3

quiz.text: So I don't need to do anything.
quiz.nativeText: 所以我不需要做任何事情。
quiz.name: b880d14f759ca2f9dd7fa29eca56b9fa.mp3

quiz.text: That is right. We will take care of everything for you.
quiz.nativeText: 正是这样。我们会为您处理好所有事情。
quiz.name: 49056ea49b88c9d659ebce44b65df0c3.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds great.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来很棒。
quiz.name: 1d6caf44019f5546e9e1c9486eba6340.mp3

quiz.text: So have you decided on a package?
quiz.nativeText: 那么您决定好选择哪种包价旅游了吗？
quiz.name: a3663b6c3e070183ccb59389845bfd83.mp3

quiz.text: I still need to think about it some more.
quiz.nativeText: 我还需要再多考虑一下。
quiz.name: 52fd716f4f86dbbf22e82e8a2f9202ac.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. You can come back anytime.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你可以随时回来。
quiz.name: cfee3922398ddc6620d027dfc2800dc5.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

learningItem.desc: 固定搭配，表示对人或事的赞许和欣赏

quiz.text: The bridge in front of you guys is the famous Golden Gate Bridge, the symbol of San Francisco!
quiz.nativeText: 在大家面前的就是著名的金门大桥，旧金山的标志性建筑！
quiz.name: 4cc6290fdd3f1586360b0a918f70f4bd.mp3

quiz.text: It is magnificent! When was it constructed?
quiz.nativeText: 好壮观！它是什么时候被建造的？
quiz.name: e6cfe1aaaab4e6767724e9f16254412c.mp3

quiz.text: Construction began in nineteen thirty three and finished four years later.
quiz.nativeText: 建造开始于一九三三年并在四年后完工。
quiz.name: def25bbc7a4c22a0b4af496c149506a5.mp3

quiz.text: Who was the chief engineer?
quiz.nativeText: 谁是总工程师？
quiz.name: 35ad3ce3e7ca2288ce96f351a6c9602a.mp3

quiz.text: Joseph Strauss. He demanded the strongest safety protections.
quiz.nativeText: 约瑟夫克劳斯。他要求最安全的保护措施。
quiz.name: aa6b54b54ca4567ae9d2117189ecd726.mp3

quiz.text: That's really something! Why is the bridge painted orange?
quiz.nativeText: 他真了不起！为什么桥被涂成橙色了呢？
quiz.name: e48f8dcef8598b143fb83d0adadc5b3a.mp3

quiz.text: That color is called International Orange, which is easier to see in the heavy fog.
quiz.nativeText: 这种颜色叫做国际橙色。在大雾天气，这种颜色更容易引人注意。
quiz.name: 7e1e81efd9a3ae574c80b2aa67864067.mp3

quiz.text: Why is it called the Golden Gate Bridge if it's orange?
quiz.nativeText: 如果它是橙色的，那为什么要叫金门大桥呢？
quiz.name: 222c2074f91057a269022b04dc53eb19.mp3

quiz.text: Because the bridge spans the Golden Gate Strait.
quiz.nativeText: 因为这座桥横跨金门海峡。
quiz.name: ba38625299257da133579434a91312db.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Thank you for answering my questions.
quiz.nativeText: 我明白了。谢谢你回答我的问题。
quiz.name: 9bf9e4d3f42c205cfb03a1544984e100.mp3

quiz.text: Is that the Statue of Liberty?
quiz.nativeText: 那是自由女神像吗？
quiz.name: 1f22020969320897c683377bd66bb656.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It was a gift to America from France.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。它是法国送给美国的礼物。
quiz.name: 708e69639a3f865572dfe8167f69ce82.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, I guess it means a lot, doesn’t it?
quiz.nativeText: 我猜它一定有很多含义，不是吗？
quiz.name: ce8fb4d0a877f4af00e79cb5a93d9662.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It has now become a symbol of freedom.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。它现在已经变成了自由的象征。
quiz.name: dad5fb705bd7cbf68e4582e4c814ce69.mp3

quiz.text: Are these people celebrating the New Year?
quiz.nativeText: 这些人在庆祝新年吗？
quiz.name: 899a4b7ba8cfdaac961bfa82efb8b90a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I took this photo at Times Square.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我在时报广场拍的这张照片。
quiz.name: 4d7094b364896d507e47724c77655e53.mp3

quiz.text: Why is it called "Times"?
quiz.nativeText: 它为什么叫“时报”?
quiz.name: 98db88a92f67df6492bcdbc78cda788e.mp3

quiz.text: It is named after the New York Times.
quiz.nativeText: 它是以纽约时报的名字命名的。
quiz.name: 926ae2e760bac7ba3298690b45aede05.mp3

quiz.text: Is that the White House?
quiz.nativeText: 那是白宫吗？
quiz.name: c7db23c3f6403e4454ee3476658e08fa.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It is the residence and workplace of the President of the United States.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。那是美国总统居住和工作的地方。
quiz.name: 8cbc3988d330a45dbed3db3476e11264.mp3

quiz.text: You also went to Washington D.C.?
quiz.nativeText: 你也去了华盛顿特区？
quiz.name: c6b3cf9dd790a2927b0c982d9f385fe6.mp3

quiz.text: But of course.
quiz.nativeText: 当然啦。
quiz.name: 9a98fae399ed1e2bb31a93bbac77ad5a.mp3

quiz.text: Where did you take all these beautiful photos?
quiz.nativeText: 你是在哪里拍出这些漂亮的照片的？
quiz.name: 003b7f3511bb7389dceeabc4c793494a.mp3

quiz.text: At Yellowstone National Park.
quiz.nativeText: 在黄石国家公园。
quiz.name: 63797ca8b62a654aec56f64703038d55.mp3

quiz.text: You have been to so many places. That is so cool.
quiz.nativeText: 你去过那么多地方。那真酷。
quiz.name: af604bf2204723f242dd5047f1b37c05.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It was a wonderful trip.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。这是一个愉快的旅行。
quiz.name: 82b2af4168dd2904049ba60820153d53.mp3

learningItem.desc: 洛杉矶郊外地区，现多指美国电影工业中心
全称为美国电影艺术与科学学院奖
位于好莱坞，是近年来奥斯卡颁奖典礼的举办地
位于好莱坞很重要的一个剧院

quiz.text: Hello, sir. Welcome to Hollywood!
quiz.nativeText: 你好，先生。欢迎来到好莱坞！
quiz.name: e17565cf60a1e017b8969f6ba60159d0.mp3

quiz.text: I am really excited about this tour. Could you give me some suggestions for what to do?
quiz.nativeText: 我对这次旅行感到十分激动。你能给我一些玩什么的意见吗？
quiz.name: a81103f41de550189e6fb8f87e111a70.mp3

quiz.text: If you are interested in the Oscar awards, the Dolby Theatre is a must-see.
quiz.nativeText: 如果你对奥斯卡颁奖有兴趣，杜比剧院是一个必看的景点。
quiz.name: 3d4978d3d120234b6718b06ba887e86c.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds good! What else?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来不错！还有呢？
quiz.name: 93afb3cfea502cc7f93e81333d805d5c.mp3

quiz.text: I think you'll also like the Chinese Theatre.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得你也会喜欢中国剧院的。
quiz.name: abd22801faec8fe59daf1175f959d895.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Is the Hollywood Walk of Fame in the neighborhood?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。好莱坞星光大道就在附近吗？
quiz.name: 7fed1359ac3355223fc8f0689ff4f8a4.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. You can find more than two thousand names embedded in the sidewalks.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。你可以找到超过两千个名人签名镶嵌在人行道上。
quiz.name: e16c4b914eb7c1b93d717a1a1b7437ee.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds interesting! Anything else?
quiz.nativeText: 这听起来真有趣！还有什么其他的吗？
quiz.name: c15cdbf2c13e0235b4bf7edf8d675d0e.mp3

quiz.text: Universal Studios. There you can see a real working movies studio and visit various theme parks.
quiz.nativeText: 环球影城。在那里你可以在真实的电影工作室，并且能够参观好多主题公园。
quiz.name: 15761a48651218734fc05f08af8b87ad.mp3

quiz.text: I cannot wait to go! Thank you for your time.
quiz.nativeText: 我都等不及要去了！谢谢你的时间。
quiz.name: 74985aa4bd7d2743d8f3dd320e534c5f.mp3

learningItem.desc: 世界上第一大跨国瀑布

quiz.text: Ladies and gentlemen, we are now approaching Niagara Falls!
quiz.nativeText: 女士们先生们，我们马上就要到尼亚加拉大瀑布了！
quiz.name: b524f5eb163d7eb2f68dc7b7f4ae3fb8.mp3

quiz.text: Could you tell us more about the waterfall?
quiz.nativeText: 你能告诉我们更多关于瀑布的信息吗？
quiz.name: 9b0e2dbd4938a9315833b911056c8d27.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Niagara Falls is a collective name for the three waterfalls.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。事实上，尼亚加拉大瀑布是三个瀑布的总称。
quiz.name: c470f6565661130f1f4749f28e19655d.mp3

quiz.text: That is interesting! What are the names of those waterfalls?
quiz.nativeText: 好有趣！这些瀑布都叫什么名字呢？
quiz.name: 8c19d45013f1e695b53bc54259619a7a.mp3

quiz.text: From largest to smallest, they are Horseshoe Falls, the American Falls and the Bridal Veil Falls.
quiz.nativeText: 从大到小分别是马蹄瀑布，美国瀑布和新娘面纱瀑布。
quiz.name: febe1301bf3c922d82fa8541713b2770.mp3

quiz.text: Do we have time to see them all?
quiz.nativeText: 我们有时间都看完吗？
quiz.name: 05b4f60662814b69acbac3eed76fbbca.mp3

quiz.text: Well, the Horseshoe Falls lies mostly on the Canadian side. But we can catch a glimpse of it from here.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，马蹄瀑布大多在加拿大那边。不过我们可以在这边瞥见它的样子。
quiz.name: 969074ed68479ce80ace953062a6a054.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Where are the best views?
quiz.nativeText: 我明白了。哪里景色最好呢？
quiz.name: 65b72f82cf30d091cf40ee92891ff78a.mp3

quiz.text: Most of the attractions lie within the Niagara Falls State Park.
quiz.nativeText: 大多数风景都在尼亚加拉国家公园境内。
quiz.name: 6f18866bf846fe154aa675a332139b69.mp3

quiz.text: I can't wait to see it!
quiz.nativeText: 我迫不及待想去看看啦！
quiz.name: 2743aea771096110c20fab9712ee14a2.mp3

quiz.text: We have arrived at the front gate of the State Park. I am going to buy tickets for our group.
quiz.nativeText: 我们已经到国家公园的大门口了。我去给我们的团队买票。
quiz.name: ff2b72d67df721216effd4900baa6d43.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Thank you for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。多谢帮助。
quiz.name: 614030d4a3fe6a8187daa7322b65d26d.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 访问最多的，参观人数最多的

learningItem.desc: 单数形式为a work of art

quiz.text: Have you been to any museums in New York?
quiz.nativeText: 你去过纽约的博物馆吗？
quiz.name: 761f223dbcd10fbb4c8527324869e363.mp3

quiz.text: Not yet. Do you have any recommendations?
quiz.nativeText: 还没有。你有什么推荐么？
quiz.name: 65cd088d6d60dfffeaba3880d518cc41.mp3

quiz.text: I suggest you visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art. You won't regret it.
quiz.nativeText: 我建议你去参观大都会博物馆。肯定不会后悔的。
quiz.name: 56f90fc28e9229f6f0e23f1c23757bdb.mp3

quiz.text: I've heard a lot about it! People usually call it "the Met", right?
quiz.nativeText: 我听说过好多关于它的事！人们通常叫它“the Met”，对吗？
quiz.name: b40814a26d30a88c58a2d8e70d315b9f.mp3

quiz.text: You're right. It is the largest art museum in the United States.
quiz.nativeText: 你说得对。它是美国国内最大的艺术博物馆。
quiz.name: 03202a4245e052216dcca9d89e6f73fa.mp3

quiz.text: Great! Who was the founder?
quiz.nativeText: 太棒了！创始人是谁？
quiz.name: f1ff3bb5c92a8ef7563e943203f0c95d.mp3

quiz.text: It was founded by artists and businessmen who wanted to bring art education to people.
quiz.nativeText: 创始人是许许多多的艺术家和商人，他们想把艺术教育带给人们。
quiz.name: 04115dd671dc5ccc9780bf3ff5f240c7.mp3

quiz.text: How many works of art in its permanent collection?
quiz.nativeText: 永久馆藏里里有多少艺术作品？
quiz.name: 0c3d2a9cb76a0c897c6ee32495207ae4.mp3

quiz.text: Over two million works of various times and places, divided in seventeen departments.
quiz.nativeText: 有超过两百万件不同时代和地区的作品，分散在十七个展区。
quiz.name: 142a97b7848631b546897dbfa8d9972e.mp3

quiz.text: That's quite extensive!
quiz.nativeText: 好多好广泛呀！
quiz.name: efa226db426f842710e42f93737e98e8.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It is also home to encyclopedic collections of costumes and weapons from around the world.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。这里还有百科全书般全面的全世界各地的戏服和武器。
quiz.name: 7727a82b7a95862813e12a4058e7023e.mp3

quiz.text: I cannot wait to see it! Let's go there tomorrow!
quiz.nativeText: 我迫不及待想去看看了！我们明天就去那儿吧！
quiz.name: 3da72373567ee00e94150af715f490c6.mp3

quiz.text: Wow! I can see the Statue of Liberty with my own eyes!
quiz.nativeText: 哇！我能亲眼看见自由女神像啦！
quiz.name: 9032228012672e419a657fe665e67b95.mp3

quiz.text: Did you know that it was a gift to the United States?
quiz.nativeText: 你知道它其实是送给美国的礼物吗？
quiz.name: a84f0d0aeb69e1e046a63d9518d94268.mp3

quiz.text: A gift from whom?
quiz.nativeText: 来自谁的礼物？
quiz.name: f2a469b71218805d4e1a75ad9a7e8dbd.mp3

quiz.text: From France.
quiz.nativeText: 来自法国。
quiz.name: d9cfc207bc20f0347cd91eb96a43431d.mp3

quiz.text: Really? That sounds good.
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？听起来不错。
quiz.name: 3893327709f70250f59b7e61191a6ef0.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. It was designed by a French sculptor.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯。是一个法国雕刻家设计的。
quiz.name: 2b82f5df129818dbb47d1ffe2bf5f3af.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, now I remember. The woman is a Roman goddess, right?
quiz.nativeText: 哦，现在我想起来了。那个女人是一位罗马女神，对吧？
quiz.name: 0d7421dadca94794dbd9e1bd93a900ed.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Now she's an icon of freedom and of the United States.
quiz.nativeText: 对。现在她是自由和美国的象征。
quiz.name: 79c594363d9e09f215b83844051c535f.mp3

quiz.text: We are about to arrive. What's next?
quiz.nativeText: 我们快到了。下面我们要看什么？
quiz.name: 2414e73c80c48d7c7686d09e4702ffed.mp3

quiz.text: We'll get to the pedestal, and go inside the statue all the way up to the crown.
quiz.nativeText: 我们会到达基座，然后进到雕像里面一直到达冠冕的部分。
quiz.name: 1362a16f25dd0cacc1fab15af96ff6be.mp3

quiz.text: Do you know why it's called Times Square?
quiz.nativeText: 你知道这里为什么叫时代广场吗？
quiz.name: b7ae8d36768a441daeb056af2725a692.mp3

quiz.text: It's named after the New York Times, right?
quiz.nativeText: 是以纽约时报命名的，对吧？
quiz.name: b7a7eae0e97f4740239f709ae917031b.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, after the New York Times moved its headquarters here.
quiz.nativeText: 对，在纽约时报把总部移到这里之后。
quiz.name: 352e762ed48dd87ac1b6a16f86c19fcb.mp3

quiz.text: Look at all these colorful billboards!
quiz.nativeText: 快看这些色彩斑斓的广告牌！
quiz.name: a639e39a33c51447cf4f1350dbe9582e.mp3

quiz.text: People always get lost here because of the huge, eye-catching billboards.
quiz.nativeText: 人们总是因为这些巨大的引人注目的广告牌而迷失在这里。
quiz.name: d156deffceba59131da29a04dbf193a5.mp3

quiz.text: Wow, it's NASDAQ! One of the largest stock exchanges in the world!
quiz.nativeText: 哇，是纳斯达克！世界上最大的证券交易所之一！
quiz.name: 72376d3e6d31883f6092fd6ba24521df.mp3

quiz.text: It's always in the news.
quiz.nativeText: 它总是出现在新闻里。
quiz.name: 394d48817ca2805301ee8e291670f9ba.mp3

quiz.text: There's a Disney store just ahead.
quiz.nativeText: 前面有家迪士尼商店。
quiz.name: a32b5fe4bc24034bc81300a6f315562d.mp3

quiz.text: Do you want to have a look inside?
quiz.nativeText: 你想进里面看看吗？
quiz.name: c44cc95f527da8de46d56b338a6f5af8.mp3

quiz.text: Absolutely! I am a big fan of Disney cartoons.
quiz.nativeText: 当然！我是迪士尼卡通的狂热粉丝。
quiz.name: bee6fb7e5cc2d9a92d16ab446d330752.mp3

quiz.text: It's really a pity that we missed the celebration here on New Year's Eve.
quiz.nativeText: 新年除夕我们错过了这里的庆祝活动真是可惜。
quiz.name: 73fd6eb1ee01280c2d9c07ce70ebcc59.mp3

quiz.text: Well, we can always come next year.
quiz.nativeText: 没事，明年我们可以随时来。
quiz.name: 07cc50677e833511d12ee4ef1ad6a4a2.mp3

quiz.text: Look! It's Old Faithful!
quiz.nativeText: 看！是老忠实泉！
quiz.name: 40931dcfe6944025895de7b6f3c11ce2.mp3

quiz.text: What is that?
quiz.nativeText: 那是什么？
quiz.name: 391c285bfa2525b3ffabcd063871258c.mp3

quiz.text: Old Faithful is the name of the most famous geyser in Yellowstone.
quiz.nativeText: 老忠实泉是黄石的一个最有名的间歇泉。
quiz.name: 45504aea677e2f1f72172683764ec749.mp3

quiz.text: It has an interesting name.
quiz.nativeText: 它的名字好有趣。
quiz.name: f9c25d708010d7c052be506587d422ca.mp3

quiz.text: People say it's faithful because this geyser erupts about every seventy five minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 人们说它忠实是因为这个间歇泉大约每75分钟喷发一次。
quiz.name: 740ab41c95b1ee013029d7637f35ccd5.mp3

quiz.text: It's started erupting! Is it shooting water?
quiz.nativeText: 它现在开始喷发啦！喷出来的是水吗?
quiz.name: 21776f348a00ac014b686e90e6d2a68c.mp3

quiz.text: Hot water and steam. It can reach up to fifty six meters high.
quiz.nativeText: 热水和蒸汽。可以达到56米高。
quiz.name: 2212c288b669e932a7db57d52c152177.mp3

quiz.text: That's cool! This is my first time seeing a geyser.
quiz.nativeText: 太酷啦！这是我第一次看到间歇泉。
quiz.name: 79a6f30761396fb5ae801b749fc5be2c.mp3

quiz.text: Now it's over. Let's walk down this trail.
quiz.nativeText: 现在结束了。顺着这条路走下去吧。
quiz.name: ac3fea1ed9fa2537f87813e1c581df0d.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. What do you think we'll see on this trail?
quiz.nativeText: 好啊。你觉得我们会在路上看到什么？
quiz.name: 998ffeee27b82510166a4e118d197add.mp3

quiz.text: Other geysers, wild animals, and at the end of this trail there's a hot spring called Morning Glory.
quiz.nativeText: 其他的间歇泉，野生动物，在这条路的尽头有个叫牵牛花的温泉。
quiz.name: 6e1ed301d8a1986bc4eb851d6e1ada27.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds beautiful! I can't wait to see it!
quiz.nativeText: 听起来好美！我等不及看到它了！
quiz.name: 4f88894e325dd5cc9ba889b494a8212c.mp3

quiz.text: There are just so many historic sites and museums. I'm not sure where to start.
quiz.nativeText: 历史景点和博物馆有好多啊，我拿不准从哪里开始。
quiz.name: ebd0a96e739d195a7536db3a2122fde7.mp3

quiz.text: Let's start with the White House and the Lincoln Memorial.
quiz.nativeText: 我们可以从白宫和林肯纪念馆开始。
quiz.name: 809a7f5d023a644b3deabb7621d57ae2.mp3

quiz.text: Those will take half the day.
quiz.nativeText: 那就要半天的时间。
quiz.name: fb5f72f7273ccaad3d2c45942215a6e4.mp3

quiz.text: What makes you think that? We can't go inside the White House, after all.
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么这么想？毕竟我们进不去白宫。
quiz.name: 7cd1509ddfba08c30e3da40cb1168940.mp3

quiz.text: There are three memorials near the Lincoln Memorial. I want to take a closer look.
quiz.nativeText: 林肯纪念馆附近还有三个纪念馆。我想更仔细地参观。
quiz.name: 53d5d3f32c905005314f6f230962901c.mp3

quiz.text: OK, then. We can go to Chinatown for lunch.
quiz.nativeText: 那好吧。我们可以去唐人街吃午饭。
quiz.name: 7c6811c901071f764b9949baf987e6a4.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds nice. What about this afternoon?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来不错。那今天下午呢？
quiz.name: 5f00373a9e43cf9f7257bbfda622f31c.mp3

quiz.text: I want to go to Capitol Hill, we can visit the United States Capitol and the Library of Congress there.
quiz.nativeText: 我想去国会山，我们可以在那参观美国参议院和国会图书馆。
quiz.name: 3e70ef74d185fd8f2f66ec2af29155cd.mp3

quiz.text: Great! But we won't have time to visit all those museums today.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒啦！但是我们今天就没时间去那些博物馆了。
quiz.name: b654396f98aec91381e3057148a0f27e.mp3

quiz.text: I think we'd better stay the night at a hotel nearby. Then we can go to Natural History Museum tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得我们最好在附近的旅馆过夜。然后我们明天就能去自然博物馆了。
quiz.name: a47c41405786a347c91a2a06ac5fdd71.mp3

quiz.text: What is this?
quiz.nativeText: 这是什么？
quiz.name: dc9d5532a6e95ca2761379375dbc47e4.mp3

quiz.text: It is the Golden Gate Bridge.
quiz.nativeText: 这是金门大桥。
quiz.name: aceb6f81e50c7aa63ef27bb20cdce3af.mp3

quiz.text: But it is orange. Why is it called "golden"?
quiz.nativeText: 但是它是橙色的。为什么叫“金”？
quiz.name: 0d75f758011dda47bc24aa885c48d632.mp3

quiz.text: It is named after the Golden Gate Strait.
quiz.nativeText: 它是以金门海峡命名的。
quiz.name: 9798ed075bf7e5c6a1b7332d94717578.mp3

quiz.text: What is Hollywood?
quiz.nativeText: 好莱坞是什么？
quiz.name: 6097e2f1ed133192f03350d9053ada21.mp3

quiz.text: It is the home of the American film industry.
quiz.nativeText: 它是美国电影工业之乡。
quiz.name: c80ac6011e3c4b643be25932febfcbd4.mp3

quiz.text: What is there to see in Hollywood?
quiz.nativeText: 在好莱坞可以参观什么？
quiz.name: dd8e38d7af1d1936b054dbba39c743ec.mp3

quiz.text: The Chinese Theatre and Hollywood Walk of Fame.
quiz.nativeText: 中国剧院和好莱坞星光大道。
quiz.name: cc8493a9cbfd6b9fe32fec03adaa82b2.mp3

quiz.text: And what is this one?
quiz.nativeText: 这又是什么？
quiz.name: fb320678da0abab03dde437172d3d068.mp3

quiz.text: It is the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
quiz.nativeText: 这是大都会艺术博物馆
quiz.name: 0584de493800ef3e2622622e1fafbab1.mp3

quiz.text: What a long name.
quiz.nativeText: 好长的名字。
quiz.name: d50c4eb87ab16a0be51e5d0017c30588.mp3

quiz.text: You can also call it the "Met" for short.
quiz.nativeText: 你也可以简称它为“Met”。
quiz.name: f0bf8861e491bf9807f83483d9880609.mp3

quiz.text: I have heard that it is the largest art museum in America.
quiz.nativeText: 我听说它是美国最大的艺术博物馆。
quiz.name: 95b0b60e87c7b14ca64f4b8faefb87ee.mp3

quiz.text: That is true.
quiz.nativeText: 确实是这样。
quiz.name: 351bef6b26b9a243c0907ea420b2923a.mp3

learningItem.desc: 专有名词，纽约城市地标性建筑之一

quiz.text: Excuse me. Can I help you with something?
quiz.nativeText: 抱歉打扰，请问需要我帮忙么？
quiz.name: 3fadd2d9a9c904d735fa4c47cdb00ed1.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I'm afraid I've lost my way.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我恐怕是迷路了。
quiz.name: 12baa8bc16f6b94a9acc3646a238c3d8.mp3

quiz.text: Where were you trying to go?
quiz.nativeText: 你想去哪里呢？
quiz.name: a2d32ea3505e790a308add1755dd1746.mp3

quiz.text: The Empire State Building.
quiz.nativeText: 帝国大厦。
quiz.name: 2c1b7f73ec0c7ff8fb8e9a32925140ae.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Take the subway to thirty fourth street. You'll see the building as soon as you exit the station.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道了。乘地铁到第三十四号大街。一出地铁站你就会看到帝国大厦了。
quiz.name: e3385b84ef9e5b18b6d8666e8a63e62b.mp3

quiz.text: Could you show me where the nearest station is?
quiz.nativeText: 可以给我指一下最近的地铁站在哪里吗？
quiz.name: da2a3fa2562eeef1eeaecbfa8cf1a02f.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Go down this street and turn left, the subway station is on your left.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。沿着这条街走并向左转，地铁站就在你的左边。
quiz.name: 88fe83d2275d65fb1f327dd0aa430a92.mp3

quiz.text: How long will it take to get to the station?
quiz.nativeText: 到地铁站会花多长时间？
quiz.name: 20fbd1dfed4e7444d0cff71c2a3ebcf2.mp3

quiz.text: About ten minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 大约十分钟。
quiz.name: c5ce133aafbff776cd484cdbd5a72e0f.mp3

quiz.text: All right. Thank you for your help.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。谢谢你的帮助。
quiz.name: 614030d4a3fe6a8187daa7322b65d26d.mp3

quiz.text: Are you all right? You look so pale.
quiz.nativeText: 你还好吗？你看起来脸色苍白。
quiz.name: b8d8e65ee4895bb86f87a62c12c32fb9.mp3

quiz.text: Actually, I am not feeling well at all.
quiz.nativeText: 其实我感觉一点都不舒服。
quiz.name: 1d2d36162f0c687a1d7445729a840a3c.mp3

quiz.text: What's the matter?
quiz.nativeText: 怎么了？
quiz.name: 023ba38a4deba81183a24181a0c8f1fa.mp3

quiz.text: I feel weak and thirsty. And I have a headache.
quiz.nativeText: 我感觉虚弱，口渴。而且我头很痛。
quiz.name: 9d48098ad7659426d6384524175629a5.mp3

quiz.text: How long have you been lying in the sun?
quiz.nativeText: 你在太阳下躺了多久了？
quiz.name: f6046492037e83bec740de1a0792a37c.mp3

quiz.text: I am not sure. Maybe for an hour.
quiz.nativeText: 我不太确定。或许有一个小时了。
quiz.name: 7b24a9f9c9e6dd8636bb44f59ca1dcb9.mp3

quiz.text: I think you might be having heat stroke.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得你可能是中暑了。
quiz.name: 9e00d4bde5ee18a6547406becf75f776.mp3

quiz.text: Really? What should I do now?
quiz.nativeText: 真的吗？我现在该怎么办呢？
quiz.name: f12d090aa68436eba0afdae6aa7a7d9b.mp3

quiz.text: Let's go to a place with air-conditioning. And I'll get you a glass of ice water.
quiz.nativeText: 我们去一个有空调的地方吧。我给你弄一杯冰水。
quiz.name: 70a268802f4ec9d5861330852449c286.mp3

quiz.text: That's very kind of you.
quiz.nativeText: 你真好。
quiz.name: c2d2fb3f29f090c42574a254f1b76f23.mp3

quiz.text: Next time don't forget to use sunscreen. Also, try not to stay in the sun for too long. OK?
quiz.nativeText: 下次别忘了涂防晒。还有，不要长时间晒太阳，好吗？
quiz.name: dd10ff132d548d278c8b11d761f0810e.mp3

quiz.text: I'll be careful next time. Thanks for reminding me.
quiz.nativeText: 我下次会小心的。谢谢你提醒我。
quiz.name: d752f2e3c4b1ccf0eed0dd39e4e71115.mp3

quiz.text: Good afternoon, miss. May I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 小姐，早上好！有什么需要帮忙的吗？
quiz.name: 15f95bbcdd689cb7da5daeb740501647.mp3

quiz.text: I lost my backpack. I wonder if anyone has found it.
quiz.nativeText: 我的背包丢了。我想知道有没有人捡到。
quiz.name: 58e075921c882a46ac72b333baec6a4c.mp3

quiz.text: Please take a seat. Could you show me your ID card, please?
quiz.nativeText: 先请坐。能给我看一下身份证件吗？
quiz.name: eeee5e6dfb5699d261d1ff542f8f7601.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Here you are.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。给你。
quiz.name: 76385aa07879a3d1c9675c3194743ebe.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Could you describe what your backpack looks like?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。能描述一下你的背包是什么样子吗？
quiz.name: f56d3afe1bde316df2ee0ff1d3e3ab30.mp3

quiz.text: It's a soft leather one with a buckle on the front.
quiz.nativeText: 是一个软皮制的，前面有一个扣。
quiz.name: 6538914513c4f2e9ba4ec6a013eec2c3.mp3

quiz.text: What color is it?
quiz.nativeText: 是什么颜色的？
quiz.name: 5565eb7286fefe73aa75ed29a9e5318d.mp3

quiz.text: It is dark brown.
quiz.nativeText: 是深棕色的。
quiz.name: 8a180160f8a76bc18488e8d35eddd1e5.mp3

quiz.text: Could you tell me what brand it is?
quiz.nativeText: 能告诉我是什么牌子的吗？
quiz.name: 1e07d5c7bf9fb8c41bb9278ef45fd0c3.mp3

quiz.text: It's a Polo. The logo is on the bottom.
quiz.nativeText: 是一个保罗包。商标在下面。
quiz.name: 326ecf01a25b1c2c1df3731b510ff22c.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Could you tell me the items that were in it?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。能告诉我包里都有什么吗？
quiz.name: 747bd50753c61d80abd99c56c0aac127.mp3

quiz.text: A red purse, a bottle of perfume and a blue scarf.
quiz.nativeText: 一个红色钱包，一瓶香水和一个蓝色的围巾。
quiz.name: 8ac0847cac08ee5842a9fd9d72b1b0d8.mp3

quiz.text: OK, you are definitely the owner of this bag. You can have it now.
quiz.nativeText: 好了，你一定是这个包的失主。你现在可以拿走了。
quiz.name: b41af05b26bd5bd2b709db94bbb81f0a.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。
quiz.name: af0fd01c5df43cdb5ff841d2387a1540.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，需要帮助吗？
quiz.name: b0822abd4ed16b6809014f857e45c8e3.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I lost my wallet.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我的钱包丢了。
quiz.name: b0c40d4370b3f0ea0412d4d9ebc82546.mp3

quiz.text: OK. What does it look like?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。它看上去是什么样子的？
quiz.name: c952b95e1c2264666e80b78b15ba9035.mp3

quiz.text: Here, I have a picture of it.
quiz.nativeText: 这儿，我有一张它的照片。
quiz.name: b91e192c0d626853b1e45c1d627ba450.mp3

quiz.text: Let me see. I am sorry but we don't have this wallet.
quiz.nativeText: 让我看看。很抱歉我们没有这样的钱包。
quiz.name: a23f80958f28c92208f6c7161089ee3a.mp3

quiz.text: What am I going to do?
quiz.nativeText: 我该怎么办？
quiz.name: 816ddae8d7de0df99adfd45b051cf726.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry. Maybe you should go to the police station and report it.
quiz.nativeText: 别担心。也许你应该去警察局报案。
quiz.name: 783f6c64159eafd7cf28ceecfca3b432.mp3

quiz.text: Do you know how to get there?
quiz.nativeText: 你知道怎么去那里吗？
quiz.name: 9ff92833e6f2a001f53681e5a11ddb40.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. You just turn right and walk three blocks.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。你就右转然后走三个街区。
quiz.name: 070d19f5482dd7308b84b4a037ee6e04.mp3

quiz.text: And then?
quiz.nativeText: 然后呢？
quiz.name: b6286d0ef5f224154fd85467e1768149.mp3

quiz.text: The police station will be on your right. You won't miss it.
quiz.nativeText: 警察局会在你的右手边。你不会错过它的。
quiz.name: 619066d2a43f0135bb87c71a1ff59c22.mp3

quiz.text: Sounds very close.
quiz.nativeText: 听起来很近。
quiz.name: ee6f46a4159346b9b4dfce765ead81d1.mp3

quiz.text: It is. If you have other problems, you can come back here. We are happy to help.
quiz.nativeText: 确实是。如果你有其他问题，你可以回到这里来。我们很愿意帮助你。
quiz.name: b753ec13a76578a2395eedd2137c2dc9.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 多谢。
quiz.name: af0fd01c5df43cdb5ff841d2387a1540.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Miss Lee. I'm calling from the Human Resources department at Microsoft.
quiz.nativeText: 李小姐您好。这里是微软公司人力资源部。
quiz.name: 93175b6ad6fcd58d5100b58ca883a209.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, I recently applied for a position in your company.
quiz.nativeText: 您好！我最近申请了你们公司的职位。
quiz.name: ea61690565124a5f4c215cfc16c96799.mp3

quiz.text: I’d like to schedule a phone interview about the position you applied. Is now convenient?
quiz.nativeText: 根据您申请的职位，我想安排电话面试的时间。您现在方便说话吗？
quiz.name: 4f2abee72959b64552a4ae428af0350a.mp3

quiz.text: Oh yes, sure.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以。
quiz.name: 22e6c84dc6ddf342141fe20a15b204e8.mp3

quiz.text: Ten a.m. or three p.m. on this Thursday. Which one works for you to take the phone interview?
quiz.nativeText: 这周四上午十点或下午三点。你希望哪个时间进行电话面试？
quiz.name: ade2919ab8b76ac9987ce3ad132a7276.mp3

quiz.text: Ten a.m. on Thursday would be perfect for me.
quiz.nativeText: 我这周四上午十点可以。
quiz.name: 441fc5e63891a2be40139ff7460f3d84.mp3

quiz.text: Great! Mary Smith from the Human Resources department will contact you for the interview at that time.
quiz.nativeText: 很好。人力资源部的玛丽·史密斯到时候将为您进行电话面试。
quiz.name: e0d466eec20ea58eda485d59e57d49da.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you for making the arrangement.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您的安排。

quiz.text: Hi, Miss Lee, this is Mary Smith from Microsoft.

quiz.text: Hi, Ms. Smith. I was expecting your call. Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today.
quiz.nativeText: 史密斯女士您好。我一直在等您的电话。感谢您今天抽出时间为我进行电话面试。
quiz.hilitText: Hi, Ms. Smith. I was expecting your call. Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today.

quiz.name: c4747e7746ee0b9aed01436bd1643777.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all. To get started, I'd like to know why you want to work at our company.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。首先我想先了解您为什么想来我们公司。
quiz.hilitText: Not at all. To get started, I'd like to know why you want to work at our company.
quiz.ipa: nɑt æt ɔl tu ɡɛt stɑrtəd aɪd laɪk tɪ noʊ waɪ ju wɑnt tu wɝk æt ɑr kʌmpəni
quiz.name: e58788d78f0b011dac26fa8d74fdc199.mp3

quiz.text: Well, first, the company has a great reputation in the industry.
quiz.nativeText: 首先，贵公司在业界享有很高的声誉。
quiz.hilitText: Well, first, the company has a great reputation in the industry.
quiz.ipa: wɛl fɝst ðə kʌmpəni hæz ə ɡreɪt rɛpjəteɪʃən ɪn ði ɪndəstri
quiz.name: 957b6765032426461f7fd3b79503fcad.mp3

quiz.text: And?
quiz.nativeText: 还有呢？
quiz.name: 06d58014cdd607a2916bc27a8387c1a8.mp3

quiz.text: I am also impressed by the company's dynamic and innovative culture, and would love to become part of it.
quiz.nativeText: 我也对贵公司充满活力和创造力的文化印象非常深刻，因此希望能成为其中的一份子。
quiz.hilitText: I am also impressed by the company's dynamic and innovative culture, and would love to become part of it.
quiz.ipa: aɪ æm ɔlsoʊ ɪmprɛst baɪ ði kʌmpəniz daɪnæmɪk ænd ɪnəveɪtɪv kʌltʃɝ ænd wʊd lʌv tu bɪkʌm pɑrt ʌv ɪt
quiz.name: f098b7eed1de710ccbe3d692fd9ea816.mp3

quiz.text: And why are you interested in this position?
quiz.nativeText: 那你为什么对这个岗位感兴趣呢？
quiz.hilitText: And why are you interested in this position?
quiz.ipa: ænd waɪ ɝ ju ɪntrəstəd ɪn ðɪs pəzɪʃən
quiz.name: 7b6bd853e6c1564270f951767fee5e66.mp3

quiz.text: Because I enjoy dealing with people.
quiz.nativeText: 因为我很享受和人打交道。
quiz.hilitText: Because I enjoy dealing with people.
quiz.ipa: bɪkɔz aɪ ɪndʒɔɪ dilɪŋ wɪθ pipəl
quiz.name: 5461ac288f6d9803aa59dfda07d3cbf5.mp3

quiz.text: All right. When would you be able to come in for an interview next week?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。下周你方便来公司参加面试吗？
quiz.hilitText: All right. When would you be able to come in for an interview next week?
quiz.ipa: ɔl raɪt wɪn wʊd ju bi eɪbəl tu kʌm ɪn fɝ æn ɪntɝvju nɛkst wik
quiz.name: dbf7c7a9a5f19f10be14ad0cb1235a43.mp3

quiz.text: I would be able to come in for an interview next Monday or Tuesday.
quiz.nativeText: 我下周一和周二都可以。
quiz.hilitText: I would be able to come in for an interview next Monday or Tuesday.
quiz.ipa: aɪ wʊd bi eɪbəl tu kʌm ɪn fɝ æn ɪntɝvju nɛkst mʌndi ɔr tjuzdeɪ
quiz.name: ce1c764cb0fd26bdf5a3ea8e776f77db.mp3

quiz.text: Great. I've got you scheduled for next Monday at nine thirty a.m. The interview will be conducted by the Human Resources manager, Mr. Jones.
quiz.nativeText: 太好了。那我就给您安排到下周一上午九点半。到时候会由人力资源部经理琼斯先生为您面试。
quiz.hilitText: Great. I've got you scheduled for next Monday at nine thirty a.m. The interview will be conducted by the Human Resources manager, Mr. Jones.
quiz.ipa: ɡreɪt aɪv ɡɑt ju skɛdʒʊld frɝ nɛkst mʌndeɪ æt naɪn θɝdi eɪ ɛm ði ɪntɝvju wɪl bi kəndʌktəd baɪ ðə hjumən risɔrsɪz mænədʒɝ mɪstɝ dʒoʊnz
quiz.name: e5580e2c4832cbe4ebd43990c67dd7a7.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，太感谢您了。

quiz.text: Three competing store owners rented adjoining shops in a mall.
quiz.nativeText: 三个相互竞争的店主在一座购物中心里租了相邻的铺位。
quiz.hilitText: Three {#*competing*$} store owners rented adjoining {#*shops*$} in a mall.

quiz.text: Good morning. Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。有什么能帮到您吗？
quiz.name: 00346f765e18bca9bd7e0a4da76dbf22.mp3

quiz.text: Good morning. I'm here to see Mr. Jones, the Human Resources manager.
quiz.nativeText: 早上好。我是来见人事部经理琼斯先生的。
quiz.name: 5a18f51c7267304dd4da7614ee25289d.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have an appointment?
quiz.nativeText: 您有预约吗？
quiz.name: 1aa499c683fe2f886c837b58e5ddff8a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I have an appointment with him at nine thirty.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我们约在上午九点半。
quiz.name: 8ceeb9fb81d4765326716afa36a315bc.mp3

quiz.text: Okay. Can I have your name, please?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。请问你的名字是？
quiz.name: b0f4b8c12540cf25be24298388739015.mp3

quiz.text: Tara Lee.
quiz.nativeText: 塔拉·李。
quiz.name: 4328ea3183f425a0cfb981571e8fc5f6.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks. Please sit down. Mr. Jones will meet with you in a minute.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。您请坐。琼斯先生一会儿就能见你。
quiz.name: 0f01352eeffe25b8a19797ed6bce7555.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. Do I need to sign in?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。我需要签到吗？
quiz.name: 7efd6cbc9b3c0ce0c463f15a97a92a13.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Write your name here, please.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，请您在这儿签个字。
quiz.name: c607a6b099be5918d3c61253d98ee957.mp3

quiz.text: All right.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。
quiz.name: b6a5a9fa043c349d795ad0b886d50f46.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 三个相互竞争的店主在一座购物中心里租了相邻的铺位。

quiz.text: Hi Susan.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，苏珊。
quiz.name: cb50d490593cdf83431d37ed7a42ddf7.mp3

quiz.text: Hi Jason. Can you help me with something?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，杰森。你能帮我个忙吗？
quiz.name: 17e80565ba768f5b00e4ed03631e1890.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. What can I do for you?
quiz.nativeText: 当然。需要我做些什么呢？
quiz.name: 512a5f5d4c26bc690adf11c44b0c77f5.mp3

quiz.text: I have a phone interview scheduled this Friday.
quiz.nativeText: 我这周五有一个电话面试。
quiz.name: e5b1b016276dce25700ae9b1a6ecdae5.mp3

quiz.text: What do you need me to do?
quiz.nativeText: 你需要我做什么？
quiz.name: 2f6010a1ec619c31b70a4971ec72006e.mp3

quiz.text: Can you ask me some questions so that I can practice?
quiz.nativeText: 你能问我一些问题我好来练习一下吗？
quiz.name: 05307b6ca3eb96871a0bd858610c7f0c.mp3

quiz.text: No problem. Why do you want to work here?
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。你为什么想在这里工作？
quiz.name: d85ba37cd068aa6255393bc904d5c5b6.mp3

quiz.text: Because of your reputation in the IT services field.
quiz.nativeText: 因为你们在IT服务方面的声誉。
quiz.name: 3080994759a56a16b37ce8a49cf4f11b.mp3

quiz.text: Why are you interested in the position?
quiz.nativeText: 你为什么对这个职务感兴趣？
quiz.name: 0856c277baf965db2e8fc3e936dd4ce8.mp3

quiz.text: Because I like dealing with people.
quiz.nativeText: 因为我喜欢和人打交道。
quiz.name: f23cf19a163ac0b809945c0c12fd4549.mp3

quiz.text: That's great.
quiz.nativeText: 回答地很棒。
quiz.name: 336628884018284817648b2c42f0dc84.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks a lot, Jason.
quiz.nativeText: 多谢杰森。
quiz.name: 9e052e1763d0f5d3e00e9266c5ff0427.mp3

quiz.text: OK, Miss Lee. You may come in. I'm Paul Jones. I'll be interviewing you today.
quiz.nativeText: 李小姐，你可以进来了。我是保罗·琼斯。今天将由我来面试你。
quiz.name: 7ab5763d5bc0bece4cfb77d0d88b3947.mp3

quiz.text: It's a pleasure to meet you, Mr. Jones.
quiz.nativeText: 很高兴见到你，琼斯先生。
quiz.name: ad2a3352acf80026c053e3443fd5d669.mp3

quiz.text: Glad to see you. Please take a seat. How are you today?
quiz.nativeText: 很高兴见到你。你请坐吧。今天感觉怎么样？
quiz.name: 2ff77fc0ce34592b1a4541b25069b395.mp3

quiz.text: I feel fine today. Thank you for asking.
quiz.nativeText: 感觉挺好的，谢谢。
quiz.name: 9c3fc3bd87ebe31c70211160e0e65e63.mp3

quiz.text: Did you have any trouble finding this place?
quiz.nativeText: 我们公司这地儿难找吗？
quiz.name: 09741183f276f8501abe2a4d18374055.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all. I'm quite familiar with this area.
quiz.nativeText: 一点儿都不难。我对这一带很熟。
quiz.name: 9fbea5fd20ec0401e8524f6f5f77aa8d.mp3

quiz.text: Great. Let's start the interview. Are you ready?
quiz.nativeText: 很好。那我们就开始面试吧，你准备好了吗？
quiz.name: 563499ed1a24510c104ddf61fadf19ec.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I am.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我准备好了。
quiz.name: 4147d14144c3923075a4335f484a5364.mp3

name: b

quiz.text: Hello? This is Mr. Jones.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，我是琼斯先生。
quiz.name: d010ebdaf524e917d48f45f0036a4adc.mp3

quiz.text: Mr. Jones, how are you? This is Tara Lee. You interviewed me two weeks ago.
quiz.nativeText: 琼斯先生，您好！我是塔拉·李，两周前面试的那位。
quiz.name: 4581ced806bafe61c99f9034c07ebdef.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, Miss Lee. Can I help you?
quiz.nativeText: 噢，李小姐，怎么啦？
quiz.name: ea647f411633415e5d880d70bf7de6c2.mp3

quiz.text: I'm just calling to see if you have made any decisions concerning the position.
quiz.nativeText: 我打电话只是想问一下你们已经决定这个职位的人选了吗？
quiz.name: 8b1077601c8356e3a5c973c1017c1c52.mp3

quiz.text: Unfortunately, we haven't made a decision yet.
quiz.nativeText: 我们还没有做出任何决定。
quiz.name: ec272b9737c5382a366eb1e6193e6415.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Do you have an idea when you might arrive at a decision?
quiz.nativeText: 这样啊。您知道大概什么时候会做出决定吗？
quiz.name: 1d18c5cc403bdbaddeef22bbcccd188e.mp3

quiz.text: I hope by next Friday.
quiz.nativeText: 可能下周五之前。
quiz.name: 02ab3151945a52ed69739f107926d510.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I'm really interested in this position. Please call me if you need any additional information.
quiz.nativeText: 我想说，我对这个职位非常感兴趣。如果您还需要其他信息，请联系我。
quiz.name: b46d730bd8a250d32c3dd034f77b45d0.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. I will.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我会的。
quiz.name: 8a84d33f64af5753109d922e09932822.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。
quiz.name: af0fd01c5df43cdb5ff841d2387a1540.mp3

quiz.text: May I ask when you will be ready to start?
quiz.nativeText: 我能知道你最快什么时间可以入职吗？
quiz.name: 93f1ab6d8bd356701026f0ffac630862.mp3

quiz.text: Oh, let me see. I'm afraid it'll have to be in two months.
quiz.nativeText: 噢，让我想想。我恐怕得两个月之后。
quiz.name: 16a8a628f599c31f1191c1d26adbfddf.mp3

quiz.text: That might be too late. Could you start a bit earlier?
quiz.nativeText: 那可能太晚了，你能稍微早点来吗？
quiz.name: 6fb722ac43ec934d967400dc31feb47f.mp3

quiz.text: I'm sorry I can't, because I haven't graduated yet.
quiz.nativeText: 很抱歉我不能，因为我还没毕业呢。
quiz.name: 64c08e05cd3c7c570adcf000d7b352c0.mp3

quiz.text: What a pity!
quiz.nativeText: 真遗憾！
quiz.name: eed4b867fa0529f7a59263bbfe174968.mp3

quiz.text: When do you usually require new employees to start?
quiz.nativeText: 你们一般要求新员工什么时候入职呢？
quiz.name: c40aab6803910ea4543fd236070e28fa.mp3

quiz.text: Normally within one month. New employees need to receive some training before beginning work.
quiz.nativeText: 通常一个月以内。新员工需要进行一些入职培训。
quiz.name: f97913d0e23f3e75666a61c96ff31f76.mp3

quiz.text: I will try my best to make arrangements for that.
quiz.nativeText: 那我尽可能再安排下时间。
quiz.name: 3dbc0a96b8ccc6c2161585e063437e97.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Let me know if there are any changes.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，有什么变动一定让我知道。
quiz.name: 99eccbf82688a90add334fda54fa3b87.mp3

quiz.text: Certainly. Thank you very much.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我一定。非常感谢。
quiz.name: 84b65b0c07613d0964b40309c01b8a70.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 正课以外的；(娱乐等)业余的

quiz.text: So where did you graduate from?
quiz.nativeText: 所以你是从哪里毕业的？
quiz.name: da35577103fde0e05ca0380df95e9b10.mp3

quiz.text: I graduated from Peking University.
quiz.nativeText: 我毕业于北京大学。
quiz.name: 8f98d165016b3c0e1354e2a069f29b32.mp3

quiz.text: What was your major?
quiz.nativeText: 你的专业是什么？
quiz.name: 3968471b15f0bffb89ee60f1c2f69251.mp3

quiz.text: I majored in law.
quiz.nativeText: 我主修法律。
quiz.name: 0255ce647cbf092cfbe6ae5ee8fb9464.mp3

quiz.text: Did you take part in any activities at school?
quiz.nativeText: 你在学校时参加过什么活动吗？
quiz.name: bb083f4794cb1af2b54be6ce69559ef4.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I was captain of the basketball team.
quiz.nativeText: 有。我是篮球队的队长。
quiz.name: 6cd548f96481b683c0158e357fed5fb8.mp3

quiz.text: What do your friends think of you?
quiz.nativeText: 你的朋友觉得你是怎样的人？
quiz.name: 519dab7048ff3ae21d633cf4d76ceacb.mp3

quiz.text: They think I am outgoing.
quiz.nativeText: 他们觉得我很外向。
quiz.name: 4a3dc75e1a34d36e12fbfba9e939eb44.mp3

quiz.text: What do you do in your free time?
quiz.nativeText: 你闲暇的时候做什么？
quiz.name: af2225baa40fa874297b04b222caf260.mp3

quiz.text: I love traveling.
quiz.nativeText: 我爱旅行。
quiz.name: e1786cabd25c554efd053c06a9089335.mp3

quiz.text: What do you like about traveling?
quiz.nativeText: 你喜欢旅行的什么？
quiz.name: 9a2fe9865be2390fba89189650341ba8.mp3

quiz.text: I can go to different places.
quiz.nativeText: 我能去不同的地方。
quiz.name: 38b96872eb06f0af77b9f0618105d8c9.mp3

quiz.text: I agree on that. Is there any other reason?
quiz.nativeText: 我同意这一点。还有其他原因吗？
quiz.name: 2e3824d421511586f78ad33f040078fe.mp3

quiz.text: I can meet people from different countries.
quiz.nativeText: 我可以碰到来自不同国家的人。
quiz.name: 2b190ce1601f6816f606d41166bdd8cc.mp3

quiz.text: Are you a leader or follower in a team?
quiz.nativeText: 你在团队中是领导者还是追随者？
quiz.name: d3de40eb616ea7a54713e9d43cd002ab.mp3

quiz.text: I prefer being a leader.
quiz.nativeText: 我更愿意做领导者。
quiz.name: 7a3a9decca08e660eb6d139643d32ae6.mp3

quiz.text: Can you tell us one of your biggest strengths?
quiz.nativeText: 你能告诉我们一个你最大的优势吗？
quiz.name: 37e9d49f21ee3c3b4e00ea0d988084fd.mp3

quiz.text: I act quickly once I understand my role.
quiz.nativeText: 一旦明白我的角色之后我会迅速地行动。
quiz.name: d613f0cd99f9bb00ba2d4717a0fb3a24.mp3

quiz.text: What about weaknesses?
quiz.nativeText: 那么劣势呢？
quiz.name: 8ea7d3dbb993951075bdfe4f93348993.mp3

quiz.text: I always try to be better than others.
quiz.nativeText: 我总是试着比别人做的好。
quiz.name: d94af713132a05d638e57716066e19cd.mp3

quiz.text: Do you mind working overtime?
quiz.nativeText: 你介意加班吗？
quiz.name: 9a2b30100c3132347ddeb99bd2123495.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all.
quiz.nativeText: 一点也不
quiz.name: 2c7dbb66b5158baaa5fcf10e9474cd5a.mp3

quiz.text: What about working under pressure?
quiz.nativeText: 那么在压力下工作呢？
quiz.name: bf55083fb2cf2603c2dc0a4a7b09340a.mp3

quiz.text: I am used to pressure.
quiz.nativeText: 我习惯于压力。
quiz.name: 2cc17ab72e320a4a6e12e3eb94f28e02.mp3

quiz.text: What is your expected salary?
quiz.nativeText: 你的期望薪资是多少？
quiz.name: ecc18bdc251705fc6842f766a8500557.mp3

quiz.text: I am thinking eight thousand per month.
quiz.nativeText: 我觉得八千元每月。
quiz.name: e7d11c2a9203cc352392f2ed3d1e61af.mp3

quiz.text: That is pretty fair. We can offer you more, as well as add insurance.
quiz.nativeText: 这很合理。我们可以提供给你更多，再加上保险。
quiz.name: 9723ec674932b7deb65dc07e93ff2f27.mp3

quiz.text: That's great.
quiz.nativeText: 太棒啦。
quiz.name: 336628884018284817648b2c42f0dc84.mp3

quiz.text: We will inform you when you will start work.
quiz.nativeText: 我们会通知你什么时候来上班的。
quiz.name: 899c0391cf96b824dcb725ff9e5cc709.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 多谢。
quiz.name: ba83ea1f3e5a32073e8575985c231d15.mp3

quiz.text: To begin with, what college did you attend?
quiz.nativeText: 首先我想问，你上的是哪个大学？
quiz.hilitText: To begin with, what college did you attend?
quiz.ipa: tɪ bɪɡɪn wɪθ wʌt kɑlɪdʒ dɪd ju ətɛnd
quiz.name: e19c4f4f2faca0256af75bdd8a56ac5a.mp3

quiz.text: I graduated from Peking University.
quiz.nativeText: 我毕业于北京大学。
quiz.name: 8f98d165016b3c0e1354e2a069f29b32.mp3

quiz.text: What made you choose this university?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么选择这所大学呢？
quiz.hilitText: What made you choose this university?
quiz.ipa: wʌt meɪd ju tʃuz ðɪs junəvɝsəti
quiz.name: 4a3cf208b1d66c403eff437cf7fee8a3.mp3

quiz.text: I chose it because of its strong academic reputation.
quiz.nativeText: 因为它有极高的学术声誉。
quiz.hilitText: I chose it because of its strong academic reputation.
quiz.ipa: aɪ tʃoʊz ɪt bɪkɔz ʌv ɪts strɔŋ ækədɛmɪk rɛpjəteɪʃən
quiz.name: 26b5aceefe107759532558e3734343b0.mp3

quiz.text: What was your major in college?
quiz.nativeText: 那你所学的专业是什么？
quiz.hilitText: What was your major in college?
quiz.ipa: wʌt wɑz jɔr meɪdʒɝ ɪn kɑlɪdʒ
quiz.name: 9aac54ccbf229f71f3a7965de770107a.mp3

quiz.text: I majored in Human Resources Management with a minor in Psychology.
quiz.nativeText: 我主修人力资源管理，辅修心理学。
quiz.hilitText: I majored in Human Resources Management with a minor in Psychology.
quiz.ipa: aɪ meɪdʒɝd ɪn hjumən risɔrsɪz mænədʒmənt wɪθ ə maɪnɝ ɪn saɪkɑlədʒi
quiz.name: b069763470a45dfd494cfe3d2a0dc941.mp3

quiz.text: Impressive. Why did you choose Human Resources Management as your major?
quiz.nativeText: 真不错。为什么选择人力资源管理这个专业呢？
quiz.hilitText: Impressive. Why did you choose Human Resources Management as your major?
quiz.ipa: ɪmprɛsɪv waɪ dɪd ju tʃuz hjumən risɔrsɪz mænədʒmənt ɛz jɔr meɪdʒɝ
quiz.name: 38b64efa66e3af26fcea6d749e87dde1.mp3

quiz.text: Because I'm very interested in dealing with people.
quiz.nativeText: 因为我喜欢和人打交道。
quiz.hilitText: Because I'm very interested in dealing with people.
quiz.ipa: bɪkɔz aɪm vɛri ɪntrəstəd ɪn dilɪŋ wɪθ pipəl
quiz.name: c4001c3f2d5933b2f4891d1072fc1648.mp3

quiz.text: What courses did you enjoy the most?
quiz.nativeText: 你最喜欢什么课程？
quiz.hilitText: What courses did you enjoy the most?
quiz.ipa: wʌt kɔrsɪz dɪd ju ɛndʒɔɪ ðə moʊs
quiz.name: ebe97655f5dfbab4e4d820b0b4df71b5.mp3

quiz.text: I liked Organizational Behavior the most. I think it's very practical.
quiz.nativeText: 我最喜欢的课是组织行为学。我认为这门课很实用。
quiz.hilitText: I liked Organizational Behavior the most. I think it's very practical.
quiz.ipa: aɪ laɪkt ɔrɡənəzeɪʃənəl bɪheɪvjɝ ðə moʊs aɪ θɪŋk ɪts vɛri præktəkəl
quiz.name: 202b59f7d17ee78b3da68a7438ce533f.mp3

quiz.text: bat
quiz.nativeText: 蝙蝠
quiz.name: 7ac04cf18b7606efb16ff9ecbca87825.mp3

quiz.text: robe
quiz.nativeText: 长袍
quiz.name: 59ab87c92761aeca5ed9b920809f069d.mp3

quiz.text: a little bit
quiz.nativeText: 一点儿
quiz.name: 251af00290bd063287b03a191796ef06.mp3

quiz.text: web site
quiz.nativeText: 网站
quiz.name: c01e95459a4d368220bb6a910034af68.mp3

quiz.text: He believed a policeman could be of some help,
quiz.nativeText: 他相信警察能帮助他，
quiz.hilitText: He {#*believed*$} a policeman could {#*be*$} of some help,
quiz.ipa: hi {#*b*$}ɪlivd ə pəlismən kʊd {#*b*$}i ʌv sʌm hɛlp
quiz.name: 84fdd7723b839a05635bfc7e59df8fc4.mp3

quiz.text: so he said to a policeman, "I've lost my beloved dad!"
quiz.nativeText: 所以他对警察说：“我找不到我亲爱的爸爸了！”
quiz.hilitText: so he said to a policeman, "I've lost my {#*beloved*$} dad!"
quiz.ipa: soʊ hi sɛd tu ə pəlismən aɪv lɔst maɪ {#*b*$}ɪlʌvdd dæd
quiz.name: b258ac6e7cf3734f071c2c9379eff291.mp3

quiz.text: Did you receive any awards at university?
quiz.nativeText: 大学期间获得过什么奖项吗？
quiz.name: 9b78eef87a39b411201091b5f45731e8.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I was awarded a first-class scholarship for three years.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我连续三年获得了一等奖学金。
quiz.name: e74abf3ddb3a9d9db032c45207e8b14f.mp3

quiz.text: Excellent. Any others?
quiz.nativeText: 真不错。还有别的吗？
quiz.name: ca5dc974c6bd87c1feb6548ccb8fa05d.mp3

quiz.text: I also won second prize in the National English Writing Contest once.
quiz.nativeText: 我还曾经获得过全国英文写作大赛的二等奖。
quiz.name: 27bf397211b72b7204dfaa86bdcc7ed2.mp3

quiz.text: Were you involved in any clubs or societies at university?
quiz.nativeText: 那你在大学期间参加过什么俱乐部或社团吗？
quiz.name: 1c38340e24fd1a38292178a7ca7be1af.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I was the member of the Students' Union and the Badminton Club.
quiz.nativeText: 对的。我还是学生会和羽毛球俱乐部的成员。
quiz.name: f48f562eedddd98ef1fea1a6b2d64e56.mp3

quiz.text: Have you been published?
quiz.nativeText: 有发表过文章吗？
quiz.name: dd89b724b0545ca4d2d50bf37884d906.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I've had a paper published in an international journal.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我曾在一个国际期刊上发表了一篇论文。
quiz.name: 62d1dba29a0c54c9c0c906952be85a22.mp3

quiz.text: A little boy was lost at a large shopping mall.
quiz.nativeText: 一个小男孩在一个大型购物中心走丢了。
quiz.hilitText: A little {#*boy*$} was lost at a large shopping mall.
quiz.ipa: ə lɪtəl {#*b*$}ɔɪ wɑz lɔst æt ə lɑrdʒ ʃɑpɪŋ mɔl
quiz.name: 884c2fbf3ff215920286e34342fb1705.mp3

quiz.text: He believed a policeman could be of some help,
quiz.nativeText: 他相信警察能帮助他，
quiz.hilitText: He {#*believed*$} a policeman could {#*be*$} of some help,
quiz.ipa: hi {#*b*$}ɪlivd ə pəlismən kʊd {#*b*$}i ʌv sʌm hɛlp
quiz.name: 84fdd7723b839a05635bfc7e59df8fc4.mp3

quiz.text: so he said to a policeman, "I've lost my beloved dad!"
quiz.nativeText: 所以他对警察说：“我找不到我亲爱的爸爸了！”
quiz.hilitText: so he said to a policeman, "I've lost my {#*beloved*$} dad!"
quiz.ipa: soʊ hi sɛd tu ə pəlismən aɪv lɔst maɪ {#*b*$}ɪlʌvdd dæd
quiz.name: b258ac6e7cf3734f071c2c9379eff291.mp3

quiz.text: The policeman's mind got boggled, and he asked,
quiz.nativeText: 警察糊涂了，问道：
quiz.hilitText: The policeman's mind got {#*boggled*$}, and he asked,
quiz.ipa: ðə pəlismənz maɪnd ɡɑt {#*b*$}ɑɡəld ənd hi æskt
quiz.name: 290f9079211d92d1e0393a20296625e2.mp3

quiz.text: "What's your beloved father like? "
quiz.nativeText: “你亲爱的爸爸长什么样子？”（小孩子理解成：你亲爱的爸爸喜欢什么？）
quiz.name: d98feea6444473ff6173d1fa883900ab.mp3

quiz.text: The little boy replied, "Beautiful women!"
quiz.nativeText: 男孩回答说：“漂亮的女人。”
quiz.name: bc6e7f490017e478e90a8cde118e2232.mp3

quiz.text: What are your leisure-time activities?
quiz.nativeText: 空闲时间你一般怎么过？
quiz.name: 75cef161b87e08db59cb3387ebf60fa6.mp3

quiz.text: I often play football with my friends.
quiz.nativeText: 我通常会和朋友们踢足球。
quiz.name: 413fff557239e4766b7e9b51939a46fd.mp3

quiz.text: Any other activities?
quiz.nativeText: 还有什么其它活动吗？
quiz.name: cdce37e04df85d334802208136c5cd4a.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I also travel a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 我还会到处旅行。
quiz.name: ccab9fec88f509c6c88c476a0d4ce071.mp3

quiz.text: What do you like about travelling?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么喜欢旅行？
quiz.name: aa1be5f32a9c6526abf66a82b1721a38.mp3

quiz.text: I like experiencing new things.
quiz.nativeText: 因为我喜欢体验新鲜事物。
quiz.name: a3a18c72478a9f38f9e43194215f5340.mp3

quiz.text: Do you like reading?
quiz.nativeText: 喜欢读书吗？
quiz.name: 97221b9866cca60843098b66b2fb6bf5.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I like reading a wide range of books.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。我喜欢广泛阅读。
quiz.name: d979c142730bac1b6230f6227d45553a.mp3

quiz.text: Tell me two books you've read lately.
quiz.nativeText: 那你给我说说你最近读的两本书。
quiz.name: 674a8b4fbbdfb12a6417447bd86df72e.mp3

quiz.text: I've just finished reading The Great Gatsby and Stoner.
quiz.nativeText: 我最近刚读完《了不起的盖茨比》和《斯通纳》。
quiz.name: 78707d78b384280e7d593be99a0fc119.mp3

quiz.text: How do you think a friend who knows you well would describe you?
quiz.nativeText: 你认为了解的朋友会怎样评价你?
quiz.name: 9ccbbb6467d8b90f1b5005d8aeb584a7.mp3

quiz.text: They would say I'm goal-oriented and energetic.
quiz.nativeText: 他们可能会说我目标明确且充满活力。
quiz.name: 71eb43b299307c222b271005e8b427c2.mp3

quiz.text: Are you introverted or extroverted?
quiz.nativeText: 你认为你的性格是内向还是外向？
quiz.name: fab63a94655604fc2565381d1a63e02a.mp3

quiz.text: I think I'm extroverted. I enjoy talking with others.
quiz.nativeText: 我认为我挺外向的。我很享受和别人交流。
quiz.name: f2fde82aea2c52543d685f66e2f0015f.mp3

quiz.text: Do you consider yourself a leader or a follower in a team?
quiz.nativeText: 你觉得自己在团队中是领导者还是追随者？
quiz.name: 298784721b64f292c18bdbf5cd8370f0.mp3

quiz.text: I can be either. I am quite adaptable.
quiz.nativeText: 都是。我比较灵活。
quiz.name: 483c998545b304cac6c72fd37a1a7a20.mp3

quiz.text: What do you mean by saying that you are adaptable?
quiz.nativeText: 灵活？怎么解释？
quiz.name: 21eb086943c157092babd545c2cc6700.mp3

quiz.text: When a team needs a leader, I gladly take on that role.
quiz.nativeText: 当团队需要一个领导者的时候，我很乐意担任这个角色。
quiz.name: c66a7480e0f2e8b77537315bdf7870de.mp3

quiz.text: But you choose to be a follower when you realize that someone else is more capable than you. Am I right?
quiz.nativeText: 但一旦发现团队里有人比你更有能力，你就会选择做一名追随者是吗？
quiz.name: b82aeae2da7ccbf399ba178213407207.mp3

quiz.text: Exactly. I would step back.
quiz.nativeText: 正是如此。我会后退一步。
quiz.name: 8ca19ce8a2562b068addba5b976dadfc.mp3

quiz.text: What are some of your strengths?
quiz.nativeText: 你自认为有哪些优势？
quiz.name: 0324f643ce96129f976afd3b2ed0a241.mp3

quiz.text: I am a fast learner and I have excellent people skills.
quiz.nativeText: 我学东西很快，且有很强的社交能力。
quiz.name: 32ccf7445e0d7a6086e6e680e0ccb53f.mp3

quiz.text: How can you prove that you are a fast learner?
quiz.nativeText: 如何证明你学东西很快？
quiz.name: 65583c9aacfc672de6d4b276d9d52e1d.mp3

quiz.text: I picked up Japanese and passed the highest level of the proficiency test within just three months.
quiz.nativeText: 我从开始学习日语到通过最高等级考试只花了三个月的时间。
quiz.name: f454e4b18dd55983b5340de35f3c1bdc.mp3

quiz.text: That's pretty impressive. Then what's your biggest weakness?
quiz.nativeText: 那确实很不简单。那你觉得你最大的缺点是什么？
quiz.name: 1201adf98ff49cdc656434aab97812aa.mp3

quiz.text: I get nervous easily when speaking in front of large groups.
quiz.nativeText: 在一群人面前演讲时，我总是容易紧张。
quiz.name: 9a1019753ff86745b2aa323792246ce3.mp3

quiz.text: Have you tried to improve this?
quiz.nativeText: 那你试过改善这个问题吗？
quiz.name: 029bbade9b6f1b1d833c6d4ea0e4f504.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I took a public speaking class last year.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我去年报了一个公共演讲班。
quiz.name: 6593f33748c499ffa41a1e770e42b6ec.mp3

quiz.text: Did it work?
quiz.nativeText: 起作用了吗？
quiz.name: e3bc482750369f07f687c78ea4293645.mp3

quiz.text: Indeed. With some practice, I started to feel more comfortable.
quiz.nativeText: 的确。通过一些练习，我逐渐地能表现得更加自如了。
quiz.name: 110d1293621b8eab9c1f950aedea4734.mp3

quiz.text: Now let me ask you a few quick questions. Do you mind working overtime if required?
quiz.nativeText: 现在让我问你几个简单的问题。必要的时候你介意加班吗？
quiz.name: 97ed0af3aa2fc9537fb3e84d0532f3d9.mp3

quiz.text: No, I do not.
quiz.nativeText: 我不介意。
quiz.name: a7f4cd462aedc3cad8e9007a81375fdc.mp3

quiz.text: Do you work well under pressure?
quiz.nativeText: 你在压力下能很好地工作吗？
quiz.name: 29adf3e833be53c413ad61c239a067f5.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, pressure helps me work more efficiently.
quiz.nativeText: 能。压力能使我更高效地工作。
quiz.name: 9927eb5ff6cbd51e2373dc9108e1b2ca.mp3

quiz.text: Do you easily get bored doing repetitive tasks?
quiz.nativeText: 重复性的工作会令你觉得无聊吗？
quiz.name: 96f38286944fed22a5ae11adeb31e75c.mp3

quiz.text: Not at all. I'm good at finding enjoyment in repetitive work.
quiz.nativeText: 并不会。我很擅长在重复性工作中找到乐趣。
quiz.name: f6f9e21d739e1d65e8c4e731b3a6ef85.mp3

quiz.text: Are you able to work on several tasks at once?
quiz.nativeText: 你可以同时进行多项工作吗？
quiz.name: 3ea8bd590502ef63b4471cc751116932.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. I think my busy college life strengthened my multitasking skills.
quiz.nativeText: 可以。我认为我繁忙的大学生活增强了我同时处理多项任务的技能。
quiz.name: fd2ce7018fe0e76fbebaae07ebe3be99.mp3

quiz.text: Are you willing to relocate for the job?
quiz.nativeText: 你愿意调动工作地点吗？
quiz.name: 751a56da2aed79b051474c6d1d76ecae.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, I am open to relocation.
quiz.nativeText: 我能接受工作调动。
quiz.name: dfce869b829a41ab3a40002166938df6.mp3

quiz.text: Welcome aboard!
quiz.nativeText: 欢迎加入我们公司！
quiz.name: 8b0c8d8fb02313e6065de99870c15add.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I'm delighted to be working here!
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您，非常高兴能在这里工作。
quiz.name: 4f955dd5d4ad63cecb84b095b122fef4.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'll show you your cubicle.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我来领你到你的工位。
quiz.name: d2c733dcd03ebf21cf38e175b89aad10.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, Mr. Underwood!
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢您，安德伍德先生！
quiz.name: 5521295037b1e1e4fb06833ce945928f.mp3

quiz.text: Just call me Henry.
quiz.nativeText: 叫我亨利就好。
quiz.name: 7821937829c8671a7b6369d13450e18b.mp3

quiz.text: OK, Henry.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，亨利。
quiz.name: 62de5ad2352174a3dd0bd0bef9438bdc.mp3

quiz.text: This is your place. If there's anything I can do, just let me know.
quiz.nativeText: 这是你的工位。如果有需要随时找我。
quiz.name: 99d8b5eb88b5009ab34d027548076058.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks a million, Henry!
quiz.nativeText: 亨利，真是太感谢你了！
quiz.name: 9b7435d002731867397c4129d2247bac.mp3

learnText: 清辅音。发音时，先将双唇微张，舌尖抵上齿龈，压迫气息，然后稍微用力将舌尖弹开，使气流外出而成音。

quiz.nativeText: 茶
quiz.name: 2a7913e16c403e701db3da60fbc8703c.mp3

quiz.text: turn
quiz.nativeText: 转动
quiz.name: 2ac9e5790771f403f29325a77d9e4a2a.mp3

quiz.text: heat
quiz.nativeText: 高温
quiz.name: 0e188df2c3af993beffab7abdcf4163e.mp3

quiz.nativeText: 等待
