name: t

quiz.text: You know, Jim, one good thing about our company is that it has got a lot of different office equipment.
quiz.nativeText: 吉姆，我们公司的一大优势就是具备齐全的办公设施。
quiz.name: c92132f308ca2a1fa8a5d450da058d9c.mp3

quiz.text: Really, can you show me some?
quiz.nativeText: 是么，可以带我看看么？
quiz.name: 1ac5ff8135b076f2629daff05f7cffc0.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Come this way.
quiz.nativeText: 当然，这边来。
quiz.name: bb1667652371505b159516c8c31b9834.mp3

quiz.text: What is this?
quiz.nativeText: 这是什么？
quiz.name: dc9d5532a6e95ca2761379375dbc47e4.mp3

quiz.text: This is a projector, which you can use to present your Power Points.
quiz.nativeText: 这是投影仪，用来展示幻灯片的。
quiz.name: 8e540bc837ea44496b0ef7683017e72d.mp3

quiz.text: What is that next to the projector?
quiz.nativeText: 投影仪旁边是什么呢？
quiz.name: 55d930562e40736b5ed9c9eefc434745.mp3

quiz.text: It's a scanner, used to put written or printed information on the computer.
quiz.nativeText: 这是扫描仪，用来把纸制文档转换成电子文档的。
quiz.name: 7afc6384fe552367d0c16337b7eba6f9.mp3

quiz.text: What about this big machine?
quiz.nativeText: 那这个大机器是什么呢？
quiz.name: 1b9f1632d8e65ce21dc75aadc787a995.mp3

quiz.text: It's a photocopier, used to make copies of documents.
quiz.nativeText: 这是打印机，用来影印文件的。
quiz.name: 4a32920c368b79cb7fd44d9d91bd2c75.mp3

quiz.text: This must be the fax machine.
quiz.nativeText: 这个一定是传真机了。
quiz.name: 6c40ddc4c639db2d7febef1d36803709.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. It's for sending and receiving faxes. Making phone calls is also one of its functions.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，它是用来收发传真的。打电话也是功能之一。
quiz.name: db3a04912eed2c30c14f7e1def759752.mp3

quiz.text: These are really helpful in our daily work.
quiz.nativeText: 这些对日常工作太有帮助了���
quiz.name: 447624483e06e4d54fdbef045ffe6a04.mp3

quiz.text: tea
quiz.nativeText: 茶
quiz.name: 2a7913e16c403e701db3da60fbc8703c.mp3

quiz.text: wait
quiz.nativeText: 等待
quiz.name: d5cc6a0064b5c25ba37826aa3fda910c.mp3

quiz.text: make a turn
quiz.nativeText: 转弯
quiz.name: 5381c026317f6744bd9f02f6a1dc9997.mp3

quiz.text: heat up
quiz.nativeText: 加热
quiz.name: b10d0824abbed645ab2a7db8a7ec74b2.mp3

quiz.text: A teacher was once giving a big test.
quiz.nativeText: 某次，一位老师举行一次重要的考试。
quiz.hilitText: A {#*teacher*$} was once giving a big {#*test*$}.
quiz.ipa: ə {#*t*$}itʃɝ wɑz wʌns ɡɪvɪŋ ə bɪɡ {#*t*$}ɛs{#*t*$}
quiz.name: 3258e692ed7e9033888274325fcea3b6.mp3

quiz.text: The teacher returned the test paper the next day with forty one dollars and a note attached,
quiz.nativeText: 第二天老师发回了试卷，并附上四十一美元和一张字条。
quiz.hilitText: The {#*teacher*$} {#*returned*$} the {#*test*$} paper the next day with {#*forty*$} one dollars and a {#*note*$} {#*attached*$},
quiz.ipa: ðə {#*t*$}itʃɝ rɪ{#*t*$}ɝnd ðə {#*t*$}ɛs{#*t*$} peɪpɝ ðə nɛks deɪ wɪθ fɔr{#*t*$}i wʌn dɑlɝz ænd ə noʊ{#*t*$} ə{#*t*$}ætʃ{#*t*$}
quiz.name: 28fca752a77085ffaa615ee489d20d29.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim! I'm here to talk with you about the orientation for new employees.
quiz.nativeText: 你好，吉姆，我想和你谈谈新员工培训的事情。
quiz.name: b57b994a0ecc4f32ae208c9e4fcd739a.mp3

quiz.text: Is it a job training program?
quiz.nativeText: 那是工作培训么？
quiz.name: 8ad37e03835fdeadf360f8573e077c39.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, all new employees will receive on-the-job training.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，所有的新员工都要接受在职培训。
quiz.name: 2b459370a887453dbdfad968696c0be2.mp3

quiz.text: What's it about?
quiz.nativeText: 培训内容是关于什么的呢？
quiz.name: 78cdb599c46bfed9b0ad0825aecb1a8c.mp3

quiz.text: It is a one-on-one training. An experienced member will help you with the work.
quiz.nativeText: 是一对一培训。一个有经验的同事会帮助你工作。
quiz.name: 5158f8f1750645176f976a0bad0d11a9.mp3

quiz.text: That sounds great. How long will the program last?
quiz.nativeText: 听起来很棒，这个培训会持续多久呢？
quiz.name: 7b916946cff5c6c32757aef44a3e3063.mp3

quiz.text: The program will last a month.
quiz.nativeText: 培训会持续一个月。
quiz.name: 45fb725bbd4074e336fc4f845e0e4079.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Can I ask what my specific task is?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我能问一下我的具体任务是什么么？
quiz.name: 7c287db1be9674c24e4e9b73d04808ae.mp3

quiz.text: Your task will be assigned by the trainer of your program.
quiz.nativeText: 你的培训人会把任务分配给你。
quiz.name: 28dbeb44a4a777a4cf66ca1f19aab1dc.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I'll try my best.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我一定会好好干的。
quiz.name: 0bb7ad36e6c2b55ea62d53e56fdd9b70.mp3

quiz.text: A teacher was once giving a big test.
quiz.nativeText: 某次，一位老师举行一次重要的考试。
quiz.hilitText: A {#*teacher*$} was once giving a big {#*test*$}.
quiz.ipa: ə {#*t*$}itʃɝ wɑz wʌns ɡɪvɪŋ ə bɪɡ {#*t*$}ɛs{#*t*$}
quiz.name: 3258e692ed7e9033888274325fcea3b6.mp3

quiz.text: Upon gathering the test papers she noticed a note attached to a test paper.
quiz.nativeText: 收卷时，老师发现了一张夹在试卷中的纸条。
quiz.hilitText: Upon gathering the {#*test*$} papers she {#*noticed*$} a {#*note*$} {#*attached*$} {#*to*$} a {#*test*$} paper.
quiz.ipa: əpɑn ɡæðɝɪŋ ði {#*t*$}ɛs{#*t*$} peɪpɝz ʃi noʊ{#*t*$}əs{#*t*$} ə noʊ{#*t*$} ə{#*t*$}ætʃ{#*t*$} {#*t*$}u ə {#*t*$}ɛs{#*t*$} peɪpɝ
quiz.name: e8e9394d396d6c41f1c31d3cb721ffd9.mp3

quiz.text: Underneath it, the teacher found a one-hundred-dollar bill.
quiz.nativeText: 纸条下面有一张百美元钞票。
quiz.hilitText: Underneath {#*it*$}, the {#*teacher*$} found a one-hundred-dollar bill.
quiz.ipa: ʌndɝniθ ɪ{#*t*$} ðə {#*t*$}itʃɝ faʊnd ə wʌn hʌndɝd dɑlɝ bɪl
quiz.name: 6a58d7f536ac32e6d3252daff972e513.mp3

quiz.text: "One dollar per point please", the note said.
quiz.nativeText: 纸条上写着：“一美元换一分，谢谢。”
quiz.ipa: wʌn dɑlɝ pɝ pɔɪn{#*t*$} pliz ðə noʊ{#*t*$} sɛd
quiz.name: 369b7c57d2b69f3712de9810088c0d9f.mp3

quiz.text: The teacher returned the test paper the next day with forty one dollars and a note attached,
quiz.nativeText: 第二天老师发回了试卷，并附上四十一美元和一张字条。
quiz.hilitText: The {#*teacher*$} {#*returned*$} the {#*test*$} paper the next day with {#*forty*$} one dollars and a {#*note*$} {#*attached*$},
quiz.ipa: ðə {#*t*$}itʃɝ rɪ{#*t*$}ɝnd ðə {#*t*$}ɛs{#*t*$} peɪpɝ ðə nɛks deɪ wɪθ fɔr{#*t*$}i wʌn dɑlɝz ænd ə noʊ{#*t*$} ə{#*t*$}ætʃ{#*t*$}
quiz.name: 28fca752a77085ffaa615ee489d20d29.mp3

quiz.text: which said, "Forty one dollars change!"
quiz.nativeText: 纸条上写着：“找零四十一美元！”
quiz.ipa: wɪtʃ sɛd fɔr{#*t*$}i wʌn dɑlɝz tʃeɪndʒ
quiz.name: f7f45d56b4dc958bd33567dddc25e17a.mp3

learningItem.nativeText: 提交； 演出； 陈述，报告

quiz.text: Welcome aboard!
quiz.nativeText: 欢迎加入我们！
quiz.name: 8b0c8d8fb02313e6065de99870c15add.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 74fb3fe1726b8c46f8704f31fc57b328.mp3

quiz.text: I am going to show you around the office.
quiz.nativeText: 我会带你转转办公室。
quiz.name: 9aad0a4d4d8b13bca8e302d097cabdc7.mp3

quiz.text: I appreciate it.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢。
quiz.name: 253146848a15ed3a1ffed5030b6b90a7.mp3

quiz.text: This is a projector. Do you know what it is for?
quiz.nativeText: 这是一个投影仪。你知道它是用来干什么的吗？
quiz.name: 8c62212301bc7dbcacc4530360ba9f26.mp3

quiz.text: It is used to give presentations.
quiz.nativeText: 它是用来做展示的。
quiz.name: a00f53c4ce90cbb5e612d12ce88f71cb.mp3

quiz.text: What about the photocopier?
quiz.nativeText: 那这台打印机呢？
quiz.name: 8f3fb470c068a9cf32c8b6397a60d681.mp3

quiz.text: It is used to copy documents.
quiz.nativeText: 它是用来复印文件的。
quiz.name: f647e9ec1edc3cf28062017f124c135a.mp3

quiz.text: What about the fax machine?
quiz.nativeText: 那这台传真机呢？
quiz.name: ccda6601cd81111be4132eb88a1f734d.mp3

quiz.text: It can send and receive faxes.
quiz.nativeText: 它能发送和接收传真。
quiz.name: d43bc753d28f707a1d4c8509bd134f4f.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. And it can also make phone calls.
quiz.nativeText: 是的。它也可以打电话。
quiz.name: 6989b1b070f3b33289216e5114c396ce.mp3

quiz.text: That's cool.
quiz.nativeText: 那真酷。
quiz.name: 45b2d6a61f222858d278f97621d9cbe9.mp3

quiz.text: Jim, you seem so anxious. What happened?
quiz.nativeText: 吉姆，你看起来忧心忡忡，发生什么了？
quiz.name: 1ac2020b60c718f5c8043cc0d00efe03.mp3

quiz.text: My computer froze. Can you help me out with it?
quiz.nativeText: 我的电脑瘫痪了，你能帮我处理一下么？
quiz.name: a28447349b1c266dd1ae846af7ae252f.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Tell me about it.
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以，跟我说说吧。
quiz.name: 5096e84c593e0c17b1de221d91458800.mp3

quiz.text: The data on my computer is missing.
quiz.nativeText: 我电脑上的数据丢失了。
quiz.name: 3bc91f11a984a6784268216d7f052fb4.mp3

quiz.text: Where did you save it?
quiz.nativeText: 你把文件存在什么地方啦？
quiz.name: cf859b6023abc7d4152f5645be60f7a0.mp3

quiz.text: I put the files on D drive. But I can't find them anywhere.
quiz.nativeText: 我把文件放在D盘了，但是怎么也找不找了。
quiz.name: d7adfd7676c5b2f68966cf3086df2bac.mp3

quiz.text: You must have placed them in the wrong folder.
quiz.nativeText: 你一定是放错文件夹了。
quiz.name: 88fa6024e618cc64ce4900f835b9441e.mp3

quiz.text: How could that be?
quiz.nativeText: 这怎么可能？
quiz.name: 9ac39cf80e54c4ba04b3b07fe9fde487.mp3

quiz.text: Here! You see, these two folders are of similar names. Your files are in the second one.
quiz.nativeText: 看这，这两个文件夹名字很像，你的文件在第二个里面。
quiz.name: e2268b6fd3176da68cabbe79399b92ca.mp3

quiz.text: I can't thank you enough, Peter!
quiz.nativeText: 太感谢你了，皮特！
quiz.name: 7f1b44a04d3a041a0c709abd5ed578bc.mp3

learnText: 浊辅音。发音时，先将双唇微开，舌尖抵住上齿龈，压迫气息，然后用力将舌尖弹开，使气流外出而成音，并振动声带。

quiz.text: deep
quiz.nativeText: 深的
quiz.name: c7489a84585b023358dc07a421411f45.mp3

quiz.text: debt
quiz.nativeText: 债务
quiz.name: 82dcb3d009f54dbf6ad4d1cb4f46e07b.mp3

quiz.text: card
quiz.nativeText: 卡片
quiz.name: 5a81822ea736ae6bf53dc995d87203df.mp3

quiz.text: read
quiz.nativeText: 读
quiz.name: 3466fab4975481651940ed328aa990e4.mp3

name: d

quiz.text: We seem to have already gone over our budget on travel expenses this month. Can you tell me why?
quiz.nativeText: 我们这个月的差旅费已经超预算了。你能给我解释一下原因么？
quiz.name: 3b970bd7570d9924f3a2a09ba02cf838.mp3

quiz.text: Well, the main reason is that airline ticket prices have become more expensive.
quiz.nativeText: 主要原因是机票涨价了。
quiz.name: 074323a46aa1211613e8c7414cdbd17f.mp3

quiz.text: What else?
quiz.nativeText: 还有其它原因么？
quiz.name: 767fa89c8da0cb211fb5b541aacced17.mp3

quiz.text: Another reason is that we signed a contract with a new hotel chain, which is more expensive.
quiz.nativeText: 另一个原因是我们换了新的酒店，价格比较高。
quiz.name: 6e9bb5438acf58bfc505b342ff9451a7.mp3

quiz.text: And why did we do that?
quiz.nativeText: 我们为什么要换合作的酒店呢？
quiz.name: f4b02055c37d0f9faf8186e0695c9879.mp3

quiz.text: Because of security issues at the previous one.
quiz.nativeText: 因为之前的酒店有安全问题。
quiz.name: fe1ad7a535ca52407c6b276406ea5af5.mp3

quiz.text: I see. But we still have to tighten up the budget.
quiz.nativeText: 原来是这样，但我们仍然要严格控制预算。
quiz.name: 2e9d38a8c5d0fee51a102a78af35ba49.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, and we have been doing that.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我们已经着手去做了。
quiz.name: 7678bc95b351a1f3cfec29d112c377a5.mp3

quiz.text: Where are we now?
quiz.nativeText: 进展怎么样？
quiz.name: 1502073d301d675f0620fa4f19b4ebec.mp3

quiz.text: We allow only staff members with legitimate reasons to take business trips.
quiz.nativeText: 我们只允许有正当理由的员工出公差。
quiz.name: a1fd15f24d5fdc92dec509343f6ff15b.mp3

quiz.text: That's good. I still want you and the other managers to try to keep down costs.
quiz.nativeText: 很好。我还是希望你再和其它经理尝试控制一下成本。
quiz.name: 491a38ce63b54da84dd545fa8ec85b21.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I'll bring up this issue at tomorrow's meeting.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我会在明天的会上提出这个议题。
quiz.name: 2000bdba2d1feaa3944ec5a9cf3b0fa2.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. I was wondering if you could do me a favor.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你能帮我一个忙么？
quiz.name: b59d2e85d1c80f3511ab8e5816575b1f.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, what is it?
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以，说吧。
quiz.name: 2904f3ad51c40133f599a59e1bd23a11.mp3

quiz.text: I have an appointment with a new client tomorrow morning, but I can't make it.
quiz.nativeText: 明天早晨我约了一个新客户，但是我去不了了。
quiz.name: ab7c2bcc3acc67d5c6cc91dea93451b7.mp3

quiz.text: Why? You won't be at work tomorrow?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么？你明天不上班么？
quiz.name: e6cb5806e9eb34b95e665779f172be3e.mp3

quiz.text: No. I have to go out for an emergency meeting with another client.
quiz.nativeText: 不，我得去和一个紧要的客户见面。
quiz.name: a4c5f6e7d74590f72b60f28ca0d45d42.mp3

quiz.text: I see. So what do you want me to do?
quiz.nativeText: 这样，那你需要我做什么？
quiz.name: 9ca781e2b49846464b885cede14986b3.mp3

quiz.text: Could you meet the first client for me?
quiz.nativeText: 你能代替我去见第一个客户么？
quiz.name: 73d7572df661e94ae95c456d95951910.mp3

quiz.text: I'd be happy to.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。
quiz.name: c5312ff70ac39bb179be2b2bd0bcfccf.mp3

quiz.text: That's so kind of you, Jim. Tell me how it went when I get back.
quiz.nativeText: 你真是太好了，吉姆。等我回来麻烦和我说一下会面怎么样。
quiz.name: 5b0d6551070c9e342aa54c4fc65ca3b2.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Drop by my office after four and I'll brief you about it.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。四点后来我的办公室吧，我和你说一下。
quiz.name: f7e6aab3956aee9066d9c0626efc89ea.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Can you spare two hours tomorrow morning?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你明天能抽出两个小时么？
quiz.name: 8136b5151e85034a0afef60231b174a2.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, what can I do to help?
quiz.nativeText: 可以，需要我做什么？
quiz.name: 1b1339bd22da064baa6ef53d3e1b74eb.mp3

quiz.text: Actually I need you to explain some figures in your report.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上，我需要你帮我解释一下你报告里的一些数据。
quiz.name: f015b7cf381adfc9dbe1e8241cb3c9bf.mp3

quiz.text: OK, no problem. Can I drop by your office at ten?
quiz.nativeText: 好的，没问题。我十点钟去你的办公室可以么？
quiz.name: b9d000da59dc44eb89f8d8cac8b0a22d.mp3

quiz.text: Can you make it earlier?
quiz.nativeText: 可以提前一些么？
quiz.name: 99bdfdfe1b72a949f2f3282a9d0cec6f.mp3

quiz.text: Actually, I have to meet with a client at eight a.m. tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上，我明天八点要去见一位客户。
quiz.name: 9c9ba3f57d9133ea733b2b578bcd95ff.mp3

quiz.text: Is it very important?
quiz.nativeText: 那个很重要么？
quiz.name: d68eb335e7bed393f8e2d9928d5e0a9e.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, it may be a big contract.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，可能是一个大单子。
quiz.name: 3508ddfdd71737e15dec1e54acef8c42.mp3

quiz.text: That's fine, then. But please come explain the figures for me as soon as you can.
quiz.nativeText: 那好吧，不过请尽快过来帮我解释这些数据。
quiz.name: afaf8a9ddd74e268591f4766a0f8d978.mp3

quiz.text: Sure thing.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。
quiz.name: 0c47bf1204d11e1a3bb4e076785ac7b4.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Are you ready?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你准备好了么？
quiz.name: 99325addff66cecccc1625327764b190.mp3

quiz.text: Just give me a second.
quiz.nativeText: 稍等一下。
quiz.name: 7151aa919849d769594084c53e68d8b8.mp3

quiz.text: Jim, we really have to take off. The traffic is going to be awful soon.
quiz.nativeText: 吉姆，我们真的需要出发了。再过一会交通状况会很糟糕。
quiz.name: c3e15c585f48289287e1c841bb0a15de.mp3

quiz.text: I know, but I have to make a copy of the contract.
quiz.nativeText: 我知道，但是我得把合同复印一下。
quiz.name: ea93628019907e506b58ce92f33f3bae.mp3

quiz.text: Hurry up, Jim. I really don't want to be late to the first meeting with this client.
quiz.nativeText: 快一点，吉姆。我可不想和客户第一次见面就迟到。
quiz.name: a9d11145a8a160663ab71c2e6b5f9806.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry. We can take the subway this time. I already checked the route.
quiz.nativeText: 别担心。这次我们可以乘地铁，我已经查好路线了。
quiz.name: 3dd37f27c5cb48778b938bd20f8dc709.mp3

quiz.text: That's good. That way we can avoid traffic.
quiz.nativeText: 很好，这样我们就可以避开拥堵了。
quiz.name: 026ed171d7b8e98107eb6fa3b42a6692.mp3

quiz.text: Yes, and we still have plenty of time.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，而且我们还有很多时间。
quiz.name: b210cc99b8d55a384a7121b168459ff5.mp3

quiz.text: Right. Finish making those copies. I will meet you in the lobby.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，快去复印，我在大厅等你。
quiz.name: 034360081fcf26ab8a0bee21c8ab298a.mp3

quiz.text: All right. See you in three minutes.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，三分钟后见。
quiz.name: 87e6c5f93b3c2878c776d30b615820a7.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. How is the negotiation with Mr. Smith going?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，和史密斯先生的谈判进展怎么样了？
quiz.name: 3a4d3d86d8c7e3475506772a80e56725.mp3

quiz.text: He didn't sound too convinced about our offer.
quiz.nativeText: 他好像不太相信我们的报价。
quiz.name: 049135287c455855749a45f67ec006aa.mp3

quiz.text: You'd better take a trip to London tomorrow to talk to him in person.
quiz.nativeText: 你最好明天去伦敦和他当面谈谈。
quiz.name: 18e78c20f0e6e15e6d0ce4afeb1f4fdb.mp3

quiz.text: Sure, if that's what's needed.
quiz.nativeText: 如果这是必要的，没有问题。
quiz.name: df7da4f59436e49c6e71dc1522e139f9.mp3

quiz.text: I don't think I have to stress again how important this deal is to us.
quiz.nativeText: 我想我不用强调这个单子的重要性了吧。
quiz.name: 5b57dc0d8f6d19355198b4e1ae5ffe8c.mp3

quiz.text: I will do my best to get this contract.
quiz.nativeText: 我一定尽全力拿下合同。
quiz.name: 9cff22d1841cfa372209245851267273.mp3

quiz.text: That'll be great. When will you set off?
quiz.nativeText: 那太棒了，你什么时候出发？
quiz.name: cbcd0eb439dd6f71ce603c9fbc7467a4.mp3

quiz.text: I'll take a flight to London this evening.
quiz.nativeText: 我乘今晚的航班去伦敦。
quiz.name: c34f9e82aebac20c35d55041060a4262.mp3

quiz.text: Good. I will pick you up and drive you to the airport.
quiz.nativeText: 很好，我去接你然后送你去机场。
quiz.name: 3af102334991a7ff88a2b3e5e5ec200b.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, sir.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢老板！
quiz.name: abf7b6220a21d23e2654bf80774b3145.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Have you heard that the managers have been ordered to cut our budget for this fiscal year?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你听说经理们被要求削减这一财年的预算了么？
quiz.name: 968acd1563be58c6b3c5e4fecfd062bb.mp3

quiz.text: Really? By how much?
quiz.nativeText: 真的么，削减多少？
quiz.name: fcc1773717aa1860cc68afb02840394d.mp3

quiz.text: Apparently the cut is going to be twenty to thirty percent.
quiz.nativeText: 听说要削减百分之二十到三十。
quiz.name: eb2caea711df7e09ef96bd6ef64ab9f7.mp3

quiz.text: In that case, all staff members are going to be affected.
quiz.nativeText: 那样的话，所有员工都会受到影响的。
quiz.name: 50ab7b6458673d0d19954bbab95d2f91.mp3

quiz.text: Right, and our sales team in particular.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，尤其是我们销售团队。
quiz.name: 418ffbf0dfe6ed2f088d7a8157bf8dba.mp3

quiz.text: When will it be carried out?
quiz.nativeText: 削减什么时候实施？
quiz.name: 8744ee304a3756228fc7baf77cd41f1e.mp3

quiz.text: In fact, some changes have already taken effect.
quiz.nativeText: 事实上，有些变化已经生效了。
quiz.name: 44fef1f093ca6c615d7668700e62888e.mp3

quiz.text: That's too bad. I bet there will be a lot of complaints.
quiz.nativeText: 太糟糕了。我打赌公司一定怨声载道。
quiz.name: c3bb78725bbef95f7654c7592d9d163a.mp3

quiz.text: I just hope that it won't affect our business too much.
quiz.nativeText: 我只希望这不会太影响我们的业务。
quiz.name: a4f8d8d839867d3b8690dfa00d92082a.mp3

quiz.text: Me too. But I am sure we will figure something out.
quiz.nativeText: 同感。我想我们会想出办法的。
quiz.name: e1dfdaf292a9c8acbf14ace0a835a16e.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Any news about your promotion?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，你升职的事情有消息么？
quiz.name: 55c73822d642c6bb0002aaed1434313b.mp3

quiz.text: Not yet, though the boss did mention it to me a month ago.
quiz.nativeText: 还没有，虽然老板一个月前和我提了一下。
quiz.name: 360370f88b5c24629ac643b4c00b1af7.mp3

quiz.text: The announcement will be posted on the bulletin board tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 公告明天就会在公示栏贴出啦。
quiz.name: 06b8ac28cb82262148e9d3ae9a40e5cc.mp3

quiz.text: Really? That's making me a bit nervous.
quiz.nativeText: 真的么，我有些紧张。
quiz.name: c24ef913a167f798997762237c6556e8.mp3

quiz.text: I guess that's understandable.
quiz.nativeText: 可以理解。
quiz.name: 30b146099a7bc3ea1ec90b53d33327bf.mp3

quiz.text: I'm just not sure if I'll get the position.
quiz.nativeText: 我不确定我能否得到这个职位。
quiz.name: 80e7b3b4421998a726b90567af23640a.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry too much. There isn't anyone who can do the job that you do in this office.
quiz.nativeText: 别担心，整个办公室没人可以胜任你的工作啦。
quiz.name: 153c89678117dcacdbf99962eb07ab86.mp3

quiz.text: You are so kind.
quiz.nativeText: 你过奖了。
quiz.name: 0fb2ee5fcdba906d1add592c173a1a51.mp3

quiz.text: I believe the management feels the same as I do.
quiz.nativeText: 我相信领导们也是这么想的。
quiz.name: 159869f2f1227503e5bf6a4b186e6f8e.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much.
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢。
quiz.name: af0fd01c5df43cdb5ff841d2387a1540.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Mr. Smith is going to pay a visit to our plant.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆，史密斯先生要来参观我们的工厂。
quiz.name: 7b5d5f3e3bdeb13f3e0c7744781ff61a.mp3

quiz.text: What's the purpose of his visit?
quiz.nativeText: 参观的目的是什么？
quiz.name: ba215a827a44c9c1ef837158291c6a8d.mp3

quiz.text: He wants to check if our plant is big enough to suit his needs.
quiz.nativeText: 他想看看我们的工厂是不是足够大以满足他的需要。
quiz.name: 2c2be1c13cda6269144abcb791494ac4.mp3

quiz.text: I really hope he will be satisfied.
quiz.nativeText: 我特别希望他能满意。
quiz.name: 9f344bba7c16a42dff523e602a6cb6f9.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah. In that case we may have a good chance to sign a contract with him.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊。这样我们就能有很大的机会和他签合同了。
quiz.name: f7342031d9fd64fb031c245527026061.mp3

quiz.text: Let's keep our fingers crossed.
quiz.nativeText: 让我们祈求好运吧。
quiz.name: 9ee5c2af680713313c6a41d97332fd4a.mp3

quiz.text: Don't worry, Jim. We have everything he asked for on the phone.
quiz.nativeText: 别担心，吉姆。我们符合他在电话中提的所有要求。
quiz.name: 86287554b67d4c133f3ee8cadda278aa.mp3

quiz.text: I hope we succeed.
quiz.nativeText: 我希望我们能成功。
quiz.name: 983ca96ab0094c468f0b65a6caf4bc15.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. And I'd like you to pick him up at the airport the day after tomorrow.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊。后天下午你去机场接他吧。
quiz.name: ea77bb5f818e911154f7d5f9ffe800e7.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. I will give him a warm welcome.
quiz.nativeText: 没问题，我热情的欢迎他的。
quiz.name: aad5cd7b6f2cd23881a2af3b65960ed7.mp3

quiz.text: Jack, can you take a look at my computer?
quiz.nativeText: 杰克，你能看一眼我的电脑吗？
quiz.name: de123decd3bf95e50e8bd9a4db34fe0e.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. What is wrong?
quiz.nativeText: 当然。有什么问题吗？
quiz.name: a4c4dd13d84f4d7515c7df79bcf11ca1.mp3

quiz.text: Something is broken. I can't find my files.
quiz.nativeText: 有什么东西坏了。我找不到我的文件了。
quiz.name: 05e78a0e29f58352ccff38d8774d75fd.mp3

quiz.text: Let me see.
quiz.nativeText: 我看看
quiz.name: 16e04387bd46315db22eda6e8109432a.mp3

quiz.text: Oh you fixed it! Thanks a lot.
quiz.nativeText: 噢你修好了！多谢。
quiz.name: 201d52c90ed04d0483517f7413be828e.mp3

quiz.text: No problem.
quiz.nativeText: 不客气。
quiz.name: 9a03904cb50a587b822f6946dbc8266c.mp3

quiz.text: Do not leave yet. There are some assignments for you.
quiz.nativeText: 先别走。这里有一些给你的任务。
quiz.name: 2ae242d69165228e509e36525efedf02.mp3

quiz.text: What are they?
quiz.nativeText: 是什么？
quiz.name: d862e0fd68867d7cb635932bd765826d.mp3

quiz.text: Addison wants you to write an agenda for the meeting.
quiz.nativeText: 艾迪森想要你给会议写一份议程。
quiz.name: e36215818a8f180fb2e5c075945aa744.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I will take care of that and let her know.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我会处理好并让她知道的。
quiz.name: 3c6c399a802a3f56ccedcf2313d32cb8.mp3

quiz.text: Also, we need to participate in the brainstorming meeting this afternoon.
quiz.nativeText: 还有，我们需要参加今天下午的头脑风暴。
quiz.name: 3d16edcb85b604544a74256280909417.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks for letting me know.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你告诉我。
quiz.name: b07f55392c5528d1ce01542a33497be7.mp3

quiz.text: I once asked for a pay raise.
quiz.nativeText: 我曾经要求过一次加薪。
quiz.name: 2dccba18f64a79a3e093a99670b65abe.mp3

quiz.text: How did it go?
quiz.nativeText: 结果怎么样？
quiz.name: 800e0605ca21d49e35db7c6c2d5d6eb6.mp3

quiz.text: The boss fired me.
quiz.nativeText: 老板把我炒了。
quiz.name: 28a83cb7ffe54d3fc39afdd8a2fed31e.mp3

quiz.text: Why was that?
quiz.nativeText: 那是为什么呢？
quiz.name: b1dd540dd1a61c70705b2695af082b88.mp3

quiz.text: He thought I had asked for too many days off.
quiz.nativeText: 他觉得我请了太多天的假。
quiz.name: dea682d19ef1fe3b237a507cfeb609d6.mp3

quiz.text: Well, I quit my last job before the boss fired me.
quiz.nativeText: 我在老板解雇我之前就辞了上一份工作。
quiz.name: 2e1194034e5997e79341bbbbde8fee8b.mp3

quiz.text: Why did you quit your job?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么你 辞掉工作呢？
quiz.name: 8878c0f61ee1d5b214f6a299d2c96e8a.mp3

quiz.text: Because it was too stressful.
quiz.nativeText: 因为它压力太大了。
quiz.name: f9fadbbfe9a2377adba75e59275f7ff0.mp3

quiz.text: Hope we can get promoted while we are here.
quiz.nativeText: 希望我们在这里的时候能升职。
quiz.name: 42223950237c28fd380f5e937b54e25c.mp3

quiz.text: Same here.
quiz.nativeText: 我也是。
quiz.name: c0be8d03410e72b473d5a2d28be005b6.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. I need you to do some preparation for this meeting.
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆。我想你为一个会议做一些准备。
quiz.name: 153bc0dbd4320011e1d54807df4f82f8.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. Can I ask when the meeting is?
quiz.nativeText: 当然可以，我能问一下开会时间么？
quiz.name: a51213a06ea5979ec06710c9940e56aa.mp3

quiz.text: The meeting is scheduled for next Thursday.
quiz.nativeText: 会议定在下周四。
quiz.name: 5dbf21618140b88f2aee148aa52dc7c5.mp3

quiz.text: OK. I'll take down some notes.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我记一下笔记。
quiz.name: 287b974c7b4dcb9f477743b15c6f2223.mp3

quiz.text: First, you need to prepare an agenda for the meeting, making sure to inform all participants.
quiz.nativeText: 首先，你要准备一份会议议程，确保通知到所有要与会的人员。
quiz.name: c80a12818e7b0e57c2157e546746ce55.mp3

quiz.text: OK, got it.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，记下了。
quiz.name: 38102ad881b44766d8f799a79b27a526.mp3

quiz.text: Then print and distribute necessary documents before the meeting.
quiz.nativeText: 然后会前要打印关分发必要的文件。
quiz.name: 1d6da36cf4cc45cfc3871a9b8b3f4211.mp3

quiz.text: Got it.
quiz.nativeText: 收到。
quiz.name: 8aaeb34992ddfab01cb834cd615ca344.mp3

quiz.text: And you should take minutes during the meeting.
quiz.nativeText: 你还需要在会中做记录。
quiz.name: 08c84f58d76652e637e3f40b574c1805.mp3

quiz.text: Yes. Do I need to type up the minutes and keep them filed?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。我需要把记录打印出来并存档么？
quiz.name: 03289aaff16cfc9d00e6249fc7ea523d.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. Make sure they are kept properly.
quiz.nativeText: 当然， 一定要把记录妥善保存。
quiz.name: 0aebfe3c6b45bb762096005af64e45dc.mp3

quiz.text: No problem!
quiz.nativeText: 没问题。
quiz.name: 7ed5bfe4d6a7247373502fb3a4ebb47e.mp3

quiz.text: deep
quiz.nativeText: 深的
quiz.name: c7489a84585b023358dc07a421411f45.mp3

quiz.text: read
quiz.nativeText: 读
quiz.name: 3466fab4975481651940ed328aa990e4.mp3

quiz.text: in debt
quiz.nativeText: 欠债
quiz.name: 9c709b707a55163b7fea7d27d1d94325.mp3

quiz.text: gift card
quiz.nativeText: 代金卡
quiz.name: c8862398f791ea50741d18e87cfe6633.mp3

quiz.text: A husband and wife walked up to view the body of his mother-in-law at the funeral.
quiz.nativeText: 丈夫同妻子一起去参加岳母的葬礼，进行遗体告别。
quiz.hilitText: A {#*husband*$} {#*and*$} wife walked up to view the {#*body*$} of his mother-in-law at the funeral.
quiz.ipa: ə hʌzbən{#*d*$} æn{#*d*$} waɪf wɔkt ʌp tɪ vju ðə bɑ{#*d*$}i ʌv hɪz mʌðɝ ɪn lɑ æt ðə fjunɝəl
quiz.name: a1ee7b554c0323dfce32e9967047d62c.mp3

quiz.text: "Why are you crying? You disliked my mother anyway."
quiz.nativeText: “你哭什么？反正你从来都不喜欢我母亲。”
quiz.hilitText: "Why are you crying? You {#*disliked*$} my mother anyway."
quiz.ipa: waɪ ɑr ju kraɪɪŋ ju {#*d*$}ɪslaɪkt maɪ mʌðɝ ɛniweɪ
quiz.name: 0e9321b032fa4b66db0da79bf753062c.mp3

quiz.text: What is your assignment in the new project?
quiz.nativeText: 新项目你被分配了什么任务？
quiz.name: 7b88063865a0d35e23da5f7290e97c9d.mp3

quiz.text: I was delegated to collect data for the project.
quiz.nativeText: 我被分配去收集项目数据。
quiz.name: bda1741bf150fe02e57502b68fdc568b.mp3

quiz.text: I guess the data collection workload must be very heavy.
quiz.nativeText: 收集数据的工作量一定很重吧。
quiz.name: 2bd2dc4bef2ee324f7fdeb24ea70044a.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I have a lot to do every day, otherwise I will miss my deadlines.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我每天要做很多，不然不能如期完成。
quiz.name: 4788538b2bf71a3f4f048ce971eb5e7a.mp3

quiz.text: Why not hand off some responsibilities to others?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么不把任务分一些给别人呢？
quiz.name: 8d0e4f883954aaeec533a9a88780aefa.mp3

quiz.text: It's a group project. I don't want to cause trouble for others.
quiz.nativeText: 这是个小组任务，我不想给大家添麻烦。
quiz.name: 1e44c2ab7194d904408287eaf800d38f.mp3

quiz.text: Good for you! You are far more considerate than some of these loafers.
quiz.nativeText: 好样的，你比有些游手好闲的人强多了！
quiz.name: 60f99d26177addf0b7cafe6cabe5c06c.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you. I just want to do my job well.
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢，我只是做好本职工作。
quiz.name: 72c5fa1a65383407b25392eb09fe7343.mp3

quiz.text: A husband and wife walked up to view the body of his mother-in-law at the funeral.
quiz.nativeText: 丈夫同妻子一起去参加岳母的葬礼，进行遗体告别。
quiz.hilitText: A {#*husband*$} {#*and*$} wife walked up to view the {#*body*$} of his mother-in-law at the funeral.
quiz.ipa: ə hʌzbən{#*d*$} æn{#*d*$} waɪf wɔkt ʌp tɪ vju ðə bɑ{#*d*$}i ʌv hɪz mʌðɝ ɪn lɑ æt ðə fjunɝəl
quiz.name: a1ee7b554c0323dfce32e9967047d62c.mp3

quiz.text: The husband soon began to weep. His wife slapped him and said,
quiz.nativeText: 过了一会儿丈夫开始擦眼泪，妻子见状扇了丈夫一巴掌，然后说：
quiz.hilitText: The {#*husband*$} soon began to weep. His wife slapped him {#*and*$} {#*said*$},
quiz.ipa: ðə hʌzbən{#*d*$} sun biɡæn tu wip hɪz waɪf slæpt ɪm æn{#*d*$} sɛ{#*d*$}
quiz.name: 8fa259707ad7b7260cf7629ef575d208.mp3

quiz.text: "Why are you crying? You disliked my mother anyway."
quiz.nativeText: “你哭什么？反正你从来都不喜欢我母亲。”
quiz.hilitText: "Why are you crying? You {#*disliked*$} my mother anyway."
quiz.ipa: waɪ ɑr ju kraɪɪŋ ju {#*d*$}ɪslaɪkt maɪ mʌðɝ ɛniweɪ
quiz.name: 0e9321b032fa4b66db0da79bf753062c.mp3

quiz.text: The husband replied, "I know. I thought I saw her move!"
quiz.nativeText: 丈夫回答说：“是啊！但是我刚才看见她还在动！”
quiz.hilitText: The {#*husband*$} {#*replied*$}, "I know. I thought I saw her move!"
quiz.ipa: ðə hʌzbən{#*d*$} rɪplaɪ{#*d*$} aɪ noʊ aɪ θɔt aɪ sɔ hɝ muv
quiz.name: 05dfa32b1c4a7740b168ea1e5a8b7a7b.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. What do you think of my plan for the new project?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，���姆。你认为我为新项目制定的计划怎么样？
quiz.name: a11dbc244d7ec7462f3c62eaa2edbeec.mp3

quiz.text: I think it's great.
quiz.nativeText: 我认为很棒。
quiz.name: da9ea01b5a748f7153addfb13ac2efa1.mp3

quiz.text: Do you have any suggestions?
quiz.nativeText: 你有什么好的提议么？
quiz.name: aa97f7da974666e5b35a739e77e7846f.mp3

quiz.text: I've also got some ideas to build on yours.
quiz.nativeText: 我在你的基础上有一些想法。
quiz.name: 0d0215ee29c44af946f7f6145e5bbe11.mp3

quiz.text: Good, I'm all ears.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我洗耳恭听。
quiz.name: 5020f9e4d5cc498f71b007eb6b0752f9.mp3

quiz.text: Well, we can draw upon previous feedback.
quiz.nativeText: 我们可以借鉴之前的反馈。
quiz.name: f75d69c2b696cb5a2c83dcbce48b157c.mp3

quiz.text: Good idea. See, that's how brainstorming works.
quiz.nativeText: 好主意。看，这就是头脑风暴的好处。
quiz.name: a555954c88385f3e63a42ab0e9998209.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, we can generate more new ideas.
quiz.nativeText: 是的，我们可以想出更多新的想法。
quiz.name: 493b9da3ef970ed18c626bf5810575d1.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. Is there anything I can help you with?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆。有什么可以帮到你的么？
quiz.name: 3803465403f8c3971d68e5190c46b142.mp3

quiz.text: Actually I was wondering if I could take a day off next Tuesday.
quiz.nativeText: 下周二我可以请一天假么？
quiz.name: 67fcd4c9b6066095052f68d7ef87cd3c.mp3

quiz.text: Why do you ask for a leave of absence from work?
quiz.nativeText: 为什么要请假呢？
quiz.name: 840ce6ba998d28212a41ee865077368f.mp3

quiz.text: My best friend is coming to see me next Tuesday.
quiz.nativeText: 我最好的朋友下周二来看我。
quiz.name: dfde83a4b04ec8b9d9bdffec99d29ce7.mp3

quiz.text: Well, can you complete your part of the assignment?
quiz.nativeText: 好吧。你可以完成分配给你的任务么？
quiz.name: 7a2040651c21a1e5459902de9efca309.mp3

quiz.text: Of course. I always work ahead of schedule.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。我总是提前完成任务。
quiz.name: 935b7f9a0840bc079b910c5de143ebda.mp3

quiz.text: Good. Then do you have any scheduled tasks that day?
quiz.nativeText: 好的。你周二那天还有已经安排的任务么？
quiz.name: ca1e918126dacea6a7ed91890b4bf80e.mp3

quiz.text: Not that I know of.
quiz.nativeText: 我想没有。
quiz.name: cd5a76e8dc7e7b89137360f7c42a9faa.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Then enjoy your Tuesday.
quiz.nativeText: 好的。下周二玩的开心。
quiz.name: e8ab1d02bbed09c26484e47cf56f91d4.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you so much!
quiz.nativeText: 非常感谢！
quiz.name: 9508ec90e722acf61c1d598449ec51de.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. How is the project going?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆。项目进行的怎么样了？
quiz.name: 41dc27100feea4c93407b605bea3cb56.mp3

quiz.text: Everything is smooth so far.
quiz.nativeText: 各项工作都很顺利。
quiz.name: bf96644f9743aa3757010e5ab5233ff6.mp3

quiz.text: Good, Jim, you've been doing a great job.
quiz.nativeText: 很好，吉姆。你做的很出色。
quiz.name: 13d696bd92a90b177bd9875be1472eb3.mp3

quiz.text: Thanks Peter. Could I have a pay raise?
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢，彼得。那我的薪水可以涨一些么？
quiz.name: 0b09e578bcfeb173eb30b309902919cb.mp3

quiz.text: You've only been here for two months, and I need more time to evaluate your performance.
quiz.nativeText: 你才来公司两个月，我需要更多时间来考察你的表现。
quiz.name: aea602ca7f4afc52b48c67b1656d6416.mp3

quiz.text: Guess I picked the wrong time to ask for a raise.
quiz.nativeText: 看来我挑错了要求加薪的时间。
quiz.name: 7e97f87c72284ce1dd630c5981d47126.mp3

quiz.text: Actually I'm satisfied with your work. It's just unfair to others if I raise your salary this quickly.
quiz.nativeText: 其实我对你的表现很满意。只是如果你这么快就加薪，对其他人不公平。
quiz.name: ba633c8dd3dc3ac6e775f3a11c046c7b.mp3

quiz.text: I see. Then when will I get a raise?
quiz.nativeText: 了解，那我什么时候可以涨工资呢？
quiz.name: 011a79b5339328110dc9ae56bf0072ac.mp3

quiz.text: I will increase your salary if you pass the three-month probation period.
quiz.nativeText: 如果你能通三个月试用期，我就给你涨工资。
quiz.name: 988078587f1caf1efe6046ff9c1af20b.mp3

quiz.text: OK, I'll try my best.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，我一定会努力的。
quiz.name: 9b382fc15c5e83854c432beed5bba3e6.mp3

quiz.text: Hi, Jim. You seem upset recently. What's wrong?
quiz.nativeText: 嗨，吉姆。你最近看起来很不开心，发生什么事情了？
quiz.name: 8d9c4917f49b3956ee5e08e4e76fae68.mp3

quiz.text: This work is really turning me off.
quiz.nativeText: 我现在很烦工作。
quiz.name: a8979a3cfd42568392b8334b5d793138.mp3

quiz.text: Why? I thought you enjoyed your job.
quiz.nativeText: 为什么呢？我以为你喜欢你的工作的。
quiz.name: acb7fbb504c9b7dd4115f8ffa030e2f4.mp3

quiz.text: The stress has kept building up recently.
quiz.nativeText: 最近压力越来越大。
quiz.name: 1d19edf126f9ea853027e81e02895730.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, you have been working extra hours lately.
quiz.nativeText: 是啊，你最近总加班。
quiz.name: d2be800f47bf047c66afbcd75a7bf401.mp3

quiz.text: I'm feeling wiped out.
quiz.nativeText: 感觉整个人都快崩溃了。
quiz.name: 8faaffa8d750cfc54276d407450e84b1.mp3

quiz.text: I'm in tune with you. Workload aside, the salary is also too low.
quiz.nativeText: 我和你同感。而且工作累不说，工资还很低。
quiz.name: a40424c366077a5ce1f9b9aef5363740.mp3

quiz.text: I can't put up with it, either.
quiz.nativeText: 我也忍受不了了。
quiz.name: 47642f8a6e6577ef5bf771d3fed880ec.mp3

quiz.text: It might be better to change jobs.
quiz.nativeText: 换份工作可能就会好些吧。
quiz.name: 0fd2acf264edd573f27c657342717a87.mp3

quiz.text: Yeah, I agree.
quiz.nativeText: 嗯，我同意。
quiz.name: 97345e448ba0422e898fde96d57bb055.mp3

quiz.text: Sorry Peter, your position is being made redundant.
quiz.nativeText: 抱歉，彼得，公司不再需要你的岗位了。
quiz.name: 8b1d2343abb690ebe1b1ea3a44215964.mp3

quiz.text: Am I being fired? Why?
quiz.nativeText: 我是要被解雇了么？为什么啊？
quiz.name: ab537503d95d3221cae4bd86491debfd.mp3

quiz.text: The company is downsizing the work force now, so we have to let you go.
quiz.nativeText: 现在公司正在精简人员，所以我们不得不让你离开。
quiz.name: 2188bdac0e7ed1b1f69cbf75683a567c.mp3

quiz.text: We had an agreement. You are violating the contract.
quiz.nativeText: 我们签过协议的，你们这是违反合同。
quiz.name: 8fa61123f21287315905a00371f8fc25.mp3

quiz.text: The company can't carry out the agreement with you. However, you will get your compensation.
quiz.nativeText: 公司不能继续履约了，但是你可以拿到补偿。
quiz.name: e17f49f95eba26824321a71b2fa4150c.mp3

quiz.text: That's not fair!
quiz.nativeText: 这不公平！
quiz.name: 574648e1081cde33ec36078891060172.mp3

quiz.text: You can choose to resign yourself or be fired by the company.
quiz.nativeText: 你可以选择自己离职或是被公司开除。
quiz.name: 122f2d3fa0066ff3ae7883252d55cedc.mp3

quiz.text: It doesn't make any difference. I am losing my job anyway.
quiz.nativeText: 这没有任何区别，反正我都是丢了工作。
quiz.name: a146677947fb43be5111d3af7f849c4d.mp3

quiz.text: I suggest you take the former option, which will be good for your interview at your next job.
quiz.nativeText: 我建议你选择前者，这会对你下一份工作的面试有帮助。
quiz.name: 2af4107b23f8c9dad7763f899235f3c2.mp3

quiz.text: OK. Let me think about it.
quiz.nativeText: 好的，让我考虑一下。
quiz.name: 441996676d03569da7b87f143b5bfed2.mp3

quiz.text: What's wrong with you, Jim? You seem out of gas.
quiz.nativeText: 你怎么了，吉姆？你看上去没精打采的。
quiz.name: e5fcb90bf7d713de40030898b6312f90.mp3

quiz.text: Actually I want to resign.
quiz.nativeText: 其实我想申请辞职。
quiz.name: 3d16a1fc123ac2c32b95993422aa368c.mp3

quiz.text: Why quit now? I just got you a pay raise.
quiz.nativeText: 为什么现在辞职呢？我刚给你加薪。
quiz.name: e8ae0cb3744b63be4b1c52ce0ee7d756.mp3

quiz.text: I want to try a more promising job.
quiz.nativeText: 我想尝试一分更有发展的工作。
quiz.name: c56688a03fcf04fabfeede34b551d5ff.mp3

quiz.text: In that case, you have to submit notice of resignation two weeks in advance.
quiz.nativeText: 如果是这样，你得提前两周递交短职信。
quiz.name: 44cf7bce01cdbcb68ce7cd8ea52cf119.mp3

quiz.text: Sure. And I will perform my duties to ensure a smooth transition.
quiz.nativeText: 当然。我会继续履职，保证顺利交接。
quiz.name: 56f30c04ff7f453f05335306997f5636.mp3

quiz.text: Good. Hope you enjoy your new job.
quiz.nativeText: 很好，希望你喜欢你的新工作。
quiz.name: bd072612c4855e255b342420be6ad222.mp3

quiz.text: Thank you, boss!
quiz.nativeText: 谢谢你，老板。
quiz.name: 3ab014eb6c382670cd7a2dced3e33eca.mp3

quiz.text: The slowest buffalo are the sick and weak, so they die off first, making it possible for the herd to move at a faster pace.
quiz.nativeText: 最慢的那几头水牛是病的最严重、最虚弱的，所以它们会先死掉。
quiz.hilitText: The slowest buffalo are the {#*sick*$} and {#*weak*$}, so they die off first, {#*making*$} it possible for the herd to move at a faster pace.
quiz.ipa: ðə sloʊəst bʌfəloʊ ɑr ði sɪ{#*k*$} ænd wi{#*k*$} soʊ ðeɪ daɪ ɔf fɝst meɪ{#*k*$}ɪŋ ɪt pɑsəbəl frɝ ðə hɝd tu muv æt ə fæstɝ peɪs
quiz.name: 1dff76c6f09ee74109b95a9c9208ad3c.mp3

quiz.text: The moral of the story: Drink more beer; it will make you smarter.
quiz.nativeText: 所以这个故事告诉我们：多喝酒;这会使我们变得更聪明。
quiz.hilitText: The moral of the story: {#*Drink*$} more beer; it will {#*make*$} you smarter.
quiz.ipa: ðə mɔrəl ʌv ðə stɔri drɪŋ{#*k*$} mɔr bɪr ɪt wɪl meɪ{#*k*$} ju smɑrtɝ
quiz.name: 39de51c85b6a9b39de306b4cebf1972f.mp3

quiz.text: A herd of buffalo can only move as fast as the slowest buffalo,
quiz.nativeText: 一群水牛都以最慢的那几头牛的移动速度行进,
quiz.hilitText: A herd of buffalo {#*can*$} only move as fast as the slowest buffalo,
quiz.ipa: ə hɝd ʌv bʌfəloʊ {#*k*$}æn oʊnli muv æz fæst æz ðə sloʊəst bʌfəloʊ
quiz.name: bb4d546c54590d7fbcf4eed9c40ee527.mp3

quiz.text: much like the brain can only operate as fast as the slowest brain cells.
quiz.nativeText: 就好比一整个大脑都以最慢的那群脑细胞的速度运转。
quiz.hilitText: much {#*like*$} the brain {#*can*$} only operate as fast as the slowest brain cells.

quiz.name: 19c8d9168447d66ffe3c1e7769ed7390.mp3

quiz.text: The slowest buffalo are the sick and weak, so they die off first, making it possible for the herd to move at a faster pace.
quiz.nativeText: 最慢的那几头水牛是病的最严重、最虚弱的，所以它们会先死掉。
quiz.hilitText: The slowest buffalo are the {#*sick*$} and {#*weak*$}, so they die off first, {#*making*$} it possible for the herd to move at a faster pace.
quiz.ipa: ðə sloʊəst bʌfəloʊ ɑr ði sɪ{#*k*$} ænd wi{#*k*$} soʊ ðeɪ daɪ ɔf fɝst meɪ{#*k*$}ɪŋ ɪt pɑsəbəl frɝ ðə hɝd tu muv æt ə fæstɝ peɪs
quiz.name: 1dff76c6f09ee74109b95a9c9208ad3c.mp3

quiz.text: Like the buffalo, the weak, slow brain cells are the ones that are killed
quiz.nativeText: 最弱的、最慢的几个脑细胞就像水牛一样死掉，
quiz.hilitText: {#*Like*$} the buffalo, the {#*weak*$}, slow brain cells are the ones that are {#*killed*$}
quiz.ipa: laɪ{#*k*$} ðə bʌfəloʊ ðə wi{#*k*$} sloʊ breɪn sɛlz ɑr ðə wʌnz ðæt ɑr {#*k*$}ɪld
quiz.name: 6c14643c8b3a5ea57b229686ca6277b1.mp3

quiz.text: by excessive beer drinking and socializing, making the brain operate faster.
quiz.nativeText: 它们被过量的啤酒和社交会杀死，从而令整个大脑运转的更快。
quiz.hilitText: by {#*excessive*$} beer {#*drinking*$} and socializing, {#*making*$} the brain operate faster.

quiz.name: e03fd79a9da5951ef4e7b46a345bdebd.mp3

quiz.text: This guy goes to the doctor for a checkup.
quiz.nativeText: 有个人去医生那里做健康检查。
quiz.hilitText: This {#*guy*$} {#*goes*$} to the doctor for a checkup.
quiz.ipa: ðɪs {#*ɡ*$}aɪ {#*ɡ*$}oʊz tu ðə dɑktɝ fɝ ə tʃɛkʌp
quiz.name: ef6c3a70cfea3262550b237e76888b39.mp3

quiz.text: "Thank God. I was afraid I had cancer!"
quiz.nativeText: “感谢上帝。我还以为我得癌症了呢。”
quiz.hilitText: "Thank {#*God*$}. I was afraid I had cancer!"
quiz.ipa: θæŋk {#*ɡ*$}ɑd aɪ wɑz əfreɪd aɪ hæd kænsɝ
quiz.name: bdf651ffa0bf38ab3f4766336434e464.mp3

quiz.text: This guy goes to the doctor for a checkup.
quiz.nativeText: 有个人去医生那里做健康检查。
quiz.hilitText: This {#*guy*$} {#*goes*$} to the doctor for a checkup.
quiz.ipa: ðɪs {#*ɡ*$}aɪ {#*ɡ*$}oʊz tu ðə dɑktɝ fɝ ə tʃɛkʌp
quiz.name: ef6c3a70cfea3262550b237e76888b39.mp3

quiz.text: After some tests, the doctor comes in with a grave look on his face.
quiz.nativeText: 一些测试之后，医生表情凝重的走进来。
quiz.hilitText: After some tests, the doctor comes in with a {#*grave*$} look on his face.
quiz.ipa: æftɝ sʌm tɛsts ðə dɑktɝ kʌmz ɪn wɪð ə {#*ɡ*$}reɪv lʊk ɑn hɪz feɪs
quiz.name: 42252f6cb26251b9c94da38a0a2bd6e7.mp3

quiz.text: "Well, I have some bad news and some really bad news."
quiz.nativeText: “是这样，我有一个坏消息和一个特别坏的消息。”
quiz.hilitText: "Well, I have some bad news and some really bad news."
quiz.ipa: wɛl aɪ hæv sʌm bæd nuz ænd sʌm rili bæd nuz
quiz.name: 3a5767b8d71ca37f2d35bc7158f9294a.mp3

quiz.text: "Well, give me the really bad news first."
quiz.nativeText: “那就先告诉我特别坏的消息吧。”
quiz.hilitText: "Well, {#*give*$} me the really bad news first."
quiz.ipa: wɛl {#*ɡ*$}ɪv mi ðə rili bæd njuz fɝst
quiz.name: 954e8725837c0c25cec0f753b9566db2.mp3

quiz.text: "You have cancer, and only six months to live."
quiz.nativeText: “你患了癌症，只有六个月的时间了。”
quiz.hilitText: "You have cancer, and only six months to live."
quiz.ipa: ju hæv kænsɝ ənd oʊnli sɪks mʌnθs tu lɪv
quiz.name: 64f0272285392ff4c7ec51280b99e93e.mp3

quiz.text: "Doing my Christmas shopping early." the thief said in a low voice.

quiz.text: "Don't murmur, please," said the judge, "How early were you doing this shopping?"

quiz.text: Embarrassed, the thief answered, "Before the store opened."
